40001001	Buku wo ka mbembɛŋ bi ka Yisɔs Kraist wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Dauda baŋ mɛnɛ Ebrahim na woŋ baŋ:
40001002	Ebrahim na nde fanda ka Aisaki, Aisaki na fanda ka Yakuba, Yakuba na fanda ka Yuda mɛnɛ mbɛndama beŋ,
40001003	Yuda na fanda ka Pirɛsi mɛnɛ Sira bi mpuu ndɛ iŋ Tema beŋ, Pirɛsi na fanda ka Hɛsirɔŋ, Hɛsirɔŋ na fanda ka Rami,
40001004	Rami na fanda ka Aminadabi, fanda ka Nasoŋ, Nasoŋ na fanda ka Salamoŋ,
40001005	Salamoŋ na fanda ka Boasi wo mpuu ndɛ iŋ wɔtɔ nama Rehabi woŋ, Boasi na fanda ka Obɛdi wo mpuu ndɛ iŋ wɔtɔ nama Ruthi woŋ, Obɛdi na fanda ka Yɛsi,
40001006	Yɛsi na fanda ka Dauda wo gbaku woŋ. Awa Dauda na nde fanda ka Silamani wo mpuu ndɛ iŋ wɔtɔ ka Yuraya woŋ,
40001007	Silamani na fanda ka Rɛhobowami, Rɛhobowami na fanda ka Abaiya, Abaiya na fanda ka Asa,
40001008	Asa na fanda ka Yɛhosafathi, Yɛhosafathi na fanda ka Yorami, Yorami na fanda ka Yusaiya,
40001009	Yusaiya na fanda ka Yothami, Yothami na fanda ka Ahasi, Ahasi na fanda ka Hɛsɛkaya,
40001010	Hɛsɛkaya na fanda ka Manasa, Manasa na fanda ka Emɔni, Emɔni na fanda ka Yosaya,
40001011	Yosaya na fanda ka Yɛkonaya mɛnɛ mbɛndama, ka lɔkɔ ba biYusu beŋ katuwo ka Babilɔŋ iŋ kuyombo koŋ.
40001012	Naa thanki bindɛ katuwo iŋ kuyombo koŋ ka Babilɔŋ, Yɛkonaya see mpuu Sialitɛli na, Sialitɛli na fanda ka Sɛrubabɛli,
40001013	Sɛrubabɛli na fanda ka Abiyudu, Abiyudu na fanda ka Ɛliakimi, Ɛliakimi na fanda ka Esori,
40001014	Esori na fanda ka Sedɔki, Sedɔki na fanda ka Ekimi, Ekimi na fanda ka Ilaiyudi,
40001015	Ilaiyudi na fanda ka Ɛliesa, Ɛliesa na fanda ka Mathani, Mathani na fanda ka Yakuba,
40001016	Yakuba na fanda ka Yusufu, wanda ka Mariyama, nanda ka Yisɔs woŋ, wo domo Banikisi woŋ.
40001017	Huna mbembɛŋ beŋ nda fooma ŋaye ka Ebrahim kaaŋ ka Dauda bi kiŋ mbembɛŋ kɔhi iŋ binaŋ, awa ŋaye ka Dauda kaaŋ ka katuwo hu ka biya beŋ haŋ iŋ kuyombo koŋ ka Babilɔŋ bi kiŋ kɔhi iŋ binaŋ, awa ŋaye ka katuwo bindɛ ka Babilɔŋ ka iŋ mpoo hu ka Banikisi woŋ haŋ, bi kiŋ mbembɛŋ kɔhi iŋ binaŋ.
40001018	Nanaŋ baŋ nɛna niiye nde mpoo hu ka Yisɔs Kraist haŋ. Yusufu na nde hathi Mariyama na, nanda ka Yisɔs, kɛrɛ ndɛ tha niŋ niye sikine wɔtɔ nama, Mariyama see mpuu hati wathe maŋaye ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ.
40001019	Kɛrɛ Yusufu wo wandama woŋ, wɔ ka Masaala na ndɛ awa ndɛ thimota nde ba niŋ thiminuwa dɛkuiŋ ka biya. Huna ndɛ see siyi ba niŋ pɛna nasɔɔyi na sa biya wuŋ kothiye.
40001020	Kɛrɛ naa ndɛ huŋ siyi ka thukuma nama haŋ, maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ see niŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka mandɛ, e ndɛ niŋ tepe, na “Yusufu, yindo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Dauda baŋ woŋ, ba payɔ ba sɛkitha Mariyama na nɔŋ wɔtɔ nda, baa hɔɔyɛ hu niyɔy ndɛ haŋ ndɛ kute huŋ maŋaye ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ baŋ.
40001021	Ndɛ kɔŋ mpuu hati wathe awa yi kɔŋ niŋ thundu keŋ na Yisɔs, baa ndɛ kɔŋ si ni biya nama beŋ kisi maŋaye ka hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.”
40001022	Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde Mariki woŋ haŋ ka hothi hu ka banabi woŋ:
40001023	na, “Hati bɛthɔ wo ba hɛ niyɔ iŋ wathe kɔŋ niyɔ hɔɔyɛ awa ndɛ kɔŋ mpuu hati wathe, awa ndɛ kɔŋ thunda keŋ na Imanuɛli,” wu thalintando ba dɔma na, “Masaala kiŋ iŋ miŋ.”
40001024	Naa thɔhɔy Yusufu, ndɛ ni nɔŋ na tepe niŋ maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ na ba sɛkitha Mariyama na nɔŋ wɔtɔ nama.
40001025	Kɛrɛ ndɛ tha niŋ kɔthɔ yɛrɛmɛ haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na see ndɛ mpuu hati wathe. Awa ndɛ niŋ thunda keŋ na Yisɔs.
40002001	Naa see Yisɔs mpaa ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi ba ka Yudiya, ka yamana wo ka gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi, biyɛthɛŋ bikele bi thanuwɛ ba sosɛŋ beŋ ŋaye kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ e bindɛ saa ka Yɛrusalɛmi kaŋ thɔnthiŋinuwa ba dɔma,
40002002	na “Thɔɔ ka gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ wo mpoo woŋ? Miŋ kute sosa nama woŋ kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ, awa huna see miŋ ba niŋ si niya kubatho.”
40002003	Naa yuye huŋ gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi, ndɛ payɔy wumandiŋ. Nɛna niyɔy hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ wuŋ iŋ biya bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ fooma.
40002004	Awa ndɛ kɔminande ka tha banthe fooma bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bikarimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, e ndɛ bindɛ thɔnthiŋina ba ka tha ka Banikisi woŋ ba mpoo.
40002005	Bindɛ mɛyiyɛ niŋ, na “Ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi ka bompi wo ka Yudiya, baa nɛna gbale nde banabi woŋ: ‘Masaala tepe, na
40002006	Awa yi, Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi, yindo ka bompi wo ka Yudiya, yi athahuwɔ kɛrɛ yina wunthe ka bakɛrɛni bisɔbɛ beŋ ka bompi wo ka Yudiya, baa maŋaye kɛnda kɛna bakɛrɛŋ woŋ ŋaye wo si kɛriŋiyɛ biyaŋ biIsirɛli beŋ.’ ”
40002007	Kɛna thiyi Hɛrɔdi biya bikele beŋ magbɔma ba kɔthɔ kɛnamɛŋ lɔkɔ bagbeeŋ ba toŋineke sosa woŋ baŋ.
40002008	Awa kɛna ŋindi ndɛ bindɛ ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi e ndɛ dɔma, na “Kaaŋ deethi kuthɛgbɛ nathɛ ba hati woŋ baŋ. Awa naa beŋ kute niŋ, saaŋ yama tepe. Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ gbeeŋ kɔŋ key ba niŋ ka niya kubatho.”
40002009	Naa thanki bindɛ nunkunoko iŋ gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi, bindɛ key kubiyasi namɛŋ koŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy. Awa sosa wo kute nde bindɛ kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ woŋ kɔtiyɔkɔi bindɛ, haaŋ yɔkɔŋ naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka hati woŋ kɛ e ndɛ kɔ kɔɔ.
40002010	Naa kute bindɛ na kɔɔyɛ sosa woŋ, wuŋ yehe bindɛ awa bindɛ yehitɔkɔi wumandiŋ.
40002011	Bindɛ biyande ka banka baŋ e bindɛ kuta Mariyama na iŋ hati woŋ, awa kɛna kunthuŋe bindɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Yisɔs e bindɛ niŋ niya kubatho. Kɛna thiye bindɛ thɛnkɔ ka ponthoiŋ namɛŋ baŋ e bindɛ nkaa hati woŋ munkii muboyi, gbomgbo ba domo na Fankinsɛnsi, mɛnɛ tɛɛni ba domo na Mari.
40002012	Naa ŋɔyɛ bindɛ ka nine, Masaala yeli bindɛ ka mandɛ ba bi be tha nda dapiyɔkɔ ka Hɛrɔdi ka. Awa naa bohe bindɛ duwa, bindɛ fuŋe gboŋa bahɛna ba duwa kɛnamɛŋ ka.
40002013	Naa key bindɛ, maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ tɔŋinɔkɔy Yusufu na ka mandɛ e niŋ tepe, na “Ŋaye, e yi gbɔnina hati woŋ iŋ nandama dondo baŋ, awa e beŋ kaa ka Iyipiti, awa kɛna beŋ niyɔ haaŋ yɔkɔŋ yaŋ tepe nɔŋ bena ba beŋ duwa, baa Hɛrɔdi kɔŋ deethi hati woŋ ba niŋ kɔra.”
40002014	Awa naa ŋaye ndɛ ka nine haŋ, ndɛ sekithe hati woŋ iŋ nandama woŋ huyɛ e bindɛ kaa ka Iyipiti.
40002015	Kɛna niyɔy bindɛ haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na tuku Hɛrɔdi. Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde Mariki woŋ haŋ ka hothi hu ka banabi woŋ, na “Maŋaye ka Iyipiti kɛna thiye yaŋ hatiŋ wowathe woŋ.”
40002016	Naa kute Hɛrɔdi ba wuŋ niyɔ na biyɛthɛŋ bikele beŋ thɔkɔŋ niŋ, ndɛ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛna dunkuŋ ndɛ yamari ba hati o hati wowathe wo tɛŋinɛ thanina thaye maa wo ba hɛ tindɛ tɛŋɛŋ ba ndɛ koro, there ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi, awa mɛnɛ lonkori wo tɔpɛ kɛndɛ woŋ fooma, baa biyɛthɛŋ bikele beŋ tepe niŋ ba sosa woŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ bɛrɛ ba thanina thaye nda.
40002017	Hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Yɛrɛmaya haŋ see niyɔ nɔndi,
40002018	ba dɔma, na “Thampa yuyo ka Rama, boka iŋ sampɛrɛŋ bamandiŋ. Retɛli kɔŋ bereŋ ba mpati nama, awa ndɛ tha mɛyi ba thaayuwo, baa ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda bindɛ kutu.”
40002019	Naa tuku Hɛrɔdi, maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ see tɔŋinɔkɔ Yusufu na ka mandɛ ka Iyipiti, e ndɛ dɔma, na
40002020	“Ŋaye e yi sɛkitha hati woŋ mɛnɛ nandama, e beŋ kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Isirɛli, baa bi nde deethi ba kɔra hati woŋ thanki tuukuwa.”
40002021	Yusufu ŋaye e ndɛ sɛkitha hati woŋ mɛnɛ nandama na e bindɛ duwa ka Isirɛli.
40002022	Kɛrɛ naa yuye Yusufu ba dɔma na Akɛleyɔsi na pɛyɛtɔi huybakine hu ka fandama Hɛrɔdi haŋ ka Yudiya, ndɛ see thooyo payɔ ba kaa kɛndɛ. Kɛna see ndɛ yela ka mandɛ iŋ maleka wo ka Masaala woŋ ba ndɛ be tha key kɛndɛ. Awa ndɛ key ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ.
40002023	Kɛna key ndɛ niyɔ ka mɛti banthe ba dɔma na ka Nasarɛthi, haliko hu tepe nde banabiŋ beŋ haŋ ba hati woŋ hu be niyɔ nɔndi, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ dɔma Nasarini.”
40003001	Ka malɔkɔ mabɛina Yɔni wo Babiye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ see kaŋ niya kɛwandi ka wula ba ka Yudiya.
40003002	Ndɛ dome, na “Sikinaŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ ndeŋ baŋ, e beŋ biyo biye hu ka Masaala haŋ, baa huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ thuriye.”
40003003	Ndɛ woŋ baŋ na nde banabi woŋ Aisaya gbonkiyiyɛ woŋ ba dɔma, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ yɛli thampa ka wula baŋ, na ‘Kɔsinɔkɔŋ gboŋa baŋ ba Mariki woŋ, awa e beŋ bɛŋ thumbunuwa natoloŋ.’ ”
40003004	Awa Yɔni thooyeŋ nde yaba ba yehinuwo maŋaye ka bɔɔyɛ bu ka maama wo domo na nyɔkɔmɛ. Awa e ndɛ pitha mbumbusa ki ka nthagba ka hirika nama haŋ, e ndɛ nde kɔ thɔma sisiŋ mɛnɛ tɔŋɔ.
40003005	Kɛna penko ndɛ iŋ biya bi ŋaye ka Yɛrusalɛmi mɛnɛ bi ka bompi wo ka Yudiya fooma, mɛnɛ bi ka bompi wo ka Yɔdaŋ fooma.
40003006	Kɛna tɛŋinɔkɔi bindɛ hakɛŋ bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ nagberekethe awa ndɛ biye bindɛ biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ.
40003007	Kɛrɛ naa kute Yɔni biFaresini mɛnɛ biSadusini bibɔyɛ bi si see kɛnama ba biyo, ndɛ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Beŋ, bendo kubɔri ku ka wɔthɔiŋ beŋ, nkaana yelɛ bena ba beŋ kita kugbasaŋati ku ka Masaala koŋ, ku ndɛ ba bena niya koŋ?
40003008	Niyaŋ bɛyiniŋ ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na beŋ sikiyɔkɔi ŋaye ka hakɛŋ ndeŋ baŋ.
40003009	Baŋ thɛrɛŋ ba kathiŋɔkɔ ba dɔma, na ‘Mpati bi ka Ebrahim bina miŋ.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, Masaala punkeŋ sɛkitha tharaka thaŋ thaŋ e ndɛ thɛŋ sikinande mpati bi ka Ebrahim.
40003010	Hali ka tete kubapi koŋ yenthiŋino nda ba thonka nthanthɛŋ ki ka ŋayeŋ ŋaŋ kiŋ, baa kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ ku sa tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy ku kɔŋ yuuta e kuŋ yelo ka buu buŋ.
40003011	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena biye iŋ mandi baa beŋ sikiŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ bakendeŋ baŋ; kɛrɛ hiŋ wɔ si see wo yamɛ ba yaŋ kaye-kaye. Yaŋ teŋeta hintiŋ nthɔŋ ba niŋ bohiyɛ dagbalɛŋ nama baŋ. Ndɛ na wɔ bɛina wo si sɛkɛthi Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ awa mɛnɛ buu ba bena biiye.
40003012	Ndɛ boheŋ kubonka koŋ ka yɔnkɔ nama haŋ, ba huukuwa gbethe nama baŋ. Ndɛ kɔŋ kɔsɔŋ paka baŋ ka kuhunkuŋ nama koŋ, e sɛkitha ŋawoi ŋaŋ e ŋɛŋ yɛla ka buu bu sa dɔmɔ buŋ.”
40003013	Kɛna see Yisɔs ka Yɔni ŋaye ka Kalili ba biyo iŋ Yɔni ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ.
40003014	Kɛrɛ Yɔni pinde niŋ e niŋ tepe, na “Yina sisande ba yama biye; mbɛ hu yi see kiyaŋ do ba biyo?”
40003015	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Wu niyɔyŋ nda tete, baa wu kɔŋ ni ba miŋ thanka niya fooma mathumbɛ ma thimo Masaala maŋ.” Kɛna mɛyi ntiŋ Yɔni ba niŋ biye.
40003016	Naa biyo Yisɔs, ndɛ fuŋ yako ka mandi maŋ. Awa kɛna pɛthɔi ka ariana e ndɛ kuta Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ si thuhu ka mathɔyande ma ka kurotho e tutɔ Yisɔs na.
40003017	Kɛna yuye Yɔni thampa maŋaye ka ariana tha tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Hatiŋ wowathe wo thimo yaŋ woŋ na woŋ baŋ, wo yeheŋ yama thukuma woŋ.”
40004001	Kɛna see Yisɔs kata iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ ka wula baŋ ba ka gberiŋino iŋ Sithani, Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ.
40004002	Yisɔs bohe suŋ ba gbɛɛni kɔnthɔ kanaŋ iŋ hura kɔnthɔ kanaŋ. Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ kɔnthɔ bohe niŋ.
40004003	Kɛna see Bathiiki woŋ ka Yisɔs e ndɛ dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ, niya hɛ tharaka thaŋ thaŋ yamari tha be sikiyɔkɔ muthɔma.”
40004004	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe, na ‘Muthɔma nagbɛti kutɛ ni ba wɔmɛti niyɔ iŋ sii, kɛrɛ sɔkɔ o sɔkɔ hu Masaala tɛpi huna ni ba wɔmɛti niyɔ iŋ sii.’ ”
40004005	Kɛna sekithe niŋ Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ e niŋ kata ka mɛti bakuwɛ ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ, ba dɔma baŋ na ka Yɛrusalɛmi, e niŋ ka tuta ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ka thinthi,
40004006	awa e tɛpa ka Yisɔs, na “Mɛnɛ yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ, yɛlɔkɔ hɛ ka pothi, baa magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala kɔŋ ni yamari malekɛŋ nama beŋ ba yina dethiteke, awa bi kɔŋ yina thaye, haliko kuthaki nda koŋ ku be tha hintiŋ thuŋɔ raka hunthe.’ ”
40004007	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe hɛlɛŋ, na ‘Yi ka ba gbɛriŋina Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ.’ ”
40004008	Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ sekithe hɛlɛŋ niŋ e niŋ ka dunkuta ka kusɛri ku kuthɔɔkuwɛ-thɔɔkuwɛ koŋ ka thinthi, e niŋ toŋine fooma thagbakinɛ tha ka faydo thaŋ iŋ nanhuluiŋ babɛina fooma.
40004009	Kɛna tepe niŋ Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina dunkune muŋ muŋ baŋ fooma mɛnɛ yi kɔŋ yama kunthuŋuyɛ e yi yama niya kubatho.”
40004010	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs Sithani na ba dɔma, na “Gbɔniyɔkɔ yama dondo baŋ, baa magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe, na ‘Yɔkɔŋ yi be ni kubatho Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ; ndɛ wuntheŋ nape, ndɛ na yi ba niyiyɛ wali.’ ”
40004011	Kɛna peneke ntiŋ niŋ Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ. Awa malekɛŋ see mase Yisɔs na.
40004012	Naa yuye Yisɔs ba dɔma na Yɔni boho e ndɛ thiyo ka yeeli woŋ, Yisɔs key ka Kalili.
40004013	Kɛrɛ ndɛ tha kahati ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ. Ndɛ key doŋe ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi ka gbaraŋ ba mankɔ maŋ, ka bompi wo ka Sɛbulɔŋ mɛnɛ ka Nafatalai,
40004014	haliko hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Aisaya ka kuthagba nama koŋ haŋ hu be thiŋ. Ndɛ tepe nde ba dɔma, na
40004015	“Kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sɛbulɔŋ mɛnɛ kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Nafatalai, wu tɔpɛ mankɔ maŋ, haaŋ thuhandeŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ, kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili ka siyani bahɛna baŋ ka,
40004016	Biya bi dɔŋɔy kɛndɛ ka huntuma humandiŋ haŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ kutu waŋ bamandiŋ. Awa iŋ ba biya bi dɔŋɔy ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka huntuma hu ka tuka haŋ koŋ, waŋ ba kɔŋ bindɛ bende.”
40004017	There ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs sɛsi ba niya kɛwandi ba dɔma, na “Sikiyɔkɔŋ maŋaye ka hakɛŋ ndeŋ baŋ, baa huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ thuriye.”
40004018	Naa nde Yisɔs kaande ka gbaraŋ ba ka mankɔ ma ka Kalili maŋ, ndɛ kute biya biye bi huwɛndiya, Saimɔŋ wo domo Pita woŋ mɛnɛ wɛndama Anduru, bi si yɛli ŋapɛli ka mankɔ ka, baa bayɔsiŋ bina bindɛ.
40004019	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yemaŋ yama, awa yaŋ kɔŋ bena sikiŋ bayɔsiŋ biyamɛti.”
40004020	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina bindɛ pɛyi ŋapɛli namɛŋ ŋaŋ e bindɛ yema Yisɔs na.
40004021	Naa Yisɔs key biyasi nama haŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy, ndɛ kute hɛlɛŋ biya biye bi huwɛndiya, Yemisi mɛnɛ wɛndama Yɔni bi doŋe ka gbe baŋ mɛnɛ fandamɛŋ Sɛbɛdi bi si yeheni ŋapɛli namɛŋ ŋaŋ. Kɛna thiyi bindɛ Yisɔs.
40004022	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina bindɛ pɛyi gbe baŋ mɛnɛ fandamɛŋ e bindɛ yema Yisɔs na.
40004023	Awa Yisɔs key kaŋ kaande fooma ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili kaŋ thaninuwa iŋ kaŋ niya kɛwandi biya beŋ Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba huybakine hu ka Masaala haŋ ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ. Ndɛ puyi fooma nthoonani kihakuwande mɛnɛ kɔnthɔhiliŋ bi ka ŋakɔtɔ fooma ka biya bi kɛndɛ beŋ.
40004024	Kɛna see keŋ ku ka Yisɔs gbanthande fooma ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Siriya. Biya beŋ bohe sisa bithoonuwɔi beŋ fooma ka Yisɔs, bi iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande, bi iŋ bumbuŋɛŋ, bi kutande iŋ mbayiŋ, bi bɔhɔi makɛndɔiŋ, mɛnɛ bigbɛsinkɔi. Yisɔs puyi bindɛ fooma.
40004025	Awa sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme Yisɔs na maŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili, ka Mɛtiŋ Kɔhi baŋ, ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya, mɛnɛ ŋaye thuhaŋ mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ.
40005001	Naa kute Yisɔs na pɛnkande niŋ sɛthɛ baŋ, ndɛ dunkɔy ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi. Naa dɔŋɔy ndɛ kɛndɛ, kɛna see bakarandeni nama beŋ niŋ pɛnkiyande.
40005002	Kɛna sɛsi ndɛ ba thaninuwa biya beŋ ba dɔma, na
40005003	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi kɔthɛ beŋ ba dɔma na bi kiŋ ba kuta kumase ka Masaala, baa bindɛ bina biyɛ huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ.
40005004	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi boki beŋ, baa Masaala kɔŋ bindɛ thaayi.
40005005	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi thathinɔkɔy beŋ, baa Masaala kɔŋ thiŋiŋ lahiri ba ni ndɛ bindɛ baŋ.
40005006	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi iŋ kufiyo ba niya mathumbɛ nɔŋ na wɔmɛti kaho kɔnthɔ iŋ kumbɛ, baa Masaala kɔŋ bindɛ thimbiŋ.
40005007	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi kutiyɛ biya bihɛna nkinikiniŋ beŋ, baa Masaala kɔŋ bindɛ kutiyɛ nkinikiniŋ.
40005008	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi mɛthɛ thathukuma beŋ, baa bi kɔŋ kutiyɔkɔ Masaala na.
40005009	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi thiyi mathɛbɛ beŋ, baa bi kɔŋ thiya mpati bi ka Masaala.
40005010	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bi niya thɔrɔ beŋ saathɛ ba mathumbɛ, baa bindɛ bina biyɛ huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ.
40005011	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka bendo biyamɛti yaki beŋ, e bindɛ bena kɔ niya thɔrɔ, awa e bindɛ bena kɔ tɛpiyɛ bɛyiniŋ fooma bahothi saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
40005012	Yɔhɔŋ thathukuma awa e beŋ yehitɔkɔ, baa beŋ kiŋ iŋ kuthunkuŋ kumandiŋ ka ariana, baa nɛna niyo nde banabiŋ bi kɔtiyɔkɔi nde bena beŋ thɔrɔ iŋ biyamɛti.
40005013	“Beŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mɛɛti ma ba biyamɛti fooma, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ mɛɛti maŋ piriŋiŋ wuthimɔy wukɛnama wuŋ, nama nda mɛŋ niye ba mɛŋ thimɔ? Mɛŋ sa nda yɔhɔ ba bɛyi o bɛyi, yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ nda ba mɛŋ yelo ka biyamɛti mɛŋ yaathuwe iŋ ŋathaki namɛŋ ŋaŋ.
40005014	“Beŋ athɔyande hɛlɛŋ nɔŋ waŋ ba ka faydo baŋ. Mɛti ba thoyo ka kusɛri ka thinthi, bɛŋ sa punku nununo.
40005015	Wɔmɛti o ka wo bohoŋ mumɔɔli e muŋ pututa kuma. Kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ muŋ tutu ka ntha, awa e ndɛ muŋ kiya ka banka baŋ mateete ka muŋ dunkune waŋ ka banka baŋ fooma.
40005016	Niyaŋ ba waŋ ndeŋ baŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biyamɛti, wuna bindɛ kutu bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ba beŋ ni baŋ, awa bindɛ thunkunuwa Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ.
40005017	“Baŋ siyi ba dɔma na yaŋ see ka thɔnkina Sirani ba ka Musa baŋ mɛnɛ mathanani ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ. Yaŋ tha see ka thɔnkina muŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ see ka thiŋina muŋ.
40005018	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ. Hanimaa ka ariana iŋ ka fay woŋ ka kiŋ hintiŋ, siraŋ ba yamɛ nthɔŋ nda mɛɛsa baŋ ka Sirani baŋ, ba kiŋ ba kosino. Ba kiŋ ba kosino haaŋ ka mapeye ma ka fay woŋ maŋ.
40005019	Wɔ o wɔ wo sa putiyɔ yamari womɛɛsɛ ka yamariŋ baŋ baŋ, awa e ndɛ thaninuwa biya ba yema gboŋa babɛina, wɔ bɛina sa niyɔ iŋ makooye ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ. Kɛrɛ wo bɛŋ putiyɔ e ndɛ bɛŋ thaninuwa, wɔ bɛina na womandiŋ ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ.
40005020	Yaŋ tepe bena, yɔkɔŋ mathumbɛ makendeŋ maŋ daŋande ma ka bikarimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, beŋ sa punku biyande ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ.
40005021	“Beŋ thanki nde yuyɛ biyamɛti bi si nde tepo ba dɔma, na ‘Ba kɔri wɔmɛti; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo kɔri, ndɛ kɔŋ kɔnsiŋina.’
40005022	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔɔ ka mathoŋ wumandiŋ ba ntɔ nama, ndɛ kɔŋ kɔnsiŋina. Wɔ o wɔ wo yaki ntɔ nama na, ndɛ kɔŋ sisa ka kaama woŋ. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo dɔŋ ntɔ nama na, na ‘Wɔ thɔkɔi na yi,’ ndɛ kɔŋ yɛla ka buu bu ka yahanama buŋ.
40005023	Huna mɛnɛ yi key ka bɛsɛ ba fuŋune saraka baŋ ka Masaala ba dunkuna munkii mukɛnda muŋ, awa e yi kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yi ni ntɔ nda na wunɛnɔy,
40005024	pɛya munkii mukɛnda muŋ ka bɛsɛ baŋ, awa e yi kaa ba yehinuwa wunɛnɔy wu mateete makɛnda wuŋ iŋ ntɔ nda. Awa e yi ntiŋ saa ba si dunkuna munkii nda muŋ ka bɛsɛ baŋ.
40005025	“Bɔha wo katɛ yina ka kaama woŋ hunyathikiya. Ndɛ wo yina ka dunkuŋ ka bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ, awa bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ yina dunkuna ka wo dethiteke kaama woŋ, awa badethiteke kaama woŋ yina thiya ka yeeli woŋ.
40005026	Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, yi sa fuŋ kɛndɛ gbɔ, yɔkɔŋ yi thunkuŋ sɛnti womankɛ woŋ.
40005027	“Beŋ thanki nde yuyɛ biyamɛti bi si nde tepo ba dɔma, na ‘Ba ni kubɛi iŋ yɛrɛmɛ wo yɛntɔi iŋ wɔ hɛna.’
40005028	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo dethi yɛrɛmɛ wo ka wɔ hɛna e ndɛ niyɔ iŋ kufiyo ba ŋɔɔ iŋ wundɛ, wɔ bɛina thanki nda niya kubɛi iŋ wundɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ.
40005029	Mɛnɛ hooya nda huthome haŋ ni ba yi niya hakɛ, fuŋuna huŋ, e yi huŋ yɛla. Wu kɔŋ yina niyɔ hita ba piriŋina ntha kinthe ka kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ ayaŋ ba kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma yelo ka yahanama.
40005030	Awa mɛnɛ yɔnkɔ nda huthome haŋ ni ba yi niya hakɛ, thoŋa huŋ, e yi huŋ yɛla. Wu kɔŋ yina niyɔ hita ba piriŋina ntha kinthe ka kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ ayaŋ ba kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma yelo ka yahanama.
40005031	“Wuŋ tepo nde hɛlɛŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Wɔ o wɔ wo baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama, wɔ bɛina kiŋ ba dunkune woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kuthagba ku iŋ magbali ma tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na bindɛ paŋande.’
40005032	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama na, mahɛŋ ma wo yɛrɛmɛ woŋ tha ni kubɛi, ndɛ ni ba woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ niya kubɛi mɛnɛ ndɛ key yɛnta iŋ wathe wohɛna. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛnti yɛrɛmɛ wo baŋino ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ siiya, wɔ bɛina ni kubɛi awa ndɛ teeti kuyɛntande kutiyɔ koŋ.
40005033	“Beŋ yuye nde hɛlɛŋ na tepo wuŋ ka biya bimayoŋ beŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Wɔ ba teeti lahiri ba thanki ndɛ gbiŋiyɛ ka Mariki woŋ ba niya. Wɔ bɛina kiŋ ba niya ba thanki ndɛ niya lahiri baŋ.’
40005034	Awa yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ hintiŋ nthɔŋ gbiŋ hali. Baŋ gbiŋ ka ariana, baa kɛna yensi hu ka Masaala haŋ.
40005035	Maa ka faydo, baa dɛna Masaala kiye ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ. Maa ka Yɛrusalɛmi, baa mɛti ba ka Gbaku wo yamɛ gbakuiŋ woŋ bɛna.
40005036	Awa wɔ bɛiŋ gbiŋ yaha nama, baa wɔ ka wo punku niya ba mbɔɔyɛ nama kinthe huha maa kiŋ bɔlɔ.
40005037	Bɛyi o bɛyi ba wɔ gbonkoy ba niyɔyŋ ‘ndo’ maa ‘ade.’ Bɛyi o bɛyi ba nda ndinta kɛndɛ, bɛŋ ŋaye ka Wɔ Nɛnɔi woŋ.
40005038	“Beŋ yuye nde na tepo wuŋ, na ‘Naa wɔ tambe ntɔ nama na hooya, ndɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ tamba hooya. Awa naa wɔ thinke ntɔ nama na thithi, ndɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ thinka thithi.’
40005039	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ tɛnkɛŋ banɛnɔy ka bi bena ni banɛnɔy beŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ thoroŋ yina ka kuwaabu kuthome koŋ, dapiniyande niŋ kuwaabu kupɔkɔdɔ koŋ, ndɛ be hɛlɛŋ yina thoroŋ.
40005040	Awa mɛnɛ wɔ ni yina sɔkɔ ba yaba nda bakaake baŋ, mba ŋutiyɛ nda niŋ kuhɔli koŋ.
40005041	Awa mɛnɛ wɔ pithite yina ba niŋ pɛɛta kuragba kunthe, kata niŋ ŋaragba ŋaye.
40005042	Dunkuneŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo bena yawute, awa baŋ baŋanti wɔ yo wɔ wo bena theete ntha yo ntha.
40005043	“Beŋ yuye nde na tepo wuŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Thimo binyathikiŋ bikɛnda, awa e yi thambo bihadeni bikɛnda.’
40005044	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, thimoŋ bihadeni bikendeŋ, awa e beŋ niyiyɛ ŋaraminɛ bi bena ni thɔrɔ beŋ,
40005045	huna beŋ niyɔ mpati bi ka Fanda ndeŋ woŋ ka ariana. Yemitɔŋ bayɔhɔy ba ka Masaala baŋ, wo niyɛ ba kaŋ nama woŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biya bi ni banɛnɔy beŋ mɛnɛ ka bi ni bayɔhɔy beŋ. Awa Masaala toŋite koyoŋ woŋ ka bithumbɛ beŋ mɛnɛ ka bisikɔi beŋ.
40005046	Mɛnɛ beŋ thimo hɔkɔŋ bi thimo bena beŋ, mbɛ kuthunkuŋ ku beŋ kutu? E nɛŋ kutɛ bahakɛŋ bi tha sikiŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ beŋ ni?
40005047	Awa mɛnɛ beŋ kɔ maaŋ hɔkɔŋ bintɔni ndeŋ beŋ, nama hakiyande beŋ iŋ biya bihɛna beŋ? E nɛŋ kutɛ bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya beŋ ni?
40005048	Yɔkɔŋ beŋ be niyɔ biya bi thankinuwɛ ka niya bayɔhɔy nɔŋ na Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ na.
40006001	“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba beŋ be tha tindɛ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biyamɛti ka bayɔhɔy ba beŋ ni ba dɔma na badinɛŋ bina beŋ, haliko beŋ be gbuŋunuwa iŋ biyamɛti. Mɛnɛ wuŋ niiye nɛŋ, beŋ ka nda iŋ kuthunkuŋ maŋaye ka Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ.
40006002	“Naa yi dunkuŋ munkii mukɛnda muŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, ba key kaŋ teepuwe biya nɔŋ ka wɔ key kaŋ hɔŋa kuthuthu. Ba ni nɔŋ na banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ ni na ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ, mɛnɛ ka mɛti baŋ, haliko bi be gbuŋunuwa iŋ biyamɛti. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, bindɛ thanki nda kuta kuthunkuŋ kukɛnamɛŋ fooma.
40006003	Kɛrɛ naa beŋ kɔ dunkuŋ munkii mukendeŋ muŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, baŋ ni ba yɔnkɔ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ kɔthɔ ba huthome haŋ ni.
40006004	Dunkunaŋ munkii ndeŋ muŋ ka nunɔkɔi. Fanda ndeŋ wo kutɛ bena ka nunɔkɔi woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bena thunkuŋ.
40006005	“Awa naa beŋ kɔ ni kuraminɛ, baŋ niyɔkɔ nɔŋ banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, baa bindɛ athimo ba kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka niya kuraminɛ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ mɛnɛ ka thapɛthandeŋ thaŋ, haliko bi be kuta iŋ biyamɛti. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, bindɛ thanki nda kuta kuthunkuŋ namɛŋ koŋ.
40006006	Kɛrɛ naa beŋ bathɔy ba niya kuraminɛ, biyandeŋ ka makonko ndeŋ maŋ e beŋ manka biyo haŋ, awa e beŋ niya kuraminɛ ka Fanda ndeŋ wo sa kuta woŋ. Awa Fanda ndeŋ wo kutɛ bɛyiniŋ ba ni beŋ ka nunɔkɔi woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bena thunkuŋ.
40006007	“Awa naa beŋ kɔ ni kuraminɛ, baŋ tindɛ gbonkoy thasɔkɔiŋ thabɔyɛ tha ka waŋ nɔŋ na biya bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya beŋ ni na, baa bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ yuya ba gbonkiya namɛŋ hubɔyɛ haŋ.
40006008	Baŋ niyɔ nɔŋ bindɛ, baa Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ kɔthɛŋ mu panke beŋ saanuŋ beŋ ba niŋ thɔnthiŋina.
40006009	Nanaŋ baŋ na beŋ niye kuraminɛ: na ‘Fanda ntuŋ wo ka ariana, haliko keŋ nda kukuwɛ koŋ ku niyo yiki.
40006010	Haliko huybakine nda haŋ hu kɛriŋa ka faydo; haliko bɛyiniŋ ba thimo yi baŋ ba niyɔ ka faydo nɔŋ na bɛŋ niyɔ ka ariana na.
40006011	Nkaa hɛ mina mu miŋ thɔŋ.
40006012	Pɛniyɛ mina banɛnɔy ba thanki miŋ niya baŋ, nɔŋ na miŋ pɛniyɛ bi mina ni wunɛnɔy beŋ.
40006013	Ba mina kati ka miŋ ka gberiŋinuwo, kɛrɛ fuŋuta mina ka yɔnkɔ hu ka Sithani, Wɔ Nɛnɔi woŋ.’
40006014	“Mɛnɛ beŋ pɛniyɛ biyamɛti banɛnɔy ba bindɛ bena ni, Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ kɔŋ nɛnɛ bena pɛniyɛ banɛnɔy bakendeŋ baŋ.
40006015	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ tha pɛniyɛ biyamɛti banɛnɔy bakɛnamɛŋ, Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ sa nɛnɛ bena pɛniyɛ banɛnɔy ndeŋ baŋ.
40006016	“Naa beŋ bohe suŋ baŋ, baŋ ŋuru nɔŋ na banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ ni na, baa bi kɔŋ ŋuru haliko wu be kothiyo ba bindɛ bɔha suŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, bindɛ thanki nda kuta kuthunkuŋ namɛŋ koŋ.
40006017	Kɛrɛ naa beŋ bohe suŋ baŋ, puyinaŋ thankaha ndeŋ thaŋ mayɔ awa e beŋ loka thayethi ndeŋ thaŋ natharaŋ,
40006018	wuna sa biya kɔthɔ ba beŋ bɔha suŋ. Kɛrɛ Fanda ndeŋ, wo sa biyamɛti kutu woŋ, ndɛ kɔthɛŋ ba beŋ bɔha suŋ. Ndɛ Fanda ndeŋ, wo kutɛ bɛyiniŋ ba beŋ ni ka nunɔkɔi woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bena thunkuŋ.
40006019	“Baŋ kɔsɔŋ hudinhaŋiya hukendeŋ haŋ ka faido du mɔɔki mɛnɛ makenkeretiŋ huŋ teetuwe do, du batuwani thinki banka do e bindɛ muŋ biiyande ba muŋ tuwe.
40006020	Kɛrɛ kɔsinaŋ nanhuluiŋ bakendeŋ baŋ ka ariana ka sa mɔɔki mɛnɛ makenkeretiŋ bɛŋ teetuwe, awa batuwani sa kɛndɛ thinki ba bɛŋ biiyande ba bɛŋ teetuwa.
40006021	Ka nanhuluiŋ bakɛnda baŋ, kɛna thukuma hukɛnda haŋ.
40006022	“Thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ thɛna mumɔɔli mu ka kɔtɔ koŋ. Mɛnɛ thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ tha kiŋ thayɔhɔy, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ thiŋa iŋ waŋ.
40006023	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ yeheta, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ ku kɔŋ thiŋa iŋ huntuma. Awa mɛnɛ waŋ ba yina baŋ kiŋ huntuma, huntuma hubɛina hu kɔŋ niyɔ humandiŋ.
40006024	“Wɔ o ka wo niyiyɛ marikiŋ biye wali kɔɔ hanthe. Lɔkɔ hɛ ndɛ kɔŋ thambo woŋ baŋ, e thimo woŋ baŋ. Maa ndɛ kɔŋ mɛyi yamari wo ka woŋ, e ndɛ yethitɔ woŋ baŋ. Wɔ ka wo niyiyɛ Masaala na wali, e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ kɔ niya wali ba kuta hudinhaŋiya.
40006025	“Huna yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ ŋataŋ thukuma ba siini ndeŋ baŋ ba mu beŋ thɔŋ, maa mu beŋ thiiye, maa ba ŋakɔtɔ ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ ba mu beŋ thɔɔ. E sii baŋ yameta ba muthɔma muŋ, awa e kɔtɔ koŋ yameta ba mupithi muŋ?
40006026	Dethaŋ hɛ bɛtiŋ bikeŋɛ beŋ. Bindɛ ka iŋ dumgbuiŋ, bindɛ ŋoneta e bindɛ biita ka ŋahunkuŋ, kɛrɛ Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ kɔŋ bindɛ thɛriyɛ. E beŋ yameta niyɔ waŋ ba bindɛ?
40006027	Mbɛ wɔ bɛina ka beŋ wo ŋataŋ thukuma ba sii nama baŋ haaŋ e ndɛ ndinta wakathi wunthe ba tɔyina sii nama baŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy?
40006028	“Mbɛ hu beŋ niyeke thɔrɔ ba mu beŋ pithi? Siyuwaŋ hɛ musɛnkɛŋ mu ka ŋayeŋ ŋaŋ muŋ nɔŋ na muŋ senkine na. Muŋ niyeta wali, muŋ yehinuweta mupithi ba yɛthɛ namɛŋ.
40006029	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, hali nde hintiŋ gbaku woŋ Silamani iŋ hudinhaŋiya nama haŋ fooma, ndɛ tha punku gbɛkitɔkɔ mupithi muyɔhɔy nɔŋ musɛnkɛŋ muŋ muŋ baŋ.
40006030	Masaala gbɛkɛti mupithi muyɔhɔy hande hu ka boi ka haŋ, hu hɛ bathɔ haŋ, mɛmpɛ nda hu thithɛ e huŋ toonuwo. E ndɛ sa bena gbɛkɛti mupithi muyɔhɔy? Biya bina beŋ bi iŋ lanɛya bathahuwɔy.
40006031	“Huna baŋ niyɔkɔ thɔrɔ ba dɔma, na ‘Mbɛ mu hɛ miŋ thɔŋ?’ maa ‘Mbɛ mu hɛ miŋ thiiye?’ maa ‘Mbɛ mu hɛ miŋ pithi?’
40006032	Muŋ muŋ baŋ fooma mu na biya bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya beŋ deethi, awa Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ kɔthɛŋ ba beŋ muŋ panka fooma.
40006033	Kɛrɛ niyaŋ hintiŋ ba Masaala kɛriŋiyɛ siini bakendeŋ baŋ awa e beŋ niya bɛyiniŋ ba thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ndɛ bena baŋ, awa ndɛ kɔŋ bena dunkune muŋ muŋ fooma.
40006034	Huna, baŋ ni thɔrɔ ba mɛmpɛ, baa mɛmpɛ ba kɔŋ teŋo thɔrɔ wokɛnama. Gbɛɛŋ ndo gbɛɛŋ ba kɔŋ teŋo wukahɛ wukɛnama.
40007001	“Baŋ niyɔkɔ bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ biya, wuna sa nɛnɛ bena Masaala kɔnsɔŋɔŋ,
40007002	baa kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ ku beŋ konsiŋine biya bihɛna, kuna nɛnɛ bena Masaala konsiŋine. Masaala kɔŋ bena konsiŋine ka sirani binthe bi beŋ konsiŋine biya bihɛna beŋ.
40007003	Mbɛ hu yi kaho ba detha ntha kimɛɛsɛ kiŋ ka hooya hu ka ntɔ nda haŋ, yi tha tenke kuta kuthopi ku yina ka hooya koŋ?
40007004	Maa mbɛ hu yi dome ka ntɔ nda, na ‘Saa, yaŋ be fuŋuŋ ntha kimɛɛsɛ kiŋ ka hooya nda haŋ,’ mahɛŋ mabɛina e kuthopi koŋ niyɔ ka hooya nda haŋ?
40007005	Yindo banitɔkɔ woŋ. Yenke hintiŋ fuŋuna kuthopi koŋ ka hooya nda haŋ, awa yi kɔŋ kutu nagberekethe ba fuŋuna ntha kimɛɛsɛ kiŋ ka hooya hu ntɔ nda haŋ.
40007006	“Baŋ dunkuŋ ntha ki beŋ niye Masaala na kubatho ka ŋatheŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ bena dapitiyeke e bindɛ bena dekiya. Awa baŋ yɛli munki mu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ ka kɔsɛŋ bitɔlɔi beŋ. Thampo bi kɔŋ muŋ bɔdɔbɔdɔŋ ka ŋathaki namɛŋ ŋaŋ.
40007007	“Thɔnthiŋinaŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ dunkuno. Deethuwaŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kutu. Gbɛdiŋaŋ biyo haŋ, beŋ kɔŋ pɛthiya.
40007008	Baa wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔnthiŋinɛ ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuno ntha; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo deethuwɛ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu ntha; wɔ o wɔ wo gbɛdiŋɛ biyo haŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ pɛthiya.
40007009	Komisa na ka ka beŋ wo, naa hati nama thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ ba kutoŋ, ndɛ niŋ dunkune raka.
40007010	Maa mɛnɛ hati nama thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ ba niŋ dunkune he, ndɛ sa niŋ dunkune wokɛkɛŋ.
40007011	Mɛnɛ beŋ, bendo biya binɛnɔy beŋ, thɔyi ba dunkuna munkii muyɔhɔy ka mpati bikendeŋ beŋ, mbu ntiŋ nda Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ? E ndɛ sa dunkuŋ munkii muyɔhɔy ka bi niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ beŋ?
40007012	“Huna bɛyi o bɛyi bayɔhɔy ba thimo beŋ ba biya bena niyiyɛ, niyiyaŋ bindɛ bɛŋ, baa nɛna tepe Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ mɛnɛ mathanani ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ.
40007013	“Biiyandeŋ ka biyo hunɔthitɔi haŋ, baa biyo hu ka yahanama haŋ aŋaraŋ, awa gboŋa ba kaaye kɛndɛ baŋ aŋɛnɔ ba fuŋe, awa bi kɔɔyɛ bɛŋ beŋ abɔyi.
40007014	Kɛrɛ biyo hu biiyando ka sii baŋ haŋ anɔthitɔ, awa gboŋa ba kaaye kɛndɛ baŋ akaahi ba fuŋe, awa bi kɔɔyɛ bɛŋ beŋ athahuwɔ.
40007015	“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba banabiŋ bibahothiŋ beŋ. Bi kɔŋ see kendeŋ e bindɛ si tɔŋinɔkɔ nɔŋ takɛŋ bithɛbɛ, kɛrɛ maniyɔ ma ka siini bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ nɔŋ yaŋɛŋ bibaŋɔi.
40007016	Beŋ kɔŋ bindɛ kothiye ka maniyɔ namɛŋ maŋ. Kuyeŋ kunɛnɔi sa tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy, awa kuyerethe sa tiŋ mutiŋ muthɔma.
40007017	Huna, kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ kuyɔhɔy ku kɔŋ tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy, kɛrɛ kuyeŋ kunɛnɔi koŋ kuna tiŋ mutiŋ munɛnɔi.
40007018	Kuyeŋ kuyɔhɔy sa tiŋ mutiŋ munɛnɔi; awa nɛna hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ kuyeŋ kunɛnɔi, kuŋ sa tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy.
40007019	Awa kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ ku sa tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy, ku kɔŋ yuuta e kuŋ yelo ka buu buŋ.
40007020	Beŋ kɔŋ ŋɛŋ kothiye ka mutiŋ mu ŋɛŋ tiŋ muŋ.
40007021	“Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ wo dɔŋ, na ‘Mariki, Mariki’ na biyande ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ. Kɛrɛ wo ni bɛyiniŋ ba thimo Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ na kɛndɛ biyande.
40007022	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biya bimandiŋ bi kɔŋ yama dɔŋ, na ‘Mariki, Mariki, e miŋ kutɛ nde niye hunabi ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ beŋ? E miŋ nde kɔ kaninande biya iŋ mbayiŋ ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ, awa e miŋ nde kɔ niya bɛyiniŋ babukuyuwɛ ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ?’
40007023	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yaŋ kɔŋ bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔita bena, gbɔniyɔkɔŋ nuŋ dondo baŋ, bendo nde ni bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy beŋ.’
40007024	“Wɔ o wɔ wo yuyɛ mathananini niŋ maŋ e ndɛ niya ba tepe yaŋ baŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ thɔyintande wɔ bɛina nɔŋ wɔ kele wo thoyɛ banka nama baŋ ka kuthara koŋ ka thinthi.
40007025	Awa e koyoŋ time banka babɛina, e mandi matɛnkɛ maŋ pɛnka banka babɛina, awa e huru humandiŋ bɛŋ pɛnka. Kɛrɛ bɛŋ tha ŋɔti, baa bɛŋ thoyo ka kuthara ka thinthi.
40007026	“Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ mathananini niŋ maŋ e ndɛ thana niya ba tepe yaŋ baŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ thɔyintande wɔ bɛina nɔŋ wɔ wothɔkɔi wo thoyɛ banka nama baŋ ka thɛkɛyaŋ haŋ.
40007027	Awa e koyoŋ time banka babɛina, e mandi matɛnkɛ maŋ pɛnka banka babɛina, awa e huru humandiŋ bɛŋ pɛnka; kɛna ŋɔti bɛŋ. Awa ŋɔta huyete kutɛ ŋɔti bɛŋ.”
40007028	Awa naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ ni thakaba ba mathanani ma ka Yisɔs maŋ,
40007029	baa ndɛ thanani bindɛ nɔŋ wɔ wo iŋ mayoho. Awa ndɛ tha bindɛ thanani nɔŋ bikarimɔkɔiŋ namɛŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ thaninuwe na.
40008001	Naa thuhe Yisɔs ŋaye ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme niŋ ka kaa.
40008002	Awa kɛna see wɔ wunthe ka Yisɔs wo iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti ka thinthi e ndɛ kunthuŋa ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnama e tɛpa, na “Hɛmɔŋ, mɛnɛ yi kɔŋ nde thimo ba yama puya, yi kɔŋ nde yama petheŋ.”
40008003	Awa kɛna yekeŋ Yisɔs yɔnkɔ nama haŋ e ndɛ niŋ boheke, e tɛpa ka hati lamgba woŋ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina petheŋ, awa pethɔ nda.” Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina nthoonaŋ kiŋ pethɔi hati lamgba woŋ baŋ.
40008004	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, na “Ba tepe wɔ yo wɔ ye, kɛrɛ kaa toloŋ e yi ka tɔŋinɔkɔ ka bafode woŋ, awa e yi fuŋuna saraka ba ni nde bena Musa yamari ba fuŋuna baŋ, ba tɔŋɔŋ ka biya beŋ ba yi pethɔ.”
40008005	Naa tɛŋ Yisɔs ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi, bayaha wo ka kurugbani bi ka biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ see kɛnama, e niŋ theteke ba dɔma,
40008006	na “Hɛmɔŋ, bawali wokiyaŋ ŋoyeŋ ka banka niŋ ka wogbɛsinkɔi wo kaho wumandiŋ.”
40008007	Awa kɛna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ key ba niŋ ka puya.”
40008008	Naa yuye huŋ bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ woŋ, ndɛ tepe ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ teŋeta yi ba kaa ka banka niŋ ka. Niya hɔkɔŋ yamari. Bawali niŋ woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.
40008009	Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ na yi kɔŋ wuŋ punku niya, baa wɔ na yaŋ wo iŋ kurugbani bibɔyɛ bi yaŋ ni yamari. Yaŋ punkeŋ ba dɔma ka wunthe, na ‘Kaa,’ e ndɛ kaa; awa yaŋ kɔŋ dɔŋ ka wohɛna, na ‘Saa,’ e ndɛ saa; awa yaŋ kɔŋ dɔŋ ka bawali niŋ woŋ, na ‘Niya baŋ baŋ,’ e ndɛ bɛŋ niya.”
40008010	Naa yuye Yisɔs na thanki hati lamgba woŋ gbonkiya, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ thɛrɛnaŋ e ndɛ tɛpa ka bi yemɛ niŋ beŋ ba dɔma, na “Hunɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, hali hintiŋ ka biIsirɛli beŋ yaŋ kuita hɛ wɔ wo iŋ lanɛya nɔŋ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ.
40008011	Yaŋ tepe bena, biya bimandiŋ bi kɔŋ nɔŋ see maŋaye kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ iŋ kuwaŋ kupothi koŋ e bindɛ dɔŋɔ ka thɔma ka tha banthe iŋ Ebrahim, Aisaki, mɛnɛ Yakuba ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ,
40008012	kɛrɛ biya bi beŋ siyi beŋ ba bindɛ nda niyɔ ka huybakine hu ka Masaala haŋ bindɛ bina nɔŋ yɛla ka gbada ka, ka huntuma humandiŋ haŋ, ka biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.”
40008013	Kɛna tepe ntiŋ Yisɔs ka bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ woŋ, na “Duwa ka banka nda. Haliko wu niyɔ nɛŋ ba yi maŋaye ka lanɛya nda baŋ.” Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya, ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina bawali wo ka bayaha woŋ pethɔi.
40008014	Awa Yisɔs ŋaye kɛndɛ e ndɛ ka biyande ka banka ba ka bakarandeŋ nama woŋ Pita. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, thɔnɔ wo ka Pita ŋoyeŋ kɛndɛ wo ŋɔtitɛ iŋ nthoonaŋ ki ka kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ.
40008015	Yisɔs bohe yɔnkɔ nama haŋ awa ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ koŋ pethɔi niŋ. Kɛna ŋaye hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ e niya Yisɔs na barɛi.
40008016	Ka mahɔnkɔlɛŋ mabɛina biya sisi ka Yisɔs biya bibɔyɛ bi bɔhɔi iŋ mbayiŋ. Yisɔs ni yamari e ndɛ kaninande bindɛ iŋ mbayiŋ beŋ, e ndɛ puya bithoonɔi beŋ fooma.
40008017	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Aisaya haŋ ba dɔma, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ si tutɔkɔ nambarɛŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ fooma, awa e ndɛ kata nthoonani kikɛntuŋ kiŋ fooma.”
40008018	Naa kute Yisɔs na pɛnkando ndɛ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ, ndɛ ni bindɛ yamari ba bi be thuhande thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ.
40008019	Kɛna see wɔ wunthe ka bithanani Siraŋ baŋ beŋ kɛnama e tɛpa ka Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ kɔŋ yina yeŋ komo kama ka yi key.”
40008020	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Bayɔbɔini beŋ bi kiŋ iŋ yikiyani, awa bɛtiŋ bi keŋɛ beŋ bi kiŋ iŋ thahooti ka bindɛ hure. Kɛrɛ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka iŋ hintiŋ nthɔŋ ka ndɛ taye yaha nama haŋ.”
40008021	Kɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ wunthe ka bakarandeni nama beŋ kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ kaayɛŋ hintiŋ, yaŋ be ka maanki fandaŋ na.”
40008022	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Yema yama, pɛyɛna bitukɛ beŋ, awa bitukɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ maanki bikɛnamɛŋ bitukɛ beŋ.”
40008023	Kɛna thɔɔyɛ Yisɔs ka gbe baŋ iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba thuhande mankɔ maŋ.
40008024	Naa bindɛ ka gbe baŋ, huru humandiŋ penke bindɛ ka mankɔ maŋ wuthinkande. Awa gbe baŋ bohe ba muluto iŋ thamunkulu thaŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs ŋoyeŋ kɔŋ nine.
40008025	Huna key bakarandeni beŋ thohine Yisɔs na e bindɛ dɔma, na “Niya mina kisi karimɔkɔ! Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ miŋ kɔŋ mɔmɔ.”
40008026	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ hu beŋ payiye? Payɔ ndeŋ haŋ tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na beŋ kiŋ iŋ lanɛya bathahuwɔy.” Kɛna ŋaye Yisɔs ka kɔɔ e ndɛ pinda huru haŋ iŋ mankɔ maŋ. Kɛna thebe muŋ nayeŋ.
40008027	Bindɛ fooma ni thakaba wumandiŋ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Mbɛ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ, wo hali hintiŋ huru haŋ iŋ mankɔ maŋ amɛyiyɛ niŋ yamari?”
40008028	Naa thuhande bindɛ mankɔ maŋ e bindɛ tɛŋa ka kirinkiri hu ka mɛti ba ka Kadara, biya biye bi bɔhɔi mbayiŋ see kɛnamɛŋ ŋaye ka thayoma ka. Biya thunketa hintiŋ ba fuŋe gboŋa babɛina.
40008029	Kɛna yele bindɛ thampa thatɔɔkɛ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Yindo Hati ka Masaala woŋ, mbɛ mu yi ba mina niya? E yi asee dondo baŋ ba mina si niya thɔrɔ mahɛŋ ma lɔkɔ baŋ teŋeta hɛ?”
40008030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina kubɛri ku kɔsɛŋ ku kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ thɛri kuwaŋ.
40008031	Huna theteke mbayiŋ beŋ Yisɔs na ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yi fuŋutu mina ka biya beŋ beŋ baŋ, yaandi niya ba miŋ ka thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ.”
40008032	Huna tepe Yisɔs ka mbayiŋ beŋ, na “Kaaŋ.” Na kɛna key mbayiŋ beŋ thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ fooma kɛna gbantɔkɔi kubɛri kubunthu koŋ ka mankɔ ka e bindɛ tuukuwa ka mandi maŋ fooma.
40008033	Naa kute wuŋ bidethiteke kɔsɛŋ beŋ, bindɛ thare ka mɛti ka e bindɛ ka tepe biya muŋ fooma bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, iŋ ba niyɔy ka bi bɔhɔi mbayiŋ beŋ baŋ.
40008034	Awa biya muŋ fooma ka mɛti ka key ba pɛnka Yisɔs na. Naa kute bindɛ niŋ, bindɛ theteke Yisɔs na ba ndɛ be pɛyɛŋ bompi namɛŋ woŋ e ndɛ kaa ka hɛna.
40009001	Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ thɔɔyɛ ka gbe baŋ ba thuhande mankɔ maŋ ba duwa ka mɛti nama ka.
40009002	Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, biya sisi bathoonaŋ wogbɛsinkɔi ka yala ka Yisɔs. Yisɔs kute ba dɔma na lanɛya ba ka biya beŋ beŋ baŋ abɔyi, huna dome ndɛ ka wogbɛsinkɔi woŋ, na “Yehitɔkɔ, hatiŋ woŋ, baa yi thanki peniyo hakɛŋ nda baŋ.”
40009003	Bikarimɔkɔiŋ binɔndi bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ bi penkitiye nde kɛndɛ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ namɛŋ ba dɔma, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɔŋ yetheni Masaala na.”
40009004	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina, Yisɔs kɔthɛ hu bindɛ siyi ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ hu beŋ siyuwe bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ?
40009005	Mbɛ wu yamɛ ŋɛnɔ, ba yaŋ dɔma ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, na ‘Hakɛŋ nda baŋ peniyo,’ maa, na ‘Ŋaye ka kɔɔ, e yi yatha’?
40009006	Yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba beŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na wɔ wo dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kiŋ iŋ mayoho ba pɛniyɛ biya hakɛŋ bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ ka faido.” Kɛna dome ntiŋ ndɛ ka hati lamgba wogbɛsinkɔi woŋ, na “Ŋaye ka kɔɔ e yi sɛkitha yala nda baŋ e yi duwa ka banka nda ka.”
40009007	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati lamgba woŋ ŋaye ka kɔɔ e ndɛ duwa ka banka nama ka.
40009008	Naa kute sɛthɛ baŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ awa e bindɛ thunkunuwa Masaala na wumandiŋ baa ndɛ dunkuŋ mayoho maŋ maŋ ka biyamɛti.
40009009	Naa pɛyɛŋ Yisɔs kɛndɛ e ndɛ kɔ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy, ndɛ penke bathuu duthu wunthe wo dɔma Mathiyu doŋe ka ndɛ thuuwe duthu woŋ ka. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yema yama.” Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina Mathiyu ŋaye ka doŋe ndɛ ka e yema Yisɔs na ka kaa.
40009010	Naa dɔŋɔy Yisɔs ka thɔma ka banka ba ka Mathiyu baŋ, bathuuni duthuiŋ bibɔyɛ mɛnɛ bi siyuwe bayahɛŋ bi ka dina wo ka biYusu beŋ ba bindɛ niyɔ bahakɛŋ thɔɔtɔy Yisɔs na mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ ka thɔma haŋ.
40009011	Awa naa kute wuŋ biFaresini binɔndi beŋ, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bakarandeni bi ka Yisɔs beŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ hu karimɔkɔ ndeŋ woŋ thome ka tha banthe iŋ bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ mɛnɛ bahakɛŋ beŋ?”
40009012	Naa yuye Yisɔs bi si nɛŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, ndɛ kaaye bindɛ thayiŋ ba dɔma, na “Biya bipethɔi beŋ thimota nda bapuyi woŋ, kɛrɛ bithoonɔi beŋ bina thimo nda bapuyi woŋ.
40009013	Kaaŋ e beŋ ka thanuwa hu tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ wu yaŋ ni wuŋ. Magbali maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Nkinikiniŋ kina thimo yaŋ, awa yaŋ thimota saraka ba fuŋuno.’ Yaŋ tha see ka thiya bithumbɛ beŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ see ka thiya bahakɛŋ beŋ.”
40009014	Kɛna see bakarandeni bi ka Yɔni wo Babiye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ ka Yisɔs e bindɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ hu miŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ bohe suŋ, kɛrɛ bakarandeni nda beŋ boheta suŋ?”
40009015	Naa yuye huŋ Yisɔs, ndɛ tepe bindɛ, na “E beŋ atute thukuma ba wɔ wo thiyo ba penkitiye ka kuyɛntande koŋ kɔ bɔha suŋ? Yaŋ niyeŋ lanɛya wuŋ sa niyɔ mɛnɛ bayɛnti woŋ kiŋ kɛndɛ. Ndɛ sa mɛyi ba wuŋ niyɔ. Kɛrɛ lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see ti bayɛnti woŋ sɛkitha ka mateete namɛŋ e kato napooŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina mɛŋ ntiŋ bohi suŋ.
40009016	“Wɔ o wɔ ka wo thiyi rombo huŋama ka yaba batiyɔ, bɛyi bahɛna kutɛ rombo huŋama haŋ hu kɔŋ thuriyande e huŋ niya ba yaba batiyɔ baŋ sainɔ wumandiŋ.
40009017	Wɔ sa hɛlɛŋ thiyi mampa maŋama ma huitu ka muthiye mutiyɔ mu yehinuwo ka kuthagba ku ka baahu e muŋ lɔŋita, bɛyi bahɛna kutɛ, muthiye muŋ mu kɔŋ thambɔ awa mampa maŋ ndo iŋ muthiye muŋ mu kɔŋ teetuwɔ. Wuna biyɛ mampa maŋama ayɔhɔ ba thiyo ka muthiye muŋama, awa ti muŋ muye sa teetuwɔ.”
40009018	Naa nde Yisɔs hintiŋ gbonkoy, bayaha wo ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ see kunthuŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Yisɔs e dɔma, na “Hatiŋ woyɛrɛmɛ na nthɔŋ dɔi tuka woŋ. Kɛrɛ yaandi kaa, yi be niŋ ka tutu yɔnkɔ nda haŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ pethɔ.”
40009019	Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ ŋaye yako, bindɛ yeme niŋ ka kaa.
40009020	Naa bindɛ key, hati yɛrɛmɛ wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo bare ka niyɔ iŋ nthoonaŋ ki ka yɛrɛmɛŋ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye. Ndɛ yeme Yisɔs na mahɛŋ e ndɛ boheke kulɛmpilɛmpi ku ka yaba nama baŋ koŋ.
40009021	Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ tepe ka yɛthɛ nama, na “Hali hɔkɔŋ aboheke na yaŋ yaba nama baŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.”
40009022	Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔi mahɛŋ e ndɛ kuta hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, awa huna dome ndɛ kɛnama, na “Yehitɔkɔ, hati woyɛrɛmɛ, yi peniyo hakɛŋ nda baŋ, awa lanɛya bakɛnda baŋ ni ba yi pethɔ.” Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ pethɔi.
40009023	Awa naa tɛŋ Yisɔs ka banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, ndɛ penke bathurɔkɔiŋ bi hɔŋ nthoriyɛŋ ba tuka haŋ e biya muŋ kɔ manka poro.
40009024	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Fuŋaŋ dondo baŋ fooma. Hati woŋ tuketa, nine ma nine.” Naa yuye huŋ biya beŋ, bindɛ bohe hɛtha Yisɔs na.
40009025	Naa funkutu ndɛ bindɛ ka gbada ka, Yisɔs biyande ka ŋoye hati woŋ ka e ndɛ niŋ ka bɔha yɔnkɔ, awa e niŋ ŋayina ka kɔɔ.
40009026	Awa bɛyiniŋ ba ni Yisɔs baŋ baŋ fooma see gbanthande ka bompi wobɛina.
40009027	Naa pɛyaŋ Yisɔs kɛndɛ e ndɛ kɔ kaa, kɛna yemo ndɛ iŋ lamgbeŋ biye bi mankɔy thaaya. Biya beŋ beŋ baŋ yele thampa wutɔɔkɛ ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma, na “Kutiyɛ mina nkinikiniŋ, yindo hati ka Dauda woŋ.”
40009028	Naa biyande Yisɔs ka banka banthe, biya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ see kɛnama. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “E beŋ siyuweŋ ba yaŋ kɔ punka bena puya?” Huna dome bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “Ndo, hɛmɔŋ, yi kɔŋ punku mina puya.”
40009029	Kɛna boheke Yisɔs thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ e ndɛ tɛpa ba wuŋ niyɔ, na “Haliko wu niyɔ nɛŋ na niye beŋ lanɛya na.”
40009030	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ pɛthɔi, bindɛ kute nagberekethe. Kɛrɛ Yisɔs yeli bindɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ ba dɔma, na “Baŋ ni ba wɔ yo wɔ huŋ kɔthɔ.”
40009031	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha punku bohiteke. Bindɛ key huŋ kaŋ tɛɛpuwa fooma ka bompi wobɛina.
40009032	Naa biya beŋ beŋ baŋ key, biya bihɛna sisi wɔ mankɔy hothi ka Yisɔs. Ndɛ punketa gbonkiya baa wayi na bɔhɛ niŋ.
40009033	Naa kaninando hati wowathe woŋ iŋ wayi woŋ, ndɛ gbonkoy. Awa sɛthɛ ba pɛnkande baŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ, e bindɛ dɔma, na “Miŋ kuita hɛ hanthe bɛyi ba niyɔ baŋ baŋ ka Isirɛli.”
40009034	Kɛna dome biFaresini beŋ, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ kaninande biya mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ.”
40009035	Awa naa nde Yisɔs kaande kɛndɛ fooma ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ mɛnɛ ka thabikidiŋ thaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ nde thanani biya beŋ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ, awa e ndɛ kɔ niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ, awa e ndɛ kɔ puya fooma nthoonani kihakuwande mɛnɛ kɔnthɔhiliŋ bi ka ŋakɔtɔ fooma ka biya bi kɛndɛ beŋ.
40009036	Naa kute Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ, ndɛ kutiye bindɛ nkinikiniŋ, baa bi teetuwɔi thathukuma bina awa bindɛ punketa ba mase yɛthɛ namɛŋ. Biya bina bi thɔyande nɔŋ takɛŋ bi ka iŋ batɔli.
40009037	Huna dome ndɛ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Biya beŋ beŋ athɔyande nɔŋ ŋɔna humandiŋ, kɛrɛ baŋɔni beŋ athahuwɔ.
40009038	Huna niyaŋ kuraminɛ haliko wo biyɛ ŋɔna haŋ woŋ be tɔŋɔti baŋɔni ka ŋɔna haŋ.”
40010001	Yisɔs thiyi bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ ka tha banthe e ndɛ bindɛ dunkune sɛmbɛ iŋ mayoho ba kantha mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ, mɛnɛ ba kaninande biyamɛti iŋ bindɛ, ba puya fooma nthoonani kihakuwande mɛnɛ kɔnthɔhiliŋ bi ka ŋakɔtɔ fooma.
40010002	Ŋakeŋ ŋa ka baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ beŋ ŋaŋ ŋɛna ŋaŋ ŋaŋ: womayoŋ woŋ na Saimɔŋ, wo dɔma Pita woŋ, mɛnɛ Anduru wɛndama; Yemisi hati ka Sɛbɛdi, mɛnɛ Yɔni wɛndama;
40010003	Filipi, mɛnɛ Batholomiyu; Thɔmɔsi, mɛnɛ Mathiyu bathuu duthu woŋ; Yemisi hati ka Alifiyɔsi, mɛnɛ Thadiyɔsi;
40010004	Saimɔŋ, wo nde kurugba woŋ, mɛnɛ Yudasi Isakariyɔti, wo niyɛ Yisɔs na gbɔŋ woŋ.
40010005	Lamgbeŋ kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ beŋ bina ŋindi Yisɔs e bindɛ nunkunɔkɔ ba dɔma, na “Baŋ key ka siyani bahɛna baŋ, awa baŋ biyande ka mɛti o mɛti ba ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sameriya.
40010006	Kɛrɛ kaaŋ toloŋ ka biya bipiriŋɛ beŋ nɔŋ takɛŋ ka siya ba ka Isirɛli beŋ baŋ.
40010007	Kaaŋ ka niya kɛwandi ba dɔma, na ‘Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ thuriye.’
40010008	Puyaŋ bithoonɔi beŋ, ŋayinaŋ bitukɛ beŋ ka tuka haŋ, puyaŋ biya bi iŋ nthoonani kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi, kaninandeŋ biya iŋ mbayiŋ. Beŋ kute wu ka iŋ mɔlɔŋ. Huna dunkuŋaŋ nɛnɛ wu ka iŋ mɔlɔŋ.
40010009	Baŋ diŋ boyi ka kaa, baŋ diŋ kɔbiri o kɔbiri ka kaa, hali hintiŋ sɛnti wunthe baŋ niŋ thiyi ka mbumbusɛŋ ndeŋ kiŋ.
40010010	Baŋ diŋ ponthoiŋ ka biyasi ndeŋ haŋ, baŋ diŋ yabɛŋ baye-baye, baŋ diŋ dagbalɛŋ, baŋ diŋ ŋagbɔkɔdi, baa bawali woŋ kiŋ ba dunkuno fooma mu panke ndɛ muŋ.
40010011	“Awa mɛti o mɛti maa thabikidi o thabikidi tha beŋ biyande, dethaŋ ba wɔ wo bena yɛrɔkɔ e beŋ niŋ thɔnthiŋina ba bena niya yikiya. Mɛnɛ ndɛ yɛrɔkɔy, niyɔŋ kɛndɛ haaŋ e beŋ nɔŋ kɛndɛ fuŋa.
40010012	Mɛnɛ beŋ biyande ka banka baŋ, maanaŋ bi beŋ kɛndɛ pɛnki beŋ.
40010013	Mɛnɛ biya bi ka banka babɛina yɛrɔkɔy bena, dɔmaŋ, na ‘Haliko mathɛbɛ ma niyɔ dondo baŋ.’ Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ bindɛ tha bena yɛrɔkɔ, baŋ nda bindɛ maaŋ.
40010014	Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ tha bena yɛrɔkɔ, maa bindɛ tha bena poniyɛ kuiha, konkaŋ kuligbi koŋ ka ŋathaki ndeŋ ŋaŋ na beŋ kɔ kɛndɛ fuŋ, haliko wu be niyɔ maseri kɛnamɛŋ.
40010015	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, ka tha ka bɛina ka kɔŋ si yaŋ teetuwo iŋ Masaala ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ adaŋande mɛtiŋ banɛnɔy ba ka Sɔdɔmi mɛnɛ ka Kɔmɔra.
40010016	“Yaŋ kɔŋ bena ŋindi ka biyamɛti nɔŋ ka takɛŋ key ka mateete ma ka yaŋɛŋ. Bɛna niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ nɔŋ na bikɛkɛni ni kuthɛgbɛ hadeni bikɛnamɛŋ awa e beŋ niyɔ bendo thɛbɛ nɔŋ ŋarotho.
40010017	Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba biyamɛti binɔndi beŋ, baa bi kɔŋ bena bohi e bindɛ bena kata ka kaamani beŋ, awa bi kɔŋ bena tawu ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ.
40010018	Awa beŋ kɔŋ bɔɔluwando ka kɔtɔkɔy ka bakɛrɛni beŋ mɛnɛ ka gbakuiŋ beŋ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, haliko ba niya maseri kɛnamɛŋ iŋ siyani bahɛna baŋ ba Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ.
40010019	Naa beŋ key kiya ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnamɛŋ ba konsiŋino, baŋ ni thɔrɔ ba hu beŋ tɛpi maa iŋ na beŋ huŋ tepe, baa Masaala kɔŋ bena toŋine hu beŋ tɛpi ka wakathi wobɛina.
40010020	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina beŋ kutɛ gbonkiyiyɔkɔ, kɛrɛ Yina wo ka Fanda ndeŋ woŋ na gbonkoy maŋaye kendeŋ.
40010021	“Ka lɔkɔ babɛina wɔ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wɛndama na ba ndɛ koro. Awa komisa wowathe kɔŋ dunkuŋ hati nama ba ndɛ koro, awa mpati bi kɔŋ ŋaye ma sɔkinɔkɔ biya namɛŋ, awa bi kɔŋ ni ba bindɛ koro.
40010022	Awa beŋ kɔŋ thambiyo iŋ biyamɛti saathɛ ba kiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ wo ni muyuŋ woŋ haaŋ ka mapeye maŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kisi.
40010023	Naa bindɛ ni bena thɔrɔ ka mɛti banthe saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, kitaŋ e beŋ kaa ka babantheŋ baŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, beŋ sa niye thanke kaandiyande fooma mɛtiŋ ba ka Isirɛli baŋ, wo domo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see.
40010024	“Bakarandeŋ woŋ yameta ba karimɔkɔ nama. Waayi woŋ yameta ba mariki nama woŋ.
40010025	Atɛŋ ba bakarandeŋ woŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na karimɔkɔ nama woŋ na, awa e waayi woŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na mariki nama woŋ na. Awa naa domo mariki wo ka banka baŋ woŋ na Beelesibuli, gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ, kubɔri nama koŋ ku kɔŋ yaŋ thiyo ŋakeŋ ŋanɛnɔi!
40010026	“Baŋ payɔ biyamɛti, baa bɛyi o ka ba pututɔy ba sa tɔŋinɔkɔ nagberekethe, maa ba nunɔkɔi ba sa kothiyo.
40010027	Ba yaŋ bena tepe baŋ ka huntuma haŋ, ba kɔŋ nɔŋ gbonkiya hatɔ teete, awa ba beŋ yuyɛ ba si ŋɔyintoko baŋ, ba kɔŋ koyiŋa ka mɛti ka fooma.
40010028	Baŋ payɔ bi kɔri bena beŋ, baa kɔtɔ koŋ kuna hɔkɔŋ bindɛ teeti. Bindɛ sa punku teetuwa yinɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ. Kɛrɛ payɔŋ Masaala na wo punku teetuwa yinɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ mɛnɛ ŋakɔtɔ ndeŋ ŋaŋ ka yɛlɛ muŋ ka yahanama.
40010029	E sɛnti wunthe kutɛ sonkoiŋ biye boyo? Kɛrɛ wunthe ka beŋ beŋ baŋ sa tuku mahɛŋ ma mathimo ma ka Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ kutɛ.
40010030	Hali hintiŋ bɔɔyɛ ndeŋ bu ka thankaha buŋ bu kɔndɔi fooma.
40010031	Huna baŋ payɔ, beŋ yameŋ ba sonkoiŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ.
40010032	“Wɔ o wɔ wo tepe biyamɛti ba dɔma na ndɛ kɔthɛŋ yama, yaŋ kɔŋ nɛnɛ nɛŋ gbonkoy ba wundɛ ka Fandaŋ woŋ ka ariana.
40010033	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yama buuhu ka biya, yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ buuhu ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ.
40010034	“Baŋ siyi ba dɔma na yaŋ see ka sisa mathɛbɛ ka faido. Yaŋ tha see ka sisa mathɛbɛ, kuyombo kuna see yaŋ ka sisa.
40010035	Yaŋ see ka thayinande hati wathe iŋ fandama, awa hati yɛrɛmɛ iŋ nandama, awa thamba iŋ thɔnɔ nama.
40010036	Awa hadeni bi ka wɔ bi kɔŋ niyɔ kubɔri nama koŋ.
40010037	“Wɔ o wɔ wo yaŋ thimo fandama na iŋ nandama e wuŋ yama ba yaŋ, ndɛ sisandeta ba yama yema. Wɔ o wɔ wo thimo mpati nama bibiyɛthɛŋ iŋ biyɛrɛmɛŋ e wuŋ yama ba yaŋ, ndɛ sisandeta ba yama yema.
40010038	Awa wɔ wo sa sɛkɛthi kuyeŋ nama kubariŋande ku ka nambarɛŋ baŋ koŋ ba yama yema, ndɛ sisandeta ba yama yema.
40010039	Wɔ wo yɔli ba niya sii nama baŋ kisi ka yɛthɛ nama, ndɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ, awa wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ kutu.
40010040	“Wɔ o wɔ wo bena yɛrɔkɔ, ndɛ yɛrɔkɔy yama; awa wo yɛrɔkɔy yama, ndɛ yɛrɔkɔy wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
40010041	Wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy banabi ba na ndɛ banabi, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu kuthunkuŋ ku ka banabi ŋaye ka Masaala. Awa wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ wɔ thumbɛ ba na ndɛ wɔ thumbɛ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu kuthunkuŋ ku ka wɔ thumbɛ.
40010042	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo dunkune mpati bi yama yemande beŋ mandi mathɛbɛ ba thiiye ba na bindɛ bakarandeni niŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu kuthunkuŋ kumandiŋ.”
40011001	Naa thanki Yisɔs nunkunɔkɔ bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, ndɛ pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ ba kaa kaŋ thaninuwa iŋ ba niya kɛwandi ka mɛtiŋ ba tɔpɛ kɛndɛ baŋ.
40011002	Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ kiŋ nde ka yeeli woŋ. Kɛna yuye ndɛ bɛyiniŋ ba Banikisi woŋ ni baŋ, huna ŋindi ndɛ bakarandeni nama binɔndi kɛnama.
40011003	Ndɛ bindɛ nunkunɔkɔ ba bindɛ ka thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na ba dɔma, na “E yina domo nde wɔ wo see woŋ, maa miŋ be dethiteke hɛlɛŋ ba wɔ hɛna?”
40011004	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Kaaŋ tepe Yɔni na ba thanki beŋ yuyɔkɔ baŋ iŋ ba thanki beŋ kutiyɔkɔ baŋ.
40011005	Bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ kute, awa bigbɛsinkɔi beŋ kaande, biya bi iŋ nthoonani kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi beŋ pethɔi, awa bilɔŋɔy ŋaiha beŋ yuye, bitukɛ beŋ ŋayino ka tuka haŋ, awa bamɔnɛŋ beŋ niyo kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ.
40011006	Mayehitɔkɔ ma kiŋ ka biya bi sa yama sikiŋ sɔkɔrɔ beŋ.”
40011007	Naa bohe bakarandeni bi ka Yɔni beŋ duwa, Yisɔs bohe gbonkitiyande sɛthɛ baŋ ba Yɔni, na “Mbɛ mu nde beŋ key ka detha ka wula baŋ? E buwari bu hande na nde beŋ kutu bu si ŋɛna iŋ huru?
40011008	Mbɛ hu nde beŋ kɛndɛ kaaye gbeeŋ? E ba ka detha wɔ thɔɔyɛ mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy? Biya bi thɔɔyɛ mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy bi kiŋ ka kaamani bibukuyuwɛ bi ka gbakuiŋ beŋ.
40011009	Mbu mbɛ hu nde beŋ kaaye kɛndɛ haŋ gbeeŋ? E ba detha banabi? Yaŋ tepe bena, beŋ thanki nda kuta wɔ yamɛ ba banabi,
40011010	baa ba Yɔni bɛna gbalo wuŋ ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala tepe ba dɔma, na, yaŋ kɔŋ ŋindi baseri wokiyaŋ woŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnda, wo ka kɔsinɔkɔ gboŋa baŋ ba yi.’
40011011	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ yameŋ ba wɔ yo wɔ ka faido. Kɛrɛ ndɛ wo thahuwɔi woŋ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ, ndɛ na yamɛ ba Yɔni.
40011012	There ka lɔkɔ ba Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ niye kɛwandi baŋ haaŋ saaŋ bohi hɛ, Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ niyɔy thɔrɔ wumandiŋ. Awa biyamɛti bibaŋɔi yole ba huŋ pinda.
40011013	Banabiŋ beŋ fooma iŋ Sirani ba ka Musa baŋ ni hunabi haaŋ e Yɔni saa.
40011014	Awa mɛnɛ beŋ mɛyi ba maseriŋ mabɛina, Yɔni na Ilaiya wo domo nde ba ndɛ kɔ saa woŋ.
40011015	Wɔ wo ba yuyɛ, ndɛ ponɛŋ kuiha.
40011016	“Mbɛ mu yaŋ thɔyintande iŋ biya bi ka lɔkɔ ba hɛ baŋ? Bindɛ athɔyande nɔŋ mpati bi dɔŋɔ ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka e bindɛ kɔ thiya bintɔni namɛŋ beŋ ba thurɔkɔ,
40011017	na ‘Miŋ haŋiye bena yakali, kɛrɛ beŋ tha kaŋ. Miŋ soŋiye bena nthenkeyni, kɛrɛ beŋ tha bereŋ.’
40011018	Naa see Yɔni, ndɛ bohe suŋ, awa ndɛ tha thiiye mampa. Biya beŋ fooma dome, na ‘Ndɛ boho iŋ wayi.’
40011019	Hati wo domo wo ka Wɔ woŋ see wo thɔŋ e ndɛ kɔ thiiye, awa biya beŋ fooma dome, na ‘Batiki iŋ bayilɔ iŋ mampa na ndɛ; nyathiki wo ka bathuuni duthu na iŋ bahakɛŋ.’ Nama o nama kele hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ bakɛnama ba huŋ niyɔ nɔndi ka wumankɛ.”
40011020	Kɛna bohe Yisɔs gbonkiya wukahɛ-kahɛ ka biya bi ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ ka thanki ndɛ niya bɛyiniŋ bathakaba, baa bindɛ tha mɛyi ba sikina sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ ba saa ka Masaala.
40011021	Ndɛ tɛpa, na “Nambara kendeŋ, bendo biKoresiŋ. Nambara kendeŋ bendo biBɛthɛseda, baa mɛnɛ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba thankɛ nde niyo kendeŋ do baŋ bɛna niyo nde ka biya bi ka mɛtiŋ ba ka Taya mɛnɛ ka Saidɔŋ baŋ beŋ, bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya beŋ, bi kɔŋ nde nɔŋ thɔɔkɔ yabɛŋ babɛkiŋ e bindɛ puyinɔkɔ hɔɔtɔ ba tɔŋina ba bindɛ kutɔkɔ mathonko e bindɛ sikiyɔkɔ maŋaye ka banɛnɔy namɛŋ baŋ.
40011022	Awa yaŋ tepe bena, ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ biTaya mɛnɛ biSaidɔŋ nkinikiniŋ wuŋ yama ba beŋ.
40011023	Awa bendo biKapaniyɔmi, e beŋ kiŋ ba ŋatina yɛthɛ bakendeŋ ka thinthi ka ariana? Beŋ kɔŋ thathina ka pothi ka yahanama; baa mɛnɛ waliŋ bamandiŋ ba thankɛ niyo nde kendeŋ do baŋ bɛna niyo nde nɔŋ ka mɛti ba ka Sɔdɔmi, ba kɔŋ nde niyɔ kɛndɛ haaŋ hɛ.
40011024	Awa yaŋ tepe bena, ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ biSɔdɔmi nkinikiniŋ wuŋ yama ba beŋ.”
40011025	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, huna tepe Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Fandaŋ woŋ, yindo Mariki wo ka ariana woŋ mɛnɛ ka faido, yaŋ thiyi yina maamo baa yi nunuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka bikele beŋ iŋ bithanuwɛ beŋ, e yi bɛŋ toŋine bi be kɔthɔ beŋ.
40011026	Nɛna huŋ yaathi Fandaŋ woŋ, yi ni mayɛthi makɛnda mɛnɛ mathimo makɛnda maŋ.”
40011027	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bakarandeni nama beŋ ba dɔma, na “Fandaŋ woŋ thanki yama dunkune ntha yo ntha, awa wɔ ka wo punku kɔthɔ Hati woŋ yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ na kɔthɛ yama, awa wɔ ka wo punku kɔthɔ Fandaŋ woŋ, yɔkɔŋ yaŋ, Hati woŋ, na kɔthɛ niŋ. Awa Hati woŋ na yɛthɛ bi ndɛ toŋine Fandama na.
40011028	“Saaŋ kiyaŋ do fooma, bendo dimbo doniŋ bakendeŋ beŋ, awa yaŋ kɔŋ bena hɛmɛni.
40011029	Kɔsinaŋ mathanani niŋ maŋ, awa e beŋ thanuwa maŋaye kiyaŋ, baa wɔ na yaŋ wo thathinɔkɔy iŋ wo thɛbɛ thukuma. Awa beŋ kɔŋ kutu kuhemuwe ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ,
40011030	baa mathanani niŋ maŋ baŋɔita kosino, awa doni niŋ baŋ ayethɔ.”
40012001	Lɔkɔ banthe Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ bi kɔŋ nde daŋande ka dumgbu ba ka muthɛri ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ. Bakarandeni beŋ kaho kɔnthɔ. Kɛna bohe bindɛ thinka muthɛri muŋ, e bindɛ muŋ kɔ thɔma.
40012002	Awa naa kute wuŋ biFaresini bi penkitiye kɛndɛ beŋ, bindɛ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Detha hɛ, bakarandeni nda beŋ bi si ni ba tepe Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba thana niyo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
40012003	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “E beŋ niyeta hɛ karaŋ ba ni nde gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ iŋ lamgbeŋ bi nde iŋ wundɛ ka biyasi haŋ beŋ naa kaho nde bindɛ ŋakɔnthɔ?
40012004	Ndɛ biyande nde ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ e ndɛ ka sɛkitha ŋatoŋ ŋa deŋo nde kɛndɛ ŋaŋ nɔŋ munkii ka Masaala, e thɔma ŋɛŋ iŋ bi nde iŋ wundɛ ka biyasi haŋ beŋ. Wuŋ baŋ wu kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba wɔ hɛna ba thɔma ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ ŋaŋ baŋ daŋandeŋ bafodeni beŋ.
40012005	Beŋ kɔthɛŋ nagberekethe ba beŋ thanki niya karaŋ ka Sirani ba ka Musa baŋ ba dɔma na Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe o Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe bafodeni bi ni wali ka banka bamandiŋ ba niye Masaala na kubatho baŋ bi kɔŋ ni ba tepe Siraŋ baŋ ba thana niyo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ ba niya wali, kɛrɛ bindɛ ka iŋ mathonko hali.
40012006	Yaŋ tepe bena, ntha ki kiŋ dondo baŋ ki yamɛ ba banka bamandiŋ ba niye Masaala na kubatho baŋ.
40012007	Awa mɛnɛ beŋ kɔthɛŋ nde saabu ba ka magbonkoy maŋ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Nkinikiniŋ kina yaŋ kufiyo; wuŋ ka sarakɛŋ ba maamiŋ,’ beŋ sa nde thonkine bi ka iŋ mathonko beŋ,
40012008	baa Hati wo domo wo ka Wɔ woŋ na kɛriŋiyɛ Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
40012009	Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ ka biyande ka banka namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ.
40012010	Kɛna penke ndɛ hati lamgba wo tukɛ yɔnkɔ. Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs na, na “E wu kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba puya wɔ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?” Bindɛ kɔŋ nde deethi na bindɛ niŋ bohe ka Siraŋ.
40012011	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wɔ o ka wo, mɛnɛ taka nama thɔɔyɛ ka kufo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, wo sa niŋ katiyɛ yɔnkɔ ba niŋ fuŋuna.
40012012	Mbu ntiŋ nda wɔmɛti wo yamɛ niyɔ wɔ waŋ woŋ daŋandeŋ taka woŋ? Huna wuŋ ka ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ baŋ ba niya bayɔhɔy ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
40012013	Bɛna dome ntiŋ Yisɔs ka hati lamgba wo tukɛ yɔnkɔ haŋ woŋ, na “Thumbuna yɔnkɔ nda haŋ.” Hati lamgba woŋ thumbuŋ yɔnkɔ nama haŋ, awa yɔnkɔ haŋ pethɔi nagbelebe nɔŋ na huhuntheŋ haŋ na.
40012014	Naa kute wuŋ biFaresini beŋ, bindɛ fuŋ ka gbada ka e bindɛ ka bɔha magbɔma ba na bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ba niŋ kɔra.
40012015	Naa kɔthɛ Yisɔs hu thanki bindɛ dɛɛnka ba ndɛ haŋ, ndɛ fuŋ kɛndɛ. Awa biya bimandiŋ yeme niŋ ka kaa. Ndɛ puyi bithoonɔi beŋ fooma,
40012016	e ndɛ bindɛ pinda ba bi be tha ni na wuŋ kothiyo ba dɔma na ndɛ na puyɛ bindɛ.
40012017	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Aisaya haŋ, na “Masaala tepe, na
40012018	Bawali wokiyaŋ wo thanki yaŋ yɛthɛ woŋ, wo thimo yaŋ woŋ wumandiŋ iŋ thukuma niŋ haŋ fooma. Yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ thiyi Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ, awa ndɛ kɔŋ koyoŋ ba mathumbɛ ma ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ niŋ koŋ maŋ ka siyani bahɛna baŋ fooma.
40012019	Ndɛ sa sisi ŋagbakali maa ba bɛnda ka gbonkiya. Awa wɔ sa yuyɛ thampa nama thaŋ ka mɛti baŋ,
40012020	ndɛ sa thinkinande kuthala kuhuthɔkɔi; ndɛ sa dɔmɔŋ mumɔɔli mu na dɔmɔɔtɔ, haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na wundɛ ni ba mathumbɛ niŋ maŋ kɛriŋa.
40012021	Ka keŋ kukɛnama koŋ kɛna siyani bahɛna baŋ kahe thukuma.”
40012022	Naa hintiŋ Yisɔs kɛndɛ, kɛna sisi biya beŋ lamgba wunthe wo boho iŋ wayi, wo mankɔy thaaya e hɛlɛŋ mankɔ hothi. Awa Yisɔs puyi niŋ e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ kuta nagberekethe e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ punka gbonkiya.
40012023	Biya beŋ fooma ni thakaba wumandiŋ, e bindɛ dɔma, na “E ba hɔŋ woŋ na Hati ka Dauda woŋ?”
40012024	Kɛrɛ naa yuye huŋ biFaresini beŋ, bindɛ dome, na “Ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli baŋ ma kaniniyande biya iŋ mbayiŋ.”
40012025	Naa kɔthɛ Yisɔs hu bindɛ ka thathukuma, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛnɛ huybakine o huybakine hakande mateete e huŋ kɔ dekiyande ka yɛthɛ nama, huybakine hubɛina hu kɔŋ thanki. Awa mɛti na o ka maa kubɔri ku thiyɛ kugbaayuwande e muŋ punka kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy.
40012026	Mɛnɛ Sithani kanthe kufɛŋ kunthe ka huybakine nama haŋ, wuŋ thɔyande ba dɔma huŋ hakande mateete. Awa huybakine hubɛina hu kɔŋ thanki.
40012027	Beŋ tepe ba dɔma na yando kanthi mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli baŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ siyuweta ba bakarandeni bikendeŋ beŋ kɔ kanthe mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli baŋ. Wuŋ, wuna tɔŋinɛ ba dɔma na yaŋ hɛlɛŋ gbeeŋ, yaŋ kantheta mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli baŋ.
40012028	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ yaŋ kanthe mbayiŋ beŋ maŋaye ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ, wuŋ thɔyande ba wuŋ niyɔ na Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ see kendeŋ.
40012029	“Wɔ o ka wo punku thinka banka ba ka basɛmbɛ ba niŋ tuuta, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be niŋ yenke yuka. Wuna ndɛ niŋ punku tuuta.
40012030	“Wɔ o wɔ wo ka iŋ yaŋ, ndɛ kiŋ ba sɔkinɔkɔ yama; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo sa mase yama ba kɔminande ka tha banthe, ndɛ kiŋ ka pankitinuwande mu thanki yaŋ kɔminande muŋ ka tha banthe.
40012031	Huna yaŋ tepe bena, hakɛ o hakɛ ba wɔ ni maa bɛyi o bɛyi banɛnɔy ba wundɛ gbonkoy, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ punku peniyo. Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo gbonkiye Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ wunɛnɔy, wɔ bɛina sa pɛniya.
40012032	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo gbonkoy wunɛnɔy ba Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ pɛniya hakɛ babɛina. Kɛrɛ wɔ o wɔ wo gbonkoy wunɛnɔy ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, ndɛ sa pɛniya, ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ maa ka lɔkɔ ba nɔŋ see baŋ.
40012033	“Kuyeŋ kuyɔhɔy kuna tɔŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy, maa kuyeŋ kunɛnɔi kuna tiŋ mutiŋ munɛnɔi, baa kuyeŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ kothiyo ka mutiŋ nama muŋ.
40012034	Beŋ, bendo kubɔri ku ka wɔthɔiŋ beŋ beŋ, nama beŋ punku gbonkiye bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy mahɛŋ ma e beŋ niyɔ biya binɛnɔy? Hothi haŋ hu kɔŋ gbonkoy fooma ba ka thukuma haŋ.
40012035	Wɔ yɔhɔy woŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy fooma ba kɔsɔŋ ndɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ; awa nɛna hɛlɛŋ wɔ nɛnɔi woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ gbonkoy fooma ba kɔsɔŋ ndɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ.
40012036	“Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ biyamɛti bi kɔŋ tɔŋ kuna bɛyi o bɛyi bamayɛini ba gbonkoy bindɛ,
40012037	baa maŋaye ka magbonkoy ndeŋ maŋ kɛna beŋ dunkuno mayoho iŋ Masaala, maa ka magbonkoy ndeŋ maŋ kɛna beŋ dunkuno mathonko.”
40012038	Kɛna see bikarimɔkɔiŋ binɔndi bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini binɔndi ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ thimoŋ ba kuta bɛyi bathakaba ba yi ni ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na sɛmbɛ nda baŋ ŋaye ka Masaala.”
40012039	Huna mɛyiyɛ bindɛ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Bendo biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ, biya binɛnɔy bina beŋ awa beŋ tha dunkunɔkɔ ka Masaala. Bena dethi ba bɛyi bathakaba. Yaŋ sa bena toŋine bɛyi bathakaba daŋandeŋ ba niyɔy nde ka banabi woŋ Yona baŋ.
40012040	Nɔŋ na niyɔy nde nthɔŋ Yona gbɛɛni bitaati iŋ hura kataati ka kotho hu ka he womandiŋ woŋ, nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyɔ gbɛɛni bitaati iŋ hura kataati ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ naa ndɛ mankuwo.
40012041	Ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ, biya bi ka mɛti ba ka Niniba bi kɔŋ biyande ka huybakine hu ka ariana haŋ baa bindɛ sikiyɔkɔi ka Masaala na ni ndɛ Yona bindɛ kɛwandi. Kɛrɛ beŋ, beŋ kɔŋ thonkino. Yaŋ tepe bena, ntha ki yamɛ ba Yona ki kooyeŋ mateete makendeŋ.
40012042	Ka lɔkɔ ba ka kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ koŋ baŋ, gbaku woyɛrɛmɛ wo nde ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Siba ba saa ka poniyɛ gbaku woŋ Silamani na kuiha naa ndɛ thanani thampɛŋ thakele thaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ ŋaye ka kɔɔ, awa e beŋ thonkino. Yaŋ tepe bena, ntha ki yamɛ ba gbaku woŋ Silamani ki kooyeŋ mateete makendeŋ.
40012043	“Naa wayi wonɛnɔy fuŋ ka wɔmɛti, ndɛ kɔŋ key kaŋ tharɔkɔ ka wulani ka ba kaa kaŋ deethuwa mahemuwe. Mɛnɛ ndɛ tha kutu ka ndɛ hemuwe,
40012044	ndɛ kɔŋ dɔŋ ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ duuteke ka banka niŋ ka ŋaye nde yaŋ ka.’ Mɛnɛ ndɛ biyande ka banka baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ pɛnki ba ka iŋ ntha, awa ba pithinɔi natharaŋ, ba kosinoko wuyɔhɔy.
40012045	Ndɛ kɔŋ fuŋ e ndɛ kaayiyɛ mbayiŋ bisɔŋ-biye bihɛna bi yamɛ nɛnɔ ba ndɛ. Bindɛ fooma bi kɔŋ biyande e bindɛ niya yikiya kɛndɛ. Awa maniyɔ ma ka wɔ bɛina ma kɔŋ nda yaŋ nɛnɔ adaŋande na nde ndɛ mayoŋ na. Nɛna nɔŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ.”
40012046	Naa nde hintiŋ Yisɔs gbonkiye biya beŋ, nandama mɛnɛ mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ see kɔɔ ka gbada e bindɛ kɔ yumba ba niŋ gbonkitiyande.
40012047	Kɛna dome wɔ wunthe ka biya beŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Ya nanda na mɛnɛ mbɛnda bibiyɛthɛŋ bi kooye ka gbada, awa bi thimoŋ ba yina gbonkitiyande.”
40012048	Huna dome ndɛ ka biya beŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ nandaŋ, awa mbɛ mbɛndaŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ?”
40012049	Kɛna pɛmpɛŋɛŋ ndɛ thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ e tɛpa ba wuŋ niyɔ, na “Bena binandaŋ mɛnɛ mbɛndaŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ,
40012050	baa wɔ yo wɔ wo ni mathimo ma ka Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ, ndɛ na wɛndaŋ wowathe, wɛndaŋ woyɛrɛmɛ, mɛnɛ nandaŋ.”
40013001	Ka lɔkɔ babanthe babɛina, Yisɔs fuŋ ka banka ba nde ndɛ baŋ e ndɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka gbaraŋ ba ka mankɔ maŋ.
40013002	Kɛna key sɛthɛ bamandiŋ niŋ pɛnkande. Huna ŋaye ndɛ ka doŋe ndɛ ka e thɔɔ ka gbe baŋ e kɛndɛ dɔŋɔ. Kɛna kɔɔyɛ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ ka gbaraŋ ba ka mankɔ maŋ ka detha niŋ.
40013003	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ ka mbɔrɔiŋ, e tɛpa, na “Bapayi paka na kaayɛ nde ka paya paka ka dumgbu nama ka.
40013004	Naa ndɛ payi, paka banɔndi ŋɔti ka gboŋa baŋ. Awa bɛna see bɛtiŋ beŋ bɛŋ thuu.
40013005	Paka banɔndi ŋɔti ka kuthara koŋ, awa bɛŋ muku yako baa bɛŋ tha pututa iŋ kupati kubɔyɛ.
40013006	Kɛrɛ saathɛ ba na ka kupati kubɔyɛ, naa tɔɔki nthɔŋ kaŋ woŋ, paka baŋ baŋ thithi baa nthanthɛŋ kiŋ tha thɔɔ wusuŋɔi.
40013007	Paka banɔndi baŋ ŋɔti ka hande hubasoi. Naa muku nthɔŋ bɛŋ, hande hubasoi haŋ nothite bɛŋ.
40013008	Paka banɔndi ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ. Bɛŋ muku e bɛŋ yɔhɔ wumandiŋ. Naa fuŋuŋ bɛŋ, kuyantha kunɔndi ku kiŋ nde iŋ thathaa kɛmɛ wunthe, kunɔndi kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-hanthe, kunɔndi kɔnthɔ kataati.”
40013009	Naa gbanthaŋ Yisɔs, huna dome ndɛ, na “Ndo ba yuyɛ, pona kuiha.”
40013010	Huna see bakarandeni beŋ ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Mbɛ hu yi bindɛ gbonkiye ka mbɔrɔiŋ?”
40013011	Huna mɛyiyɛ bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Beŋ thanki kothino gbundu wo ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ, kɛrɛ biya beŋ beŋ tha niŋ kɔthina.
40013012	Wo iŋ wubɔyɛ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ ndintiya haliko ndɛ be niyɔ iŋ wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ wo ka iŋ ntha woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kanita hali wuyete wu iŋ wundɛ wuŋ.
40013013	Ba saabu baŋ baŋ huna yaŋ bindɛ gbonkitiyande ka mbɔrɔiŋ, baa ‘bi kɔŋ dethi natiŋ kɛrɛ bindɛ kuita, awa bi kɔŋ poŋ kuiha kɛrɛ bindɛ yuyeta awa bindɛ methota.’
40013014	Ka maniyɔ namɛŋ maŋ kɛna see hunabi hu ka banabi woŋ Aisaya haŋ thiŋe, hu tepe nde ndɛ haŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala tepe, na Bi koŋ yuyɛ, kɛrɛ bindɛ sa metho. Bi kɔŋ dethi natiŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ sa kutu,
40013015	baa thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ thapimɔi, awa bindɛ lɔnkitɔkɔi ŋaiha, e bindɛ mankɔkɔ thaaya. Mɛnɛ bindɛ tha nde wuŋ ni, thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ kɔŋ nde punku ba kuta, ŋaiha namɛŋ ŋaŋ kɔŋ nde punku ba yuyɛ, thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ kɔŋ nde punku ba metho, ba haliko bi be see kiyaŋ do, yaŋ be bindɛ puyi.’ ”
40013016	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba tɛpa, na “Biya bi iŋ mayehitɔkɔ bina beŋ baa thaaya thakendeŋ thaŋ kute e ŋaiha ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ yuyɛ.
40013017	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, banabiŋ bibɔyɛ mɛnɛ biya bithumbɛ bi thimoŋ nde nɔŋ ba kuta ba thanki beŋ kuta baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ kutu. Bi thimoŋ nde hɛlɛŋ ba yuyɛ ba thanki beŋ yuyɛ baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ yuyɛ.”
40013018	Huna dome hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ponaŋ kuiha. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena methine mbɔrɔ ki ka bapayi woŋ kiŋ.
40013019	Biya binɔndi yuye thampa tha ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ thaŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha thɛŋ metho, e Wɔ Nɛnɔi woŋ thɛŋ si fuŋuna ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ. Bindɛ bina thɔyande iŋ paka ba ŋɔtɛ ka gboŋa baŋ.
40013020	Ba ŋɔtɛ nɛnɛ ka kuthara koŋ baŋ, bindɛ bina bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, e bindɛ thɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ yako iŋ mayehitɔkɔ,
40013021	kɛrɛ saathɛ ba na tha bindɛ thɔɔ wusuŋɔi ka thampa thaŋ e bindɛ thɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ wutɛŋɛ, bi kɔŋ ni muyuŋ ba wuthurɔy; kɛrɛ naa biya ni nthɔŋ, bindɛ thɔrɔ saathɛ ba thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ bindɛ pɛyi niya Masaala na lanɛya.
40013022	Ba ŋɔtɛ nɛnɛ ka hande hubasoi haŋ, bɛna biya bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ thɔrɔiŋ iŋ bɛyiniŋ ba ka faido baŋ mɛnɛ kufiyo ku ka deethuwa nanhulu baŋ koŋ nothite thampa thaŋ, awa bindɛ tha punku ba sisa mutiŋ.
40013023	Ba ŋɔtɛ nɛnɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ baŋ, bindɛ bina bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, e bindɛ thɛŋ metho wuyɔhɔy, e bindɛ thɛŋ bɔha. Awa bindɛ bina sisi mutiŋ mubɔyɛ nɔŋ paka baŋ. Kuyantha kunɔndi ku kiŋ nde iŋ thathaa kɛmɛ wunthe, kunɔndi thathaa kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-hanthe, kunɔndi thathaa kɔnthɔ kataati.”
40013024	Kɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kihɛna ba dɔma, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande iŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka wɔ wunthe wo key payi paka nama bayɔhɔy ka dumgbu nama ka.
40013025	Awa naa ŋɔyɛ nthɔŋ bindɛ huyɛ ka nine, hadeŋ nama key payi hande humayara ba biyamɛti ka dumgbu nama baŋ fooma e kɔ kaa napoŋ.
40013026	Awa kɛna see paka baŋ iŋ hande haŋ mukutande, e muŋ si fuŋuna ka nanthe. Awa kɛna see hande humayara haŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ.
40013027	Huna dome bawaliŋ nama beŋ kɛnama, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, e paka bayɔhɔy kutɛ paye nde yi ka dumgbu ka? Mbu nama kute bɛŋ hande haŋ haŋ siiya?’
40013028	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Hadeŋ niŋ woŋ na niyɛ wuŋ.’ Huna dome bawaliŋ beŋ kɛnama, na ‘E miŋ ka huŋ ŋaaki ka paka baŋ?’
40013029	Kɛrɛ wundɛ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na ‘Ade, thampo naa beŋ kɔ ŋaaki hande haŋ, beŋ kɔŋ ŋakati paka baŋ.
40013030	Mu mukutandeŋ ka tha banthe haaŋ nɔŋ e ŋɔna haŋ kɔ tɛŋa. Ka lɔkɔ ba ka ŋɔna haŋ baŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ tepe baŋɔni beŋ, na ŋɔnaŋ hande humayara haŋ hintiŋ e beŋ huŋ yuukuwa magbɔni na huŋ toonuwo, awa e beŋ ntiŋ manke ŋɔna paka baŋ e beŋ bɛŋ biita ka kuhunkuŋ ka.’ ”
40013031	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ mathɔyande mahɛna, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe wo sɛkithɛ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na ‘mɔstadi’ awa e ndɛ huŋ thuwa ka dumgbu nama ka.
40013032	Thaa haŋ haŋ baŋ huna yamɛ nda mɛɛsa ka thathaa fooma. Thaa haŋ haŋ baŋ huna see muku, e kuyeŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ thɔɔkuwa. Kuŋ see niyɔ kuyeŋ kumandiŋ haaŋ e bɛtiŋ beŋ si thooyuwa thahooti ka bathalɛŋ beŋ.”
40013033	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ mathɔyande mahɛna, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo sɛkithɛ yisithi woyete e niŋ tikitinuwande iŋ kutoŋ kuthithɛ ku bankɔ hanthe haaŋ e yisithi woŋ niya ba kutoŋ koŋ ŋata.”
40013034	Yisɔs kɔŋ nde thaninuwe sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ fooma ka mbɔrɔiŋ mɛnɛ ka mathɔyandeŋ. Awa ndɛ tha bindɛ tepe bɛyi o bɛyi mahɛŋ ma ka mbɔrɔ maa ka mathɔyande kutɛ.
40013035	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde banabi woŋ haŋ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkiye bindɛ ka mbɔrɔiŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy bɛyi o bɛyi ba nununɔi kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ ma ka fay woŋ maŋ.”
40013036	Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ sɛthɛ baŋ e ndɛ biyande ka banka ka. Kɛna see bakarandeni nama beŋ kɛnama e bindɛ dɔma, na “Methine mina mbɔrɔ ki ka hande humayara haŋ ka dumgbu baŋ ka.”
40013037	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ bindɛ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Wɔ wo payɛ paka bayɔhɔy baŋ woŋ na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.
40013038	Dumgbu baŋ bɛna ka fay woŋ, awa paka bayɔhɔy baŋ bɛna kubɔri ku ka Masaala koŋ. Hande humayara haŋ huna kubɔri ku ka Wɔ Wonɛnɔi woŋ koŋ.
40013039	Awa hadeŋ wo payɛ hande haŋ woŋ na Sithani, Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ. Ŋɔna haŋ huna mapeye ma ka faido maŋ. Awa baŋɔni beŋ bina malekɛŋ beŋ.
40013040	Nɔŋ na nthɔŋ hande haŋ kɔminando na e huŋ toonuwo iŋ buu, nɛna nɔŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka mapeye ma ka faido maŋ.
40013041	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ ŋindi malekɛŋ nama beŋ ba si yɛtha fooma mu ni ba banɛnɔy niyɔ muŋ iŋ biya bi ni banɛnɔy beŋ ka faido nɔŋ hande humayara haŋ,
40013042	awa bi kɔŋ bindɛ yɛli ka yahanama ka thɔyande kɛ nɔŋ buu butɔɔkɛ buŋ, ka biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.
40013043	Biya bithumbɛ beŋ kɔ bɛnda iŋ yiki nɔŋ kaŋ woŋ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala, Fandamɛŋ woŋ haŋ. Wɔ wo ba yuyɛ, ndɛ ponɛŋ kuiha.”
40013044	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ mbɔrɔ kihɛna ba dɔma, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka ntha ki kahɛ mɔlɔŋ ki mankuwɔi ka dumgbu ba theeye wɔ. Wɔ woŋ key kutu ntha ki kahɛ mɔlɔŋ ka thɛɛluwa haŋ. Kɛna manki wundɛ wuŋ. Ndɛ key ka banka nama ka kaŋ yehitɔkɔ e ndɛ ka niya gbɔŋ fooma mu iŋ wundɛ e ndɛ kaa ba ka boya dumgbu baŋ.”
40013045	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ mbɔrɔ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka wɔ wo deethi raka hu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ ba huŋ boya.
40013046	Mɛnɛ ndɛ penke huŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ key e ka niya gbɔŋ mu iŋ wundɛ muŋ fooma ba boya raka haŋ haŋ baŋ.”
40013047	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ mbɔrɔ kihɛna ba dɔma, na “Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka biya bi kaayɛ ka yɛla kupɛli ka mankɔ ka ba bɔha heni fooma bihakuwande.
40013048	Naa thiŋe kupɛli koŋ koŋ baŋ, biya beŋ yose kuŋ ka thithɛ ka e bindɛ dɔŋɔ ba yɛtha heni biyɔhɔy beŋ. Awa e bindɛ thiya bindɛ ka ntha e binɛnɔy beŋ yelo.
40013049	Nɛna nɔŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka mapeye ma ka fay woŋ maŋ. Malekɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ see ba si hakinande binɛnɔy beŋ iŋ bithumbɛ beŋ,
40013050	awa bi kɔŋ yɛli binɛnɔy bɛŋ ka yahanama ka thɔyande kɛ nɔŋ buu butɔɔkɛ buŋ, ka biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.”
40013051	Kɛna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “E beŋ metho mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ?” Bindɛ mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Ndo.”
40013052	Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Huna, karimɔkɔ wo ka Siraŋ baŋ woŋ wo thankɛ thaninuwo ba Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ woŋ athɔyande iŋ bayikiya wo funkutɛ kɛɛ bakɛnama ka gbada ba munki muŋama mɛnɛ mutiyɔ.”
40013053	Naa thanki nthɔŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya mbɔrɔiŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ, ndɛ pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ ba kaa ka hɛna,
40013054	awa naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama koŋ, ndɛ thanani biya beŋ ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ, haaŋ e bindɛ niya thakaba wumandiŋ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Kama kute hati woŋ kele humandiŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ iŋ ba punka niya bɛyiniŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ baŋ?
40013055	E hati ka kamudɛri woŋ kutɛ woŋ baŋ? E nandama woŋ kutɛ dɔma Mariyama? E mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ kutɛ Yemisi, Yusufu, Saimɔŋ, mɛnɛ Yudasi?
40013056	E mbɛndama biyɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ kutɛ iŋ miŋ dondo baŋ beŋ? Kama kute wundɛ kele iŋ sɛmbɛ baŋ baŋ?”
40013057	Ba saabu baŋ baŋ huna tha bindɛ niŋ yereke. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Banabi ka wo pankɛ yiki, yɔkɔŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama iŋ ka banka nama, kɛna ka ndɛ iŋ yiki.”
40013058	Wuna biyɛ ndɛ tha ni bɛyi bathakaba kɛndɛ, baa bindɛ tha niŋ ni lanɛya.
40014001	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Hɛrɔdi wo nde kɛrɛŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ yuye ba Yisɔs.
40014002	Awa huna dome ndɛ ka bakaamani nama beŋ, na “Hati lamgba wo ni bɛyiniŋ ba yaŋ yuyɛ baŋ baŋ woŋ, Yɔni na yaathi wo Babiye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ. Ndɛ na ŋaye hɛlɛŋ ka tuka haŋ. Wuna biyɛ ndɛ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba punka niya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.”
40014003	Saanuŋ Hɛrɔdi ba gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ niye nde nda yente Hɛrɔdiyasi na wuthɔkitɛ, wɔtɔ wɛndama Filipi. Kɛna key Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba niŋ tepe, na “Wuŋ sisandeta yi ba yɛnta Hɛrɔdiyasi na.” Awa huna niye Hɛrɔdi yamari ba Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ ka boho e ndɛ yuko e thiyo ka yeeli woŋ.
40014005	Wundɛ yole gboŋa o gboŋa ba kɔra Yɔni na, kɛrɛ wo nde payɔ biya beŋ baa banabi namɛŋ na.
40014006	Kɛrɛ ka lɔkɔ ba ka siyuwa malɔkɔ ma mpoo nde Hɛrɔdi maŋ, hati ka Hɛrɔdiyasi woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kame wuyɔhɔy ka sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ, awa wuŋ yehe gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi na.
40014007	Kɛna ni niŋ gbaku woŋ lahiri e ndɛ gbiŋa ba dɔma, na “Ntha o ntha ki yama yi thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba dunkuno, yaŋ kɔŋ yina kiŋ dunkune.”
40014008	Nandama tepe niŋ hu ndɛ ka tepe gbaku woŋ. Awa hati woŋ key tepe gbaku woŋ, na “Dunkune yama yaha hu ka Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ haŋ ka ntha!”
40014009	Naa yuye huŋ gbaku woŋ, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ, kɛrɛ saathɛ ba na thanki nda ndɛ gbiŋa, ndɛ ni yamari ba yaha hu ka Yɔni haŋ dunkuno.
40014010	Kɛna ŋinde ndɛ ba yaha hu ka Yɔni haŋ ba huŋ ka thoŋo ka ndɛ ka yeeli woŋ ka.
40014011	Awa yaha haŋ kaayiyo e huŋ thiyo ka ntha e hati woŋ huŋ si dunkuno, awa hati woŋ kati huŋ ka nandama ka.
40014012	Naa koro Yɔni, bakarandeni nama beŋ sekithe kubeli nama koŋ e bindɛ kuŋ ka mankuwa. Awa bindɛ key huŋ tepe Yisɔs na.
40014013	Naa yuye Yisɔs ba Yɔni, ndɛ fuŋ ka nde ndɛ kɛ e ndɛ thɔɔ ka gbe e kaa ka tha ka ndɛ wuntheŋ. Naa yuye huŋ sɛthɛ baŋ, bindɛ pɛyɛŋ mɛtiŋ namɛŋ baŋ e bindɛ niŋ yema kaŋ yathiyɔkɔ gbaraŋ ba ka mankɔ maŋ.
40014014	Naa fuŋ Yisɔs ka gbe baŋ e ndɛ dunkɔ ka thithɛ ka, ndɛ kute sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ awa ndɛ kutiye bindɛ nkinikiniŋ e ndɛ puya bithoonɔi beŋ.
40014015	Mahɔnkɔlɛŋ, naa bohe kaŋ woŋ thɔɔ, bakarandeni nama beŋ see kɛnama e bindɛ dɔma, na “Dutha du yɔthiŋɔi duna dondo baŋ, awa kaŋ woŋ bohe thɔɔ, niya ba sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ kaa ka thabikidiŋ thaŋ, bi be ka boyiyɔkɔ muthɔma.”
40014016	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Bindɛ kaaita kama o kama. Beŋ ka yɛthɛ bakendeŋ dunkuneŋ bindɛ muthɔma.”
40014017	Huna dome bakarandeni beŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi iŋ heni biye muna iŋ miŋ nagbɛti.”
40014018	Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Sisaŋ muŋ kiyaŋ do.”
40014019	Naa bohe ndɛ muŋ, ndɛ ni yamari sɛthɛ baŋ ba bindɛ dɔŋɔ ka hande haŋ. Kɛna sekithe ndɛ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ mɛnɛ heni biye beŋ e detha ka thinthi. Ndɛ thiyɛ muŋ thaduba, awa ndɛ thinkinuwande muŋ e dunkune bakarandeni nama beŋ, ba bindɛ muŋ hana sɛthɛ baŋ.
40014020	Naa thɔŋ bindɛ muŋ, woma o woma ka bindɛ thimbɔi. Kɛna ŋutunuwande bakarandeni beŋ magbanthi maŋ e mɛŋ tɛŋa thadebe kɔhi iŋ thaye.
40014021	Biyɛthɛŋ bɛrɛ ba wuluiŋ bisɔhi mɛnɛ yɛrɛmɛŋ iŋ mpatiyɛŋ bindɛ bina thɔmɛ.
40014022	Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni beŋ ba bindɛ thɔɔ ka gbe baŋ ba bindɛ niŋ kɔtiyɔkɔ ka thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ, na hintiŋ ndɛ pɛyɔ kɛndɛ ba dututuwa sɛthɛ baŋ.
40014023	Naa thanki ndɛ dututuwa sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ, ndɛ dunkɔy ka kusɛri koŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ ka ndɛ wuntheŋ.
40014024	Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ gbe baŋ ba kiŋ nda wuthɔkiyande iŋ ka thithɛ ka, awa kɛna sɛsi bɛŋ ba gbantuwando iŋ thamunkulu thaŋ, baa huru haŋ abɔyi ka mankɔ maŋ.
40014025	Saanuŋ kaŋ woŋ ba puthɔ, Yisɔs see kɛnamɛŋ, e ndɛ kɔ kaande ka mankɔ maŋ ka thinthi.
40014026	Naa kute niŋ bakarandeni beŋ si kaande ka mankɔ maŋ ka thinthi, bindɛ payɔy wumandiŋ, e bindɛ dɔma, na “Kuyimɛi na woŋ baŋ.” Kɛna payɔy bindɛ e bindɛ berina sampɛrɛŋ batɔɔkɛ.
40014027	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Kahaŋ thathukuma. Yama. Baŋ payɔ.”
40014028	Huna meyiye niŋ Pita, na “Mariki, mɛnɛ yina hunɔndi, niya yama yamari ba yaŋ kaande ka mandi maŋ ka thinthi e yaŋ kaa kɛnda ka.”
40014029	Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Saa.” Kɛna fuŋ Pita ka gbe baŋ e ndɛ bɔha kaande ka mandi maŋ ka thinthi ba kaa ka Yisɔs ka.
40014030	Kɛrɛ naa kute nthɔŋ ndɛ huru humandiŋ haŋ, ndɛ thooyo payɔ, awa ndɛ sɛsi ba mula ka mandi maŋ. Kɛna berintɔkɔi ndɛ, na “Mariki, niya yama kisi.”
40014031	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina Yisɔs katiyɛ niŋ yɔnkɔ e ndɛ niŋ thaye, e dɔma kɛnama, na “Yi kiŋ iŋ lanɛya bathahuwɔy. Mbɛ hu yi niyiye haamɛ ba niya lanɛya ba dɔma na yaŋ punkeŋ ba yi kaande ka mandi maŋ ka thinthi?”
40014032	Awa naa thɔɔyɛ Yisɔs iŋ Pita ka gbe baŋ, huru haŋ pɛyi hɔŋa haŋ.
40014033	Bakarandeni bi nde ka gbe baŋ beŋ fooma kunthuŋe ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma, na “Hunɔndi yaathi, yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ.”
40014034	Naa thuhande bindɛ mankɔ maŋ, bindɛ tɛŋ ka tha ka dɔma na Kɛnɛsɛrɛti.
40014035	Awa naa kɔthɛ biya bi kɛndɛ beŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs na, bindɛ ŋiindi thaseriŋ fooma ka kirinkiri hubɛina ba bithoonɔi beŋ fooma siso ka Yisɔs.
40014036	Naa sisi bindɛ bathoonani beŋ, biya beŋ theteke Yisɔs na ba ndɛ be mɛkɛŋ ba bathoonani beŋ hɔkɔŋ boheke kulɛmpilɛmpi ku ka yaba nama baŋ koŋ. Awa bathoonaŋ ndo bathoonaŋ wo boheke kulɛmpilɛmpi koŋ, ndɛ pethɔi.
40015001	Kɛna see biFaresini binɔndi mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ ka Yisɔs ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na
40015002	“Mbɛ hu bakarandeni nda beŋ teetuwe naamu wo thaninuwo nde miŋ iŋ mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ? Bindɛ sa loki thɛnkɔ na sisiyande bindɛ ba lokeke naa bindɛ bohe ba saa ka thɔma.”
40015003	Huna meyiye Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Mbu beŋ? Mbɛ hu beŋ teetuwe yamari wo ka Masaala woŋ saathɛ ba naamu ndeŋ woŋ?
40015004	Masaala ni nde yamari ba dɔma, na ‘Thiya fanda na mɛnɛ nanda na yiki,’ awa wundɛ tepe hɛlɛŋ, na ‘Wo gbonkiye fandama na mɛnɛ nandama na wunɛnɔy, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ tuku.’
40015005	Naa wɔ niyɔy iŋ ntha ki sisande ndɛ ba dunkune fandama na maa nandama, beŋ thanani ba dɔma na mɛnɛ ndɛ kɔŋ dɔŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Masaala na biyɛ wuŋ,’
40015006	na kabari na wo thane niye fandama na yiki ba niŋ dunkune muŋ muŋ baŋ. Huna saathɛ ba naamu wokendeŋ woŋ, beŋ buuhu yamari wo ka Masaala woŋ.
40015007	Bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, banabi woŋ Aisaya tepe nde nɔndi yaathi ba beŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala tepe, na
40015008	Biya beŋ beŋ baŋ bi kɔŋ yama ni yiki iŋ thahothi namɛŋ thaŋ hɔkɔŋ, kɛrɛ thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ tha thokiye yama,
40015009	Huna, ba gboŋ na bindɛ yama niye kubatho, baa bi kɔŋ thanani sirani ba ka biyamɛti nɔŋ Sirani niŋ bɛna.’ ”
40015010	Kɛna thiyi Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ kɛnama ka e dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ponaŋ kuiha awa e beŋ metho hu yaŋ bena see ka tepe haŋ.
40015011	Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na muthɔma mu thɔɔ ka hothi hu ka wɔmɛti muna niŋ pothoni, kɛrɛ thampɛŋ tha niŋ fuŋ ka hothi thaŋ thɛna niŋ pothoni.”
40015012	Huna see bakarandeni beŋ kɛnama e bindɛ dɔma, na “E yi kɔita ba dɔma na biFaresini beŋ teetuwɔi thathukuma wumandiŋ naa yuye bindɛ hu gbonkoy yi haŋ?”
40015013	Huna meyiye Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Muthuu o muthuu mu tha Fandaŋ woŋ thuu, mu kɔŋ ŋaka.
40015014	Penekeŋ bindɛ, bindɛ athɔyande nɔŋ biya bi mankɔy thaaya bi katitɔkɔ biya bi mankɔy thaaya, awa mɛnɛ wɔ mankɔy thaaya katitɔkɔi wɔ mankɔy thaaya, bindɛ bibiye bibɛina bi kɔŋ ŋɔti ka kufo.”
40015015	Huna dome Pita kɛnama, na “Methine mina hu tepe yi haŋ.”
40015016	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “E beŋ hɛlɛŋ haaŋ hɛ beŋ methota?
40015017	E beŋ kɔita ba dɔma na mu thɔɔ ka hothi hu ka wɔmɛti mu kɔŋ key toloŋ ka kotho ka, awa e muŋ fuŋa?
40015018	Kɛrɛ mu fuŋ ka hothi hu ka wɔmɛti mu kɔŋ ŋaye ka thukuma nama haŋ. Muŋ muŋ baŋ muna niŋ pothoni,
40015019	baa kɛna ŋaye masiyini manɛnɔy maŋ, kɔra haŋ ndo, ŋabɛini ŋahakuwande fooma, kutuwaŋ koŋ ndo, ba niya maseri maŋasɔkɛ yo, mɛnɛ ba teetuwa keŋ ku ka wɔ.
40015020	Muŋ muŋ baŋ fooma muna pothoni wɔmɛti, kɛrɛ ba thɔma wɔ tha lɔkɔkɔ na sisiyande wundɛ ba lokeke, huŋ kutɛ pothoni wɔmɛti.”
40015021	Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka kirinkiri hu ka mɛtiŋ ba ka Taya mɛnɛ ka Saidɔŋ baŋ.
40015022	Kɛna see hati yɛrɛmɛ wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kenaŋ koŋ, wo nde ka kirinkiri hubɛina. Ndɛ see berine Yisɔs na ba dɔma, na “Hɛmɔŋ, kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ, yindo Hati ka Dauda woŋ. Hatiŋ woyɛrɛmɛ ŋoyeŋ kɛndɛ wukahɛ baa wo kutande iŋ wayi.”
40015023	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha niŋ gbonkitiyande hali. Awa kɛna see bakarandeni nama beŋ kɛnama e bindɛ niŋ theteke ba dɔma, na “Niya ba hati yɛrɛmɛ woŋ kaa, baa ndɛ kɔŋ mina manki poro wumandiŋ.”
40015024	Huna niye Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ ŋindo hɔkɔŋ ka biya bi ka Isirɛli bipiriŋɛ beŋ. Bindɛ athɔyande nɔŋ takɛŋ bi fuŋɛ ka yɔnkɔ hu ka wo tɔlɛ bindɛ woŋ.”
40015025	Kɛrɛ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ see e ndɛ si kunthuŋa ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Yisɔs e dɔma, na “Hɛmɔŋ, mase yama.”
40015026	Huna meyiye niŋ Yisɔs, na “Wuŋ yeheta ba sɛkitha muthɔma mu ka mpati beŋ muŋ ba muŋ yɛliyɛ ŋatheŋ beŋ.”
