40015027	Huna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Hunɔndi yaathi hɛmɔŋ, kɛrɛ hali ŋatheŋ beŋ gbeeŋ bi kɔŋ ŋɔɔ ka pothi ka wo biyɛ bindɛ woŋ thome kɛ haliko ba thɛɛruwa ŋaboba ŋa ŋɔti ŋaŋ.”
40015028	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “O yi, yi kiŋ iŋ lanɛya bamandiŋ. Haliko wu niyiye nɛŋ na thonthiŋine yi na.” Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati nama woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ pethɔi.
40015029	Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka gbaraŋ ba ka mankɔ ma ka Kalili maŋ. Ndɛ key dunkɔ ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi, e ndɛ dɔŋɔ kɛndɛ.
40015030	Kɛna penko ndɛ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ bi sisɛ bathoonani, binɔndi ka bathoonani beŋ beŋ bagbɛthɛŋ, bimankɔy thaaya, bigbɛsinkɔi, baboboiŋ, mɛnɛ bi iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande, awa e bindɛ si dɛŋiyɛ Yisɔs na bindɛ. Kɛna puyi Yisɔs bindɛ fooma.
40015031	Sɛthɛ baŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ naa kute bindɛ baboboiŋ beŋ gbonkiya, bigbɛsinkɔi beŋ punka kɔɔ, bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ yatha, awa e bimankɔy thaaya beŋ kuta. Bindɛ gbuŋunu Masaala wo biIsirɛli beŋ ni kubatho woŋ.
40015032	Kɛna thiyi Yisɔs bakarandeni nama beŋ kɛnama ka e bindɛ tepe, na “Wuŋ niyɔy yama nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ ba sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ, baa bindɛ niyɔy iŋ yaŋ ka gbɛɛni bitaati beŋ beŋ baŋ. Awa bindɛ thanki thɔma muthɔma namɛŋ muŋ. Yaŋ thimota ba bindɛ duuta mahɛŋ ma yaŋ tha bindɛ thɔmɔŋ, thampo naa bindɛ kɔ duu bi kɔŋ yilɔ ka gboŋa e bindɛ ŋɔɔtuwa.”
40015033	Huna dome bakarandeni beŋ kɛnama, na “Kama miŋ kute ŋatoŋ ka wula baŋ baŋ ŋa tɛŋ ba sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ?”
40015034	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Tima ŋatoŋ ŋa iŋ beŋ?” Huna dome bindɛ, na “Ŋasɔŋ-ŋaye, mɛnɛ muheni muthahuwɔi.”
40015035	Kɛna ni Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ yamari ba bindɛ dɔŋɔ kɛkɛŋ.
40015036	Naa dɔŋɔy bindɛ, Yisɔs sekithe ŋatoŋ ŋasɔŋ-ŋaye ŋaŋ mɛnɛ muheni muŋ, e thiya Masaala na maamo ba muŋ. Naa thanki ndɛ muŋ thiyɛ maamo, ndɛ thinkinuwande muŋ e dunkune bakarandeni beŋ ba bindɛ dunkune biya beŋ. Naa bohe muŋ bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ dunkune muŋ sɛthɛ baŋ.
40015037	Awa sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ thɔŋ e woma o woma thimbɔ. Naa ŋaye bindɛ ka thɔma haŋ, bakarandeni beŋ ŋutunuwande magbanthi maŋ e mɛŋ tɛŋa thadebe thasɔŋ-thaye.
40015038	Biyɛthɛŋ bɛrɛ ba wuluiŋ binaŋ bina thɔmɛ. Yɛrɛmɛŋ iŋ mpatiyɛŋ bi thɔmɛ tha thiyita ka kɔnda.
40015039	Naa dututu Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ, ndɛ thɔɔyɛ ka gbe baŋ ba kaa ka kirinkiri hu ka mɛti ba ka Makadaŋ.
40016001	Biya binɔndi bi dɔma na biFaresini mɛnɛ biSadusini beŋ key ka Yisɔs ba niŋ ka gbɛriŋina. Bindɛ see niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba ndɛ be ni bɛyi bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
40016002	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Naa kaŋ woŋ kɔ thɔɔ, beŋ kɔŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Kuthahinɛ koŋ ayɔhɔ, baa miŋ kɔŋ kutu na pothoŋ kuŋ.’
40016003	Awa sanka sanka beŋ kɔŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Koyoŋ kɔŋ niyɔ hɛ, baa kuthahinɛ koŋ kubɔlinɛ.’ Beŋ kɔthɔ nagberekethe na beŋ hakiniyande maniyɔ ma ka kuthahinɛ koŋ maŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa punku tɛpa mathɔyande ma ka bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔ ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ.
40016004	Bendo biya bihɛ beŋ ani bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy awa beŋ metheta ka Masaala. Beŋ kɔŋ dethi ba bɛyi bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba yaŋ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba ŋaye ka Masaala baŋ. Kɛrɛ beŋ sa toŋino bɛyi bathakaba bahɛna yɔkɔŋ ba ka Yona baŋ nde.” Huna pɛyi Yisɔs bindɛ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kɔ kaa napooŋ.
40016005	Naa thuhande Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni beŋ mankɔ maŋ, bakarandeni beŋ piitɔi ba diŋa muthɔmɛŋ ka kaa.
40016006	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ yisithi wo ka biFaresini beŋ mɛnɛ biSadusini beŋ woŋ.”
40016007	Bindɛ sɛsi huŋ gbonkiya kɛndɛ bindɛ bithɔ ba dɔma, na “Yisɔs tepe haŋ haŋ baa na tha miŋ diŋ ŋatoŋ.”
40016008	Kɛrɛ naa kɔthɛ Yisɔs hu bindɛ gbonkiyɔkɔ bindɛ bithɔ, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Biya bi iŋ lanɛya bathahuwɔy bina beŋ. Mbɛ hu beŋ gbonkiyeke ba hu tha beŋ diŋe ŋatoŋ ka saa?
40016009	E haaŋ hɛ beŋ methota? E beŋ piitɔi naa theriye nde yaŋ lamgbeŋ wuluiŋ bisɔhi ka ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ? Tima nde thadebe tha thiŋɛ magbanthi ma pɛyɛ maŋ naa ŋutunuwande beŋ?
40016010	Maa ka ŋatoŋ ŋasɔŋ-ŋaye ŋaŋ iŋ lamgbeŋ wuluiŋ binaŋ beŋ? Tima nde thadebe tha thiŋɛ magbanthi ma pɛyɛ maŋ naa ŋutunuwande beŋ?
40016011	Mbɛ hu sa te beŋ metho ba dɔma na yaŋ gbonkiyeta bena ba ŋatoŋ ba na dome yaŋ, na ‘Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ yisithi wo ka biFaresini beŋ woŋ mɛnɛ biSadusini beŋ’?”
40016012	Kɛna metho ntiŋ bindɛ ba dɔma na ndɛ tepeta bindɛ ba niya kuthɛgbɛ ba yisithi wo thiya ka kutoŋ koŋ woŋ, kɛrɛ ba mathanani ma ka biFaresini beŋ maŋ mɛnɛ biSadusini beŋ.
40016013	Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e kaa ka kirinkiri hu thuriye ka mɛti ba ka Sɛsariya Filipai. Kɛna thonthiŋine ndɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Nama biyamɛti yama dɔŋ, yando Hati ka Wɔ woŋ na yaŋ?”
40016014	Huna tepe bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “Binɔndi bi kɔŋ dɔŋ na yina Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, binɔndi bi kɔŋ dɔŋ na yina Ilaiya, awa binɔndi na Yɛrɛmaya, maa wunthe na yi ka banabiŋ beŋ.”
40016015	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kɛrɛ mbu nda beŋ? Nama siyuwe beŋ na yaŋ?”
40016016	Huna dome Saimɔŋ Pita, na “Yina Banikisi wo yetho iŋ Masaala woŋ. Yina Hati ka Masaala wo iŋ sii ba kɔi o kɔi woŋ.”
40016017	Huna meyiye niŋ Yisɔs, na “Yehitɔkɔ Saimɔŋ, yindo hati ka Yɔni woŋ, baa wɔmɛti kutɛ toŋine yina nɔndi baŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ na toŋine yina bɛŋ.
40016018	Awa yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe, yina nda dɔma Pita, kuthara, awa ka kuthara koŋ koŋ baŋ kɛna yaŋ sesuwe ba kɔminiyande makɔmande ma ka biya bikiyaŋ beŋ, awa hali hintiŋ sɛmbɛ ba ka tuka haŋ baŋ sa mɛŋ punku teetuwa.
40016019	Yaŋ kɔŋ yina dunkune masaapɛŋ ma ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ. Awa bɛyi o bɛyi ba yi baŋaŋ ka faido, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ baŋaŋ ka ariana. Awa bɛyi o bɛyi ba yi yɛrɔkɔ ka faido, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ ka ariana.”
40016020	Kɛna yeli ndɛ bakarandeni beŋ wukahɛ-kahɛ ba bi be tha huŋ tepe wɔ yo wɔ ba dɔma na ndɛ na Banikisi woŋ.
40016021	There nda ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Yisɔs sɛsi ba tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma, na “Yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be key ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi e yaŋ kɛndɛ ka niyo thɔrɔ wumandiŋ iŋ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, awa mɛnɛ bikarimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ kɔra, kɛrɛ ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ e yaŋ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ iŋ sii.”
40016022	Kɛna thiyi niŋ Pita ka bindɛ biye e niŋ pinda ba hu tepe ndɛ haŋ ba dɔma, na “Mariki, haliko Masaala niya yina huŋ thanka. Wuŋ sa yina punku niyɔ haaŋ nɔŋ.”
40016023	Huna dethe Yisɔs mahɛŋ e ndɛ dɔma ka Pita, na “Gbɔniyɔkɔ yama Pita, yindo sɛkithɛ kufɛŋ ku ka Sithani koŋ. Yindo kankilɛ gboŋa niŋ baŋ, baa masiyi makɛnda maŋ maŋ tha ŋaye ka Masaala, kɛrɛ ka kufɛŋ ku ka wɔmɛti kɛna ŋaye mɛŋ.”
40016024	Huna tepe Yisɔs bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ kiŋ ba yama yema, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be thambo munki mu ka faido mu thimo ndɛ muŋ, e ndɛ thunkuteke nambarɛŋ ba niŋ pɛnki ba thɔyande nɔŋ kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, e ndɛ yama yema.
40016025	Wɔ o wɔ wo yɔli ba kɔsina sii nama baŋ ka yɛthɛ nama, ndɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii.
40016026	Munahaŋ ndo ka wo wɔmɛti kutu ba piriŋina sii nama baŋ haliko ba kuta munki mu ka faido muŋ fooma. Wuŋ sa punku niyɔ hali. Ntha o ka ki wɔmɛti dunkuŋ ba kuta sii nama baŋ hɛlɛŋ.
40016027	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kiŋ ba saa iŋ malekɛŋ nama beŋ mɛnɛ sɛmbɛ bamandiŋ ba ka Fandama woŋ baŋ ba si tɛnkiniyɛ wɔ yo wɔ ba ba thanki ndɛ niya baŋ.
40016028	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, biya binɔndi bi kooyeŋ dondo baŋ bi sa niye tuke bi kɔŋ kutiyɔkɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si kɛrɛŋ ka Hugbakinɛ nama haŋ.”
40017001	Naa daŋande wuŋ mandɛni masɔŋ-manthe, Yisɔs thiyi Pita na, mɛnɛ biya bi huwɛndiya Yemisi mɛnɛ Yɔni. Ndɛ diŋe bindɛ ka thinthi ka kusɛri kuthɔkuwɛ-thɔkuwɛ ka bindɛ bintheŋ.
40017002	Naa bindɛ niŋ dethi, kɛna thikipo Yisɔs, awa e yethi nama haŋ maleke nɔŋ kaŋ woŋ, awa e yaba nama baŋ huha napooŋ.
40017003	Kɛna kute bakarandeni bitaati beŋ Musa na mɛnɛ Ilaiya e bindɛ kɔ gbonkiye Yisɔs na.
40017004	Huna dome Pita ka Yisɔs, na “Mariki, wuŋ yɔhɔy na nda miŋ dondo na. Mɛnɛ yi kɔŋ mɛyi, yaŋ kɔŋ kiyi bankɛŋ bataati bathikɛŋ dondo baŋ, yi banthe, Musa banthe, Ilaiya banthe.”
40017005	Naa ndɛ gbonkoy, kɛna see wuruma hu bɛndɛ-bɛndɛ pututɔ bindɛ, awa e thampa fuŋa maŋaye ka wuruma haŋ tha tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Hatiŋ wo thimo yaŋ woŋ na woŋ baŋ, wo yama yeheŋ thukuma woŋ. Huna poniyaŋ niŋ kuiha.”
40017006	Naa yuye bakarandeni beŋ thampa thaŋ thaŋ baŋ, wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ gbɛki wumandiŋ e bindɛ ŋɔɔkɔ kɛkɛŋ e bindɛ pututɔ thayethi namɛŋ thaŋ.
40017007	Huna see Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ e ndɛ bindɛ tuta thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ e dɔma, na “Ŋayeŋ ka kɔɔ. Baŋ payɔ.”
40017008	Kɛna ŋaye bindɛ ka ŋoke bindɛ ka. Kɛrɛ naa yili bindɛ thaaya, bindɛ tha nda kutu wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna kɛndɛ yɔkɔŋ Yisɔs ndɛ wuntheŋ napethi, ndɛ na kute bindɛ.
40017009	Naa Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni beŋ thuhu ŋaye ka kusɛri koŋ, Yisɔs ni bindɛ yamari ba dɔma, na “Baŋ tepe wɔ o wɔ ba thanki beŋ kuta baŋ, haaŋ nɔŋ yɔkɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ŋayino ka tuka haŋ iŋ sii.”
40017010	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ bakarandeni beŋ, na “Mbɛ ba dɔmɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ tɛpi ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ Ilaiya na nɔŋ yenke saa?”
40017011	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ, na “Nɔndi yaathi, nɛna tepe magbali maŋ, na Ilaiya na nɔŋ yenke saa, awa ndɛ kɔŋ si kɔsinɔkɔ bɛyiniŋ fooma.
40017012	Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena ba wuŋ niyɔ na Ilaiya thanki nde nda saa, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha nde niŋ ŋee, awa bindɛ ni niŋ nama o nama na thimo bindɛ. Nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si niya nambara iŋ biyamɛti.”
40017013	Kɛna kɔthɛ ntiŋ bakarandeni beŋ ba wuŋ niyɔ na ndɛ kɔŋ bindɛ gbonkiye ba Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ.
40017014	Naa teŋiteke bindɛ ka sɛthɛ baŋ ka, hati lamgba wunthe see ka Yisɔs e ndɛ si kunthuŋa ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnama e tɛpa, na
40017015	“Hɛmɔŋ, kutiyɛ hati niŋ wowathe woŋ nkinikiniŋ, baa timo tima wo ŋɔti iŋ makɛndɔiŋ, awa wo kaho-kaho wumandiŋ. Tima o tima ndɛ kɔŋ ŋɔti ka buu, lɔkɔ hɛ ka mandi ka.
40017016	Huna sise yaŋ niŋ ka bakarandeni nda beŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niŋ punku puya.”
40017017	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “O biya bi be ni lanɛya iŋ biya bisikɔi, tima hɛlɛŋ nda yaŋ niyɔ iŋ beŋ? Mbɛ hɛlɛŋ nda muyuŋ ba yaŋ bena ni? Sisiyaŋ nuŋ hati woŋ dondo baŋ.”
40017018	Kɛna bende Yisɔs wayi woŋ, awa wayi woŋ pɛyɛŋ hati woŋ. Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati woŋ pethɔi.
40017019	Huna see bakarandeni beŋ nasɔɔyi ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma, na “Mbɛ hu tha miŋ punke kaniniyande hati woŋ iŋ wayi woŋ?”
40017020	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Baa kulanɛya kukendeŋ koŋ athahuwɔ tindɛ. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, mɛnɛ beŋ hɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ niyɔ iŋ lanɛya bathahuwɔy nɔŋ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na mɔstadi haŋ, beŋ kɔŋ punku dɔma ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ, na ‘Gbɔnɔkɔ dondo baŋ e yi kaa kanka baŋ.’ Awa ku kɔŋ gbɔnɔkɔ e kuŋ kɛndɛ kaa. Awa bɛyi o bɛyi ka ba sa beŋ punku niya. [
40017021	Kɛrɛ yɔkɔŋ kuraminɛ mɛnɛ bɔha suŋ muna ni ba bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ punka niyɔ.]”
40017022	Naa thuŋande bakarandeni beŋ ka tha banthe fooma ka Kalili, Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biyamɛti,
40017023	awa bi kɔŋ niŋ kɔri. Kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ.” Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ wuŋ niyɔy bakarandeni beŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ.
40017024	Naa tɛŋ Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi, bathuuni duthu bi ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ beŋ key ka Pita ka, e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “E karimɔkɔ ndeŋ woŋ kɔŋ kɔ thunkuŋ duthu woŋ?”
40017025	Huna meyiye Pita, na “Ndo.” Awa naa tɛŋ Pita ka banka, Yisɔs yenke hintiŋ gbonkitiyande Pita na ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ mu siyuwe yi, Saimɔŋ? Kama gbakuiŋ bi ka faido beŋ bohi duthu? Ka lasiri baŋ maa ka biya bihɛna beŋ?”
40017026	Huna dome Pita, na “Ka biya bihɛna beŋ na bindɛ niŋ bohe.” Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Awa lasiri baŋ sa nda thunkuŋ.
40017027	Kɛrɛ na ka miŋ ba bindɛ mina thooye ka mathoŋ, huna kaa ka mankɔ ka e yi ka yɛla danka baŋ, awa he wo yi yenke bɔha woŋ, kubunande hothi nama haŋ. Yi kɔŋ kɛndɛ kutu kɔbiri. Sɛkitha kɔbiri wobɛina e yi ka thunkuna bindɛ duthu woŋ ba yaŋ iŋ yi.”
40018001	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina bɛna see bakarandeni beŋ ka Yisɔs, e bindɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina ba dɔma, na “Nkaana yamɛ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ?”
40018002	Huna thiye Yisɔs hati woyete e ndɛ niya ba ndɛ kɔɔ mateete makɛnamɛŋ,
40018003	e ndɛ dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ beŋ sikiyɔkɔi ka maniyɔ makendeŋ maŋ e beŋ niyɔ nɔŋ mpatiyɛŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, beŋ sa punku biyande ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ.
40018004	Wɔ wo niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ woŋ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ, ndɛ na wɔ thathinɔkɔ woŋ nɔŋ hati woŋ baŋ.
40018005	Wɔ o wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ hati nɔŋ hati woyete woŋ baŋ ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ, wɔ bɛina yɛrɔkɔy yama.
40018006	“Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ ni ba wunthe ka mpati beŋ beŋ baŋ bi niyɛ yama lanɛya beŋ ŋɔta ka hakɛ, wu kɔŋ niyɔ hita ba wɔ bɛina yantino raka humandiŋ ka nkoyo nama kiŋ e ka muluno ka mankɔ masuŋɔi-suŋɔi maŋ.
40018007	Nambara ba kɔŋ see ka biya bi ka faido beŋ baa bindɛ thiiko ba ŋɔta ka hakɛ. Kɛrɛ nambara ka wɔ sisi kuthiiki koŋ koŋ woŋ.
40018008	“Mɛnɛ yɔnkɔ nda maa kuthaki nda ni ba yi ŋɔta ka hakɛ, thoŋa e yi yɛla. Wu kɔŋ niyɔ hita yi ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy wu ka yɔnkɔ maa wu ka kuthaki, ayaŋ yi ba yelo ka yahanama ka buu bu sa dɔmɔ buŋ iŋ thɛnkɔ mɛnɛ ŋathaki.
40018009	Awa mɛnɛ hooya nda haŋ ni ba yi ŋɔta ka hakɛ, fuŋuna huŋ e yi huŋ yɛla. Wu kiŋ hita yi ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy iŋ hooya hunthe, ayaŋ yi ba niyɔ iŋ thaaya thaye e yi yelo ka buu bu ka yahanama buŋ.”
40018010	“Baŋ yethitɔ wunthe ka mpati beŋ beŋ baŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, malekɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ ka ariana bina kɔɔ timo tima ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ. [
40018011	Baa Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see ba niya kisi biya bipiriŋɛ beŋ.]
40018012	“Nama siyuwe beŋ na wuŋ niyɔ ba wɔ wunthe wo iŋ takɛŋ kɛmɛ wunthe e wunthe ka bindɛ piriŋa? E ndɛ sa pɛyi bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ beŋ ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ e ndɛ kaa kaŋ deethuwa wo piriŋɛ woŋ?
40018013	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, naa ndɛ kute niŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ ba ndɛ, e wuŋ yama ba bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ bi tha piriŋ beŋ.
40018014	Nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka Fanda ndeŋ wo ka ariana woŋ. Mathimo nama kutɛ ba wunthe ka mpati nama beŋ beŋ ba piriŋa.
40018015	“Mɛnɛ wɛnda ka kubɔri ku ka Masaala koŋ ni yina wunɛnɔy, kaa kɛnama ka e yi niŋ ka tepe ba ni ndɛ yina baŋ ka beŋ biye. Mɛnɛ ndɛ poniyɛ yina kuiha, yi ni hɛlɛŋ ba ndɛ niyɔ wɛnda.
40018016	Mɛnɛ ndɛ tha yina poniyɛ kuiha, diŋa wɔ wunthe maa biya biye ka kaa, wuna ‘sɔkɔ o sɔkɔ hu yi tɛpi hu be niyɔ iŋ maseri ma ka biya biye maa bitaati bi yi diŋ ka kaa beŋ,’ nɔŋ na tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ na.
40018017	Mɛnɛ ndɛ baŋaŋ ba hɛlɛŋ bindɛ poniyɛ kuiha, tɛpa huŋ ka makɔmande ma ka biya bi ka Masaala beŋ maŋ. Awa mɛnɛ ndɛ baŋaŋ hɛlɛŋ ba bindɛ poniyɛ kuiha, ndɛ niyɔyŋ ka kuwaŋ kukɛnda nɔŋ wɔ wo be ni Masaala na lanɛya na ndɛ maa bahakɛ wo tha sikiŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ bakɛnama baŋ.
40018018	“Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, bɛyi o bɛyi ba beŋ baŋaŋ ka faido, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ baŋaŋ ka ariana. Awa bɛyi o bɛyi ba beŋ yɛrɔkɔ ka faido, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ ka ariana.
40018019	“Yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na mɛnɛ biya biye ka beŋ niyɔy hunthe ka faido ba bɛyi o bɛyi ba bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ka kuraminɛ bi kɔŋ bɛŋ niyiya iŋ Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ.
40018020	Ka biya biye maa bitaati niyɔ ka keŋ kukiyaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ bindɛ.”
40018021	Kɛna see Pita ka Yisɔs e ndɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina, na “Mariki, tima dɔŋɔ hu wɛndaŋ yama ni wunɛnɔy, awa tima dɔŋɔ hu yaŋ niŋ pɛniyɛ? E mɔlɔŋ ba dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye?”
40018022	Huna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ sa yina tepe na dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye na yi niŋ pɛniyɛ, kɛrɛ kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kaye dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye na yi niŋ pɛniyɛ.
40018023	Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka gbaku wo dɔŋɔy ba kɔthɔ ti kɔbiri wo thohite niŋ bayahɛŋ nama beŋ.
40018024	Naa sɛsi nthɔŋ ndɛ kɔthɔ ti kɔbiri woŋ, bayaha wunthe wo thohite nde niŋ kɔbiri wo liyoni wuluiŋ-wuluiŋ siso kɛnama.
40018025	Kɛrɛ naa tha hati lamgba woŋ niŋ punku thunkuna nanhulu baŋ baŋ, gbaku nama woŋ ni yamari ba ndɛ be niya gbɔŋ, wɔtɔ nama, mpati nama, mɛnɛ ntha yo ntha kikɛnama haliko nanhulu baŋ ba be thunkuna.
40018026	Kɛna kunthuŋe bayaha woŋ baŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnama, e niŋ theteke, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, niya yama muyuŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ yina thunkuŋ fooma.’
40018027	Kɛna kutiye niŋ gbaku nama woŋ nkinikiniŋ e ndɛ niya ba ndɛ kaa, awa ndɛ pɛniyɛ niŋ dɔɔnthɔ baŋ.
40018028	“Kɛrɛ bayaha wowunthe wobɛina woŋ, naa bohe nthɔŋ ndɛ kaa, ndɛ pɛnkande iŋ ntɔ nama wo bayaha wo thohite niŋ liyoni kɛmɛ wunthe. Kɛna bohe ndɛ niŋ ka nkoyo kiŋ e niŋ siikita, e dɔma, na ‘Thunkuna yama dɔɔnthɔ baŋ.’
40018029	Kɛna kunthuŋe badɔɔnthɔ nama woŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnama e niŋ theteke ba dɔma, na ‘Yaandi, niya yama muyuŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ yina thunkuŋ.’
40018030	Kɛrɛ hati lamgba woŋ tha mɛyi ba niŋ pɛniyɛ dɔɔnthɔ baŋ. Kɛna bohe ndɛ niŋ e niŋ ka thiya ka yeeli na yɔkɔŋ ndɛ thunkuŋ dɔɔnthɔ baŋ.
40018031	Naa kute nthɔŋ ntɔni nama bi ndɛ ni wali beŋ ka tha banthe ba thanki ndɛ niya baŋ, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ, awa bindɛ key tepe gbaku namɛŋ woŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
40018032	Huna thiye niŋ gbaku nama woŋ e niŋ tepe, na ‘Bawali na yi wonɛnɔy. Yaŋ thanki yina pɛniyɛ fooma dɔɔnthɔ ba yi ba yama thunkuna baŋ baa yi theteke yama.
40018033	Yi kiŋ nde ba kutiyɛ ntɔ nda na nkinikiniŋ, nɔŋ na kutiye yaŋ yina nkinikiniŋ na.’
40018034	Gbaku nama woŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ wumandiŋ, e ndɛ dunkuna niŋ ka ndɛ niyo nambara ka yeeli woŋ haaŋ yɔkɔŋ ndɛ thunkuŋ dɔɔnthɔ nama baŋ.
40018035	“Nɛna hɛlɛŋ Fandaŋ wo ka ariana woŋ ni ka wɔ o wɔ ka beŋ, mɛnɛ beŋ tha pɛniyɛ mbɛnda ndeŋ ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ.”
40019001	Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, ndɛ pɛyɛŋ ka Kalili e ndɛ kaa ka kirinkiri hu ka Yudiya thuhaŋ mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ.
40019002	Naa ndɛ key, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme niŋ ka kaa, awa ndɛ puyi bathoonani beŋ fooma.
40019003	Kɛna see biFaresini binɔndi iŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba niŋ si gbɛriŋina ba kuta na bindɛ niŋ bohe ka Siraŋ. Huna dome bindɛ, na “E wu kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba wɔ ba baŋina wɔtɔ nama ba saabu o saabu ba yɛthi ndɛ?”
40019004	Huna mɛyiyɛ bindɛ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “E beŋ tha ni karaŋ magbali ma ka Masaala ma tɛpɛ ba wuŋ niyɔ na ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ, Masaala yeheni wɔ wathe mɛnɛ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ.
40019005	Awa ndɛ dɔma, na ‘Ba saabu baŋ baŋ huna wɔ wathe peyene fandama na mɛnɛ nandama na e bɔhande ka tha banthe iŋ wɔtɔ nama, awa biya bibiye beŋ beŋ see nda niyɔ nɔŋ wɔ wunthe.’
40019006	Huna bindɛ ka nda biya biye, kɛrɛ bi kiŋ nda nɔŋ wɔ wunthe. Wu bohinande Masaala ka tha banthe, wɔmɛti bɛiŋ wuŋ paŋinande.”
40019007	Huna dome biFaresini beŋ kɛnama, na “Mbu mbɛ hu niye nde Musa yamari ba dɔma na mɛnɛ wɔ baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama, ndɛ kiŋ ba niŋ dunkune kuthagba ku iŋ magbali ma tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ baŋaŋ niŋ?”
40019008	Huna mɛyiyɛ Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Musa ni nde wuŋ baa beŋ akaahi thaninuwo. Kɛrɛ ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ wuŋ ka nɛŋ hali.
40019009	Awa yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, wɔ yo wɔ wo baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama wu ka ba dɔma na wɔtɔ nama ni kubɛi e wɔ bɛina yɛnta yɛrɛmɛ wohɛna, ndɛ ni kubɛi ku teeti kuyɛntande kumayoŋ koŋ.”
40019010	Huna dome bakarandeni beŋ kɛnama, na “Mɛnɛ nɛna wuŋ ba niiye ba wɔ iŋ wɔtɔ nama, wu kiŋ nda hita ba wɔ nda thana yɛnta.”
40019011	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Biya fooma kutɛ yɛrɔkɔ mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ ma kiŋ hɔkɔŋ nagbɛti ka bi dunkuno mɛŋ beŋ iŋ Masaala.
40019012	Biya binɔndi bi kiŋ kɛndɛ bi iŋ saabuiŋ bahakuwande ba sa bindɛ yente. Binɔndi nɛŋ mpoo mɛŋ. Binɔndi bi kiŋ kɛndɛ biyamɛti bina niyɛ nɛŋ bindɛ. Awa binɔndi bi kiŋ kɛndɛ bindɛ bina yɛthɛ ba thana yɛnta saathɛ ba Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ. Wɔ wo punku yɛrɔkɔ mathanani maŋ maŋ woŋ, ndɛ yɛrɔkɔyŋ mɛŋ.”
40019013	Kɛna sisi biya binɔndi mpatiyɛŋ ka Yisɔs ba ndɛ be bindɛ tutu thɛnkɔ e bindɛ niyiyɛ kuraminɛ. Kɛrɛ naa kute wuŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, bindɛ pinde biya beŋ.
40019014	Huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni beŋ, na “Niyaŋ ba mpati beŋ beŋ saa kiyaŋ do; baŋ bindɛ pindi, baa beŋ beŋ baŋ siiya bina biyɛ Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ.”
40019015	Yisɔs tute bindɛ thɛnkɔ e bindɛ niyiyɛ kuraminɛ. Naa thankaŋ ndɛ, ndɛ fuŋ kɛndɛ e kɔ kaa.
40019016	Awa kɛna see hati lamgba wunthe ka Yisɔs e ndɛ dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, mbɛ bayɔhɔy ba yaŋ ni gbeeŋ haliko ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy?”
40019017	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Mbɛ hu yama yi thonthiŋine ba bayɔhɔy ba yi ba niya? Masaala ndɛ wuntheŋ napethi ndɛ na wɔ yɔhɔy. Mɛnɛ yi kiŋ ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, putiyɔ sirani ba dunkuŋ nde Masaala baŋ ka yɔnkɔ hu ka Musa.”
40019018	Huna thonthiŋine hati lamgba woŋ Yisɔs na, na “Mbɛ sirani na?” Huna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs, na “Ba kɔri, ba ni kubɛi, ba tuwe, ba ni maseri mahothi ba ntɔ nda,
40019019	thiya fanda na iŋ nanda na yiki, awa e yi thimo ntɔ nda na nɔŋ na thimo yi yɛthɛ bakɛnda baŋ.”
40019020	Huna dome hati lamgba woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ thɔkɔti nde nda putiyɔ sirani baŋ baŋ fooma. Mbɛ hɛlɛŋ mu pɛyɛ yaŋ ba niya?”
40019021	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Mɛnɛ yi thimoŋ ba niyɔ wɔ thankinuwɛ, kaa e yi ka niya gbɔŋ fooma munki mukɛnda muŋ, e yi dunkuna kɔbiri woŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Yi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ hudinhaŋiya ka ariana, awa e yi tiŋ saa ba yama yema.”
40019022	Naa yuye huŋ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, ndɛ sinkiŋ yaha e ndɛ kaa iŋ thukuma hu teetuwɔi baa ndɛ kiŋ iŋ nanhulu bamandiŋ.
40019023	Huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wu kɔŋ kaahi ba bananhulu ba biyande ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ.
40019024	Yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ bena huŋ tepe, akaahi ba maama womandiŋ nɔŋ nyɔkɔmɛ ba fuŋande ka mathaa ma ka masandeŋ. Ba bananhulu ba biyande ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ, wu kɔŋ yaŋ kaahuwa.”
40019025	Naa yuye huŋ bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ, e bindɛ dɔma, na “Mbu mbɛ wo nda niyɔ kisi?”
40019026	Huna dethe bindɛ Yisɔs e ndɛ dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Biyamɛti sa punku niyɔkɔ kisi, kɛrɛ Masaala punkeŋ niya bɛyi o bɛyi.”
40019027	Huna dome Pita ba wuŋ niyɔ, na “Miŋ pɛyi ntha o ntha ba yina yema. Mbɛ mu nda miŋ kutu gbeeŋ maŋaye kɛnda?”
40019028	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, ka fay woŋama wo see woŋ, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka yensi nama hu ka sɛmbɛ baŋ haŋ. Bendo yemɛ yama beŋ, beŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ nɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka thayensi kɔhi iŋ thaye thaŋ ba kɔnsiŋina bɔnsɔni bakɔhi iŋ baye ba ka Isirɛli baŋ.
40019029	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina wɔ yo wɔ wo pɛyɛnɛ bankɛŋ nama, maa mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ maa mbɛndama biyɛrɛmɛŋ maa fandama maa nandama maa mpati nama maa thakai nama ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ tutiya kɛmɛ wunthe ka ntha yo ntha ki piriŋiŋ wundɛ awa ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
40019030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bibɔyɛ bi nde ka kɔtɔkɔy beŋ, bindɛ bina nda manki mahɛŋ; awa bimankɛ beŋ nde, bindɛ bina nda si niyɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy.
40020001	“Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka bayɔi wo fuŋɛ kuputhɔ ku kaŋ ba sɛkitha lamgbeŋ bi niŋ niyiyɛ wali ka dumgbu nama ka.
40020002	Naa kute ndɛ bindɛ, ndɛ bohinande iŋ bindɛ ka mɔlɔŋ ba ti nde wuŋ kɛndɛ thunkuna ba gbɛɛŋ woŋ. Awa ndɛ dome ntiŋ ba bindɛ kaa ka niya wali baŋ ka dumgbu nama ka.
40020003	Naa tɔɔki theyaŋ haŋ, ndɛ fuŋ ba kaa ka kaande. Kɛna penke ndɛ lamgbeŋ bihɛna bi kooye ka gbɔɔni baŋ niyo ka bi ka iŋ wali ba bindɛ ni.
40020004	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Kaaŋ ka niya wali ka dumgbu niŋ ka, awa yaŋ kɔŋ bena thunkuŋ na sisande wɔ o wɔ ba thunkuno.’
40020005	Lamgbeŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ yɛrɔkɔy awa bindɛ key ka niya wali baŋ. Ndɛ ni hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ naa tɛŋ wuŋ hatɔ teete iŋ naa dɛkinɔi kaŋ woŋ.
40020006	Naa tɛŋ wuŋ lɔkɔ ba yɛrɛmɛŋ tote, ndɛ fuŋ hɛlɛŋ e ndɛ kuta lamgbeŋ bihɛna bi kooye ka gbɔɔni baŋ niyo ka. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Mbɛ hu kooye beŋ dondo baŋ gbɛɛŋ, beŋ niyeta wali?’
40020007	Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na ‘Baa wɔ ka wo sɛkithɛ mina ba niya wali.’ Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Kaaŋ yama ka niyiyɛ wali ka dumgbu niŋ ka.’
40020008	“Naa bohe kaŋ woŋ ba thɔɔ, wo biyɛ dumgbu baŋ woŋ dome ka lamgba nama woŋ, na ‘Thiya bawaliŋ beŋ fooma e yi si thunkuna bindɛ ba wali ba ni bindɛ baŋ. Kooye thunkuna haŋ ka wo manke sekitho woŋ, haaŋ e yi kaa ka wo yenke sekitho woŋ.’
40020009	Naa bohe ndɛ thunkuna haŋ, ndɛ kooye ka bi sekitho ka lɔkɔ ba yɛrɛmɛŋ bohe tota baŋ. Bindɛ thunkuno ti wuŋ kɛndɛ thunkuna ba gbɛɛŋ woŋ.
40020010	Naa see bi yenke hɛ sekitho beŋ ba thunkuno, bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ thunkuna wuyamɛ ba beŋ beŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ bindɛ fooma thunkuno nanthe nathesi mɔlɔŋ ba ti wuŋ thunkuna ba gbɛɛŋ woŋ.
40020011	Awa naa bindɛ thunkuna, bi yenke hɛ sekitho beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ ma sɔkinɔkɔ bayɔi wo sɛkithɛ bindɛ woŋ
40020012	ba dɔma, na ‘Wakathi wunthe ni na bi manke saa beŋ wali nagbɛti, kɛrɛ yi deŋine bindɛ nanthe iŋ mindo yenke hɛ saa beŋ e miŋ yiŋe niyɔ thɔrɔ nagbɛɛŋ ka kaŋ wotɔɔkɛ woŋ.’
40020013	Huna dome ndɛ ka wunthe ka bindɛ, na ‘Nyathiki, yaŋ niyeta yina kɔɔtha hali.’ Yaŋ bohinande hɛ iŋ beŋ ka mɔlɔŋ ba ti wuŋ thunkuna ba gbɛɛŋ.
40020014	Huna bɔhaŋ kuthunkuŋ ndeŋ koŋ, e beŋ kɔ kaa ka bankɛŋ ndeŋ. Yama yɛthɛ nɛŋ ba thunkune bimankɛ beŋ nɔŋ na yaŋ bena thunkune na.
40020015	E ba hɔŋ yaŋ ka iŋ mayoho ba niya mathimo makiyaŋ ka ntha niŋ? Maa hunaŋ na beŋ kutu baa na ni yaŋ bayɔhɔy?’ ”
40020016	Huna manke Yisɔs dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Bimankɛ beŋ bina nɔŋ kɔtɔkɔ, awa bikɔtɔkɔy beŋ nɔŋ manka.”
40020017	Naa nde Yisɔs ŋati ba kaa ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi iŋ bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, ndɛ sakitɔkɔi bindɛ ka gboŋa e ndɛ bindɛ gbonkitiyande ba dɔma, na
40020018	“Ponaŋ kuiha. Miŋ kɔŋ key ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, awa kɛna Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka dunkuno ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, awa bi kɔŋ niŋ thonkine haaŋ e bindɛ niya ba ndɛ koro.
40020019	Awa bi kɔŋ niŋ dunkuŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biya bi be ni Masaala na kubatho beŋ, awa bi kɔŋ niŋ thiyi ŋasɛkɛ e bindɛ niŋ tawa, awa bi kɔŋ niŋ lɔŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ e ndɛ kɛndɛ yantɔ haaŋ ndɛ kɛndɛ tuke. Kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ.”
40020020	Awa kɛna see wɔtɔ ka Sɛbɛdi woŋ iŋ mpati nama biye bibiyɛthɛŋ e si kunthuŋa ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Yisɔs ba niŋ thɔnthiŋina ba niyiyo bɛyi banthe.
40020021	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Mbɛ ba thimo yi ba yaŋ yina niyiyɛ?” Huna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Niya yama lahiri ba mpatiŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ nɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka madoŋeŋ makɛnda mayiki maŋ, wunthe kuwaŋ ka yɔnkɔ nda huthome haŋ, wunthe kuwaŋ ka hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ, naa yi niyɔy nɔŋ gbaku.”
40020022	Huna meyiye Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Beŋ kɔita hu beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ haŋ. E bendo biye beŋ beŋ, beŋ kɔŋ punku ba thiiye kɔɔpu hu ka nambarɛŋ ba yama see ka pɛnka baŋ?” Huna dome bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “Miŋ kɔŋ punku.”
40020023	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ kɔŋ thiiye kɔɔpu hu ka nambarɛŋ baŋ haŋ yaathi, kɛrɛ yaŋ ka iŋ mayoho ba yɛtha bi dɔŋɔ ka yɔnkɔ niŋ huthome haŋ mɛnɛ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ. Fandaŋ woŋ na yɛthi bi dɔŋɔ ka madoŋeŋ mayiki maŋ maŋ.”
40020024	Naa yuye huŋ bakarandeni bibintheŋ bikɔhi beŋ, wuŋ thoŋ bindɛ ba biya bi huwɛndiya beŋ beŋ baŋ.
40020025	Kɛna thiyi Yisɔs bindɛ ka tha banthe e dɔma, na “Beŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na biya bi kɛriŋiyɛ biya bihɛna bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya beŋ, bi kiŋ iŋ mayoho mamandiŋ ba bindɛ tuta sɛmbɛ.
40020026	Wuŋ ka ba niyɔ ka mateete makendeŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ kiŋ ba niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ mateete makendeŋ, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be niyɔ bawali wokendeŋ.
40020027	Awa wɔ wo ba niyɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka mateete makendeŋ woŋ, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be niyɔ waayi wokendeŋ.
40020028	Beŋ kiŋ ba niyɔ nɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ. Ndɛ tha see ba niyiyo. Kɛrɛ ndɛ see ba niyiyɛ biya iŋ ba dunkuna sii nama baŋ ba bakiŋa biya fooma.”
40020029	Naa Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ pɛyɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Yɛriko baŋ, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme bindɛ ka kaa.
40020030	Awa kɛna penke bindɛ lamgbeŋ biye bi mankɔy thaaya bi doŋe ka gboŋa baŋ kuwaŋ. Naa yuye nthɔŋ bindɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs na daŋande woŋ, bindɛ yele thampa ba dɔma, na “Yindo Hati ka gbaku woŋ Dauda, kutiyɛ mina nkinikiniŋ.”
40020031	Huna wokitɔkɔi sɛthɛ baŋ bindɛ ba bi be daanɔkɔ. Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha daanɔkɔ. Bindɛ yame ntiŋ hɛlɛŋ lemgbiŋina sampɛrɛŋ batɔɔkɛ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Yindo Hati ka gbaku woŋ Dauda, kutiyɛ mina nkinikiniŋ.”
40020032	Huna kɔɔyɛ Yisɔs e ndɛ bindɛ thiya. Naa see bindɛ, huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ mu thimo beŋ ba yaŋ bena niyiyɛ?”
40020033	Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, niya hɛlɛŋ ba miŋ kuta.”
40020034	Yisɔs kutiye bindɛ nkinikiniŋ e ndɛ boheke thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ. Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina, bindɛ kute nagberekethe e bindɛ yema Yisɔs na ka kaa.
40021001	Naa bohe Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ thuriye ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ, bindɛ tɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛfɛki, ka kusɛri ku dɔma na Ɔlifisi. Kɛna ŋinde Yisɔs bakarandeni nama biye,
40021002	e ndɛ dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kaaŋ toloŋ ka bikidi hu siseke beŋ haŋ, awa naa beŋ tɛŋ kɛndɛ, beŋ kɔŋ kɛndɛ pɛnki mbapu wokomisa yuke iŋ hati nama. Pɛɛkaŋ bindɛ e beŋ bindɛ sisa kiyaŋ do.
40021003	Mɛnɛ wɔ kɔŋ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba beŋ bindɛ peeke, tepeŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Mariki woŋ na thimo bindɛ,’ awa wobiyɛ bindɛ woŋ kɔŋ bena bindɛ dunkune yako.”
40021004	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe nde banabi woŋ haŋ ba dɔma, na
40021005	“Tɛpa ka mɛti ba ka kusɛri ku ka Saiyɔŋ koŋ: Detha, gbaku nda woŋ na see kɛnda woŋ, wothathinɔkɔy e ndɛ tutɔ ka mbapu woŋ, iŋ ka hati ka mbapu.”
40021006	Bakarandeni beŋ key e bindɛ ka niya nɔŋ na nunkuneke nthɔŋ bindɛ Yisɔs na.
40021007	Bindɛ sisi mbapu wokomisa woŋ mɛnɛ hati nama woŋ ka Yisɔs. Naa sisi bindɛ mbapuiŋ beŋ, bindɛ yiinthi ŋahɔli namɛŋ ŋaŋ ka mbapuiŋ beŋ, awa Yisɔs tutɔy kɛndɛ.
40021008	Awa binɔndi ka sɛthɛ baŋ taayi ŋahɔli namɛŋ ŋaŋ ka gboŋa baŋ, binɔndi thiinki buyitha mɛnɛ mgbenthɛŋ e bindɛ muŋ dɛɛnka ka gboŋa baŋ ba niŋ niya yiki.
40021009	Awa sɛthɛ ba Yisɔs na ka kɔtɔkɔy baŋ mɛnɛ ba niŋ mahɛŋ baŋ yele thampa ba dɔma, na “Miŋ gbuŋunuwɛŋ wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ. Thaduba tha kiŋ ka wo seeye ka keŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ koŋ. Miŋ gbuŋunuwɛŋ Masaala na wo ka thinthi woŋ.”
40021010	Naa biyande Yisɔs ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, biya beŋ fooma ka mɛti ka thɛnɔkɔi, e bindɛ dɔma, na “Mbɛ woŋ baŋ?”
40021011	Huna dome sɛthɛ baŋ, na “Banabi woŋ Yisɔs na woŋ baŋ, wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ, ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ.”
40021012	Naa wundɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ndɛ biyande ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ndɛ kantha fooma biya bi ni gbɔŋ beŋ e bindɛ kɔ boya ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ. Ndɛ koŋotoni thebuluiŋ beŋ fooma bi ka bi thikipi kɔbiri woŋ beŋ, awa iŋ mudoŋeŋ mu ka bi ni kukuni gbɔŋ beŋ.
40021013	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wuŋ gbalo ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Banka niŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ dɔma na banka ba niye kuraminɛ.’ Kɛrɛ beŋ sikiŋ bɛŋ ka tha ka batuwani nuneke.”
40021014	Awa kɛna see biya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ mɛnɛ bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ ka Yisɔs ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ ba puyo. Awa ndɛ puyi bindɛ.
40021015	Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ naa kute bindɛ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba Yisɔs ni baŋ, iŋ na mpati muŋ sɔnkɔti Yisɔs na ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ, na “Miŋ gbuŋunuwɛŋ wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ.”
40021016	Huna dome bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “E yuyeŋ hu bindɛ tɛpi haŋ?” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ yuyeŋ.” Kɛna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “E beŋ niyeta hɛ nɔŋ magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ karaŋ, ka tepe bagbali woŋ kɛ ka Masaala, na ‘Yi kɔŋ diinki mpatiyɛŋ beŋ mɛnɛ malɛɛthɛŋ ba yina gbuŋunuwa kugbuŋunu kuthankinuwɛ.’ ”
40021017	Yisɔs pɛyi bindɛ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani e ndɛ kɛndɛ ka hura.
40021018	Naa Yisɔs duu sanka ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ndɛ kaho kɔnthɔ ka gboŋa.
40021019	Kɛna kute ndɛ kuyeŋ ku iŋ mutiŋ muthɔma muŋ koŋ kuwaŋ ka gboŋa baŋ. Huna key ndɛ ka kuyeŋ koŋ ba ka detha ba mutiŋ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ tha pɛnki kɛndɛ ntha o ntha yɔkɔŋ bompa buthɔ. Huna dome ndɛ ka kuyeŋ koŋ, na “Haliko yi be tha nɔŋ nda tiŋ mutiŋ haaŋ nɔŋ nda.” Ka yako babɛina, kuyeŋ koŋ thokinɔkɔi.
40021020	Naa kute wuŋ bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Nama dɔmɛ kuyeŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ thokineke yako-yako na?”
40021021	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ kiŋ iŋ lanɛya e beŋ thana niyɔ haamɛ ba niya lanɛya, beŋ kɔŋ punku niya ba ni yaŋ ka kuyeŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ. Wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ka kuyeŋ koŋ kuthɔ, kɛrɛ hali adɔmɛ na beŋ ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ, na ‘Gbɔnɔkɔ dondo baŋ e yi ka gbantɔkɔ ka mankɔ ka,’ wu kɔŋ punku ba niyɔ.
40021022	Huna mɛnɛ beŋ ni lanɛya, bɛyi o bɛyi ba beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ka kuraminɛ, beŋ kɔŋ bɛŋ niyiya.”
40021023	Naa biyande Yisɔs ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bayahɛŋ bi ka biya beŋ key ka Yisɔs thanani biya beŋ ka, e bindɛ niŋ ka thɔnthiŋina ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ mayoho ma yi niye bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, awa nkaana dunkune yina mayoho maŋ maŋ baŋ?”
40021024	Huna meyiye Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ kunthe, awa mɛnɛ beŋ kɔŋ yama ni yaabi, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ka kute yaŋ mayoho ma yaŋ punke niye bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
40021025	Kama kute nde Yɔni mayoho ba biye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ? E ka Masaala maa ka biyamɛti?” Kɛna bohe bindɛ gbakila bindɛ bithɔ e bindɛ kɔ dɔma, na “Mbɛ hu miŋ tɛpi? Mɛnɛ miŋ dome, na ‘Ka Masaala ŋaye na mɛŋ,’ ndɛ kɔŋ dɔŋ kɛntuŋ, na ‘Mbu mbɛ hu tha nde beŋ niya Yɔni na lanɛya?’
40021026	Mɛnɛ miŋ dome tete, na ‘Ka biyamɛti ŋaye na mayoho mabɛina,’ miŋ kɔ payɔ biya beŋ ba ba bindɛ mina ni baŋ, baa bi siyuweŋ ba dɔma na Yɔni banabi na nde.”
40021027	Huna meyiye bindɛ Yisɔs na ba dɔma, na “Miŋ kɔita ka ŋaye mayoho ma ka Yɔni maŋ.” Huna dome nɛnɛ Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ yaŋ sa bena tepe ka kute yaŋ mayoho makiyaŋ maŋ.”
40021028	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy e dɔma ka bafodeni beŋ mɛnɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ, na “Nama siyuwe beŋ? Wɔ wathe wunthe na nde iŋ mpati biye bibiyɛthɛŋ. Lɔkɔ banthe ndɛ tepe wokalaŋ woŋ, na ‘Hatiŋ woŋ, kaa hɛ ka niya wali ka dumgbu niŋ ka.’
40021029	Hati woŋ mɛyi, na ‘Yaŋ kaayita,’ kɛrɛ naa nambe nthɔŋ wuŋ wuyete, ndɛ sikinande masiyi nama e ndɛ kaa ka niya wali baŋ ka dumgbu ka.
40021030	Fandamɛŋ woŋ key hɛlɛŋ ka wɛndama ka e niŋ ka tepe ba kaa ka niya wali ka dumgbu nama ka. Hati woŋ mɛyi, na ‘Papaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ key.’ Kɛrɛ ndɛ tha key.
40021031	Ka mpati bibiye beŋ beŋ baŋ, nkaana niyɛ mathimo ma ka fandamɛŋ maŋ?” Huna dome bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “Wokalaŋ woŋ na.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, bathuuni duthu bi dɔma ba bindɛ niyɔ bahakɛŋ beŋ mɛnɛ yɛrɛmɛŋ bi katitoko nama o nama beŋ bi kɔŋ nɔŋ yenke biyande ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ ba beŋ.
40021032	Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ see kendeŋ ba bena toŋine gboŋa bathumbɛ baŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ tha niŋ ni lanɛya. Kɛrɛ bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ mɛnɛ yɛrɛmɛŋ bi katitoko nama o nama beŋ ni niŋ lanɛya. Hali naa kute nde beŋ wuŋ na, beŋ tha sikinande masiyi ndeŋ maŋ e beŋ niŋ niya lanɛya.”
40021033	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Poniyaŋ hɛlɛŋ mbɔrɔ kihɛna kuiha. Bayɔi wunthe na thuuwɛ nde muthuu ka dumgbu nama ka e ndɛ bɛŋ pɛnkinande kunku. Ndɛ gbuse matha ka pothe mutiŋ muŋ, awa e ndɛ kɛndɛ kiya kuwera ka lamgbeŋ beŋ tutɔ ba pama dumgbu baŋ fooma. Ndɛ dunkuŋ dumgbu baŋ baŋ ka lamgbeŋ bi tepe ndɛ ba niŋ kɔsiniyɛ mutiŋ mukɛnama ba ti ndɛ see. Ndɛ key biyasi haŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuhɛna napooŋ.
40021034	Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba ka thada mutiŋ muŋ, ndɛ ŋindi bawaliŋ nama beŋ ka lamgbeŋ beŋ ba kaayiyɛ mutiŋ mukɛnama muŋ.
40021035	Naa kute lamgbeŋ beŋ bawaliŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ, bindɛ tawe wunthe, bindɛ kore woŋ, awa e bindɛ lɔɔpuwa wowuntheŋ woŋ.
40021036	Huna ŋinde hɛlɛŋ ndɛ bawaliŋ bihɛna, bi yamɛ ba bimayoŋ beŋ. Awa bindɛ ni hɛlɛŋ bindɛ na bi yenke nde ŋindo beŋ na.
40021037	Ka wumankɛ nagbɔŋ kɛna ŋindi ndɛ hati nama woŋ kɛnamɛŋ, e dɔma ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ nda siyi ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ nda dunkune hati niŋ woŋ yiki.’
40021038	Kɛrɛ naa kute lamgbeŋ beŋ hati woŋ, bindɛ dome ka yɛthɛ namɛŋ, na ‘Woŋ baŋ na biyɛ kɛɛ baŋ. Saaŋ miŋ be niŋ kɔri wuna miŋ biyɔ kɛɛ baŋ.’
40021039	Kɛna bohe bindɛ niŋ e bindɛ niŋ fuŋuta ka dumgbu baŋ, awa e bindɛ niŋ kɔra.
40021040	“Nama siyuwe beŋ na wuŋ niyɔ naa wo biyɛ dumgbu baŋ woŋ see?”
40021041	Huna dome bafodeni beŋ mɛnɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ kɔri lamgbeŋ binɛnɔy beŋ beŋ baŋ, awa e ndɛ dunkuna dumgbu baŋ ka lamgbeŋ bihɛna bi niŋ dunkune mutiŋ muŋ naa lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ.”
40021042	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “E beŋ niyeta hɛ nɔŋ karaŋ magbali ma ka Masaala ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Raka hu baŋino iŋ bathoyini beŋ haŋ, huna see niyɔ raka hu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda niyɔ waŋ ka thoya haŋ. Mariki woŋ na niyɛ wuŋ baŋ, awa bɛyi bathakaba bɛna miŋ ba wuŋ kuta.’
40021043	“Huna yaŋ tepe bena, beŋ kɔŋ kanita makooye ma kute beŋ maŋ ba niyɔ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ e mɛŋ dunkuno ka biya bihɛna bi sisi mutiŋ muyɔhɔy. [
40021044	Wɔ o wɔ wo ŋote raka haŋ haŋ baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ yɔminuwɔ. Awa mɛnɛ raka haŋ haŋ baŋ ŋote wɔ, hu kɔŋ niŋ kɔri.]”
40021045	Naa yuye bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ mbɔrɔiŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ, e bindɛ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ gbonkoy ba bindɛ,
40021046	kɛna yole bindɛ ba niŋ bɔha. Kɛrɛ bindɛ kɔ payɔ sɛthɛ baŋ, baa bi siyuweŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs banabi na ndɛ.
40022001	Yisɔs gbonkitiyande hɛlɛŋ biya beŋ ka mbɔrɔ ba dɔma, na
40022002	“Hugbakinine hu ka ariana haŋ athɔyande nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka gbaku wo kɔsinɔkɔy muthɔma ba malɔkɔ ma ti wundɛ yɛntiyɛ hati nama.
40022003	Ndɛ ŋiindi bawaliŋ nama beŋ ba ka thiya bi thiyo beŋ ba ka penkitiye ka kuyɛntande koŋ beŋ. Naa key bindɛ thiya ba kaa, binɔndi tha mɛyi ba kaa.
40022004	Ndɛ ŋiindi hɛlɛŋ bawaliŋ bihɛna e ndɛ bindɛ nunkunɔkɔ, na ‘Kaaŋ tepe bi thiyo nde beŋ ba dɔma, na yaŋ thanki nda kɔsinɔkɔ muthɔma muŋ fooma. Yaŋ kore manani bibukuyuwɛ mɛnɛ manani bidankɔy beŋ, awa yaŋ thanki kɔsinɔkɔ ntha yo ntha. Bi sɛɛŋ ka thɔma haŋ.’
40022005	Kɛrɛ bindɛ yethitɔy huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ awa womo woma key ka thimo ndɛ ba kaa. Woŋ key ka dumgbu nama, woŋ key ka niya bɛyi bakɛnama.
40022006	Bi pɛyɛ beŋ bohe bawaliŋ bi ŋindo beŋ, e bindɛ tawa bindɛ haaŋ e bindɛ kɔɔruwa bindɛ.
40022007	Naa yuye huŋ gbaku woŋ, ndɛ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ, awa ndɛ ŋindi kɛndɛ kurugbani nama beŋ ba bakɔriŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ ka kooruwo fooma e mɛti namɛŋ baŋ toonuwo.
40022008	Huna thiye hɛlɛŋ ndɛ bawaliŋ nama beŋ e dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Thɔma humandiŋ haŋ tɛŋ lɔkɔ, kɛrɛ bi thiyi yaŋ beŋ tha sisande ba saa ka thɔma haŋ baa bindɛ yethitɔy kuthiyi niŋ koŋ.’
40022009	Huna dome ndɛ ka bawaliŋ beŋ, na ‘Pinthaŋ mɛti baŋ fooma e beŋ ka thiya wɔ yo wɔ wo beŋ kutu ndɛ be see ka thɔma haŋ.’
40022010	Bawaliŋ beŋ pinthi mɛti baŋ e bindɛ ka thunkunuwande biya bi kute bindɛ beŋ fooma ka tha banthe, biyɔhɔy yo, mɛnɛ binɛnɔy. Kɛna see banka ba kuyɛntande koŋ niyo baŋ thiŋa iŋ biya bimandiŋ.
40022011	“Naa see gbaku woŋ fuŋ ba saa kaŋ detha bi sɛɛ beŋ, ndɛ kute kɛndɛ wɔ wunthe wo tha thɔɔ yaba bathɔɔkɔ ba ka kuyɛntande koŋ baŋ.
40022012	Huna dome gbaku woŋ kɛnama, na ‘Nyathiki, mbɛ hu see yi dondo baŋ yi tha thɔɔ yaba bathɔɔkɔ ba ka kuyɛntande koŋ baŋ?’ Kɛrɛ wothiyo woŋ tha bohi hu ndɛ tɛpi.
40022013	Huna dome gbaku woŋ ka bi sɛɛ beŋ, na ‘Yukaŋ niŋ thɛnkɔ mɛnɛ ŋathaki, e beŋ niŋ yɛla ka huntuma haŋ, ka biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.’ ”
40022014	Kɛna gbanthaŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Biya bibɔyɛ bina thiyo iŋ Masaala, kɛrɛ biyete bina yetho ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ.”
40022015	Naa daŋande wuŋ, biFaresini beŋ key bohi magbɔma ba deethuwa na bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ka magbonkoy nama.
40022016	Huna ŋinde bindɛ bakarandeni namɛŋ beŋ mɛnɛ binɔndi bi kɔɔyɛ ba Hɛrɔdi beŋ ka Yisɔs ka. Naa tɛŋ bindɛ ka Yisɔs, bindɛ dome kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na batɛpi nɔndi na yi, awa yi kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ thanani gboŋa ba ka Masaala baŋ ka nɔndi. Yi kahota ba kɔthɔ hu wɔmɛti siyi ba yi, awa yi kahota ba makooye ma ka wɔmɛti.
40022017	Huna, tepe hɛ mina hu siyuwe yi. E wuŋ asisande maŋaye ka Siraŋ ntuŋ baŋ ba miŋ thunkuna duthu woŋ ka Gbaku wo ka Romaŋ woŋ, maa wuŋ sisandeta?”
40022018	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɔthɛŋ magbɔma manɛnɔy makɛnamɛŋ maŋ, huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ hu beŋ yama gberiŋinuwe, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ.
40022019	Toŋineŋ hɛ nuŋ kɔbiri wo beŋ thunkuŋ duthu woŋ.” Kɛna sisi bindɛ kɔbiri woŋ kɛnama.
40022020	Naa bohe Yisɔs kɔbiri woŋ, ndɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ biyɛ yethi iŋ keŋ ka kɔbiri woŋ baŋ?”
40022021	Huna dome bindɛ ka Yisɔs, na “Gbaku wo ka Romaŋ woŋ na.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Dunkuneŋ Gbaku woŋ wukɛnama wuŋ, awa e beŋ dunkune Masaala na wukɛnama wuŋ.”
40022022	Naa yuye bindɛ huŋ, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ, awa bindɛ pɛyi niŋ kɛndɛ e bindɛ kɔ kaa.
40022023	Ka lɔkɔ banthe babɛina biSadusini binɔndi see ka Yisɔs, bi tɛpɛ beŋ ba dɔma na biya sa ŋaye ka tuka haŋ hali. Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs na
40022024	ba dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, Musa tepe nde ka Siraŋ baŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Mɛnɛ wɔ wathe wo yɛntɛ tuku, awa ndɛ tha mpuu mpati, yɔkɔŋ wɛndama be yɛnti bagbokora woŋ, bi be mpuu mpati ba wɛndama wo tukɛ woŋ.’
40022025	Miŋ kiŋ nde dondo baŋ iŋ biya bisɔŋ-biye bi kotho hunthe. Womayoŋ woŋ yente, e ndɛ tuka, kɛrɛ ndɛ tha mpuu mpati iŋ woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, awa wɛndama pɛɛtɔy bagbokora woŋ.
40022026	Nɛna niiye wuŋ ka wobiye woŋ, wotaati woŋ, haaŋ kaaŋ ka wosɔŋ-biye woŋ.
40022027	Naa thanki bindɛ tuukuwa fooma, woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ see ntiŋ manke tuka.
40022028	Ka lɔkɔ ba biya ŋaye ka tuka haŋ baŋ, nkaana biyɔ woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ? Bindɛ fooma thanki niŋ yɛnta.”
40022029	Huna meyiye bindɛ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Beŋ fooma piriŋinuwɔy, baa beŋ kɔita magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ, awa beŋ kɔita sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
40022030	Naa biya ŋaye ka tuka haŋ, biyɛthɛŋ sa nda yɛnti, awa yɛrɛmɛŋ sa nda dunkuna ka yɛnto, baa biya bi kɔŋ nɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ malekɛŋ bi ka ariana beŋ.
40022031	Awa sɔkɔ hu ba ŋaye hu ka bitukɛ beŋ haŋ: E beŋ niyeta hɛ nɔŋ karaŋ hu tepe Masaala ka magbali nama maŋ haŋ ba beŋ? Ka tepe ndɛ kɛ ba dɔma, na
40022032	‘Yama Masaala wo Ebrahim ni kubatho woŋ, wo Aisaki ni kubatho woŋ, mɛnɛ wo Yakuba ni kubatho woŋ.’ Ndɛ ka Masaala wo bitukɛ beŋ ni kubatho woŋ, kɛrɛ ndɛ na Masaala wo bihɛmɛ beŋ ni kubatho woŋ.”
40022033	Awa naa yuye huŋ sɛthɛ baŋ, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba mathanani nama maŋ.
40022034	Kɛrɛ naa yuye biFaresini beŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs ni ba biSadusini beŋ danɔkɔ nayeeŋ, bindɛ see kɔmande ka tha banthe.
40022035	Naa see bindɛ ka Yisɔs, kɛna thonthiŋine niŋ karimɔkɔ wunthe wo ka Siraŋ baŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba niŋ gbɛriŋina. Huna dome ndɛ ka Yisɔs, na
40022036	“Karimɔkɔ, mbɛ siraŋ ba yamɛ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka sirani baŋ?”
40022037	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Thimo Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ iŋ thukuma nda fooma, iŋ sii bakɛnda fooma, mɛnɛ masiyi makɛnda fooma.
40022038	Siraŋ baŋ baŋ bɛna bamandiŋ baŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, awa bɛna bamayoŋ baŋ ka sirani baŋ.
40022039	Awa ba tɛŋinɛ babaye baŋ athɔyande iŋ bamayoŋ baŋ: ‘Thimo ntɔ nda na nɔŋ na thimo yi yɛthɛ bakɛnda baŋ.’
40022040	Ka sirani babaye baŋ baŋ kɛna there Sirani ba ka Musa baŋ mɛnɛ mathanani ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ.”
40022041	Naa thuŋande biFaresini binɔndi beŋ ka tha banthe, kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs bindɛ
40022042	ba dɔma, na “Nama siyuwe beŋ ba wo dɔma Banikisi woŋ? Mbɛ bɔnsɔŋ ba ŋaye wundɛ?” Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ.”
40022043	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛnɛ nɛna huŋ, mbu mbɛ ba dɔmɛ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ niya gbaku woŋ Dauda ba thiya Banikisi woŋ, na ‘Mariki’? Baa ndɛ Dauda gbeeŋ, ndɛ tepe, na
40022044	‘Mariki woŋ tepe ka Mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ, na: Dɔŋɔ kuwaŋ ka yɔnkɔ niŋ huthome haŋ, ka madoŋe mayiki maŋ, haaŋ nɔŋ e yaŋ niya ba hadeni bikɛnda beŋ niyɔ ka ŋathaki nda ŋaŋ ka pothi.’
40022045	Mɛnɛ gbaku woŋ Dauda thiyi niŋ na ‘Mariki,’ mbu nama Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ kɔ ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ nama baŋ?”
40022046	Wɔ o wɔ tha niyɔ wo punkɛ niŋ niya yaabi kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, awa there nda ka lɔkɔ babɛina wɔ tha nda niŋ thunku thɔnthiŋina kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ.
40023001	Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, huna dome Yisɔs ka sɛthɛ baŋ mɛnɛ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na
40023002	“Bikarimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ bindɛ bina iŋ mayoho ba methine biya nagberekethe Sirani ba ka Musa baŋ.
40023003	Huna, thanuwaŋ awa e beŋ niya bɛyiniŋ fooma ba bindɛ bena tepe baŋ. Kɛrɛ baŋ ni ba bindɛ ni baŋ, baa bi kɔŋ ni kɛwandi, kɛrɛ bindɛ niyeta ba bindɛ tɛpi baŋ.
40023004	Bi kɔŋ yuukiyɛ biya doniŋ badimbɔy ba sa wɔ punku tutɔkɔ, e bindɛ bɛŋ tutuna biya. Kɛrɛ bindɛ gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ, bindɛ sa mase biya ba bɛŋ kata.
40023005	Bi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ fooma haliko biyamɛti bi be bindɛ kutu. Bi kɔŋ yukutɔkɔ nthagbɛŋ kiŋarinɛ ki iŋ magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ka thayethi namɛŋ mɛnɛ ka thɛnkɔ namɛŋ thaŋ. Awa bindɛ athimo ba thɔɔ ŋahɔli ŋa yantuwɔy nyarɛŋ kithɔɔkuwɛ ba toŋine biya na badinɛŋ bina.
40023006	Awa e bindɛ thimo ba dɔŋɔ ka mudoŋe mu ka thinthi muŋ ka thɔma humandiŋ haŋ, awa iŋ madoŋe mayɔhɔy maŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ,
40023007	awa e bindɛ thimo ba maanuwo iŋ yiki ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka, awa e biya bindɛ kɔ thiya ‘Karimɔkɔiŋ.’
40023008	Kɛrɛ beŋ ka ba thiyo ‘Karimɔkɔiŋ,’ baa beŋ kiŋ iŋ Karimɔkɔ wunthe hɔkɔŋ, awa huwɛndiya huna beŋ fooma.
40023009	Baŋ dɔŋ wɔ yo wɔ ka faido na ‘Fanda ntuŋ na woŋ,’ baa Fanda ndeŋ wunthe napethi na iŋ beŋ, wo ka ariana woŋ.
40023010	Baŋ hintiŋ nthɔŋ dɔma na ‘Bayahɛŋ,’ baa Bayaha wunthe na iŋ beŋ, ndɛ na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.
40023011	Wɔ wo ba niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ woŋ mateete makendeŋ ndɛ na ba niyɔ bawali wokendeŋ.
40023012	Wɔ o wɔ wo ŋatinɔkɔi, ndɛ kɔŋ thathina; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo thathinɔkɔy, ndɛ kɔŋ ŋatina.
40023013	“Bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ lɔŋɔti biyamɛti biyo hu ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ. Beŋ tha biyande, awa beŋ tha mɛkɛŋ ba biya bihɛna biyande. [
40023014	Nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ ni bagbokorani beŋ sɛmbɛ awa beŋ kɔŋ bindɛ tuutu bankɛŋ ba peyo bindɛ iŋ biwandamɛŋ beŋ baŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ ni ŋaraminɛ ŋathɔɔkuwɛ haliko ba pututa bɛyiniŋ ba beŋ ni baŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ gbasiŋita wuŋ yama ba biya bihɛna ba bɛyiniŋ ba beŋ ni baŋ baŋ.]
40023015	“Bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ kɛriŋande mankɔ mamɛɛti maŋ e beŋ kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuhɛna napooŋ ba ka niya ba wɔ wunthe be ni lanɛya nɔŋ beŋ. Kɛrɛ naa ni nthɔŋ ndɛ lanɛya, beŋ yame ntiŋ niŋ niya wɔ tɛŋɛ ba kaa ka yahanama nɔŋ na beŋ na.
40023016	“Bendo thɔyande nɔŋ biya bi mankɔy thaaya bi katitɔkɔ biya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ. Nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ dome, na ‘Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ gbiŋe banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, na ba gboŋ bɛna. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ gbiŋe ka boyi bu ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ buŋ, na ndɛ kɔŋ thiŋiŋ lahiri ba ni ndɛ baŋ.’
40023017	Bendo biya bi mankɔy thaaya bithɔkɔy beŋ beŋ baŋ! E beŋ kɔita ba dɔma na banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ba yameŋ niyɔ waŋ ba boyi buŋ baa bɛna niyɛ ba boyi buŋ niyɔ bukuwɛ?
40023018	Awa beŋ tepe hɛlɛŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ gbiŋe ka bɛsɛ ba fuŋune saraka ka Masaala baŋ, na ba gboŋ bɛna; kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ gbiŋe ka munkii mu siso ka bɛsɛ baŋ muŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ thiŋiŋ lahiri nama baŋ.’
40023019	Bendo biya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ beŋ baŋ. E beŋ kɔita ba dɔma na bɛsɛ baŋ ba yameŋ niyɔ waŋ ba munkii muŋ baa bɛna niyɛ ba munkii muŋ niyɔ mukuwɛ?
40023020	Huna, mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ gbiŋe ka bɛsɛ baŋ, ndɛ gbiŋe ka bɛŋ iŋ ntha yo ntha ki kɛndɛ ka bɛsɛ baŋ.
40023021	Awa wɔ wo gbiŋ banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, ndɛ gbiŋɛŋ bɛŋ e ndɛ gbiŋa Masaala wo kɛndɛ woŋ.
40023022	Awa wɔ wo gbiŋ ka ariana, ndɛ gbiŋɛŋ yensi hu ka Masaala haŋ iŋ wundɛ wo dɔŋɔy ka huŋ woŋ.
40023023	“Bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wu tɛŋɛŋ kɔhi wuŋ naa beŋ kɔ thubututu munki mu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda thahuwɔ muŋ fooma ŋaye ka dumgbuiŋ ndeŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ boho gbothontiŋ ba putiyɔ mathanani ma yamɛ niyɔ waŋ ma ka Siraŋ baŋ maŋ, ba niya wuthumbɛ, ba niyɔ iŋ nkinikiniŋ, mɛnɛ ba niyɔ biya bi yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya. Beŋ kiŋ ba yenke putiyɔ mathanani ma yamɛ niyɔ waŋ maŋ, awa e beŋ thana niyɔ gbothontiŋ sirani bathahuwɔy baŋ.
40023024	Bendo thɔyande nɔŋ biya bi mankɔy thaaya bi katitɔkɔ biya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ senseŋeŋ ntha yo ntha ki beŋ thiiye ba thana thiiyitande kumuimuy, kɛrɛ e beŋ kɔ ŋuna nyɔkɔmɛni bibukuyuwɛ naa beŋ boho gbothontiŋ na mathanani ma yamɛ niyɔ waŋ maŋ.
40023025	“Bendo bikarimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ gbɔɔki thakɔɔpu mɛnɛ thapanɛ ndeŋ thaŋ kahɛŋ, kɛrɛ kaake mu poothuwɛ iŋ munki mu kɔsɔŋ beŋ kɛndɛ mu kute beŋ ka kansuŋ iŋ ba yɛthɛ ndeŋ hɔkɔŋ.
40023026	Bendo biFaresini bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ beŋ baŋ. Yenkeŋ hintiŋ gbɔɔkuwa thakɔɔpu thaŋ kaake, e beŋ ntiŋ thɛŋ kɔ manke gbɔɔkuwa kahɛŋ.
40023027	“Bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ athɔyande nɔŋ thayoma tha puyino hiro huhuhɛ napooŋ e thɛŋ yɔhɔ ka detha kahɛŋ, kɛrɛ kaake tha thiŋo iŋ bathoy bapoothuwɛ ba ka biya bitukɛ mɛnɛ ŋakɔtɔ ŋatuunuwɛ.
40023028	Bendo tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biyamɛti beŋ nɔŋ biya bithumbɛ bina beŋ, kɛrɛ kaake ka siini ndeŋ baŋ beŋ ka nɛŋ awa bendo thiŋo iŋ hunitɔkɔ mɛnɛ banɛnɔy.
40023029	“Bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, nambara ba kɔŋ see ba beŋ, baa beŋ yeheni thayoma thaŋ wuyɔhɔy tha ka banabiŋ bi kooruwo nde beŋ, awa e beŋ yehinuwa wuyɔhɔy thayoma tha ka biya bithumbɛ beŋ thaŋ.
40023030	Beŋ hɛlɛŋ tɛpa ba dɔma, na ‘Mɛnɛ miŋ kiŋ nde nɔŋ ka yamana ba ka mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ baŋ, miŋ sa nde nɔŋ thɔɔtɔ ka niya ba ni bindɛ baŋ iŋ ba kɔra banabiŋ beŋ.’
40023031	Kɛrɛ wuŋ tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na bena ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka bi kɔrɛ nde banabiŋ beŋ.
40023032	Huna, kaaŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba thankina wali ba sɛsi nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ baŋ.
40023033	Bendo bikɛkɛni beŋ beŋ baŋ, bendo kubɔri ku ka wɔthɔiŋ beŋ, nama beŋ niiye thanka yelo ka yahanama haŋ?
40023034	Huna yaŋ kɔŋ ŋindi banabiŋ, biya bikele, mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ beŋ kendeŋ do. Awa beŋ kɔŋ kɔri binɔndi, e beŋ yanta binɔndi ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande, awa beŋ kɔŋ tawu binɔndi ka bankɛŋ ndeŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ bindɛ kanthi maŋaye ka mɛti akey ka mɛti.
40023035	Wuna beŋ gbasiŋita kugbasaŋati ku ka bi tɔŋɛ nde wasi ba ka biya bithumbɛ beŋ baŋ kɛkɛŋ ka faido, there nthɔŋ nda ka wasi ba ka Ebɛli wo pankɔy bɛyi woŋ baŋ haaŋ kaaŋ ka wasi ba ka Sɛkaraiya hati ka Barakaya woŋ baŋ, wo kore nde beŋ woŋ mateete ma ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ mɛnɛ ka bɛsɛ baŋ ka saraka baŋ fuŋuno kɛ.
40023036	Yaŋ tepe bena nɔndi baŋ, kugbasaŋati ku ka biya bi niyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ beŋ ku kɔŋ tutɔ ka thankaha tha ka biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ.
40023037	“Yɛrusalɛmi, bendo biya bi ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, beŋ thanki nde kɔɔruwa banabiŋ beŋ, awa e beŋ hɛlɛŋ lɔɔpuwa baseriŋ bi ŋindi Masaala kendeŋ do beŋ. Yaŋ thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda niyɔ kufiyo ba bena kɔminande ka tha banthe e yaŋ bena pɔpitɔkɔ nɔŋ na thɛɛ wokomisa kɔminande mpati nama beŋ ka tha banthe e ndɛ bindɛ pututɔ iŋ ŋapɛli nama ŋaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ tha mɛyi.
40023038	Banka ndeŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ pɛyɛnɔ wu ka wɔ, awa ba kɔŋ teetuwɔ.
40023039	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, beŋ sa nɔŋ nda yama kutu, haaŋ yɔkɔŋ beŋ dome, na ‘Thaduba tha kiŋ ka wo see ka keŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ.’ ”
40024001	Naa Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ banka bamandiŋ ba Masaala niyo kubatho baŋ ba kaa, bakarandeni nama beŋ see kɛnama ba niŋ toŋine yɔhɔ hu ka bankɛŋ bahɛna ba ka Masaala baŋ kɛndɛ.
40024002	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “E beŋ kute bankɛŋ baŋ baŋ fooma? Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, ba kɔŋ teetuwa fooma. Raka hunthe huŋ sa niyɔ hu tutɔ ntɔ nama na ka thinthi, tha kɔŋ ŋɔti kɛkɛŋ fooma.”
40024003	Naa dunkɔy ndɛ ka kusɛri ku dɔma na Ɔlifisi koŋ e ndɛ kɛndɛ ka dɔŋɔ, kɛna see bakarandeni nama beŋ kɛnama ka bindɛ bintheŋ e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Tepe hɛ mina malɔkɔ ma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma niiye, awa iŋ bɛyi ba yenke niyɔ ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na yi bohe ba saa iŋ ba tɔŋɔŋ mapeye ma ka lɔkɔ ba ka fay woŋ baŋ.”
40024004	Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ wɔ be tha bena thɔkɔŋ.
40024005	Biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ see ka keŋ kukiyaŋ, awa wɔ o wɔ ka bindɛ kɔŋ dɔmɔkɔŋ, na ‘Yama Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ,’ awa bi kɔŋ thɔkɔŋ biya bibɔyɛ.
40024006	Awa beŋ kɔŋ yuyɛ masɔnkɔ ma ka ŋayombo wuthuriye bena mɛnɛ maseriŋ ma ka ŋayombo wuthokiye bena. Kɛrɛ baŋ ni thɔrɔ ka thathukuma ndeŋ, baa muŋ muŋ fooma mu kiŋ ba yenke niyɔ hintiŋ. Kɛrɛ mapeye ma ka lɔkɔ ba ka fay woŋ baŋ kutɛ hɛ.
40024007	Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ dekeyi kuyɛkɛŋ, awa huybakine hu kɔŋ dekeyi huybakine, awa ŋakɔnthɔ ŋamandiŋ ŋa kɔŋ niyɔ, kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ ka thani ka bɔyɛ.
40024008	Kɛrɛ muŋ muŋ fooma athɔyande iŋ wuthoonɛ wumayoŋ wu naa yɛrɛmɛ bohe ba saa ka mpaa.
40024009	“Awa beŋ kɔŋ bɔha e beŋ dunkuno ka biya bi bena gbasaŋati haaŋ e bindɛ bena kɔra, awa biyamɛti bi kɔŋ bena thambo saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
40024010	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ fuŋ ka lanɛya baŋ, awa biya bi kɔŋ niyande gbɔŋ ka bi iŋ sɛmbɛŋ baŋ beŋ, awa biya bi kɔŋ thambiyande.
40024011	Banabiŋ bibahothiŋ bi kɔŋ fuŋ awa bi kɔŋ thɔkɔŋ biya bibɔyɛ.
40024012	Biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ pɛyi ba thimiyande baa banɛnɔy baŋ ba kɔŋ key ka kɔtɔkɔy wudankande.
40024013	Kɛrɛ wɔ wo ni muyuŋ woŋ haaŋ ka mapeye maŋ, ndɛ na niyɔ kisi.
40024014	Awa Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ haŋ baŋ ba Hugbakinɛ hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ niya kɛwandi ka fay woŋ fooma, haliko ba niya maseri ka siyani baŋ fooma, awa kɛna ntiŋ mapeye ma ka lɔkɔ ba ka fay woŋ baŋ tɛŋ.
40024015	“Naa beŋ kute nthɔŋ Ntha Kithambiyo ki sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na, ki dome nde banabi woŋ Daniyɛli kiŋ, ki kooye ka kuwɛ kɛ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ka be kiŋ sisande ba kɔɔ,” (Yindo ni karaŋ woŋ, niya kuthɛgbɛ yi be wuŋ metho.)
40024016	“ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bi ka Yudiya, yɔkɔŋ bi be kite ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ ka.
40024017	Wɔ wo penko ndɛ tute ka banka bakɛnama baŋ ka thinthi, ndɛ be tha nda thuhu ba si sɛkitha mu ka banka nama baŋ kaake,
40024018	awa wo nda ka dumgbu nama ka, ndɛ be tha nda duu ba si sɛkitha kuhɔli nama koŋ.
40024019	Nambara ba kɔŋ nɔŋ niyɔ ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi niyɔ iŋ thahɔɔyɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bi bɔpɔŋ malɛɛthɛŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
40024020	Niyaŋ kuraminɛ ka Masaala haliko kita ndeŋ haŋ hu be tha nɔŋ niyɔ thamɔ maa ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ,
40024021	baa nambarɛŋ babɔyɛ ba kɔŋ niyɔ ba be hɛ nɔŋ niyɔ hanthe kabi na thɛri nde ka fay woŋ haaŋ saaŋ bohi ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ. Awa bɛyi bahɛna sa nɔŋ nda niyɔ ba thɔyande iŋ baŋ baŋ.
40024022	Kɛrɛ Masaala thanki thuruna malɔkɔiŋ ma ka nambarɛŋ baŋ baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ nde, wɔ yo wɔ sa buthurɔ tuka. Kɛrɛ saathɛ ba bi thanki Masaala yɛtha beŋ, ma kɔŋ thuruna.
40024023	“Huna, mɛnɛ wɔ kɔŋ bena tepe, na ‘Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ,’ maa ‘Ndɛ na kanka woŋ,’ baŋ niŋ ni lanɛya,
40024024	baa bi dɔmɔkɔ beŋ na Baninikisiŋ bina bindɛ mahɛŋ ma bindɛ ka nɛŋ, mɛnɛ banabiŋ bibahothiŋ bi fuŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba, haliko ba thɔkina biya bibɔyɛ. Bi kɔŋ yɔli ti punke bindɛ ba thɔkina bi thanki Masaala yɛtha beŋ, mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ ŋɛnɔ.
40024025	Wuna biyɛ yaŋ kɔŋ bena yenke tepe bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ saanuŋ bɛŋ ba niyɔ.
40024026	“Huna mɛnɛ bi kɔŋ bena dɔŋ, na ‘Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ tɛŋ ka wula ka,’ baŋ kɛndɛ key. Mɛnɛ bi kɔŋ bena dɔŋ, na ‘Ndɛ nunekeŋ ka banka ka kaake,’ baŋ bindɛ ni lanɛya,
40024027	baa Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see na nthɔŋ kuwaliwaliŋ koŋ kɛriŋande ŋaye kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ e kɔŋ kaa kuwaŋ kupothi koŋ.
40024028	“Beŋ bareŋ kɔ yuyɛ na wuŋ tɛpa na ka maama woŋ tuke ka, kɛna yibani beŋ kɔmande ka tha banthe.
40024029	“Ka wuthurɔy wu nambarɛŋ baŋ baŋ see wuŋ, kaŋ woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ huntuma, awa sɛnkɛ woŋ sa nda bɛndi, sosɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ yayi maŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ, sɛmbɛŋ ba ka kuthahinɛ koŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ.
40024030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina na ntiŋ bɛyi bathakaba baŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka kuthahinɛ koŋ ba tɔŋina ba wuŋ niyɔ na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see. Awa siyani ba ka faido baŋ fooma ba kɔŋ boki naa bindɛ kute Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si see ka thawuruma tha ka kuthahinɛ koŋ thaŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ mɛnɛ yiki bamandiŋ.
40024031	Kuthuthu kumandiŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ hɔŋa. Ndɛ kɔŋ ŋindi malekɛŋ nama beŋ ba kɔminande ka tha banthe bi thanki ndɛ yethiyo beŋ maŋaye ka fai wobunthu woŋ fooma.
40024032	“Niyaŋ ba kuyeŋ ku tiŋ mutiŋ muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na fiki ku thɔyande nɔŋ kugbemgbeŋ koŋ bena thaninuwa mathanani. Naa beŋ kute nthɔŋ bathalɛŋ biŋama beŋ thaha e bindɛ fuŋuna bompa, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na thamɔ bohe thɔɔ.
40024033	Thanuwaŋ mathanani maŋaye ka wuŋ baŋ. Naa beŋ kute nthɔŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba si niyɔ, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na ntha kiŋ ki kiŋ nda wuthuriye, awa ki kooyeŋ nda ka biyo haŋ ba biyande.
40024034	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, biya bi ka yamana bahɛ baŋ baŋ sa niye daŋiyande fooma e bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niyɔ.
40024035	Kuthahinɛ kɔŋ iŋ ka fay woŋ mu kɔŋ daŋande fooma, kɛrɛ thampa niŋ thaŋ sa daŋande.
40024036	“Wɔ o ka wo kɔthɔ malɔkɔ mɛnɛ wakathi wo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see, hali hintiŋ malekɛŋ bi ka ariana beŋ, maa Hati woŋ. Yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ nagbɛti ndɛ na kɔthɛ.
40024037	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see e biya kɔ niya bɛyiniŋ nɔŋ na niyɔy nde nthɔŋ wuŋ na ka yamana ba ka Nowa baŋ.
40024038	Ka lɔkɔ ba thenkiyiye mandi maŋ ka faido, biya bi kɔŋ nde thɔɔmi e bindɛ kɔ thiiyuwe mampani, bi kɔŋ nde yɛɛnti e bindɛ kɔ dunkuna ŋayɛntande, haaŋ Nowa thɔɔ ka gbe bamandiŋ baŋ.
40024039	Awa bindɛ tha nde kɔthɔ ba niyɔ haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na thɛnkiyiyɔy mandi maŋ e bindɛ momino fooma. Nɛna nɔŋ wuŋ niyɔ na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see.
40024040	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, lamgbeŋ biye bi kɔŋ niyɔ ka wali ka dumgbu ka, wunthe kɔŋ si sɛkitha, e woŋ kɛndɛ peyo.
40024041	Yɛrɛmɛŋ biye bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ka yɔŋa ka kuthodo kunthe. Wunthe kɔŋ si sɛkitha, e woŋ kɛndɛ peyo.
40024042	Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ baa beŋ kɔita malɔkɔ ma Mariki ndeŋ woŋ see maŋ.
40024043	Awa yaŋ thimoŋ ba beŋ hakiyando hu tepe hɛ yaŋ bena haŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ wo biyɛ banka baŋ woŋ nde hɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ kɔthɔ wakathi wo ka huyɛ baŋ wo batuwaŋ woŋ see ba si thinka banka nama baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ nde hure yila banka nama baŋ napiripiri haliko ba be tha si thinka ba tuuto.
40024044	Huna niyɔŋ bendo dɛɛnkitɔkɔy timo tima, baa Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see ka wakathi wo be beŋ niŋ siyuwe.
40024045	“Mbɛ bawali wo yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ wo kele? Ndɛ na wɔ wo mariki nama ni bayaha ka bawaliŋ bihɛna beŋ ba bindɛ kɔ dunkune muthɔma naa lɔkɔ ba ka thɔma haŋ baŋ tɛŋ.
40024046	Bawali wobɛina kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ naa mariki nama woŋ penke niŋ si ni wali babɛina.
40024047	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ niŋ ni bayaha ba kɛriŋiyɛ mu biyɛ ndɛ muŋ fooma.
40024048	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ bawali wonɛnɔy na ndɛ, ndɛ kɔŋ dɔŋ ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Mariki niŋ woŋ seeta hɛ yako.’
40024049	Ndɛ kɔŋ sɛsi ba tawa ntɔni nama bi bawaliŋ beŋ, e ndɛ kɔ thɔma, e ndɛ kɔ thiiye mampa maŋ iŋ bayilɔiŋ beŋ.
40024050	Mariki wo ka bawali wonɛnɔy woŋ kɔŋ see ka lɔkɔ ba be ndɛ niŋ siyuwe, iŋ wakathi wo be ndɛ kɔthɔ.
40024051	Ndɛ kɔŋ niŋ gbasaŋati ka nanthe iŋ banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, ka tha ka bɛina kɛndɛ kɛna biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.”
40025001	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba dɔma, na “Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Hugbakinɛ hu ka ariana haŋ hu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ mbɔrɔ ki ka mpati bibɛthɛŋ kɔhi bi sɛkithɛ panɛ lampuiŋ namɛŋ ba kaa ka gbada ka ba ka yumba bayɛnti woŋ ba saa ka yakali ba ka kuyɛntande koŋ baŋ.
40025002	Bisɔhi ka beŋ beŋ baŋ bithɔkɔy; awa bisɔhi beŋ bikele.
40025003	Bithɔkɔy beŋ sekithe panɛ lampuiŋ namɛŋ beŋ kɛrɛ bindɛ tha diŋiti mayɔ ma ka ɔlifisi maŋ mayɛɛndɛni.
40025004	Kɛrɛ bikele beŋ, naa bathɔy bindɛ ba kaa, bindɛ sekithe lampuiŋ namɛŋ beŋ e bindɛ hɛlɛŋ diŋita mayɔ mayɛɛndɛni.
40025005	Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, bayɛnti woŋ tha peŋ biyande. Huna bindɛ fooma boho mandɛ awa bindɛ ŋɔɔkɔy ka nine.
40025006	“Naa tɛŋ nthɔŋ wuŋ huyɛ teete, wuŋ yelo thampa ba dɔma, na ‘Bayɛnti woŋ na see woŋ. Fuŋaŋ fooma ba ka pɛnka bayɛnti woŋ.’
40025007	Kɛna thɔhɔy bɛthɛŋ bikɔhi beŋ beŋ fooma e bindɛ yehinuwa lampuiŋ namɛŋ beŋ.
40025008	Naa kute bithɔkɔy beŋ ba dɔma na mayɔ namɛŋ maŋ thanki, huna dome bindɛ ka bikele beŋ, na ‘Nkaaŋ mina mayɔ manɔndi baa lampuiŋ ntuŋ beŋ thanko mayɔ.’
40025009	Kɛrɛ huna dome bikele beŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Ade, mɛŋ sa tɛŋ ba hanande iŋ beŋ. Huna kaaŋ ka bi ni gbɔŋ beŋ e beŋ ka boyiyɔkɔ.’
40025010	Naa key nthɔŋ bithɔkɔy beŋ ka boya haŋ, bayɛnti woŋ biyande, awa bikele bi dɛɛnkitɔkɔy beŋ biyande ka kuyɛntande koŋ. Naa biyande nthɔŋ bindɛ, biyo haŋ loŋo.
40025011	“Naa thanki nthɔŋ biyo haŋ loŋo, bɛthɛŋ bi kaayɛ hɛ ka boya haŋ beŋ tɛŋ, e bindɛ si dɔma, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, hɛmɔŋ, yaandi pɛthiyɛ mina, miŋ be biyande.’
40025012	Kɛrɛ bayɛnti woŋ ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔita bena. Mbɛ hu yaŋ bena pethiye biyo haŋ?’ ”
40025013	Kɛna gbanthaŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Kɔ kɛndɛ ka niya kantha, baa beŋ tha kɔthɔ lɔkɔ baŋ mɛnɛ wakathi wo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see.”
40025014	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tɛpa mbɔrɔ kihɛna ba tɔŋina na nɔŋ wuŋ niye naa Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see. Ndɛ tepe, na “Bayaha wunthe na bathɔy nde ba fuŋa biyasi. Naa bathɔy ndɛ ba kaa, ndɛ thiyi bawaliŋ nama beŋ ba bindɛ dunkune kɛɛ nama baŋ ba niŋ kɔsiniyɛ.
40025015	Ndɛ dunkune woma o woma ti peye punka hukɛnama. Ndɛ dunkuŋ kɔbiri woboyi wuluiŋ bisɔhi ka womayoŋ woŋ, ka wobiye woŋ wuluiŋ biye, ka wotaati woŋ wulu wunthe. Naa thanki nthɔŋ ndɛ wuŋ niya, ndɛ key biyasi haŋ.
40025016	Bawali wo bɔhɛ wuluiŋ bisɔhi woŋ fuŋ ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ na ba ka sikinuwande kɔbiri woboyi woŋ, haaŋ e ndɛ kuta wuluiŋ bisɔhi ka thinthi.
40025017	Nɛna ni hɛlɛŋ wo bɔhɛ wuluiŋ biye woŋ. Ndɛ sikinuwande niŋ haaŋ e ndɛ kuta wuluiŋ biye ka thinthi.
40025018	Kɛrɛ wo bɔhɛ wulu wunthe woŋ, naa fuŋ nthɔŋ ndɛ, akey gbusu kɛkɛŋ e ndɛ maankuwa kɔbiri wo ka bayaha nama woŋ.
40025019	“Naa nambe nthɔŋ wuŋ haaŋ bayaha wo ka bawaliŋ beŋ beŋ woŋ see tɛŋ maŋaye ka biyasi haŋ. Kɛna thiyi ndɛ bindɛ ba bi be si tɔŋ kuna kɔbiri wo kute bindɛ woŋ.
40025020	Wo bɔhɛ nde wuluiŋ bisɔhi woŋ see e ndɛ si tɔŋa kuna wuluiŋ bisɔhi bi tutɔy ka thinthi beŋ. Huna dome ndɛ ka bayaha nama woŋ, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, yi dunkune nde yama wuluiŋ bisɔhi, awa yaŋ kute wuluiŋ bisɔhi ka thinthi. Ya dondo baŋ nda wuluiŋ kɔhi ka fooma nama.’
40025021	Huna dome bayaha nama woŋ kɛnama, na ‘Yi ni wuyɔhɔy, awa bawali woyɔhɔy na yi, e yi hɛlɛŋ yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya. Yi niyɔy wɔ yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ba kuta munahaŋ ka ntha kiyetenaŋ. Huna yaŋ kɔŋ yina ni bayaha ka munki mubɔyɛ. Biyande, miŋ be si yehitɔkɔ ka tha banthe.’
40025022	“Awa wo bɔhɛ nde wuluiŋ biye woŋ see e ndɛ si tɔŋa kuna wuluiŋ biye bi tutɔy ka thinthi beŋ. Huna dome ndɛ ka bayaha nama woŋ, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, yi dunkune nde yama wuluiŋ biye, awa yaŋ kute wuluiŋ biye ka thinthi. Ya dondo baŋ nda wuluiŋ binaŋ ka fooma nama.’
40025023	Huna dome bayaha nama woŋ kɛnama, na ‘Yi ni wuyɔhɔy, awa bawali woyɔhɔy na yi, e yi hɛlɛŋ yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya. Yi niyɔy wɔ yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ka ntha kiyetenaŋ. Huna yaŋ kɔŋ yina ni bayaha ka munki mubɔyɛ. Biyande, miŋ be si yehitɔkɔ ka tha banthe.’
40025024	“Kɛna manke wo bɔhɛ nde wulu wunthe woŋ saa e ndɛ si dɔma ka bayaha nama woŋ, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba wuŋ niyɔ na wɔ thiyɛ dɛnkɛŋ na yi, baa yi kɔŋ ŋɔŋ ka tha yi paya paka, awa e yi thinka muthɛri ka tha yi thɛɛli.
40025025	Haŋ haŋ baŋ huna payɔy nde yaŋ, wuna biyɛ nde yaŋ ka gbusa kɛkɛŋ e yaŋ maankuwa kɔbiri nda woŋ. Bɛna ya kɔbiri wo dunkune nde yama yi woŋ.’
40025026	Huna dome bayaha nama woŋ kɛnama, na ‘Bawali wonɛnɔy na yi, awa e yi hɛlɛŋ niyɔ wɔ mayɛini. Yi kɔthɛŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na yaŋ kɔŋ ŋɔŋ ka tha yaŋ thɛɛli paka, awa e yaŋ thinka muthɛri ka tha yaŋ thɛɛli.
40025027	Na tha nde yi sikinuwande kɔbiri niŋ woŋ yi kɔŋ nde nɔŋ niŋ kati ka kuhunkuŋ ku ka kɔbiri woŋ kosino ka. Haliko naa see yaŋ na, yaŋ be nde nda pɛnki kɔbiri niŋ woŋ fooma mɛnɛ munahaŋ bayete ba tutɔy ka thinthi baŋ.’
40025028	“Huna dome bayaha woŋ ka bawaliŋ bihɛna beŋ, na ‘Bohitaŋ niŋ kɔbiri woboyi wowulu wunthe woŋ e beŋ dunkune wo iŋ kɔbiri wowuluiŋ kɔhi woŋ.
40025029	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe haŋ haŋ baŋ baa wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ wubɔyɛ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ ndintiya, wuna ndɛ niyɔ iŋ wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ. Kɛrɛ wo ka iŋ ntha woŋ, hali wuyete wu iŋ wundɛ wuŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ wuŋ kanita.
40025030	Yɛlaŋ bawali wo ka munahaŋ woŋ baŋ ka huntuma hugbɛki haŋ ka gbada ka, ka biya thinkuwɔ thathukuma kɛ e bindɛ kɔ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.’ ”
40025031	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba dɔma, na “Ti Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see nɔŋ gbaku iŋ malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ fooma, ndɛ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka yensi nama hu ka huybakine haŋ.
40025032	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, siyani baŋ fooma ba kɔŋ si kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnama. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ bindɛ hakinande makɔɔni maye nɔŋ na nthɔŋ batɔli woŋ hakinande takɛŋ beŋ iŋ baahuiŋ beŋ na.
40025033	Ndɛ kɔŋ kiyi biya bithumbɛ beŋ ka yɔnkɔ nama huthome haŋ, awa e kiya biya binɛnɔy beŋ ka hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ.
40025034	Huna nɔŋ gbaku woŋ dɔŋ ka bi ka yɔnkɔ huthome haŋ beŋ, na ‘Saaŋ, bendo thiyiyo thaduba beŋ iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ! Saaŋ beŋ be si dunkuno huybakine hu kosiniyoko beŋ haŋ iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ ma ka fay woŋ maŋ.
40025035	Beŋ kɔŋ kutu huybakine haŋ baa yaŋ see nde kendeŋ wo kaho kɔnthɔ e beŋ yama nkaa muthɔma. Yando kaho nde kumbɛ e beŋ yama nkaa mandi ba thiiye. Yando sɛɛ nde kendeŋ thahinɛ e beŋ yama niya yikiya.
40025036	Yando ka iŋ nde muthɔɔ, kɛrɛ beŋ nkee nde yama muthɔɔ. Yando nde wothoonɔy e beŋ yama kaa ka thiya nhee. Yaŋ kiŋ nde ka yeeli e beŋ yama kaa ka maana.’
40025037	“Huna nɔŋ niŋ bithumbɛ beŋ meyiye ba dɔma, na ‘Mariki, kama kute nde miŋ yina wo kaho kɔnthɔ e miŋ yina nkaa muthɔma, maa yindo kaho kumbɛ e miŋ yina nkaa mandi ba thiiye?
40025038	Awa tima see yi thahinɛ kɛntuŋ do e miŋ yina niya yikiya, maa yindo ka iŋ muthɔɔ e miŋ yina dunkune muthɔɔ?
40025039	Awa tima kute miŋ yina wothoonɔy maa wo thiyɔy ka yeeli e miŋ yina kaa ka maana?’
40025040	“Huna nɔŋ gbaku woŋ bindɛ meyiye ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, naa ni nde nthɔŋ beŋ wuŋ ka wunthe ka mbɛndaŋ beŋ beŋ bi ka waŋ beŋ, wuŋ niyɔy ba dɔma na kiyaŋ ni na nde beŋ wuŋ.’
40025041	“Huna nɔŋ gbaku woŋ dɔŋ ka bi kooye niŋ ka yɔnkɔ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ beŋ, na ‘Gbɔniyɔkɔŋ nuŋ dondo baŋ, bendo badankɛŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ. Bendo thiya ka buu bu sa dɔmɔ bu deenkitoko buŋ ba Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ mɛnɛ malekɛŋ nama beŋ.
40025042	Beŋ kɔŋ thiya ka buu buŋ baa yaŋ see nde kendeŋ wo kaho kɔnthɔ, kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama dunkune muthɔma. Yaŋ see nde kendeŋ wo kaho kumbɛ, beŋ tha yama nkuu mandi ba thiiye.
40025043	Yaŋ see nde thahinɛ kendeŋ, beŋ tha yama ni yikiya. Yaŋ see nde kendeŋ wo ka iŋ muthɔɔ, beŋ tha yama nkii muthɔɔ. Yaŋ thoono nde awa yaŋ thiyo nde ka yeeli, beŋ tha yama key ka maana kɛndɛ.’
40025044	“Huna nɔŋ bindɛ niŋ meyiye ba dɔma, na ‘Mariki, kama kute nde miŋ yina wo kaho kɔnthɔ maa wo kaho kumbɛ maa thahinɛ maa wo ka iŋ muthɔɔ maa wothoonɔy maa ka yeeli, miŋ tha yina mase?’
40025045	“Huna nɔŋ gbaku woŋ dɔŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, na tha nde nthɔŋ beŋ wuŋ ni ka wunthe ka beŋ beŋ bi dɔma bi ka waŋ beŋ. Wuŋ niyɔy ba dɔma beŋ tha wuŋ ni kiyaŋ.’
40025046	Huna biya bi ka yɔnkɔ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ key ka kugbasaŋati ku kɔy yo kɔy koŋ. Kɛrɛ bithumbɛ beŋ, bi kɔŋ key ka bindɛ ka niyɔ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.”
40026001	Naa thanki Yisɔs thaninuwa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, ndɛ dome ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na
40026002	“Beŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na wuŋ pɛyɛ hura kaye biya ba dɔŋɔ ba siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde biIsirɛli beŋ maŋ iŋ maleka wo ka tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ dunkuna ka bi niŋ yanti ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ba niŋ kɔra.”
40026003	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hɛlɛŋ tɛɛna kɔmande bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ ka biya beŋ ka tha banthe ka gbada hu ka Bafode Womandiŋ wo dɔma Keyafasi woŋ.
40026004	Bindɛ dɛɛnki ka tha banthe na bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ka gbundu ba niŋ kɔra.
40026005	Bindɛ gbonkoy ka tha banthe ba dɔma, na “Miŋ kɔŋ niŋ kɔri, kɛrɛ miŋ bɛiŋ wuŋ ni ka wiki wo ka thɔma humandiŋ haŋ woŋ, baa thampo biya muŋ niya sɔnkɔ-sɔnkɔ.”
40026006	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs kiŋ nde ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani ka banka ba ka Saimɔŋ wo boho nde iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi.
40026007	Naa dɔŋɔy Yisɔs ka thɔma haŋ, hati yɛrɛmɛ wunthe see ka Yisɔs wo iŋ bithira hu mayɔ ma thimɔy huru, awa e mɛŋ nde hɛlɛŋ niyɔ ma kahɛ mɔlɔŋ. Bithira hubɛina hu yehinuwo maŋaye ka raka hu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ hu dɔma na alabasata. Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ key mɛŋ koŋe Yisɔs na ka yaha ka doŋe ndɛ ka thɔma haŋ ka.
40026008	Naa kute wuŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, wuŋ baŋiye bindɛ wumandiŋ. Huna dome bindɛ, na “Mbɛ hu teetuwe hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ mayɔ maŋ maŋ?
40026009	Mayɔ maŋ maŋ ma kɔŋ nde niya gbɔŋ e mɛŋ fuŋuna kɔbiri womandiŋ, wo nde bamɔnɛŋ beŋ dunkuno.”
40026010	Yisɔs kɔthɛ hu bindɛ tɛpi haŋ, huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ hu beŋ niye hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ thɔrɔ? Ndɛ thanki niya bɛyi bayɔhɔy kiyaŋ.
40026011	Beŋ kiŋ iŋ bamɔnɛŋ beŋ timo tima, kɛrɛ beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ yaŋ timo tima.
40026012	Mayɔ ma koŋe hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ yama ka kɔtɔ maŋ, ndɛ ni wuŋ ba yama kɔsinɔkɔ haliko na yaŋ si maankuwo.
40026013	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, komo kama ka Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ haŋ baŋ niya kɛwandi ka fay woŋ baŋ fooma, ba ni hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ doŋe tepo ba niŋ siyuwa.”
40026014	Kɛna ŋaye wunthe ka bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, wo dɔma Yudasi Isakariyɔti woŋ, e ndɛ kaa ka bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ.
40026015	Ndɛ key bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ mu beŋ yama dunkune mɛnɛ yaŋ dunkune bena Yisɔs na?” Kɛna konde bindɛ kɔbiri wosiliba kɔnthɔ kataati e bindɛ niŋ dunkune Yudasi na.
40026016	Awa there nda ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Yudasi bohe nda deethuwa na ndɛ dunkune Yisɔs na ka hadeni nama beŋ.
40026017	Ka lɔkɔ bamayoŋ ka wiki wo thɔŋ bindɛ kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ, bakarandeni beŋ see ka Yisɔs, e bindɛ niŋ si thɔnthiŋina ba dɔma, na “Kama thimo yi ba miŋ kosineke ba thɔma hu ka siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde siya ntuŋ baŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ?”
40026018	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kaaŋ ka mɛti bamandiŋ ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ e beŋ ka tepe wɔ wunthe kɛndɛ ba dɔma, na ‘Karimɔkɔ woŋ dome, na lɔkɔ niŋ baŋ thuriye. Huna yaŋ kɔŋ thɔŋ thɔma haŋ iŋ bakarandeni niŋ beŋ ka banka kɛnda do.’ ”
40026019	Bakarandeni beŋ ni nɔŋ na toŋinuwe nthɔŋ Yisɔs bindɛ na. Naa toŋino bindɛ makonko maŋ, bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔy kɛndɛ wuyɔhɔy ba thɔma haŋ.
40026020	Naa tɛŋ wuŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ, Yisɔs dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ iŋ bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ.
40026021	Awa naa bindɛ thɔŋ, huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ yama ni gbɔŋ ka hadeni niŋ beŋ.”
40026022	Naa yuye bindɛ haŋ haŋ baŋ, wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛna bohe bindɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋinuwa ka wunthe-wunthe, na “Mariki, yaŋ kutɛ ye.”
40026023	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Wunthe ka beŋ wo yaŋ thiyitande yɔnkɔ ka kaaro banthe woŋ, ndɛ na yama ni gbɔŋ.
40026024	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ tuke nɔŋ na gbalo nde wuŋ na ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba ndɛ. Kɛrɛ nambara ba kɔŋ see ka wɔ wo ni Hati ka Wɔ woŋ gbɔŋ. Wu kɔŋ nde nɔŋ niyɔ hita ba wɔ bɛina nde nɔŋ thana mpoo.”
40026025	Yudasi hɛlɛŋ gbeeŋ ndɛ thɔɔtɔy ka dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ kutɛ ye.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ yi.” Yudasi wobɛina gbeeŋ na niye Yisɔs na gbɔŋ woŋ.
40026026	Naa nde bindɛ thɔŋ, Yisɔs sekithe kutoŋ koŋ, e ndɛ thiyiyɛ kuŋ maamo. Naa thankaŋ ndɛ, ndɛ thinkinuwande kuŋ e ndɛ dunkune bakarandeni beŋ e ndɛ bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Sɛkithaŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ e beŋ kuŋ thɔma. Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna.”
40026027	Ndɛ sekithe hɛlɛŋ kɔɔpu haŋ e ndɛ thiya Masaala na maamo. Awa naa thanki ndɛ thiya maamo, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Thiiyeŋ beŋ fooma.
40026028	Mampa maŋ maŋ mɛna wasi niŋ baŋ, ba thiŋinɛ mayukunande ma ka Masaala maŋ iŋ biyamɛti. Wasi niŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ tɔŋa wuna biya bibɔyɛ pɛniya hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.
40026029	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thiiye mampa ma ka mutiŋ muŋ muŋ baŋ, yɔkɔŋ nɔŋ nda ti yaŋ thiiye maŋama maŋ ka Hugbakinɛ hu ka Fandaŋ woŋ haŋ.”
40026030	Naa thanki bindɛ thɔma, bindɛ soŋe kuiŋa ku ka Masaala koŋ, kɛna pɛyɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ ba kaa ka kusɛri ku dɔma na Ɔlifisi koŋ.
40026031	Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ yama pɛyɛŋ huyɛ baŋ baŋ. Wu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na tepe Masaala na ka magbali nama maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ kɔri batɔli woŋ, awa takɛŋ beŋ fooma ka kubinthi koŋ bi kɔŋ paŋande.’
40026032	Kɛrɛ naa yaŋ ŋayino ka tuka haŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ key ka Kalili; kɛna beŋ yama penke.”
40026033	Huna dome Pita kɛnama, na “Hali beŋ beŋ fooma bi pɛyɛnaŋ yina, yaŋ sa yina pɛyɛŋ.”
40026034	Huna dome Yisɔs ka Pita, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira huyɛ baŋ baŋ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔita yama.”
40026035	Kɛna dome Pita kɛnama, na “Hali wu pɛnkaŋ nthɔŋ ba dɔma na yaŋ kɔŋ tuku iŋ yi ka nanthe, yaŋ sa yina buuhu.” Bakarandeni bibintheŋ beŋ fooma dome hɛlɛmaŋ nɛŋ.
40026036	Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ fuŋ ba kaa ka tha ka dɔma na ka Kɛthɛsɛmɛni. Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, ndɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Dɔŋɔŋ dondo baŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ key kanka baŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ.”
40026037	Ndɛ diŋe Pita na ka kaa mɛnɛ mpati bi ka Sɛbɛdi bibiye beŋ. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ ndɛ bohe kutɔkɔ nkinikiniŋ, awa e thukuma nama haŋ kɔ niya thɔrɔ.
40026038	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ ka thukuma niŋ haŋ, wu yama kɔ ba kɔra. Bɛna pɛyɔŋ dondo baŋ, beŋ be huru gbele ka nanthe iŋ yaŋ.”
40026039	Kɛna key ndɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ wuyete, e ndɛ putɔ nasɔli-sɔli ka niya kuraminɛ, na “Fandaŋ woŋ, mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ nde ŋɛnɔ, niya ba kɔɔpu hu ka nambara baŋ baŋ haŋ yama bariŋɔ. Kɛrɛ wu bɛiŋ niyɔ ka mathimo niŋ nde, kɛrɛ wu niyɔyŋ ka mathimo makɛnda maŋ.”
40026040	Naa thanki ndɛ niya kuraminɛ, ndɛ teŋiteke ka bakarandeni bitaati beŋ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ penke bi si nine. Huna dome ndɛ ka Pita, na “Mbɛ hu sa bendo bitaati beŋ punku hure gbele iŋ yaŋ hali ba wakathi wunthe?
40026041	Huraŋ gbele e beŋ niya kuraminɛ wuna sa beŋ thiika ba niya hakɛŋ. Thukuma haŋ hu thimoŋ ba niya bɛyi bathumbɛ, kɛrɛ huwɔmɛtiya haŋ ka iŋ sɛmbɛ ba bɛŋ niya.”
40026042	Naa nambe wuŋ wuyete, Yisɔs key hɛlɛŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ hukaye. Huna dome ndɛ, na “Fandaŋ woŋ, mɛnɛ kɔɔpu hu ka nambarɛŋ baŋ baŋ haŋ sa yama bariŋɔ na yɔkɔŋ yaŋ thiiye huŋ, awa mathimo makɛnda ma niyɔyŋ.”
40026043	Naa thanki ndɛ niya kuraminɛ, ndɛ see hɛlɛŋ ka bakarandeni beŋ e ndɛ pɛnka bindɛ bi si nine, baa bi thiŋo nde mandɛ ka thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ.
40026044	Ndɛ pɛyi hɛlɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ba ka niya kuraminɛ hu tɛŋinɛ dɔŋɔ kataati. Kuraminɛ kukunthe koŋ thuŋ kuŋ ma key ka niya.
40026045	Naa thanki ndɛ niya kuraminɛ, ndɛ teŋiteke hɛlɛŋ ka bakarandeni beŋ, kɛrɛ ndɛ penke hɛlɛŋ bi si nine. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “E haaŋ hɛ nine na beŋ nine e beŋ kɔ hɛɛmuwa? Poniyaŋ nuŋ kuiha, wakathi woŋ tɛŋ wo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyo gbɔŋ woŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bahakɛŋ.
40026046	Ŋayeŋ ka kɔɔ, miŋ beŋ key. Dethaŋ hɛ, wo yama ni gbɔŋ woŋ, ndɛ kiŋ nda mina wuthuriye.”
40026047	Naa nde Yisɔs gbonkoy, kɛna see Yudasi, wo nde wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, iŋ sɛthɛ babɔyɛ bi iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbe, bi ŋindi bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ.
40026048	Saanuŋ bindɛ ba kaa ka bɔha Yisɔs na, Yudasi, banigbɔŋ woŋ, toŋine bindɛ na wundɛ ka ni na bindɛ kothiye Yisɔs na. Ndɛ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Hati wathe wo nthɔŋ yaŋ dɔɔkɔ ka maana woŋ, bɔhaŋ niŋ. Ndɛ na.”
40026049	Naa tɛŋ Yudasi, ndɛ key toloŋ ka Yisɔs ka e dɔma, na “Maande, karimɔkɔ.” Awa ndɛ dɔɔkɔi niŋ ka maana.
40026050	Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Nyathiki, niya yako ba see yi ka niya dondo baŋ.” Kɛna see sɛthɛ baŋ ŋote Yisɔs na e bindɛ niŋ bɔha wukahɛ.
40026051	Naa kute nthɔŋ wuŋ wunthe ka bi iŋ Yisɔs beŋ, ndɛ yose silanhi nama baŋ e ndɛ yuwa waayi wo ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ e gbaara kuiha nama koŋ.
40026052	Naa kute wuŋ Yisɔs, ndɛ tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Thiya silanhi nda baŋ ka kurɔmɔ nama koŋ, baa bi sɛkithɛ silanhiŋ namɛŋ beŋ fooma ba dekiya, silanhiŋ bɛna bindɛ kɔɔri.
40026053	E beŋ kɔita ba dɔma na yaŋ punkeŋ ba thɔnthiŋina Fandaŋ woŋ ba maso, awa ndɛ kɔŋ yama tɔŋɔti ŋakunkunɛ ŋa yamɛ kɔhi iŋ ŋaye ŋa ka kurugbani bimalekɛŋ beŋ ŋaŋ?
40026054	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ yaŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba bindɛ, nama magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ thiŋe, ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma na bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma yɔkɔŋ bɛŋ niiye nɛŋ?”
40026055	Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka sɛthɛ baŋ, na “E beŋ asee iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbe ka bɔha yama nɔŋ ka beŋ see ka bɔha wɔ wo sa putiyɔ siraŋ? Tima o tima yaŋ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ iŋ beŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ka thaninuwa, kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama bohi.
40026056	Kɛrɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niyɔy fooma haliko magbali ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ ma be thiŋ.” Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ bakarandeni beŋ fooma pɛyɛŋ niŋ e bindɛ kita.
40026057	Bi bɔhɛ Yisɔs na beŋ kati niŋ ka banka ba ka Keyafasi ka, Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ka kɔmande karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ.
40026058	Naa Yisɔs kata, Pita yeme kahɛŋ kɛrɛ wuthɔkiyande iŋ bindɛ. Naa biyande Pita, ndɛ key dɔŋɔ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ baŋ. Ndɛ key dɔŋɔ iŋ bi ni kantha beŋ ba detha ba niyɔ.
40026059	Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakaamani beŋ fooma bohe niya maseri mahothi ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na haliko na ndɛ koro.
40026060	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu hu bindɛ niŋ thonkine. Biya bibɔyɛ see kɔɔ kɔ kɔtɔkɔy ba niŋ keriŋiyɛ hothi. Yɔkɔŋ hu mankɛ nagbɔŋ baseriŋ biye see kɔɔ,
40026061	bi tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Ndɛ tepe nde ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ punkeŋ teetuwa yikiya ba ka Masaala baŋ, awa e yaŋ bɛŋ hɛlɛŋ thanka thoya ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ.’ ”
40026062	Naa yuye huŋ Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ndɛ ŋaye ka kɔɔ e ndɛ dɔma ka Yisɔs, na “E yi ka iŋ yaabi ba yi ni ka maseri ma lamgbeŋ beŋ beŋ ni ma sɔkinɔkɔ yina maŋ?”
40026063	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha hintiŋ nthɔŋ niŋ tɔtiyɔkɔ. Huna dome Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ kɛnama, na “Yi iŋ Masaala wopethɔy woŋ, gbiŋa hɛ mɛnɛ yina Banikisi wo niyo miŋ lahiri woŋ, Hati ka Masaala woŋ.”
40026064	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ yi. Kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, wuŋ sa nda nambi beŋ kɔŋ kutu Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka madoŋe mayiki maŋ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Wo biyɛ sɛmbɛŋ fooma woŋ haŋ, awa e ndɛ kɔ saa ka thawuruma tha ka kuthahinɛ koŋ thaŋ.”
40026065	Naa yuye huŋ Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ndɛ saayaŋ ŋahɔli ŋa thooye ndɛ ŋaŋ ba tɔŋina ba ndɛ thɔɔ ka mathoŋ, e ndɛ dɔma, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ yetheni keŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ ka gbonkiya. Mbɛ hɛlɛŋ nda maseri ma miŋ kufiyo? Beŋ fooma yuye nda na ndɛ yetheni keŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ.
40026066	Nama tepe beŋ?” Huna tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Ndɛ asisande ba koro.”
40026067	Kɛna thuthe bindɛ Yisɔs na ka yethi haŋ, e bindɛ niŋ tawa. Kɛna dome bi thorinɛ niŋ beŋ kɛnama,
40026068	na “Niya hɛ hunabi kɛntuŋ, baa yina Banikisi woŋ. Mbɛ wo thorinɛ yina?”
40026069	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Pita doŋeŋ nde ka gbada ka. Kɛna see hati bɛthɔ wo nde wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ kɛnama e ndɛ dɔma, na “Yi hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ yina nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs wo ka Kalili woŋ.”
40026070	Kɛrɛ Pita buuhu ka kooye bindɛ kɛ e ndɛ dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔita hu yi tɛpi haŋ.”
40026071	Pita fuŋ e ndɛ ka kɔɔ ka biya muŋ biiyande kɛ. Hati bɛthɔ wohɛna kute hɛlɛŋ Pita na. Huna dome ndɛ ka bi kɔɔyɛ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ beŋ, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ ndɛ na nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ.”
40026072	Kɛna buuhu hɛlɛŋ Pita e ndɛ tɛpa ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ gbiŋe, yaŋ kɔita hati lamgba woŋ baŋ.”
40026073	Naa nambe nthɔŋ wuŋ wuyete, kɛna see bi kɔɔyɛ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ beŋ ka Pita e bindɛ dɔma, na “Hunɔndi yaathi wunthe na yi ka bindɛ, baa magbonkoy makɛnda maŋ tɔŋɔŋ ba yi ŋaye ka tha banthe iŋ bindɛ.”
40026074	Kɛna bohe Pita thiyiyɔkɔ danka e ndɛ kɔ gbiŋa ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔita hati lamgba woŋ baŋ. Mɛnɛ yaŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ, haliko Masaala gbasiŋita yama.” Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina, koki woŋ kokori.
40026075	Kɛna siyi Pita hu tepe nde niŋ Yisɔs haŋ ba dɔma, na “Saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔita yama.” Pita fuŋ ka gbada ka e ndɛ berina wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.
40027001	Kuputhɔ ku kaŋ sanka-sanka, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ fooma ka biya beŋ kɔmande ka tha banthe ba dɛɛnka na bindɛ niŋ kore.
40027002	Bindɛ niŋ lɔŋa iŋ yɔlɔnkɔiŋ ba niŋ kata ka Pailɛti ka wo ŋindo nde ba niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ iŋ biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ.
40027003	Naa kute Yudasi, wo niyɛ Yisɔs na gbɔŋ ka hadeni nama woŋ, ba dɔma na Yisɔs thonkino, ndɛ sikinande masiyi nama maŋ. Kɛna duutu ndɛ kɔbiri wosiliba wo kɔnthɔ kataati woŋ ka bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ.
40027004	Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ ni hakɛ ba niya wɔ wo pankɔy bɛyi woŋ gbɔŋ ba ndɛ koro.” Naa yuye bindɛ huŋ, huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Hukɛntuŋ kutɛ, huŋ pɛyɛ kɛnda.”
40027005	Kɛna yele Yudasi kɔbiri woŋ kɛkɛŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ndɛ fuŋa e ka yantɔkɔ ba kɔrɔkɔ.
40027006	Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ sekithe kɔbiri woŋ, e bindɛ dɔma, na “Wuŋ kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba thiya kɔbiri woŋ baŋ ka kɔbiri woŋ kosino ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ, baa kɔbiri wo tɔŋɛ wasi na, wo niyɛ ba lamgba wunthe koro.”
40027007	Kɛna dɔŋɔy bindɛ makutande ba na bindɛ siseke niya kɔbiri woŋ baŋ. Bindɛ bohinande ba boya kai hu ka bayeheni thasokoro thaŋ woŋ ba mankuwe thahinɛŋ.
40027008	Wuna biyɛ bi kɔŋ kɛndɛ dɔŋ, na “Kai hu ka wasi baŋ haŋ.” Haaŋ hɛ nɛna kɛndɛ thiyo.
40027009	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Yɛrɛmaya haŋ hu be thiŋ. Ndɛ tepe nde ba dɔma, na “Kɔbiri wosiliba wo kɔnthɔ kataati sekitho, awa mɔlɔŋ baŋ baŋ thanki nde nda deŋo iŋ biya binɔndi bi ka Isirɛli ba tindɛ niŋ niye gbɔŋ.
40027010	Awa bindɛ sekithe kɔbiri wobɛina e bindɛ boya kai hu ka wo yeheni thasokoro thaŋ woŋ, nɔŋ na ni nde nthɔŋ yama Mariki woŋ yamari na.”
40027011	Kɛna kiye bindɛ Yisɔs na ka kɔtɔkɔy ba konsiŋino iŋ Pailɛti wo ŋindo nde ba niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ iŋ biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ. Wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs na ba dɔma, na “E yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?” Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ yi.”
40027012	Hali na thanki nde nda bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ niŋ fuŋutiyɛ, Yisɔs tha ni yaabi hali.
40027013	Huna dome Pailɛti ka Yisɔs, na “E yi yuyeta na bindɛ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy baŋ baŋ fooma ma sɔkinɔkɔ yina?”
40027014	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha niŋ ni yaabi, hali sɔkɔ hunthe. Huna ni bakɛrɛŋ woŋ thakaba wumandiŋ ba Yisɔs.
