42006009	Huna tepe bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ be hɛ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ: Mbɛ mayoho ma dunkuŋ mina Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba miŋ ba niya ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ? Ba mase maa ba teetuwa? Ba niya sii ba ka wɔ kisi maa ba bɛŋ teetuwa?”
42006010	Kɛna dethe ndɛ bindɛ natiŋ. Huna tepe wundɛ ka hati lamgba wo tukɛ yɔnkɔ haŋ woŋ, na “Thumbuna yɔnkɔ nda haŋ.” Wundɛ thumbuŋ huŋ. Kɛna thɔhɔy yɔnkɔ nama haŋ huŋ pethɔ nagbelebe.
42006011	Bindɛ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ, e bindɛ bɔha thɔnthiŋinuwande ba ba nda bindɛ ni Yisɔs na.
42006012	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs see key ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ; wundɛ hure niya kuraminɛ ka Masaala kɛndɛ.
42006013	Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, kɛna thiyi wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, e yɛtha kɔhi iŋ biye bi thunde wundɛ keŋ na baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ.
42006014	Wundɛ yɛthi Saimɔŋ na, wo thunde wundɛ keŋ woŋ na Pita, iŋ wɛndama Anduru, Yemisi iŋ Yɔni, Filipi, iŋ Batholomiyu,
42006015	Mathiyu, iŋ Thɔmɔsi, Yemisi wo hati ka Alifiyɔsi, iŋ Saimɔŋ wo nde kurugba woŋ,
42006016	Yudasi hati ka Yemisi, iŋ Yudasi Isakariyɔti wo dunkunɛ Yisɔs na ka hadeni nama beŋ woŋ.
42006017	Naa thuhe Yisɔs ŋaye ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ iŋ baseriŋ nama bithɔɔkɔ beŋ, wundɛ see kɔɔ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kugbɛnthɛŋ-gbɛnthɛŋ koŋ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba ka bakarandeni nama, mɛnɛ biya bimandiŋ bi nde kɛndɛ ŋaye fooma ka Yudiya, ka Yɛrusalɛmi, iŋ ka kufɛŋ ku ka Taya iŋ ka Saidɔŋ ku tɔpɛ mankɔ mamɛɛti maŋ koŋ. Beŋ beŋ fooma see ba niŋ saa ka yuyɛ iŋ ba si puyo nthoonani namɛŋ kɔŋ.
42006018	Bi boho iŋ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma puyo.
42006019	Biya beŋ fooma ayɔli ba boheke Yisɔs na, baa sɛmbɛ ba puyi hiŋ ba niŋ fuŋ ka kɔtɔ e bɛŋ bindɛ kɔ puya fooma.
42006020	Yisɔs dethe bakarandeni nama beŋ e tɛpa, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, baa bena biyɛ hudinhaŋiya hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
42006021	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo kaho hɛ kɔnthɔ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ thimbina. “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo bereŋ hɛ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ hɛthi.
42006022	“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, mɛnɛ biya thambo bena, e bena baŋina, e bena thɔtha dɛkuiŋ, e bena gbonkiyiyɛ bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy fooma ba saathɛ ba Hati wo ka Wɔ woŋ.
42006023	Yehitɔkɔŋ, e beŋ mala iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ mɛnɛ wuŋ niyɔy nɛŋ, baa kuthunkuŋ kumandiŋ ku kɔŋ ba beŋ ka ariana, baa nɛna ni nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ kɔŋ ka banabiŋ beŋ nde.
42006024	“Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo bananhuluiŋ beŋ, baa beŋ thiŋiŋ nda ŋafiyo ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ.
42006025	“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo hɛ nda bendo thimbɔy beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ kaho kɔnthɔ! Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo hɛ hɛthi beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ bereŋ!
42006026	“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka kuwaŋ kukendeŋ mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy ba beŋ, baa nɛna nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ kɔŋ gbeeŋ gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy ba banabiŋ biŋasɔkɛ beŋ.
42006027	“Kɛrɛ beŋ, bendo yama yuyɛ beŋ, yaŋ tepe bena, thimoŋ hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ; niya wuyɔhɔy bi thambo bena beŋ.
42006028	Thiyiyaŋ thaduba bi bena thiyiyɛ thadanka beŋ. Niyaŋ kuraminɛ ba bi bena gbonkiyiyɛ wunɛnɔy beŋ.
42006029	Mɛnɛ wɔ thoroŋ yina ka kuwaabu kuthome koŋ, dapiniyande niŋ kuwaabu kupɔkɔdɔ koŋ hɛlɛŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ ŋututu yina kuhɔli, mba ŋutiyɛ nda niŋ yaba bakaake baŋ.
42006030	Dunkune wɔ yo wɔ wo yina thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba ntha, awa mɛnɛ wɔ sekithite yina ntha, ba nda niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba wuŋ.
42006031	Niyiyɛ biya bihɛna nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na thimo yi ba bindɛ yina niyiyɛ na.
42006032	“Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ thimo hɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ bi thimo bena beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ, nɛŋ mɛiŋ ni.
42006033	Awa mɛnɛ beŋ ni hɔkɔŋ bayɔhɔy ka bi bena ni bayɔhɔy beŋ ŋagbɛti beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ, nɛŋ mɛiŋ ni.
42006034	Mɛnɛ beŋ thɔhɔŋ hɔkɔŋ bi bena punku thunkuna beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ thɔhɔŋ bintɔni namɛŋ ba thunkuno nanthe nathesi.
42006035	Kɛrɛ thimoŋ biya bi thambo bena beŋ, awa e beŋ niya bayɔhɔy, awa e beŋ thɔhina wu ka matute yima ba thunkuno. Awa kuthunkuŋ kukendeŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ niyɔ kumandiŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma. Baa Masaala wɔ yɔhɔy na ka bi ka thiya beŋ, iŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma.
42006036	Bɛna, niyɔŋ bankinikiniŋ nɔŋ na Fanda ntuŋ woŋ bankinikiniŋ na.
42006037	“Baŋ niyɔkɔ bakɔnsɔŋɔni, awa Masaala sa nɛnɛ bena kɔnsɔŋɔŋ; baŋ thonkine biya bihɛna, awa Masaala sa nɛnɛ bena thonkine; pɛniyaŋ biya bihɛna, awa Masaala kɔŋ nɛnɛ bena pɛniyɛ.
42006038	Nkaaŋ biya bihɛna, awa Masaala kɔŋ nɛnɛ bena nkii. Yaathi, beŋ kɔŋ thubutiya ka muthubute mu ka iŋ kɔɔtha, wu kɔŋ thiya e wuŋ ŋeno, e wuŋ noinko, e wuŋ thiyo ka thɛnkɔ thakendeŋ thaŋ. Baa ka muthubute mu beŋ thubutiye biya bihɛna muŋ, muna nɛnɛ Masaala bena thubutiye.”
42006039	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ thabɔrɔ thaŋ thaŋ ba bindɛ thaninuwa ba Masaala: na “Wɔ mankɔy thaaya sa katitɔkɔ wɔ mankɔy thaaya. Mɛnɛ wundɛ ni wuŋ, ti bindɛ biye bi kɔŋ ŋɔti ka kufo ka.
42006040	Karandeŋ yameta bukuya ba karimɔkɔ nama, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wundɛ thanki thanuwa, wundɛ kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ karimɔkɔ nama.
42006041	“Nama yi kute kuthopi ku ka hooya hu ka ntɔ nda haŋ koŋ, kɛrɛ yi tha kutu kugboŋ ku yinthande ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ koŋ?
42006042	Nama yi tepe ntɔ nda na, na ‘Ntɔŋ, yaandi saa be yina fuŋuŋ kuthopi koŋ ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ,’ halisa yi kuita kugboŋ ku ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ koŋ? Wɔ banitɔkɔ na yi! Yenke hintiŋ fuŋuna kugboŋ koŋ ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ kutu nagberekethe. Yi kɔŋ punku kuta nagberekethe ba fuŋuna kuthopi ku ka hooya hu ka ntɔ nda haŋ koŋ.
42006043	“Kuyeŋ kuyɔhɔy sa tiŋ mutiŋ munɛnɔy, ba hintiŋ nɛnɛ tɛpa na kuyeŋ kunɛnɔy ku kɔŋ tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy.
42006044	Kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ ku kɔŋ kothiyo ka detha mutiŋ nama muŋ. Yi sa thadi mutiŋ muthɔma ŋaye ka kuyeŋ ku sa thɔma, ba hintiŋ tɛpa na yi kɔŋ thadi mutiŋ muyɔhɔy ŋaye ka kuyerethe.
42006045	Wɔ yɔhɔy ndɛ kɔŋ fuŋutu bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ŋaye ka bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ba kɔsɔŋ wundɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ. Wɔ nɛnɔy nɛnɛ, wundɛ kɔŋ fuŋutu bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy ba kɔsɔŋ wundɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ, baa hothi haŋ hu kɔŋ gbonkoy ba thiŋɛ ka thukuma haŋ.
42006046	“Mbɛ ba beŋ yama thiye ‘Mariki,’ mahɛŋ mabɛina beŋ niyeta ba yaŋ bena tepe baŋ?
42006047	Wɔ yo wɔ wo see kiyaŋ do, e wundɛ yuyɛ thampa thakiyaŋ thaŋ, e wundɛ thɛŋ bɔha, yaŋ kɔŋ bena toŋine wo thɔyande iŋ wundɛ:
42006048	Wundɛ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wo ŋaye nde ba thoya banka. Wundɛ gbuse wusunŋɔy haaŋ wundɛ pɛnka kuthara. Kɛna tute wundɛ banka nama baŋ. Naa see mandi maŋ tɛnki, e mandi mabɛina si haŋɔ banka babɛina, mɛŋ tha beŋ punku ŋɛna, baa bɛŋ kiyo ka tha ka kahɛ.
42006049	Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ thampa thakiyaŋ thaŋ, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha thɛŋ putiyɔ, wundɛ thɔyandeŋ nɔŋ wo thoyɛ banka, wundɛ tha bɛŋ suŋuyɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ haaŋ wundɛ pɛnka kuthara. Naa see mandi maŋ tɛnki, e mandi maŋ haŋɔ banka babɛina, bɛŋ ŋɔti kɔɔ hanthe, awa ŋɔta hubɛina huŋ niyɔy ŋɔta hukasara bamandiŋ.”
42007001	Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ka biya beŋ, wundɛ key ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi.
42007002	Bayaha wunthe ka kurugbani bi ka biRomaŋ beŋ, bawali wokɛnama wo thimo wundɛ wumandiŋ woŋ see thoona wukahɛ-kahɛ ba tuka.
42007003	Naa yuye bayaha woŋ baŋ ba Yisɔs, wundɛ ŋindi bakalani bibayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ kɛndɛ yako ba ka thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na ba puyiyo bawali woŋ.
42007004	Naa key bakalani beŋ beŋ, bindɛ key theteke Yisɔs na wumandiŋ, e tepe Yisɔs na, na “Bayaha woŋ asisande ba kuta kumase ŋaye kɛnda,
42007005	babiyɛ wundɛ athimo biya ntuŋ beŋ, awa wundɛ thoyiye mina banka bathuŋuyande.”
42007006	Kɛna ŋaye Yisɔs. Wundɛ key iŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi bayaha woŋ beŋ. Naa thuriye Yisɔs banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, bayaha woŋ ŋindi binyathikɔŋ nama beŋ ba ka tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, ba nda niyɔkɔ thɔrɔ; yaŋ ka yando tɛŋɛ ba yi ba biyande ka banka bakiyaŋ baŋ.
42007007	Ba hintiŋ tɛpa, na yaŋ kɔŋ simɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ yando tɛŋɛ ba yina kutiyɔkɔ yethi. Niya hɔkɔŋ yamari ba bawali wokiyaŋ woŋ be pethɔ, awa wundɛ kɔŋ pethɔ.
42007008	Baa yaŋ, wɔ na yaŋ wo deŋo ka sɛmbɛ ka pothi, awa yaŋ hɛlɛŋ yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ kurugbani bi yama ka pothi. Yaŋ punkeŋ niya wunthe yamari, na ‘Kaa’ e wundɛ kaa; yaŋ punkeŋ niya yamari bawali wohɛna, na ‘Niya baŋ baŋ,’ awa e wundɛ bɛŋ niya!”
42007009	Naa yuye Yisɔs madunkunɔkɔy maŋ maŋ, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ thɛrɛnaŋ. Huna sikiyeke wundɛ e tepe sɛthɛ ba niŋ yeŋ baŋ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, yaŋ kuita hɛ nɔŋ wɔ niyɛ yama lanɛya nɔŋ woŋ, hali hintiŋ ka mateete ma ka biIsirɛli beŋ!”
42007010	Naa duu baseriŋ beŋ ka banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, bindɛ penke bawali wo ka bayaha woŋ wopethɔy nagbelebe.
42007011	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ key ka mɛti ba dɔma baŋ na ka Neni.
42007012	Ndɛ si nthɔŋ tɛŋ ka biyo hu ka mɛti baŋ haŋ, wundɛ pɛnkande iŋ biya bi si kati kubeli ku hati wathe wo ka bagbokora wo niŋ wunthe napethi, iŋ biya bibɔyɛ ŋaye ka mɛti ka.
42007013	Naa kute niŋ Mariki woŋ, wundɛ niyɔy niŋ nkinikiniŋ, huna tepe wundɛ niŋ, na “Ba bereŋ.”
42007014	Kɛna thuriye wundɛ, wundɛ boheke mgbansi kɔŋ. Kɛna kɔɔyɛ biya bi tutɔkɔy kɔŋ beŋ. Yisɔs tepe, na “Hati lamgba, yaŋ konde yina, ŋayi ka kɔɔ.”
42007015	Kubeli koŋ ŋaye; kuŋ dɔŋɔy. Wundɛ bohe gbonkiya. Kɛna sekithe niŋ Yisɔs; wundɛ dunkuŋ niŋ ka nandama.
42007016	Bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ, e thunkunuwa Masaala na, e tɛpa, na “Banabi womandiŋ tɛŋ! Masaala see ba saa ka kutiyɛ biya nama beŋ.”
42007017	Huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba ni Yisɔs baŋ gbanthande fooma ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ.
42007018	Naa tepo Yɔni iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba Yisɔs ni baŋ,
42007019	wundɛ thiyi biya biye ŋaye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, e ŋinda bindɛ ka Mariki woŋ ka iŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ, na “E yina nde yaŋ dɔŋ woŋ, wo bɔhɛ ba saa woŋ, maa miŋ ba dethiteke wohɛna gboŋa?”
42007020	Naa see baseriŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ ka Yisɔs, bindɛ see niŋ tepe, na “Yɔni wo biye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ ŋindi mina ba yina si thɔnthiŋina mɛnɛ yina wunthe wo nde wundɛ dɔŋ woŋ wo bɔhɛ ba saa woŋ, maa miŋ ba dethiteke wohɛna gboŋa?”
42007021	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina gbeeŋ Yisɔs puyi biya bibɔyɛ bi iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande, wundɛ kanthe mbayiŋ binɛnɔy, wundɛ pɛthi thaaya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ.
42007022	Kɛna tepe wundɛ baseriŋ bi ŋindi Yɔni beŋ, na “Kaaŋ kaŋ tepe Yɔni na ba thanki beŋ yuyɔkɔ e beŋ kutiyɔkɔ: bi mankɔy thaaya kute, bagbɛthɛŋ yathe, bi iŋ nthoonani kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ beŋ pethɔy, bi lɔŋɔi ŋaiha yuye, bitukɛ beŋ ŋayino ka thatuka thaŋ, Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ niyo kɛwandi ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ.
42007023	Wɔ thaduba na wo sa kikɔŋ ba yaŋ.”
42007024	Naa duu baseriŋ bi ŋindi Yɔni beŋ, Yisɔs bohe gbonkitiyande biya beŋ ba Yɔni. Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs biya beŋ, na “Naa key nde beŋ ka Yɔni ka ka wula ka, mbɛ mu key nde beŋ ka detha? E bompa bu huru haŋ yɛlande na thimo huŋ? Hali wuŋ ka nɛŋ.
42007025	Mbu mbɛ ntiŋ nda mu key nde beŋ ka detha? E wɔ wo iŋ mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy? Biya bi gbɛkitɔkɔy mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy iŋ bi ka hariyeke beŋ, ka bankɛŋ ba ka bananhuluiŋ beŋ baŋ kɛna bindɛ.
42007026	Kɛrɛ tepeŋ hɛ yama, mbɛ wɔ wo key nde beŋ ba ka detha ka wula ka? E banabi? Yaathi, banabi, kɛrɛ beŋ kute nde wu yamɛ ba banabi.
42007027	Baa Yɔni na gbonkiyiyo nde ka magbali maŋ iŋ Masaala ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ yenke ŋinda baseri wokiyaŋ woŋ ba yina ka pɛthiyɛ gboŋa baŋ.’ ”
42007028	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy, na “Yaathi, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, Yɔni yameŋ bukuya ba wɔ yo wɔ nɔŋ ka faido. Kɛrɛ wundɛ wo yamɛ thahuwɔ ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ, wundɛ yameŋ bukuya ba Yɔni.”
42007029	Naa yuye biya beŋ fooma iŋ bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ kɛwandi wo ka Yisɔs woŋ, bindɛ tepe ba dɔma na gboŋa ba ka Masaala baŋ ba kɔŋ nɔndi, baa bindɛ biyo iŋ Yɔni.
42007030	Kɛrɛ biFaresini beŋ ndo, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ ndo, bindɛ bina thanthiye madɛɛnki ma ka Masaala maŋ ba bindɛ, baa bindɛ baŋaŋ ba biyo iŋ Yɔni.
42007031	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy, na “Mbɛ mu nda yaŋ thɔyintande biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ ndee? Mbɛ mu thɔyande bindɛ?
42007032	Bindɛ athɔyande nthɔŋ nɔŋ mpati bi dɔŋɔy ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka, beŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ yɛli beŋ beŋ thampa, na ‘Miŋ haŋiye bena yakali ba ka mayehitɔkɔ, kɛrɛ beŋ tha kaŋ; miŋ soŋiye bena nthenkey, kɛrɛ beŋ tha bereŋ!’
42007033	Naa see nde Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, wundɛ thometa, wundɛ thiiyeta. Beŋ dome, na ‘Akutande ma iŋ wayi.’
42007034	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see hɛlɛŋ wo thiiye, wo thɔŋ. Beŋ dome hɛlɛŋ, na ‘Dethaŋ hati lamgba wo batiki, wo thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ, nyathiki wo ka bathuuni duthu iŋ bahakɛŋ.’
42007035	Kele hu ka Masaala haŋ gboŋa yo gboŋa tɔŋinɔkɔy ba huŋ niyɔ nɔndi ka bɛyiniŋ ba bi yɛrɔkɔy huŋ beŋ ni baŋ.”
42007036	WoFaresi wunthe thiyi Yisɔs na ba ka thɔma iŋ wundɛ. Kɛna key wundɛ ka banka ba ka woFaresi woŋ baŋ e bindɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka thɔma ka tha banthe.
42007037	Ka mɛti babɛina yɛrɛmɛ wo bahakɛ kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ. Naa yuye wundɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs thiyo ka thɔma ka banka ba ka woFaresi woŋ baŋ, kɛna sisi wundɛ bithira hu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ, hu yehinuwo maŋaye ka raka hu dɔma haŋ na alabasata, hu thiŋɛ iŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru.
42007038	Wundɛ si kooye Yisɔs na kuwaŋ ka ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ, e kɔ berina, e manɛɛni nama maŋ kɔ thɔninuwa ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ, awa e ŋɛŋ kɔ thithunuwe bɔɔyɛ nama buŋ, e ŋɛŋ kɔ dɔɔkɔ, e kɔ koŋe ŋɛŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru maŋ.
42007039	Naa kute woFaresi woŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ dome ka thukuma nama, na “Mɛnɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɔŋ nde banabi, wundɛ kɔŋ nde hakiyando wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, wo boheke niŋ woŋ nɔŋ na wundɛ. Baa wundɛ kɔŋ nde kɔthɔ ba dɔma na bahakɛ na wundɛ!”
42007040	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Saimɔŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ bɛyi ba yina tepe.” Huna tepe Saimɔŋ, na “Awa, karimɔkɔ, tɛpa; yaŋ poneŋ kuiha.”
42007041	Yisɔs tepe, na “Biya biye bi kɔŋ nde ba thunkuna wɔ wunthe dɔɔnthɔ. Wunthe woŋ kɔŋ ba thunkuna bɛrɛ ba liyoni kɛmɛŋ-bisɔhi, wo wuntheŋ woŋ bɛrɛ ba liyoni kɔnthɔ-kasɔhi.
42007042	Kɛrɛ na tha bindɛ punku ba thunkuna kɔbiri woŋ, wo biyɛ kɔbiri woŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ pɛniyɛ bena ti beŋ fooma.’ Ka tete, ka bi biye beŋ beŋ, mbɛ wo yaŋ thimo wumandiŋ hɛmɔŋ wo pɛniyɛ bindɛ dɔɔnthɔiŋ baŋ woŋ?”
42007043	Saimɔŋ tepe, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ siyi ba dɔma na wo peniyo dɔɔnthɔ bayamɛ baŋ woŋ na.” Yisɔs tepe, na “Yi tepe nɔndi.”
42007044	Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy ntiŋ ka woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ e tɛpa ka Saimɔŋ, na “Yi kuteŋ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ. Yaŋ see ka banka bakɛnda baŋ, kɛrɛ yi tha yama nkii mandi ba looka ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ looke ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ iŋ manɛɛni nama maŋ, e ndɛ ŋɛŋ thithinuwe iŋ bɔɔyɛ nama buŋ.
42007045	Yi tha yama dɔɔkɔ ka maana, kɛrɛ kabi na see hɛ yaŋ, wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ peyeta ba dɔɔkɔ ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ.
42007046	Yi tha yama koŋe mayɔ ka yaha niŋ haŋ ba yama maana, kɛrɛ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ koŋe ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru.
42007047	Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe, mathimo mamandiŋ ma tɔŋɔŋ wundɛ maŋ tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na hakɛŋ nama bimandiŋ thanki peyeno, kɛrɛ wɔ wo peniyo wuthahuwɔy kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ mathimo mathahuwɔy.”
42007048	Huna tepe Yisɔs ka wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Yi thanki peniyo hakɛŋ bikɛnda.”
42007049	Bihɛna bi doŋe wundɛ ka thɔma haŋ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ, na “Mbɛ wɔ woŋ, wo pɛniyɛ wɔ hakɛŋ nama?”
42007050	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Lanɛya bakɛnda baŋ kiyaŋ ni yina kisi maŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikɛnda beŋ. Kaa iŋ mathɛbɛ.”
42008001	Naa daŋande malɔkɔ manɔndi, Yisɔs kaande ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ mɛtiŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ, kaŋ kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ. Bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ yeme niŋ,
42008002	iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi bi kanthe wundɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande: Mariyama wo ka mɛti ba ka Makadala, wo kantho mbayiŋ bisɔŋ-biye,
42008003	Yoana wo yento iŋ Kusa wo nde bayaha ka banka ba ka Hɛrɔdi baŋ woŋ, iŋ Susana, iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ bibɔyɛ, bi nde mase Yisɔs na iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ŋaye ka mu iŋ bindɛ muŋ.
42008004	Naa bohe biya bibɔyɛ saa ka Yisɔs ŋaye ka mɛti makey ka mɛti, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ see kɔmande ka tha banthe; Yisɔs tepe bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ:
42008005	na “Malɔkɔ manthe bapayi wunthe na fuŋɛ nde ba kaa kaŋ paya paka nama. Naa wundɛ key kaŋ paya, banɔndi ŋɔti ka gboŋa baŋ. Bɛŋ see yathuwa, awa bɛtiŋ beŋ see hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ thuu.
42008006	Banɔndi baŋ ŋɔti ka kuthara koŋ. Naa bɔɔti bɛŋ, bɛŋ see thithi, babiyɛ bɛŋ ka iŋ mandi matɛŋɛ.
42008007	Banɔndi ŋɔti ka thaka haŋ. Naa see bɛŋ muku, bɛŋ mukutande iŋ thaka haŋ, awa thaka haŋ see bɛŋ pɔthitinande.
42008008	Banɔndi ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ. Bɛŋ see muku wuyɔhɔy, bɛŋ see fuŋuŋ humo huma kɛmɛ wunthe.” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Ponaŋ kuiha, yindo ba pona kuiha!”
42008009	Bakarandeni beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ kolo ba ka mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ?”
42008010	Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ dunkuno hɛɛra ba kɔthɔ gbundu ba ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, kɛrɛ ka biya bihɛna beŋ, yɔkɔŋ ka thabɔrɔ na bindɛ kothiye, ‘hali na amayaŋ thaaya nabanthuŋ, bindɛ sa kutu; hali na apoŋ kuiha, bindɛ sa metho.’
42008011	“Kolo ba ka mbɔrɔ ki ka bapayi woŋ kɔŋ baŋ bɛna baŋ baŋ:
42008012	Paka ba ŋɔtɛ ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ bɛna thɔyande iŋ bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ Sithani see. Wundɛ see fuŋuŋ thampa thabɛina ŋaye ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ, ba haliko na sa bindɛ niye lanɛya e niyo kisi.
42008013	Ba ŋɔtɛ ka kuthara koŋ baŋ bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ thɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, kɛrɛ thɛŋ tha thɔɔ wusunŋɔy ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ. Bindɛ ni hɔkɔŋ lanɛya ba malɔkɔ mathurɔy, kɛrɛ naa lɔkɔ ba kugbɛrɛŋɛŋ koŋ baŋ tɛŋ nthɔŋ, bindɛ ŋɔti.
42008014	Ba ŋɔtɛ ka thaka haŋ baŋ, bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ yaagbani beŋ ndo, dethuwa nanhulu baŋ haŋ ndo, wuthimɔy wu ka huwɔmɛtiya haŋ wuŋ ndo see niŋ thɔɔ ka thukuma, awa biya bibɛina sa punku fuŋuna munahaŋ.
42008015	Ba ŋɔtɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ baŋ, bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ huŋ putiyɔ, e bindɛ huŋ kɔsina ka thathukuma thakɛnamɛŋ, e niya kuthithi haaŋ e fuŋuna munahaŋ.
42008016	“Wɔ yo wɔ ka wo mɔɔli mumɔɔli ba muŋ pututa kuma, maa ba muŋ nɔra ka kuhinsi ka pothi, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ mɔɔli mumɔɔli ndɛ kɔŋ ba muŋ tuta ka thinthi, ba haliko wɔ yo wɔ wo biyande ka banka ka, ndɛ be kutu waŋ babɛina.
42008017	“Bɛyi na ka ba nunɔkɔy ba sa nɔŋ kuta nagberekethe; bɛyi na ka ba gbundu ba sa nɔŋ biya kɔthɔ, maa ba sa nɔŋ kiya ka waŋ.
42008018	“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ na beŋ yuye, baa wo iŋ wuyete, wundɛ na ndintiya, kɛrɛ wo ka iŋ wuyete woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ kanita hali wu simeke wundɛ wu iŋ wundɛ.”
42008019	Nanda ka Yisɔs iŋ mbɛndama see ka Yisɔs, kɛrɛ na biya beŋ bibɔyɛ, bindɛ tha niŋ punku thuriye.
42008020	Huna yele wɔ wunthe Yisɔs na thampa, na “Nanda iŋ mbɛnda bi kooyeŋ ka gbada ka ka yumba yina; bi thimoŋ ba yina kuta.”
42008021	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Biya beŋ beŋ, bindɛ bina binandaŋ iŋ mbɛndaŋ bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, e bindɛ thɛŋ putiyɔ.”
42008022	Ka lɔkɔ banthe Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ thɔɔyɛ ka gbe, huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Miŋ kaayɛŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ.” Kɛna fuŋ bindɛ ba kaa.
42008023	Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ key, Yisɔs bohe nine ka gbe baŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina huru humandiŋ see bindɛ pɛnki ka mankɔ maŋ. Kɛna bohe gbe baŋ thiŋo mandi, e bindɛ bɔha mula ka mandi maŋ.
42008024	Kɛna key bakarandeni beŋ ka Yisɔs ka e niŋ ka thɔhina, e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, karimɔkɔ, miŋ bohe muluto?” Kɛna ŋayinɔkɔy Yisɔs. Wundɛ pinde huru haŋ iŋ thamunkulu thabukuyuwɛ thaŋ, na “Thɛbaŋ,” kɛna thebe muŋ nayeŋ.
42008025	Huna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbɛ ba sa beŋ niye lanɛya?” Kɛrɛ bindɛ fooma ni kukabanɛ ka payɔ ka tete, e tɛpiyande, na “Mbɛ woŋ, wo ni yamari huru haŋ woŋ iŋ thamunkulu thaŋ, e thɛŋ niŋ putiyɔ?”
42008026	Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ thuhande mankɔ maŋ e kaa ka bompi wo ka Kɛrasa ba dethande iŋ ka Kalili baŋ.
42008027	Naa fuŋ nthɔŋ Yisɔs ka gbe baŋ, kɛna see niŋ hati lamgba wo boho iŋ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy pɛnki ŋaye ka thayoma ka. Wundɛ thooyeta nɔŋ nda yaba. Wundɛ ka nɔŋ nda ka banka nama, yikiya bakɛnama nɔŋ nda ka thayoma ka.
42008028	Naa kute wundɛ Yisɔs na, wundɛ bereŋ wutɔɔkɛ, e hɔrande ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs, e yɛla thampa, na “Yisɔs, yindo Hati ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, mbɛ ba thimo yi yama ba niye? Yaŋ theteke yina. Ba yama gbasaŋati!”
42008029	Wundɛgbonkoynɛŋ baa Yisɔs ni wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ yamari ba fuŋa kɛnama. Timo tima nde, hali na adeŋitoko na wundɛ e thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ loŋo yɔlɔnkɔiŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ muŋ thenki, e wundɛ thiyo ka wula ka iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ.
42008030	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ keŋ nda?” Huna dome wundɛ, na “Keŋ niŋ kuna dɔma Sɛthɛ,” baa wundɛ kɔŋ iŋ mbayiŋ bibɔyɛ bihɛna.
42008031	Mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ theteke Yisɔs na ba wundɛ be tha bindɛ yɛli ka tha ka tha kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ mankande kɛ.
42008032	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina kɔsɛŋ bitɔlɔy bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ thɛri ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ. Kɛna theteke mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ Yisɔs na ba ndɛ bindɛ dunkune hɛɛra ba ka thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ. Yisɔs yɛrɔkɔy.
42008033	Mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fuŋ ka hati lamgba woŋ. Bindɛ key thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ. Kɔsɛŋ beŋ thare fooma. Bindɛ key yɛlɔkɔ ka kudunku ku ka mankɔ maŋ koŋ, kɛna tuukuwe bindɛ fooma.
42008034	Naa kute batɔliŋ kɔsɛŋ beŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ key kaŋ thara e kaa kaŋ pankitinuwande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka mɛti ka iŋ ka dumgbuiŋ baŋ fooma.
42008035	Biya bibɔyɛ key ba ka kuta ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ. Naa see bindɛ pɛnki Yisɔs na, iŋ hati lamgba wo kanthe wundɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ woŋ doŋe ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs wo thɔɔyɛ nda munki nama, wo kele nda nagberere, bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ.
42008036	Biya bi kutiyɔkɔy beŋ tepe biya bihɛna nɔŋ na puyo hati lamgba woŋ baŋ wo boho nde iŋ mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ.
42008037	Bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ. Huna biyɛ biya beŋ fooma ŋaye ka bompi wobɛina ka tepe Yisɔs na ba wundɛ kɛndɛ fuŋa. Huna thooye Yisɔs ka gbe e wundɛ fuŋa kɛndɛ.
42008038	Kɛrɛ saanuŋ Yisɔs ba fuŋa, hati lamgba wo kanthe ndɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ woŋ theteke Yisɔs na ba diŋo ka kaa. Kɛrɛ Yisɔs duutu niŋ e tepe niŋ,
42008039	na “Kaa ka madoŋe makɛnda e yi ka tepe biya beŋ fooma ba niyiyɛ yina Masaala baŋ.” Hati lamgba woŋ duu kaŋ tɛpuwa ka mɛtiŋ baŋ fooma ba niyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs baŋ.
42008040	Naa duu Yisɔs ka thuhaŋ ka, biya beŋ yɛritɔy niŋ wumandiŋ, baa bi nde nda niŋ yumbu.
42008041	Kɛna see wɔ wunthe wo dɔma na Yairɔsi, wo nde bakɛrɛŋ wo ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ, e ŋɔta ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ e theteke niŋ ba ndɛ be key ka banka nama ka.
42008042	Hati nama woyɛrɛmɛ wo bɛrɛ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye, wo thankɛ niŋ nape, wundɛ ŋoyeŋ ba tuka. Naa Yisɔs key, biya beŋ pɛnkande niŋ kufɛŋ ndo kufɛŋ, e bindɛ niŋ kɔ nɔthita.
42008043	Ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo nde iŋ nthoonaŋ ki ka yɛrɛmɛŋ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye. Wɔ ka wo punkɛ ba niŋ puya.
42008044	Kɛna see wundɛ kaŋ funkande biya beŋ. Wundɛ kɔɔyɛ mahɛŋ ma Yisɔs e wundɛ boheke kulɛmpi-lɛmpi ku ka yaba nama baŋ koŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina wasi baŋ pɛyi niŋ fuŋa haŋ.
42008045	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs, na “Nkaana boheke yaba niŋ baŋ?” Wɔ yo wɔ thanthiye, huna tepe Pita, na “Karimɔkɔ, biya beŋ fooma yina pɛnkande e bindɛ yina kɔ nɔthita.”
42008046	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Wɔ boheke yama, baa yaŋ kutɔkɔy wuŋ naa fuŋ yama sɛmbɛ.”
42008047	Naa kute hati yɛrɛmɛ woŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ kothiyo, wundɛ see kaŋ thɛna e si ŋɔta ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs. Kɛna gbonkoy wundɛ ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka biya fooma mu dɔmɛ haaŋ wundɛ boheke Yisɔs na, iŋ nɔŋ na pethiye wundɛ kɔɔ hanthe.
42008048	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, lanɛya bakɛnda petheŋ yina; kaa iŋ mathɛbɛ.”
42008049	Saanuŋ wundɛ ba thanka gbonkiya, baseri tɛŋ ŋaye ka banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, ba dɔma, na “Hati nda woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ tuku; ba nda ni karimɔkɔ na thɔrɔ.”
42008050	Kɛrɛ naa yuye huŋ Yisɔs, wundɛ tepe Yairɔsi na, na “Ba payɔ; niya nthuŋ lanɛya, awa hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.”
42008051	Naa biyande Yisɔs ka banka ba ka Yairɔsi baŋ, wundɛ tha mɛyi ba wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna biyande iŋ wundɛ, yɔkɔŋ Pita, Yɔni, Yemisi, iŋ fanda ka hati woŋ mɛnɛ nanda ka hati woŋ.
42008052	Wɔ yo wɔ abereŋ, aboki ba hati woŋ, huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Baŋ bereŋ, hati woŋ tuketa; nine huna hɔkɔŋ wundɛ nine!”
42008053	Biya beŋ fooma ahɛthi Yisɔs na, baa bindɛ fooma kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hati woŋ tuku hɛ nda wuthɔɔkitɛ.
42008054	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs bohe niŋ kugbeke; wundɛ yentheŋeŋ niŋ, e thiya niŋ wuŋatɛ, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, ŋayi ka kɔɔ!”
42008055	Kɛna duu yina wokɛnama woŋ e hɛma, e ŋayi ka kɔɔ kɔɔ hanthe. Yisɔs tepe bindɛ ba bindɛ niŋ dunkune muthɔma.
42008056	Komisɛŋ beŋ ni kukabanɛ, kɛrɛ Yisɔs yeli bindɛ ba bi be tha huŋ tepe wɔ ba bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy baŋ.
42009001	Kɛna thiyi Yisɔs bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ ka tha banthe e dunkune bindɛ sɛmbɛ iŋ mayoho ba kantha mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma iŋ ba puya nthoonani kihakuwande.
42009002	Kɛna ŋindi wundɛ bindɛ ba kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ iŋ ba puya bithoonuwɔy beŋ.
42009003	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ key biyasi haŋ haŋ na, baŋ diŋ ntha yo ntha ka kaa; baŋ diŋ kugbɔkɔdi maa pontho, muthɔma maa kɔbiri, maa yabɛŋ baye.
42009004	Ka beŋ yeroko kɛ, niyɔŋ ka banka babɛina haaŋ e beŋ nɔŋ pɛyɛna mɛti babɛina.
42009005	Kamo kama ka sa beŋ yeroko, fuŋaŋ ka mɛti babɛina e beŋ konka kuligbi koŋ ka ŋathaki ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ haliko wu be niyɔ kuyeli ka biya bibɛina ba dɔma na bindɛ tha yɛrɔkɔ huseri haŋ.”
42009006	Naa thanki wundɛ bindɛ yela, bakarandeni beŋ fuŋ. Bindɛ key kaŋ kaande ka mɛtiŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ e kaa kaŋ niya Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ kɛwandi e kaa kaŋ puya biya kamo kama ka bindɛ kaaye.
42009007	Naa yuye Hɛrɔdi, bakɛrɛŋ wo nde ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ, bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy baŋ, wundɛ see thooyo yaayi bamandiŋ, baa hiŋ biya binɔndi bi si tɛpi ba dɔma na Yɔni wo nde biye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ na ŋaye hɛlɛŋ ka tuka haŋ.
42009008	Binɔndi bi kɔŋ nɛnɛ tɛpi na Ilaiya banabi woŋ na tɔŋinɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ. Kɛrɛ binɔndi nɛnɛ na wunthe ka banabiŋ bi nde wutiyɔ beŋ na ŋaye hɛlɛŋ ka tuka haŋ.
42009009	Huna tepe Hɛrɔdi, na “Yaŋ ni nde ba yaha hu ka Yɔni haŋ thoŋo, kɛrɛ mbɛ hɛlɛŋ wɔ bɛina woŋ, wo yaŋ yuyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ woŋ?” Hɛrɔdi bohe thuŋ deethuwa gboŋɛŋ ba wundɛ kute Yisɔs na.
42009010	Naa duu bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ see toŋe Yisɔs na kuna ba thanki bindɛ ka niya. Kɛna sekithe wundɛ bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ e kaa iŋ bindɛ kufɛŋ ku ka mɛti ba dɔma na Bɛthɛseda.
42009011	Naa see huŋ biya beŋ kɔthɔ, bindɛ yeme niŋ kɛndɛ. Wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy bindɛ e bindɛ gbonkitiyande ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ e wundɛ puya bithoonuwɔy beŋ.
42009012	Naa bohe kaŋ woŋ ba thɔɔ, bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ see niŋ tepe, na “Pɛyɛna nda biya beŋ bi be key ka mɛtiŋ batɔpɛ baŋ iŋ ka dumgbuiŋ baŋ ba ka deethuwa yikiyani iŋ muthɔma, baa dutha duyɔthiŋɔy duna miŋ do.”
42009013	Kɛrɛ huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Awa beŋ dunkune bindɛ muthɔma.” Huna tepe bakarandeni beŋ, na “Miŋ ka iŋ wuyamɛ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi iŋ heni biye. E yi thimoŋ ba miŋ be key, e miŋ ka boya muthɔma ba biya beŋ beŋ fooma?”
42009014	Ba biyɛthɛŋ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bɛrɛ ba wuluiŋ bisɔhi. Huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ ba biya beŋ dɔŋɔ kikɔŋ-kikɔŋ, kiki yo kiki biya kɔnthɔ-kasɔhi.”
42009015	Bakarandeni beŋ ni nɛŋ e niya ba biya beŋ fooma dɔŋɔ.
42009016	Kɛna sekithe Yisɔs ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ iŋ heni biye beŋ e ŋatina thaaya ka ariana e muŋ thiyiyɛ thaduba, e muŋ thinkinuwande e dunkuna muŋ ka bakarandeni beŋ ba bindɛ be kiyɛ biya beŋ.
42009017	Kɛna thɔŋ biya beŋ haaŋ bindɛ thimbɔ. Bakarandeni beŋ thunkunuwande mupɛyɛ muŋ, bɛrɛ ba thadebe kɔhi iŋ thaye thɛna pɛyɛ.
42009018	Ka lɔkɔ banthe naa nde Yisɔs ni kuraminɛ ndɛ wuntheŋ, e bakarandeni nama beŋ niŋ pɛnkande, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbɛ wo biya beŋ dɔŋ wo yaŋ?”
42009019	Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Binɔndi bi kɔŋ dɔŋ na yina Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, kɛrɛ binɔndi na Ilaiya, binɔndi na wunthe ka banabiŋ bitiyɔ beŋ na ŋaye ka tuka haŋ.”
42009020	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Kɛrɛ mbu beŋ, nama dome beŋ ba yaŋ?” Pita tepe, na “Yina Banikisi woŋ wo ni nde Masaala lahiri woŋ.”
42009021	Kɛna yeli Yisɔs bindɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ, ba bi be tha huŋ tepe wɔ yo wɔ.
42009022	Wundɛ tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ, na “Yɔkɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyɔy thɔrɔ wumandiŋ, e wundɛ thanthiyo iŋ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ kɔra, kɛrɛ ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ wundɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋayi iŋ sii.”
42009023	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ fooma, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ thimoŋ ba yama yema, yɔkɔŋ wundɛ be thanthiye yɛthɛ nama, e wundɛ yinthɔkɔ kuyeŋ nama kubariŋande ku ka nambara baŋ koŋ timo tima, e yema yama.
42009024	Ba wɔ yo wɔ wo thimo ba niya sii nama baŋ kisi, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ; kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ ni kisi.
42009025	Mɛnɛ wɔmɛti kute munkɔŋ mu ka faido fooma, kɛrɛ wundɛ piriŋina sii nama baŋ, mbɛ munahaŋ ba kute wundɛ? Hali, wundɛ tha kutu munahaŋ ndo munahaŋ!
42009026	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ niyɔy yama kuyaahu iŋ mathanani makiyaŋ maŋ, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ti nɔŋ wundɛ see ka yiki nama baŋ iŋ ba ka Fandama woŋ baŋ iŋ ba ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ baŋ.
42009027	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nagberekethe ba dɔma na binɔndi bi kooyeŋ dondo bi sa tuku, yɔkɔŋ na bindɛ kutiyɔkɔy Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
42009028	Bɛrɛ ba hura kasɔŋ-kaye naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ thiyi Pita na, Yɔni, iŋ Yemisi. Bindɛ key dunkɔ ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi ba niya kuraminɛ.
42009029	Naa wundɛ ni kuraminɛ, yethi nama haŋ see thikipi, awa muthɔɔ nama muŋ huhu napooŋ e muŋ kɔ maleke.
42009030	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina biya biye see niŋ kɔɔ ka gbonkitiyande, wunthe kɔŋ dɔma na Musa, wunthe woŋ na Ilaiya.
42009031	Bindɛ see niŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ iŋ yiki ba ka ariana baŋ, e kɔ gbonkiya iŋ Yisɔs ba gboŋa ba bohe Yisɔs ba si thiŋine lahiri ba ka Masaala baŋ, ba si tuka ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42009032	Pita iŋ bintɔni nama thanki thɔɔ ka mandɛ, kɛrɛ naa thɔhɔy bindɛ, bindɛ kute yiki ba ka Yisɔs baŋ iŋ biya bibiye bi kɔɔyɛ iŋ wundɛ beŋ.
42009033	Naa bohe biya beŋ ba pɛyɛna Yisɔs na, Pita tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, ayɔhɔ ba miŋ niyɔ nda dondo. E miŋ kiyɛŋ bankɛŋ bataati bathikɛŋ, banthe ba yi, banthe ba Musa, banthe ba Ilaiya?” Kɛrɛ Pita methota nde ba wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy.
42009034	Naa wundɛ gbonkoy, kɛna see wuruma, awa e bindɛ pututiyo iŋ niŋ hubɛina. Bakarandeni beŋ thooyo payɔ naa see bindɛ pututiyo iŋ wuruma haŋ.
42009035	Kɛna fuŋ thampa maŋaye ka wuruma haŋ tha tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Woŋ baŋ wundɛ na Hati wokiyaŋ woŋ, wo thanki yaŋ yɛtha woŋ, huna poniyaŋ niŋ kuiha.”
42009036	Naa thanki thampa thaŋ gbonkiya, bindɛ tha nda kutu wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna yɔkɔŋ Yisɔs. Bakarandeni bitaati beŋ danɔkɔi nayeŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki bindɛ kuta baŋ, awa bindɛ tha bɛŋ tɛpi ka wɔ yo wɔ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
42009037	Ka gbɛɛŋ babantheŋ baŋ Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni bitaati beŋ thuhe ŋaye ka kusɛri koŋ, kɛna see bindɛ pɛnki sɛthɛ bamandiŋ iŋ bakarandeni bi pɛyɛ hɛ beŋ. Biya beŋ beŋ fooma penke Yisɔs na.
42009038	Ŋaye mateete ka sɛthɛ baŋ hati lamgba wunthe tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ theteke yina, detha hatiŋ wowathe wo thankɛ yama woŋ nape.
42009039	Wayi wonɛnɔy na niŋ kɔ bohi. Wundɛ kɔŋ bereŋ wutɔɔkɛ. Wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ kɔŋ niŋ kahitinuwande e kuhɛ niŋ kɔ fuŋa ka hothi. Wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ ni wuthoonɛ haaŋ wundɛ sa niŋ pɛyɛŋ yako.
42009040	Yaŋ theteke bakarandeni nda beŋ ba yama niŋ kaninande iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha punku.”
42009041	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka iŋ kulanɛya beŋ, tima thɔkɔti nɔŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ? Tima nambe nda wuŋ ti thɔkɔti nda yaŋ bena kɔ niya muyuŋ?” Kɛna tepe Yisɔs hati lamgba woŋ, na “Sisa hɛ hati nda woŋ dondo.”
42009042	Naa hati woŋ see, wayi woŋ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Wundɛ toŋe niŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ, e wundɛ ka thutha kuhɛ. Kɛna ni Yisɔs wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ yamari ba pɛyɛna hati woŋ; kɛna pɛyɛŋ wayi woŋ hati woŋ. Hati woŋ pethɔy. Yisɔs sekithe hati woŋ; wundɛ dunkuŋ niŋ ka fandama.
42009043	Biya beŋ fooma ni kukabanɛ ba wali basɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa biya beŋ ni thakaba ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki Yisɔs niya baŋ, wundɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ,
42009044	na “Thampɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ tha thɔɔiŋ wusunŋɔy ka thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ, ba dɔma na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biyamɛti.”
42009045	Kɛrɛ bɛyiniŋ ba gbonkoy Yisɔs baŋ baŋ tha bindɛ methe, babiyɛ bɛyiniŋ bɛna ba nununɔi ŋaye kɛnamɛŋ, ba dɔma na bindɛ sa bɛŋ metho, awa bindɛ hɛlɛŋ bi nde payɔ ba thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki wundɛ gbonkiya baŋ.
42009046	Kugbakali see thɔɔ mateete makɛnamɛŋ ba wo yamɛ niyɔ womandiŋ.
42009047	Kɛrɛ naa see Yisɔs kɔthɔ hu siyuwe bindɛ ka thathukuma thakɛnamɛŋ thaŋ, wundɛ sekithe hati woyete, e wundɛ niŋ kiteke,
42009048	e tɛpa kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy hati woŋ baŋ ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy yama. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy yama, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ. Mba wo yamɛ thahuwɔ woŋ ka mateete makendeŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, wundɛ na yamɛ nthɔŋ nda ba beŋ fooma.”
42009049	Yɔni tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kute wɔ si kanthi mbayiŋ binɛnɔy ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ, awa miŋ pinde niŋ, baa wundɛ ka wunthe ka mindo bakarandeni nda beŋ.”
42009050	Yisɔs tepe, na “Baŋ niŋ pindi, baa wɔ wo tha kɔɔ ba bena sɔkinɔkɔ, wundɛ kɔŋ ba beŋ.”
42009051	Naa kunthu malɔkɔ ma wundɛ ba ŋate ka thinthi maŋ, wundɛ sekithe gboŋa toloŋ ba kaa ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42009052	Wundɛ kɔɔtɔŋ baseriŋ ka mɛti banthe bayete ba ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sameriya ba ka tepe biya beŋ ba kɔsiniyɔkɔ niŋ yikiya.
42009053	Kɛrɛ biya beŋ kɛndɛ tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ, baa wukothiyo wuna nda nagberekethe ba dɔma na wundɛ kooyeŋ gboŋa ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42009054	Naa kute wuŋ bakarandeni beŋ Yemisi iŋ Yɔni, bindɛ tepe, na “Mariki, e yi thimoŋ ba miŋ thiya buu ŋaye ka ariana ba si tɔɔnuwa biya beŋ beŋ?”
42009055	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy; wundɛ pinde bindɛ.
42009056	Kɛna ŋaye bindɛ; bindɛ key ka mɛti bahɛna.
42009057	Naa bindɛ key, wɔ see tepe Yisɔs na, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina yeŋ kamo kama ka yi key.”
42009058	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Bayɔbɔini beŋ bi kɔŋ iŋ yikiyani; bɛtiŋ bi keŋɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ iŋ thahooti ka bindɛ hure; kɛrɛ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka hintiŋ nthɔŋ iŋ ka wundɛ taaye yaha nama haŋ.”
42009059	Kɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs ka wɔ wunthe, na “Yema yama.” Kɛrɛ wundɛ tepe, na “Mariki, yaŋ kaayɛŋ hintiŋ, yaŋ be ka manki fandaŋ na.”
42009060	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Pɛyɛna bitukɛ beŋ bi be manki bitukɛ beŋ. Yi kɔŋ ba kaa e niya kɛwandi ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
42009061	Wɔ hɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ, na “Mariki, yaŋ kɔŋ yina yeŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kaayɛŋ hintiŋ yaŋ be ka sankaŋ biyaŋ bi ka banka bakiyaŋ baŋ beŋ.”
42009062	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo bohi kusala koŋ ba thɛɛluwa haŋ e wundɛ kɔ detha mahɛŋ, wundɛ sisandeta ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
42010001	Naa daŋande wuŋ, Mariki woŋ Yisɔs yɛthi biya kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kaye iŋ biye, e bindɛ kɔɔtina ka biye-biye ka mɛtiŋ baŋ iŋ ka bohe wundɛ ba kaande kɛ fooma.
42010002	Kɛna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Ŋɔna haŋ abɔyi, kɛrɛ baŋɔni beŋ boyeta; niyaŋ kuraminɛ ba wobiyɛ yiya haŋ woŋ be ŋindi baŋɔni ka ŋɔna nama haŋ.
42010003	Kaaŋ! Dethaŋ, yaŋ ŋindi bena nɔŋ takɛŋ ka mateete ma ka yaŋɛŋ beŋ.
42010004	Baŋ diŋ pontho ba thiye kɔbiri, maa pontho, maa dagbalɛŋ. Baŋ kɔɔ wunambɛ ba maanuwa biya ka gboŋa.
42010005	Naa beŋ biyande banka, dɔmaŋ, na ‘Haliko Masaala thiya mathɛbɛ ka banka baŋ baŋ.’
42010006	Mɛnɛ wɔ kɛndɛ wo kɔsinɔkɔy ba kuta mathɛbɛ, mathɛbɛ makendeŋ maŋ mɛ kɔŋ kɛndɛ pɛyɔ; mɛnɛ wuŋ ka nɛŋ, mɛ kɔŋ duu hɛlɛŋ kendeŋ.
42010007	Dɔŋɔŋ kɛndɛ e beŋ kɔ thɔma e beŋ kɔ thiiye ntha yo ntha ki bindɛ bena kɛndɛ dunkune. Bawali woŋ kɔŋ ba kuta kuthunkuŋ ŋaye ka wali ba wundɛ ni baŋ. Baŋ key kaŋ pɛnkande ŋaye ka banka ba kaa ka banka.
42010008	Naa beŋ tɛŋ ka mɛti e beŋ kɛndɛ yeroko, thɔmaŋ ntha yo ntha ki beŋ dunkuno.
42010009	Puyaŋ kɛndɛ biya bithoonuwɔy beŋ e beŋ bindɛ tepe, na ‘Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye bena.’
42010010	Kɛrɛ mɛti yo mɛti ba beŋ key beŋ thana yeroko, fuŋaŋ ka gboŋɛŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ e beŋ bindɛ tepe,
42010011	na, ‘Kuligbi ku ka mɛti bakendeŋ baŋ, ku kahitɛ ka dagbalɛŋ ntuŋ baŋ koŋ, miŋ kɔŋ kuŋ konki ba ku be niyɔ maseri ba bena sɔkinɔkɔ. Kɛrɛ simɔkɔŋ nde, Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thanki thuriye bena narɔthɔ.’ ”
42010012	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, na ka malɔkɔ ma ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ maŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ nkinikiniŋ mɛti ba ka Sɔdɔmi ayaŋ ba mɛti baŋ baŋ!
42010013	“Nambara ka kuwaŋ kukendeŋ, bendo biKoresiŋ iŋ biBɛthɛseda, baa mɛnɛ wali bathakaba ba niyo kendeŋ do baŋ na bɛna niyo nde ka Taya iŋ ka Saidɔŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ thɔɔyɛ nde nɔŋ nda yabɛŋ babɛkɔŋ e puyinɔkɔ hɔɔtɔ ba tɔŋina ba dɔma na bindɛ kutɔkɔy mathonko e sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka banɛnɔy bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ.
42010014	Ka malɔkɔ ma ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ maŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ biTaya iŋ biSaidɔŋ nkinikiniŋ wuŋ yama ba beŋ.
42010015	Awa beŋ, bendo biKapaniyɔmi, e beŋ kɔŋ ba yenthiŋina yɛthɛ bakendeŋ ka thinthi ka ariana? Beŋ kɔŋ thathina ka pothi ka yahanama!”
42010016	Yisɔs tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo bena yɛrɔkɔ, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy yama; awa wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo bena baŋaŋ, yama baŋaŋ wundɛ. Wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo yama baŋaŋ, wundɛ baŋaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.”
42010017	Bakarandeni kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kaye beŋ iŋ biye duu ŋaye biyasi haŋ iŋ thathukuma thayɔhɔy. Bindɛ tepe, na “Mariki, naa key miŋ, ŋaye ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ, hali mbayiŋ beŋ gbeeŋ aputiyɔ mina.”
42010018	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Hiŋ yando nde dethi, yaŋ kute naa ŋɔti Sithani nɔŋ kuwalani ŋaye ka ariana.
42010019	Dethaŋ, yaŋ dunkune bena sɛmbɛ ka thinthi ka Hadeŋ woŋ, iŋ ba yaathuwa bikɛkɛni iŋ dempuiŋ fooma, awa ntha yo ntha sa bena punku niya muthoonɛ.
42010020	Kɛrɛ halisa, baŋ hɔkɔŋ yehitɔkɔ ba wuŋ nagbɛti, ba dɔma na mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ putiyɔy bena. Kɛrɛ yehitɔkɔŋ ba kɔthɔ ba dɔma na ŋakeŋ ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ gbalo ka ariana.”
42010021	Ka wakathi wobɛina gbeeŋ, Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ thiŋiŋ Yisɔs na iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, e Yisɔs tɛpa, na “Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo Fandaŋ woŋ, Mariki wo ka ariana woŋ, iŋ ka faido, ba dɔma na yi nunuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka bikele beŋ, iŋ bikɔthɛ beŋ, kɛrɛ e yi bɛŋ toŋine malɛɛthɛŋ. Fandaŋ woŋ, yi ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma nɔŋ na thimo yi bɛŋ ba bɛŋ niyɔ.”
42010022	Yisɔs tepe biya beŋ, na “Fandaŋ woŋ thanki yama dunkune ntha yo ntha. Wɔ yo wɔ ka wo kɔthɛ nɔŋ na Hati woŋ, yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ; maa wo kɔthɛ Fandaŋ woŋ yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ Hati woŋ mɛnɛ wo Hati woŋ yɛthi ba niŋ toŋine Fandama woŋ.”
42010023	Huna sikiyeke wundɛ ka bakarandeni beŋ naa pɛyɛ bindɛ bindɛ bintheŋ, e tɛpa, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ba biya bi kutɛ bɛyiniŋ ba thanki beŋ kuta baŋ.
42010024	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, banabiŋ bibɔyɛ iŋ gbakuiŋ bibɔyɛ bi thimoŋ nde nɔŋ ba kuta bɛyiniŋ ba beŋ kutu baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ punku kuta; awa bi thimoŋ nde nɔŋ ba yuyɛ ba beŋ yuyɛ baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ punku yuyɛ.”
42010025	Karimɔkɔ wunthe wo ka Siraŋ baŋ woŋ see ba saa ka gbɛriŋina Yisɔs na, e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, mbɛ ba yaŋ ni gbeeŋ ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy?”
42010026	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba gbalo ka Siraŋ baŋ? Mbɛ ba ni yi kɛndɛ karaŋ?”
42010027	Karimɔkɔ woŋ tepe, na “Yi kɔŋ ba thimo Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ iŋ thukuma hukɛnda haŋ fooma, iŋ sii bakɛnda baŋ fooma, iŋ sɛmbɛ bakɛnda baŋ fooma, iŋ masiyi makɛnda maŋ fooma; awa yi kɔŋ ba thimo ntɔ nda na nɔŋ na thimo yi yɛthɛ bakɛnda.”
42010028	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yi gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy. Niya nɔŋ na gbonkiye yi na, awa yi kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔi o kɔi.”
42010029	Kɛrɛ karimɔkɔ woŋ thimoŋ ba kanɔkɔ kuyaahu, huna thonthiŋine wundɛ Yisɔs na, na “Nkaana ntɔŋ?”
42010030	Huna tepe Yisɔs mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde thathi ŋaye ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba kaa ka Yɛriko. Kɛna see wundɛ ŋooto iŋ batuwani ka gboŋa. Bindɛ kanite niŋ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ; bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ haaŋ; bindɛ niŋ pɛya ŋoye wo ba tuka.
42010031	Wuŋ see pɛnkande bafode wunthe kɔ fuŋe gboŋa babɛina. Naa kute wundɛ niŋ wundɛ ŋoye, wundɛ gbɔrɔŋ gboŋa bahɛna.
42010032	Nɛna ni hɛlɛŋ wɔ wunthe wo ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Libay baŋ ba nde iŋ wali ba ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa kute wundɛ hati lamgba woŋ ŋoye, wundɛ gbɔrɔŋ hɛlɛŋ gboŋa bahɛna.
42010033	Kɛrɛ hati lamgba wothahinɛ napooŋ woSameriya wo ka kubiyasi nama, naa see wundɛ tɛŋ ka ŋoye hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɛ e niŋ kuta, nkinikiniŋ bohe niŋ.
42010034	Kɛna thuriye wundɛ niŋ. Wundɛ thiye mayɔ mɛnɛ mampa nɔŋ tɛɛni ka mathimɔyŋ maŋ. Wundɛ yuuku mɛŋ wuyɔhɔy e niŋ sɛkitha e tuta niŋ ka maama wo niŋ katitɔkɔ woŋ, e niŋ ka niya yikiya, e niŋ dethiteke wuyɔhɔy.
42010035	Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, wundɛ fuŋuŋ kɔbiri wonɔndi, e wundɛ dunkune wo niyɛ niŋ yikiya woŋ e tɛpa, na ‘Ya niŋ; dethiteke niŋ wuyɔhɔy. Timo tima ti yi thiyi ba wundɛ, naa yaŋ see, yaŋ kɔŋ yina si thunkuŋ.’ ”
42010036	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs karimɔkɔ woŋ, na “Ka biya bitaati beŋ beŋ, nkaana yi simɔkɔ wo tɔŋinɛ huntɔndiya huyɔhɔy ka hati lamgba wo ŋɔtɛ ka mateete ma ka batuwani beŋ maŋ woŋ?”
42010037	Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Wo kutiyɛ niŋ nkinikiniŋ woŋ na.” Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Awa, kaa, e yi nɛŋ ka niya.”
42010038	Naa Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ key kubiyasi namɛŋ koŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy, wundɛ key tɛŋ ka mɛti banthe. Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo dɔma na Matha yɛrɔkɔy niŋ ka banka nama baŋ.
42010039	Awa Matha kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ iŋ wɛndama woyɛrɛmɛ wunthe wo dɔma na Mariyama wo dɔŋɔy ka pothi ka Yisɔs, e kɔ poniyɛ mathanani nama maŋ kuiha.
42010040	Kɛrɛ na thanki Matha kaho wali baŋ, wundɛ key tepe Yisɔs na, na “Mariki, e yi wuŋ ka yina bɛyi ba yama wɛndaŋ peyene wali baŋ yaŋ wuntheŋ? Tepe niŋ ba yama mase.”
42010041	Kɛrɛ Mariki woŋ tepe niŋ, na “Matha, Matha, yi ni yaagba haaŋ e bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ yina kɔ niya thɔrɔ ka thukuma.
42010042	Kɛrɛ bɛyi banthe bɛna bakolo baŋ; Mariyama thanki yɛtha kufɛŋ kukolo koŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, ku sa wundɛ punku ba kanito iŋ wɔ yo wɔ koŋ.”
42011001	Lɔkɔ banthe, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde ni kuraminɛ ka tha banthe. Naa thanki wundɛ niya kuraminɛ, wunthe ka bakarandeni nama beŋ tepe kɛnama, na “Mariki, thaninuwa mina na na niye kuraminɛ nɔŋ na thanani Yɔni bakarandeni nama beŋ na.”
42011002	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Naa beŋ kɔ ni kuraminɛ, tɛpaŋ, na ‘Fanda ntuŋ woŋ, haliko biya niya yiki keŋ nda koŋ. Haliko malɔkɔ ma saa ma Hugbakine nda haŋ maŋ keriŋe.
42011003	Nkaa mina timo tima muthɔŋ ntuŋ.
42011004	Pɛniyɛ mina hakɛŋ bikɛntuŋ baa miŋ pɛniyɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo mina ni wunɛnɔy. Ba mina kati ka miŋ ka gbɛriŋinuwo.’ ”
42011005	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy na wunthe ka beŋ key ka banka ba ka nyathiki nama huyɛ teete, e niŋ ka tepe, na ‘Nyathiki, mase yama ba muthɔma.
42011006	Ntɔŋ wo key biyasi na pɛnkɛ yama huyɛ baŋ baŋ ka banka niŋ ka, awa yaŋ ka iŋ muthɔma kɛndɛ’?
42011007	Nyathiki nda mɛyi kaake ba dɔma, na ‘Ba yama ni thɔrɔ. Yaŋ lɔŋ nda biyo haŋ, awa yaŋ ŋɔyɛ nda iŋ mpatiŋ. Yaŋ sa nda punku ŋayi ba yina dunkune ntha o ntha.’
42011008	Mbɛ mu nda niyɔ? Hali na niyɔy wuŋ na na wundɛ tha ŋayi e yina dunkune muthɔma mu yawe yi muŋ na na wundɛ nyathiki nda, kɛrɛ saathɛ ba kunapi kukɛnda koŋ, yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ wundɛ be ŋayi e yina dunkune mu thimo yi muŋ.
42011009	Huna yaŋ tepe bena: Thɔnthiŋinaŋ; beŋ kɔŋ dunkuno. Deethuwaŋ; beŋ koŋ kutu. Gbɛdiŋaŋ; awa beŋ kɔŋ pɛthiya iŋ Masaala.
42011010	Baa wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuno ntha; wɔ yo wɔ wo deethi, wundɛ kɔŋ kutu; wɔ yo wɔ wo gbɛdɛŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ pɛthiya.
42011011	Mbɛ komisa wobɛina ka mateete makendeŋ wo, mɛnɛ hati nda thɔnthɔŋɔŋ yina ba he, saanuŋ yi ba niŋ dunkune he, adunkune niŋ wokɛkɛŋ?
42011012	Maa mɛnɛ wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba heeli, e yi kɔŋ niŋ dunkune thokoŋa?
42011013	Mɛnɛ beŋ, bendo nɛnɔy beŋ beŋ, thɔyiŋ ba dunkuna munki muyɔhɔy ka mpati bikendeŋ, mbu ntiŋ nda Fanda ndeŋ woŋ ka ariana? E wundɛ sa dunkuŋ Yina Wokɛnama woŋ ka bi niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ beŋ?”
42011014	Lɔkɔ banthe Yisɔs kanthe wayi wo thiyɛ hati lamgba wunthe hubobo. Naa fuŋ wayi woŋ, babobo woŋ dunkunɔkɔy, awa biya beŋ ni kukabanɛ wumandiŋ.
42011015	Kɛrɛ binɔndi tepe, na “Wundɛ kɔŋ kanthe mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli, gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ.”
42011016	Binɔndi niŋ kɔ yɔla ba gbɛriŋinuwa ka thɔnthiŋina niŋ ba wundɛ be ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Masaala na ŋindɛ niŋ.
42011017	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs, naa kɔthɛ wundɛ masimɔkɔ makɛnamɛŋ maŋ, wundɛ tepe, na “Mɛnɛ hugbakine hakande e huŋ kɔ dekiyande, hu kɔŋ teetuwɔ; awa mɛnɛ mpoo hakande e kɔŋ kɔ dekiyande, ki kɔŋ teetuwɔ.
42011018	Beŋ tepe na yando kanthe mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ. Kɛrɛ yaŋ be hɛ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, mɛnɛ biya bi ka hugbakine hu ka Sithani haŋ hakande e bindɛ ka dekiyande, nama huŋ kooye?
42011019	Mɛnɛ yaŋ kɔŋ kanthe mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ baŋ, mbu mbɛ sɛmbɛ ba bakarandeni bikendeŋ beŋ kanthe mbayiŋ? Bakarandeni bikendeŋ beŋ gbeeŋ, bindɛ bina bena kɔnsɔŋɔŋ.
42011020	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ nɛnɛ ba dɔma na ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ na yaŋ wuŋ niye, wuŋ tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye bena.
42011021	“Mɛnɛ wɔ kahɛ wo iŋ mudekiye mukɛnama kɔɔyɛ e kɔ pama banka bakɛnama baŋ, munki mukɛnama muŋ mu kɔŋ mupankɔy bɛyi.
42011022	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ yamɛ kahuwa ba wundɛ see niŋ ŋote e niŋ punka, wundɛ kɔŋ kanati niŋ mudekiye nama muŋ mu dekinteke wundɛ muŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ sɛkɛthi munki mu tuwe wundɛ muŋ e hanuwa muŋ bi yemɛ niŋ beŋ.
42011023	“Wɔ yo wɔ wo ka ba yaŋ, wundɛ kooyeŋ ba yama dekiya yaathi. Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yama mase kɔminande haŋ, yaathi pankitinuwande huna wundɛ pankitinuwande.
42011024	“Naa wayi wonɛnɔy fuŋ ka wɔmɛti, wundɛ kɔŋ key kaŋ tharɔkɔ ka wulani ka ba kaa kaŋ deethuwa mahemuwe. Mɛnɛ wundɛ tha kutu, wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ duu ka banka ba ka ŋaye nde yaŋ ka baŋ.’
42011025	Mɛnɛ wundɛ see, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ pɛnki bapithinuwɔy natharaŋ, bakosinoko wuyɔhɔy.
42011026	Wundɛ kɔŋ fuŋ, e wundɛ ka diŋa mbayiŋ bisɔŋ-biye bihɛna bi yamɛ nɛnɔ ba wundɛ. Bindɛ fooma bi kɔŋ si biyande, e bindɛ kɛndɛ dɔŋɔ, awa makooye ma ka wɔ bɛina mɛ kɔŋ nda si yaŋ nɛnɔ daŋande na nde wundɛ mayoŋ na.”
42011027	Naa thanki nthɔŋ wundɛ huŋ gbonkiya, wɔ yɛrɛmɛ yele thampa mateete ka sɛthɛ baŋ e tepe niŋ, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo mpɛɛ yina woŋ e bɔpina yina!”
42011028	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma yameŋ niyɔ ka biya bi yuyɛ thampɛŋ tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ thɛŋ bɔha.”
42011029	Naa yame sɛthɛ baŋ kɔ ndintɔ, Yisɔs tepe, na “Biya bi ka yamana bahɛ baŋ beŋ anɛnɔ; bi kɔŋ deethi bɛyi bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Masaala na iŋ yaŋ, kɛrɛ bɛyi yo bɛyi bathakaba ka nda ba bindɛ Masaala dunkune daŋandeŋ bɛyi bathakaba ba niyɔy nde ka banabi woŋ Yona baŋ.
42011030	Baa, nɔŋ na see nde nthɔŋ Yona niyɔ bɛyi bathakaba na ba biya bi ka Niniba, nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si niyɔ bɛyi bathakaba ba biya bi ka lɔkɔ bakɔɔyɛ baŋ baŋ.
42011031	Gbaku woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Siba woŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayi ka lɔkɔ ba ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ ba thonkine biya bi ka lɔkɔ bakɔɔyɛ baŋ baŋ, baa wundɛ ŋaye nde napooŋ ka mapeye ma ka dunia baŋ ba si yuyɛ kele hu ka Silamani haŋ. Kumaŋ ntiŋ ntha ki yamɛ bukuya ba Silamani ki kɔŋ dondo.
42011032	Biya bi ka Niniba bi kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayi ka lɔkɔ ba ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ baŋ iŋ biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ beŋ e thonkine bena, babiyɛ bindɛ sikɔŋ nde sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ naa ni Yona bindɛ kɛwandi. Kumaŋ ntiŋ ntha ki yamɛ bukuya ba Yona ki kɔŋ dondo.”
42011033	“Wɔ ka wo mɔɔli mumɔɔli ba muŋ nununa, maa ba muŋ pututa ntha. Kɛrɛ ba muŋ tuta ka thinthi, ba haliko biya beŋ fooma bi biyande ka banka baŋ bi be kutu waŋ babɛina.
42011034	Thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ tha kɔŋ nɔŋ mumɔɔli ba kɔtɔ koŋ. Mɛnɛ thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ tha kɔŋ thayɔhɔy, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ kuthiŋɛ iŋ waŋ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ thaaya nda thaŋ yeheta, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ thiŋa iŋ huntuma.
42011035	Dekiyɔkɔ ba kɔthɔ ba dɔma na waŋ ba iŋ yi baŋ huntuma kutɛ.
42011036	Mɛnɛ kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ kuthiŋɛ napɛ iŋ waŋ, huntuma topeta kɛndɛ; ku kɔŋ niyɔ nagberekethe fooma nɔŋ mumɔɔli muna yina bende.”
42011037	Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya, woFaresi wunthe thiyi niŋ ba kaa ka thɔma iŋ wundɛ.
42011038	Wuŋ niyɔy woFaresi woŋ thɛrɛnaŋ ba na tha Yisɔs yenke looka thɛnkɔ nɔŋ na naamu namɛŋ woŋ na saanuŋ ba thɔma.
42011039	Huna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, beŋ kɔŋ looki kɔɔpu haŋ iŋ panɛ haŋ kahɛŋ. Kɛrɛ kaake, bendo thiŋɛ iŋ ŋatuwaŋ mɛnɛ banɛnɔy ka thathukuma.
42011040	Bendo mayɛini beŋ beŋ. E wo yehinuwɛ kahɛŋ woŋ kutɛ yehinuwɛ hɛlɛŋ thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ?
42011041	Dunkunaŋ munki mu ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ munkii mu ka nkinikiniŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina ntha o ntha ki kɔŋ niyɔ kimɛthɛ ba beŋ.
42011042	“Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wu tɛŋɛŋ kɔhi wuŋ naa beŋ kɔ thubututu muthuuni mu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda thahuwɔ muŋ fooma ŋaye ka thasayo ndeŋ thaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ pɛyɛŋ mathumbɛ iŋ ba tɔŋina mathimo ka Masaala. Wuŋ, beŋ kɔŋ ba wuŋ niya ka nanthe iŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma.
42011043	“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, baa beŋ athimo ba deŋo ka madoŋeŋ mayɔhɔy maŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ iŋ ba niyo yiki ka maano naa beŋ kɔ daŋande ka thani ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka.
42011044	Nambara ba beŋ, baa beŋ athɔyande nɔŋ thayoma tha sa kuta kaake; biya bi kɔŋ kaande thɛŋ ka thinthi, kɛrɛ bindɛ kuita nɔŋ na neniye thɛŋ kaake.”
42011045	Wɔ wunthe ka karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, naa gbonkiye yi nanaŋ na, yi gbonkiye mina kɛnsɛma.”
42011046	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Nambara ba beŋ, bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ tutuŋ biya doniŋ badimbɔy-dimbɔy, kɛrɛ beŋ ka yɛthɛ bakendeŋ, beŋ sa hintiŋ nthɔŋ bɛŋ tɔpɔŋ kuthenke kunthe ba bindɛ mase ba bɛŋ kata.
42011047	Nambara ba beŋ, baa beŋ thoyite thayoma tha ka banabiŋ bi kore nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ kɔŋ beŋ.
42011048	Awa beŋ, beŋ see nda tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na beŋ yɛrɔkɔy wali ba ni nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ kɔŋ baŋ; baa bindɛ kore nde banabiŋ beŋ, awa beŋ, beŋ see thoyiti thayoma namɛŋ thaŋ.
42011049	Ba kolo baŋ baŋ, kele hu ka Masaala haŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ bindɛ tɔŋɔti banabiŋ iŋ baseriŋ; bi kɔŋ kɔri binɔndi e gbasiŋita binɔndi.’
42011050	Huna biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ gbasiŋita ba koruwo hu koruwo nde banabiŋ beŋ haŋ there nthɔŋ na thɛri dunia baŋ.
42011051	There nthɔŋ nda ka koro hu ka Ebɛli haŋ iŋ hu ka Sɛkaraiya, wo koro nde mateete ma ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ mɛnɛ bɛsɛ baŋ ka saraka baŋ fuŋuno kɛ. Yaathi, biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ nɔŋ gbasiŋita ba bi koro nde beŋ beŋ.
42011052	“Nambara ba beŋ, bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, beŋ kosineŋ masaapa ma pɛthɛ biyo hu ka kele haŋ maŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ, beŋ biyandeta kaake, e beŋ ntiŋ kɔ pinda bi yɔli ba biyande kaake beŋ.”
42011053	Naa ŋaye kɛndɛ Yisɔs, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ iŋ biFaresini beŋ thɛrɛŋ ba niŋ sɔkinɔkɔ wusɔbɛ-sɔbɛ e kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwa niŋ ŋathɔnthɔŋɔŋ ŋabɔyɛ e nda niŋ kɛntha ba niŋ bɔha ka Siraŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ kɔŋ piriŋinɔ ka gbonkiya.
42012001	Naa thuŋande biya wuluiŋ-wuluiŋ haaŋ e bindɛ nda kɔ yathitituwande, Yisɔs gbonkitiyande hintiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ, beŋ be tha thɔɔtɔ yisithi wo ka biFaresini beŋ woŋ, hunitɔkɔ namɛŋ haŋ.
42012002	Baa bɛyi yo bɛyi ba pututuwɔy bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ kubunuwa, awa gbundu yo gbundu bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ kothiyo.
42012003	Huna bɛyi yo bɛyi ba gbonkoy yi ka huntuma haŋ, bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ gbonkiya hatɔ teete nadewu, awa bɛyi yo bɛyi ba ŋɔintɔkɔy yi ka makonko kaake, bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ koyiŋa ka gbanthaŋ ka.
42012004	“Yaŋ tepe bena, bendo binyathikɔŋ bikiyaŋ beŋ, baŋ payɔ bi kɔri kɔtɔ koŋ beŋ, mahɛŋ mabɛina bindɛ ka nda iŋ ba bindɛ punku ba niya bena.
42012005	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe wo beŋ ba payɔ; payɔŋ Masaala na wo, naa ndɛ sekithe siini bakendeŋ baŋ woŋ, e hɛlɛŋ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba bena yɛla ka yahanama. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, woŋ, ndɛ na beŋ ba payɔ.
42012006	“E sɛntiŋ biye kutɛ sonkoiŋ bisɔhi niyo gbɔŋ? Kɛrɛ hali wunthe Masaala sa niŋ piitɔ.
42012007	Masaala thanki kɔnda bɔɔyɛ ndeŋ buŋ. Huna baŋ payɔ, beŋ akaahi mɔlɔŋ daŋandeŋ sonkoiŋ bibɔyɛ.
42012008	“Huna yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yama niyɔ kuyaahu ka mateete ma ka biyamɛti, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ sa nɛnɛ nɔŋ niŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ka mateete ma ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ.
42012009	Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo yama buuhu ka mateete ma ka biyamɛti, wundɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ buuhuwa ka mateete ma ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ.
42012010	“Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo gbonkoy thampa ba sɔkinɔkɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ punku peniyo; kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo dunkunɔkɔy thampa ba teetuwa keŋ ku ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ koŋ, wundɛ sa punku peniyo.
42012011	“Awa mɛnɛ bindɛ kati bena ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ ba bena kɔnsiŋina, maa ka kɔtɔkɔy ka bakɛrɛni beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba hu beŋ ka tɛpi iŋ na beŋ huŋ ka tepe,
42012012	baa Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ kɔŋ bena thanani ka malɔkɔ mabɛina gbeeŋ hu beŋ ba tɛpa.”
42012013	Wɔ wunthe ka sɛthɛ baŋ tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaandi tepe wɛndaŋ na ba miŋ hanande kɛɛ baŋ iŋ wundɛ.”
42012014	Huna tepe Yisɔs niŋ, na “Hati lamgba, nkaana niyɛ yama bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ maa bahaninande bena kɛɛ?”
42012015	Kɛna key Yisɔs ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ yela bindɛ fooma e tɛpa, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ e beŋ pamɔkɔ ŋaye ka milɛŋ bihakuwande, baa sii bakɛnda baŋ dekinteketa ka nanhulu bakɛnda baŋ hali kɔyta ti bɛŋ ka bɔya.”
42012016	Kɛna sisiyɛ wundɛ bindɛ mathɔyande maŋ maŋ e tɛpa, na “Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ nde wo kutɛ nde paka bamandiŋ ka yiya hukɛnama.
42012017	Wundɛ see tutunuwande ka thukuma hukɛnama haŋ, na ‘Yaŋ ka nda iŋ ka kosine paka niŋ baŋ. Nama nda yaŋ ni yee?’
42012018	Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ na yaŋ ni. Yaŋ kɔŋ thinki ŋahunkuŋ niŋ ŋaŋ fooma e yaŋ thoya ŋa yamɛ bukuyuwa, e yaŋ kɛndɛ kosine paka niŋ baŋ iŋ nanhulu niŋ baŋ.
42012019	Yaŋ kɔŋ tepe yɛthɛ niŋ, na “Yi kɔsɔŋ nanhulu bamandiŋ ba thaninɛŋ thabɔyɛ. Hɛmuwa nda, thɔma, thiiye, yehitɔkɔ.” ’
42012020	Kɛrɛ Masaala tepe kɛnama, na ‘Yi, wɔ thɔkɔy na yi! Ka huyɛ bahɛ baŋ yɔkɔŋ yi tuku; awa munki muŋ fooma mu thanki yi kɔsinɔkɔ muŋ, nkaana muŋ biyɔ?’
42012021	“Nɛna wuŋ niyɔ ba wɔ yo wɔ wo kɔminuwande nanhulu ba yɛthɛ bakɛnama, kɛrɛ e Masaala niŋ kɔthɔ ba wundɛ niyɔ bamɔnɛ ka thaaya nama thaŋ.”
42012022	Huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba siini bakendeŋ baŋ ba mu beŋ thɔŋ, maa ba ŋakɔtɔ ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ ba mu beŋ thɔɔ.
42012023	Baa sii baŋ bɛna yamɛ ba muthɔma muŋ, e kɔtɔ koŋ nɛnɛ yama ba muthɔma muŋ.
42012024	Siyuwaŋ hɛ bɛtiŋ beŋ: bindɛ payeta, bindɛ ŋoneta, bindɛ ka iŋ ŋahunkuŋ, kɛrɛ Masaala athɛriyɛ bindɛ. Beŋ, beŋ yameŋ kolo ba bɛtiŋ beŋ!
42012025	E wɔ kɔŋ ka mateete makendeŋ wo, ŋaye ka yaagba ba wundɛ ni baŋ, wo punku ba ndinta thɔɔkuwa hu ka sii bakɛnama baŋ?
42012026	Mɛnɛ beŋ tha punku niya bɛyi bathahuwɔy baŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, mbɛ ba beŋ niye kuyaagba ba bapɛyɛ baŋ?
42012027	Siyuwaŋ hɛ musɛnkɛŋ mu ka ŋayeŋ ŋaŋ muŋ nɔŋ na muŋ senkine na. Muŋ niyeta wali, muŋ yehinuweta mupithi, kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, hali gbaku woŋ Silamani iŋ hudinhaŋiya nama haŋ fooma wundɛ tha punku ba pitha wuyɔhɔy wuŋ doŋe nanthe iŋ muŋ.
42012028	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ Masaala wundɛ pithe hande hu hɛ hɔkɔŋ ka boi ka hupethɔy haŋ, mɛmpɛ nda e huŋ si tɔɔka, mbu ntiŋ nda beŋ, e wundɛ sa bena yaŋ pitha? O beŋ, bendo ka iŋ kulanɛya kutɛŋɛ beŋ!
42012029	“Awa baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba kɔɔ timo tima ka deethuwa mu beŋ thɔŋ iŋ mu beŋ thiiye.
42012030	Baa munki muŋ muŋ fooma, muna siyani ba be kɔthɔ Masaala na baŋ deethi. Awa Fanda ndeŋ woŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na beŋ ka iŋ muŋ.
42012031	Yɔlaŋ hintiŋ ba deethuwa Hugbakine nama haŋ ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, awa munkɔŋ muŋ muŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ muŋ kutu.
42012032	“Baŋ payɔ, bendo thahuwɔy beŋ ka kiki, baa mathimo ma ka Fanda ndeŋ woŋ mɛna ba bena dunkune Hugbakine haŋ.
42012033	Niyaŋ gbɔŋ fooma mu iŋ beŋ, e beŋ niya bayɔhɔy ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Dethiyɔkɔŋ ponthoiŋ ba sa tiyɔ, e beŋ kɔsina kɛɛ ka ariana ba sa teetuwɔ, ka sa batuwani biyande kɛ, mɔɔki sa bɛŋ teeti.
42012034	Baa kamo kama ka kɛɛ bakɛnda, kɛna thukuma hukɛnda.
42012035	“Kɔsinɔkɔŋ yɛthɛ bakendeŋ, e beŋ kɔsina mumɔɔli mukendeŋ muŋ mumaye timo tima.
42012036	Niyɔŋ nɔŋ biya bi yumbu ba mariki wokɛnamɛŋ woŋ be tɛŋ ŋaye ka yakali ba ka kuyɛntande koŋ baŋ, ba haliko bi be niyɔ bikɔsinɔkɔy ba niŋ pɛthiyɛ yako naa wundɛ see gbɛdɛŋ ka biyo haŋ.
42012037	Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawaliŋ bi pɛnka bithɔhɔy iŋ mariki namɛŋ woŋ. Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, mariki woŋ kɔŋ si kɔsinɔkɔ yɛthɛ bakɛnama e bindɛ dɛŋa ka tha banthe, e si niya bindɛ fantha.
42012038	Hali na asɛɛ na wundɛ huyɛ teete, maa ka kuputhɔ ku kaŋ koŋ, mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawaliŋ bi pɛnka bithɔhɔy!
42012039	Kɛrɛ kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na mɛnɛ wo biyɛ banka kɔthɛ wakathi wo batuwaŋ woŋ see, wundɛ kɔŋ huru gbele, awa wundɛ sa mɛyi ba batuwaŋ woŋ thinka banka nama baŋ.
42012040	Beŋ hɛlɛŋ, beŋ kɔŋ ba kɔsinɔkɔ ba yɛritɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, baa wundɛ kɔŋ see ka malɔkɔ ma ba beŋ niŋ tute thukuma.”
42012041	Huna tepe Pita, na “Mariki, e thabɔrɔ thaŋ thaŋ tha kɔŋ ba miŋ hɔkɔŋ nagbɛti, mindo bakarandeni beŋ, maa tha kɔŋ ba biya fooma?”
42012042	Kɛna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Nkaana bawali woyɔhɔy niyo lanɛya e wundɛ niyɔ wokele? Wundɛ na bawali wo dɛŋo iŋ mariki nama ka thinthi ba dethiteke banka babunthu baŋ e hana bawaliŋ bibintheŋ beŋ muthɔma ka lɔkɔ ba bindɛ ba kute muthɔma.
42012043	Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawali wobɛina wo mariki nama woŋ pɛnki si ni wali bakɛnama.
42012044	Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ dɛŋ ka thinthi ka ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ.
42012045	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ bawali wobɛina tepe ka yɛthɛ bakɛnama, na ‘Mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ nambe tindɛ ba duwa,’ e bɔha ba gbuduŋa bawaliŋ bibintheŋ beŋ e kɔ thɔma, e kɔ thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ.
42012046	Mariki wo ka bawali wobɛina kɔŋ see malɔkɔ manthe ma be wundɛ niŋ tute thukuma, ka wakathi wo ba wundɛ kɔthɔ. Mariki woŋ kɔŋ niŋ thonkande, awa wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ kɔnditande iŋ biya bi be yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya beŋ.
42012047	“Bawali wo kɔthɛ ba thimo mariki nama ba wundɛ be ni, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha kɔsinɔkɔ yɛthɛ nama e ŋayi ka kɔɔ e bɛŋ niya, wundɛ kɔŋ yaŋ gbuduŋo wuthoonɛ.
42012048	Kɛrɛ bawali wo be kɔthɔ ba thimo mariki nama woŋ ba wundɛ niya, mɛnɛ wundɛ ni ba tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba gbuduŋo, wundɛ kɔŋ kutu kugbuduŋ kuyete. Wo dunkuno wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ, ndɛ kɔŋ thɔnthiŋina ba wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ; wɔ bɛina wo dunkuno wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ, wundɛ kɔŋ thɔnthiŋina ba dunkuna wu yamɛ bɔya.
42012049	“Yaŋ see ba si thiya hɛrɛ hu buu ka dunia baŋ, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nda kufiyo ba buu bubɛina maye.
42012050	Yaŋ boheŋ ba muluno ka nambarɛŋ, awa thukuma niŋ haŋ hu ka yaagba ba daŋinande nambarɛŋ babɛina.
42012051	E beŋ simekeŋ ba dɔma na yaŋ see ba saa ka thiya mathɛbɛ ka dunia baŋ? Ade, yaŋ tha see ba thiya mathɛbɛ, kɛrɛ ba si thiya mabarinkande wɔ iŋ ntɔ nama.
42012052	There nda hɛ, mpoo ki biya bisɔhi ka banka banthe ki kɔŋ hakuwande; biya bitaati bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ biya biye, biya biye bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ biya bitaati.
42012053	Komisa wowathe kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ hati nama wowathe; hati wathe kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ fandama na; komisa woyɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ hati nama woyɛrɛmɛ; hati yɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ nandama na; thɔnɔ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ thamba nama; thamba woŋ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ thɔnɔ nama.”
42012054	Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ wundɛ biya beŋ, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ kute thawuruma thaŋ thɛ si ŋati ka koyoŋ woŋ ŋaye ka, beŋ kɔthɛ yako na koyoŋ kɔŋ tete see; yaathi, e wundɛ nɛnɛ saa.
42012055	Awa mɛnɛ beŋ kute hɛlɛŋ huru hu ka kuheda koŋ haŋ hu si hɔŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na, naa huŋ daŋande, nthonthoŋ kɔŋ ki kɔŋ see; yaathi, e kɔŋ nɛnɛ saa.
42012056	Bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, beŋ punkeŋ ba detha dunia baŋ iŋ kuthahinɛ koŋ, e beŋ tɛpa ba niyɔ. Mbɛ ba sa beŋ kothiye kolo ba ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ baŋ?
42012057	“Mbɛ ba sa beŋ kɔnsiŋiniyande nɔŋ na thumbe wuŋ?
42012058	Mɛnɛ yi thohite wɔ dɔɔnthɔ, e ndɛ yina bɔha ba yina kata ka kaama, ka dekiyɔkɔ ba huŋ dɛɛnka iŋ wundɛ ka gboŋa saanuŋ beŋ ba biyande ka kaama ka. Mɛnɛ yi tha wuŋ ni, wundɛ kɔŋ yina kati ka bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ ka, awa e bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ yina ka dunkuna ka bayaha woŋ, awa e bayaha woŋ yina ka thiya ka yeeli.
42012059	Yaŋ tepe yina, yi sa kɛndɛ fuŋ gbɔ, yɔkɔŋ na yi thunkuŋ fooma dɔɔnthɔ baŋ, sɛnti wunthe ndɛ sa peyɔ.”
42013001	Ka malɔkɔ mabɛina biya binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bi tepe Yisɔs na ba biKalili bi kore nde Pailɛti beŋ ka lɔkɔ ba nde bindɛ kore maamiŋ beŋ baŋ ba bindɛ fuŋuna saraka ka kuwaŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ.
42013002	Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “E ba na niyɔy wuŋ na biKalili beŋ beŋ kore nde ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ, e huna beŋ siyi ba dɔma na bi yameŋ niyɔ bahakɛŋ ba biya bi ka Kalili fooma?
42013003	Hali wuŋ ka nɛŋ, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ tha sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikendeŋ beŋ fooma, beŋ kɔŋ tuku nɔŋ na tuku nde nthɔŋ bindɛ na.
42013004	Mbu biya kɔhi iŋ bisɔŋ-bitaati bi ka Silowami, bi tukɛ nde naa ŋoto bindɛ iŋ banka bathɔɔkuwɛ-thɔɔkuwɛ baŋ? E beŋ siyi ba dɔma na bindɛ bina yamɛ nde nɛnɔ ba biya beŋ fooma ka Yɛrusalɛmi?
42013005	Ade, wuŋ ka nɛŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, mɛnɛ beŋ tha sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ, beŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ tuku nɔŋ na tuku nde nthɔŋ bindɛ na.”
42013006	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde wo thuuwɛ kuyeŋ ku tiŋ mutiŋ muthɔma ku dɔma koŋ na fiki ka sayo hukɛnama haŋ. Lɔkɔ banthe wundɛ key kɛndɛ ba ka detha ba mutiŋ ba thɔma, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha pɛnki mutiŋ kɛndɛ.
42013007	Huna tepe wundɛ bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Dethaŋ hɛ, bɛrɛ ba thanina thataati nda yama see ka deethuwa mutiŋ ka kuyeŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ hali hanthe yaŋ penketa mutiŋ. Yuutaŋ kuŋ. Mbɛ ba kuŋ kooye dondo e kuŋ kɔ teetuwa kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ ba gboŋ?’
42013008	Kɛrɛ bawali woŋ tepe niŋ, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, pɛyɛna kuŋ ba nina hunthe hɛlɛŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ pɛnkande gbusuta kuŋ e yaŋ kuŋ thiya tɛɛni ba kuŋ yeheŋ.
42013009	Awa mɛnɛ kuŋ tiŋ kohira, wu kɔŋ mina niyɔ kuhita daŋandeŋ ba kuŋ yuuta haŋ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ kuŋ tha nɛnɛ tiŋ, yi kɔŋ kuŋ yuutu.’ ”
42013010	Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe manthe, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde thanani ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ.
42013011	Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy wo niyɛ niŋ ba thana pethɔ kɔtɔ ba thaninɛŋ kɔhi iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati. Wundɛ puto nda iŋ nthoonaŋ kɔŋ; wundɛ punketa nda thumbunɔkɔ hali.
42013012	Naa kute Yisɔs niŋ, wundɛ thiyi niŋ, na “Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ, yi pɛɛkuwɔy ŋaye ka nthoonaŋ kikɛnda kɔŋ.”
42013013	Yisɔs tute niŋ thɛnkɔ. Ka wuyako wubɛina, wundɛ thumbunɔkɔy, e thunkunuwa Masaala na.
42013014	Wuŋ thoŋ bayaha wo ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ woŋ na baa Yisɔs puyi ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ. Huna tepe wundɛ biya beŋ, na “Hura kasɔŋ-hanthe miŋ kɔŋ ba niya wali bakɛntuŋ, huna saaŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina ba beŋ be puya, kɛrɛ beŋ ka ba saa ba beŋ be puya ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
42013015	Huna tepe Mariki woŋ bindɛ, na “Beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ beŋ! Beŋ kɔŋ pɛɛki ndansi kikendeŋ ŋaye ka binthi ka e kata kɔŋ ka thiiye ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
42013016	Ka tete detha wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Ebrahim baŋ, wo thanki Sithani yuka bɛrɛ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati. E wuŋ ka wuyɔhɔy ba niŋ pɛɛka ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?”
42013017	Thampɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ ni ba bindɛ kutɔkɔ kuyaahu ka yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ. Biya beŋ nɛnɛ ayehitɔkɔ ba bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba Yisɔs ni baŋ.
42013018	Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “Mbɛ mu yaŋ thɔyintande Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ dee?
42013019	Huŋ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe wo sɛkithɛ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na mɔstadi awa e huŋ thuuwa ka dumgbu bakɛnama. Thaa humɛɛsɛ haŋ haŋ see muku. Huŋ thɔɔki. Huŋ see niyɔ kuyeŋ kumandiŋ haaŋ e bɛtiŋ beŋ si thooyuwa ka bathalɛŋ bibɛina.”
42013020	Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ wundɛ, na “Mbɛ mu yaŋ thɔyintande Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ dee?
42013021	Huŋ athɔyande nɔŋ yisithi wo sekithe wɔ yɛrɛmɛ, e niŋ tikitinuwande iŋ kutoŋ kuthithɛ ku bankɔ hunthe haaŋ e yisithi woŋ niya ba kutoŋ koŋ fooma ŋata.”
42013022	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy kubiyasi nama koŋ ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Naa wundɛ key, wundɛ fuŋe ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ fooma kaŋ kaa kaŋ thaninuwa biya beŋ.
42013023	Wɔ wunthe thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mariki, e biya biyete bina hɔkɔŋ niya kisi?” Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ fooma,
42013024	na “Dekiyɔkɔŋ ba biiyande ka biyo hunɔthitɔy haŋ, baa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ gbɛrɛŋɛŋ yaathi ba biyande kaake, kɛrɛ bindɛ sa punku biyande.
42013025	Mariki wo ka banka baŋ woŋ kɔŋ ŋayinɔkɔ e lɔŋa biyo haŋ, awa naa beŋ kɔɔyɛ ka gbada ka e beŋ bɔha gbɛdiŋa ka biyo haŋ e beŋ kɔ dɔma, na ‘Pɛthiyɛ mina biyo haŋ, mariki!’ Wundɛ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye beŋ!’
42013026	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina beŋ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yi bareŋ nde ka thɔma, e ka thiiye iŋ miŋ, e thaninuwa ka mɛtiŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ.’
42013027	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yaŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye beŋ, gbɔniyɔkɔŋ yama, bendo bare nde niya wunɛnɔy beŋ.’
42013028	Beŋ kɔŋ bereŋ e beŋ kɔ ŋakitinande thathithi ka wuthoonɛ ka tete ka lɔkɔ ba beŋ kutu Ebrahim na, Aisaki, Yakuba, iŋ banabiŋ beŋ fooma ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, beŋ, e beŋ yelo ka gbada ka.
42013029	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biya bi kɔŋ see ŋaye ka thadoŋ tha ka dunia baŋ fooma e bindɛ dɔŋɔ ka thɔma ka tha banthe ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
42013030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bi hɛ mahɛŋ beŋ, bindɛ bina nɔŋ niyɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy; awa bi hɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy beŋ, bindɛ bina nɔŋ niyɔ mahɛŋ.”
42013031	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina biFaresini binɔndi see niŋ tepe, na “Wu kɔŋ kuhita ba yi ŋayi dondo, baa Hɛrɔdi dɛɛnki ba yina kɔra.”
42013032	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kaaŋ tepe bakɔɔtha wobɛina, na ‘Detha, yando kanthi mbayiŋ binɛnɔy e yaŋ kɔ puya biya hɛ iŋ mɛmpɛ, mɛmpɛthɔ yaŋ kɔŋ thankaŋ wali bakiyaŋ baŋ.
42013033	Halisa, yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be key ka kɔtɔkɔy biyasi niŋ haŋ hɛ, mɛmpɛ, iŋ mɛmpɛthɔ, ba wuŋ thumbeta ba banabi koro ka tha ka hɛna wuŋ daŋande ka Yɛrusalɛmi.’
42013034	“Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi, beŋ lɔɔpi banabiŋ beŋ iŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi Masaala beŋ haaŋ beŋ bindɛ kɔra. Tima thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda yaŋ niyɔ kufiyo ba bena kɔmitɔkɔ ka thɛnkɔ niŋ thaŋ nɔŋ na thɛɛ wokomisa pɛnkinande ŋapɛli nama ŋaŋ ka mpati nama, kɛrɛ beŋ tha mɛyi ba yaŋ bena nɛŋ niya.
42013035	Huna banka bakendeŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ bɛ kɔŋ fuŋoko. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, beŋ sa nda yama kutu haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na beŋ dome nɔŋ, na ‘Wɔ thaduba na, wo see ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ!’ ”
42014001	Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe manthe Yisɔs thiyo ba kaa ka thɔma ka banka ba ka bakɛrɛŋ wunthe ka biFaresini beŋ. Awa biya beŋ fooma lope niŋ thaaya.
42014002	Kumaŋ, wɔ doŋeŋ niŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy wo thiinkɛ.
42014003	Huna gbonkitiyande Yisɔs karimɔkɔiŋ beŋ iŋ biFaresini beŋ, na “E wu kɔŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ baŋ ba puya wɔ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, maa wuŋ ka nɛŋ?”
42014004	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha gbonkoy bɛyi yo bɛyi. Kɛna sekithe Yisɔs hati lamgba woŋ; wundɛ puyi niŋ; wundɛ pɛyɛŋ niŋ ba wundɛ duwa.
42014005	Huna thonthiŋine wundɛ bindɛ, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ iŋ hati, maa manaŋ, awa mɛnɛ wuŋ niyɔy na wundɛ key ŋɔti ka sobo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, e wundɛ sa niŋ ka fuŋuŋ yako ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?”
42014006	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha punku niya yaabi kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ.
42014007	Naa thanki Yisɔs detha nɔŋ na biya bi thiyo ka thɔma haŋ beŋ yethe madoŋeŋ mayiki maŋ, wundɛ gbonkitiyande bindɛ fooma mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ e tɛpa,
42014008	na “Naa wɔ thiyi yina ka thɔma humandiŋ, ba yɛthiyɔkɔ ba dɔŋɔ ka gbɔdɔ huyiki haŋ, athamɔkɔ niyɔ wɔ yamɛ yiki ba yi thiyo ka thɔma hubɛina.
42014009	Lɔkɔ hɛ wo thiyɛ bena ka thɔma haŋ ka nanthe woŋ kɔŋ see e yina si tepe, na ‘Ŋayiyɛ woŋ ka madoŋe maŋ. Hɛɛra yo ka, yɔkɔŋ yi be dɔŋɔ ka madoŋe ma ka pothi maŋ.’ Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ kutɔkɔ kuyaahu.
42014010	Huna mɛnɛ yi thiyo ka thɔma, kaa e ka dɔŋɔ ka madoŋe ma ka pothi maŋ, huna mɛnɛ wo thiyɛ yina woŋ see, ndɛ kɔŋ yina si tepe, na ‘Nyathiki, saa ka madoŋe ma yamɛ ka thinthi maŋ.’ Wuŋ, wu kɔŋ yina dunkuŋ yiki ka mateete ma ka biya fooma bi thiyo ka thɔma haŋ beŋ.
42014011	Baa wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋatinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ thathina; awa wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo thathinɔkɔ, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋatina.”
42014012	Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs ka hati lamgba wo thiyɛ niŋ ka thɔma haŋ woŋ, na “Naa yi kɔsinɔkɔy ba thiya biya ka thɔma humandiŋ, ba thiyi binyathikɔŋ bikɛnda, maa mbɛnda, maa mpoo kikɛnda, maa bintɔni nda bi bananhuluiŋ, baa bindɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ yina thiyi ka thɔma, awa ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kute kuthunkuŋ ba wu ni yi wuŋ.
42014013	Kɛrɛ, naa yi kɔ thiyi biya ba thɔma, thiya bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ, biyɔŋɛ beŋ, iŋ bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ.
42014014	Yi kɔŋ nɔŋ kutu thaduba, baa bindɛ sa yina punku tɛnkiniyɛ, kɛrɛ Masaala kɔŋ nɔŋ yina thunkuŋ ka malɔkɔ ma biya bithumbɛ beŋ ŋayi ka hutuka haŋ.”
42014015	Naa yuye huŋ wɔ wunthe ka bi nde thɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ, wundɛ tepe, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka wɔ wo nɔŋ penkitiye ka thɔma hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
42014016	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ na yehinuwɛ nde thɔma humandiŋ. Wundɛ see thiyi biya bibɔyɛ ba si penkitiye ka thɔma haŋ haŋ.
42014017	Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba ka thɔma haŋ baŋ, wundɛ ŋindi bawali nama woŋ ba si tepe bi thiyi wundɛ ka thɔma haŋ beŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Saaŋ, yaŋ thanki kɔsinɔkɔ ntha o ntha.’
42014018	Kɛrɛ naa key bawali woŋ, bindɛ fooma bi thiyo beŋ ka wunthe-wunthe thɛrɛŋ ba dunkuna kabariŋ bihakuwande. Womayoŋ woŋ tepe baseri woŋ, na ‘Yaŋ thanki boya yiya, yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be key ba huŋ ka detha. Yaandi, yɛrɔkɔ kabari wokiyaŋ woŋ.’
42014019	Wowuntheŋ woŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ boye manani kɔhi bi niye wali. Yaŋ kɔŋ nda gboŋa ba bindɛ ka gbɛriŋina. Yaandi yɛrɔkɔ kabari niŋ woŋ.’
42014020	Wowuntheŋ woŋ dome, na ‘Yando yɛntɛ wuŋama. Ba kolo babɛina yaŋ sa punku kaa ka thɔma haŋ.’
42014021	Bawali woŋ duu awa wundɛ key tepe mariki nama woŋ fooma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ. Mariki nama woŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ, wundɛ tepe ka bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Kaa yako ka gboŋɛŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ ka thapɛthandeŋ thaŋ e yi ka thiya bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ, bimankɔy thaaya beŋ, iŋ biyɔŋɛ beŋ fooma.’
42014022	Wundɛ key ni nɔŋ na nunkunoko wundɛ na. Kɛna duu wundɛ; ndɛ see tɛpi, na ‘Mariki, ba ni yi yamari baŋ, yaŋ thanki bɛŋ niya, kɛrɛ madoŋe pɛyɛ hɛlɛŋ kɛndɛ ba bihɛna.’
42014023	Huna tepe mariki woŋ ka bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ fooma, ka gboŋɛŋ baŋ, ka thapɛthandeŋ thaŋ; biita bindɛ haliko banka niŋ baŋ bɛ be thiŋ biya.
42014024	Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ wunthe ka bi yenke thiyo beŋ, wundɛ sa miŋ sisa niŋ baŋ.’ ”
42014025	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy biyasi nama haŋ e sɛthɛ bamandiŋ kɔ yema. Huna sikiyeke wundɛ. Ndɛ tepe bindɛ,
42014026	na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo yama yeŋ, wundɛ sa punku ba niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ tha yenke sikina sɔkɔrɔ fandama, nandama, wɔtɔ nama, mpati nama, mbɛndama, iŋ yɛthɛ bakɛnama gbeeŋ.
42014027	Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yinthɔkɔ kuyeŋ nama kubariŋande ku ka nambara baŋ koŋ e yama yema, wundɛ sa niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ.
42014028	Nkaana wɔɔŋ, wo ŋayi ba thoya banka, ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke dɔŋɔ e kɔnda si niŋ bɛŋ yaki, ba mɛnɛ wundɛ kɔŋ iŋ wutɛŋɛ ba bɛŋ thankina?
42014029	Mɛnɛ wundɛ tha wuŋ ni, wu kɔŋ niyɔ naa wundɛ thɛrɛŋ nthɔŋ bɛŋ, wundɛ thamɔi, awa fooma biya bi bɛŋ kutu beŋ, bi kɔŋ niŋ hɛthi, e bindɛ kɔ tɛpa, na
42014030	‘Hati lamgba woŋ thɛrɛŋ nde ba thoya, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha bɛŋ punku thankina.’
42014031	Mbɛ hɛlɛŋ gbaku wobɛina wo ŋayi ba kaa ka dekiya gbaku wohɛna, ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke dɔŋɔ e wundɛ simɔkɔ iŋ thukuma nama mɛnɛ ndɛ kɔŋ punku dekiye kurugbani wuluiŋ kɔhi gbaku wo see woŋ iŋ kurugbani wuluiŋ kɔnthɔ kaye?
42014032	Mɛnɛ wuŋ ka nɛŋ, naa hintiŋ gbaku wowuntheŋ woŋ wuthokiye, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋindi baseri ba haliko bi be pɛyɔ ka mathɛbɛ.”
42014033	Huna thuhune ntiŋ Yisɔs, na “Wɔ yo wɔ sa punku ba niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ tha sikɔŋ sɔkɔrɔ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ.
42014034	“Mɛɛti maŋ athimɔ, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ mɛɛti maŋ piriŋiŋ wuthimɔy wukɛnama wuŋ, mbɛ mu nda mɛŋ thimiŋ?
42014035	Mɛŋ sa nda yɔhɔ ba bɛyi yo bɛyi yɔkɔŋ mɛ be yɛla. Wundɛ wo ba pona kuiha, wundɛ ponɛŋ kuiha.”
42015001	Lɔkɔ banthe bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ iŋ biya bi simeke bayahɛŋ bi ka dina wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ ba bindɛ niyɔ bahakɛŋ thuriye Yisɔs na ba niŋ poniyɛ kuiha.
42015002	Kɛna bohe biFaresini beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ e kɔ tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ ayɛrɔkɔ bahakɛŋ beŋ e ka thɔma iŋ bindɛ.”
42015003	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ:
42015004	na “Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy naa wɔ wunthe ka mateete makendeŋ kɔŋ iŋ takɛŋ kɛmɛ wunthe, e wunthe niŋ kɛndɛ si piriŋe? Nama wundɛ ni? Wundɛ kɔŋ pɛyɛŋ bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ beŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ beŋ bi si thɛri ka wula ka, e kaa kaŋ deethuwa wunthe wo piriŋe niŋ woŋ haaŋ ndɛ niŋ kuta.
42015005	Awa naa wundɛ kute niŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ yinthɔkɔ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
42015006	Naa wundɛ tɛŋ ka banka nama ka, wundɛ kɔŋ thiyi binyathikɔŋ nama iŋ biya bi thuriyande wundɛ beŋ fooma. Wundɛ kɔŋ bindɛ tepe, na ‘Nyehitɔkɔŋ, baa yaŋ kute taka niŋ wo piriŋe nɔŋ yama woŋ.’
42015007	Yaŋ tepe bena, mayehitɔkɔ ma yamɛ mɛ kɔŋ niyɔ ka ariana ba bahakɛ wunthe wo sikinɛ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ ayaŋ ba bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ bithumbɛ bi ka nda ba sikina sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.
42015008	“Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy naa wɔ yɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ iŋ kɔbiri wo siliniŋ kɔhi nagbɛti, e siliŋ wunthe kɛndɛ piriŋa? Nama wundɛ ni? Wundɛ kɔŋ mɔɔli mumɔɔli e pithinuwa banka baŋ fooma e deethuwa kuthɛgbɛ haaŋ ndɛ niŋ kuta.
42015009	Naa wundɛ kute niŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ thiyi binyathikɔŋ nama beŋ iŋ bithuriyuwande wundɛ beŋ ka tha banthe e tepe bindɛ, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, baa yaŋ kute kɔbiri niŋ wo piriŋe yama woŋ. Miŋ yehitɔkɔyŋ ka tha banthe!’
42015010	Yaŋ tepe bena, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ. Bi kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ wumandiŋ ba bahakɛ wunthe wo sikinɛ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ.”
42015011	Huna tepe wundɛ hɛlɛŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde wo iŋ mpati biye bibiyɛthɛŋ.
42015012	Wohatiyɛ woŋ tepe ka fandama, na ‘Papaŋ, haninande mina kɛɛ bakɛnda baŋ e yama yi dunkune kufɛŋ ku yaŋ ba kuta.’ Fandamɛŋ hakinande bindɛ kɛɛ baŋ.
42015013	Naa sɛsi wuŋ hurukuta, wohatiyɛ woŋ sekithe kɛɛ bakɛnama baŋ. Wundɛ fuŋutɔkɔy iŋ kɔbiri woŋ. Wundɛ key ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuthokiye napooŋ. Wundɛ key thanki teetuwa kɔbiri nama woŋ ka maniyɔ manɛnɔy.
42015014	Wundɛ teeti ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ. Kɛna see kɔnthɔ kumandiŋ ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ kubɛyna. Wundɛ nda, ntha yo ntha ka nda iŋ wundɛ.
42015015	Kɛna key wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ lasiri wunthe ba dunkuno wali. Lasiri woŋ baŋ toŋite niŋ ka dumgbu ba ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ ba kaa ka thɛriyɛ kɔsɛŋ nama beŋ.
42015016	Wundɛ kaho kɔnthɔ haaŋ e wundɛ nda niyɔ kufiyo ba thɔma muthɔma mu ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ muŋ, kɛrɛ wɔ ka wo niŋ nkii muthɔma.
42015017	Ka wumankɛ nda nagbɔŋ thukuma nama haŋ see ntiŋ duu, huna tepe ndɛ, na ‘Fooma bawaliŋ bigbako beŋ iŋ papaŋ athɔŋ e bindɛ pɛyɛta, kɛrɛ yaŋ yama see ka tuka dondo woŋ iŋ kɔnthɔ.
42015018	Yaŋ kɔŋ ŋayi dondo. Yaŋ kɔŋ duu ka fandaŋ ka. Yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ ka tepe, na “Papaŋ, yaŋ thanki niya hakɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na mɛnɛ ba yina sɔkinɔkɔ.
42015019	Yaŋ ka nda yando tɛŋɛ ba domo na hati nda, kɛrɛ sɛkitha nda yama nɔŋ wunthe ka bawaliŋ nda bigbako beŋ.” ’
42015020	Kɛna ŋaye wundɛ. Wundɛ bohe gboŋa ba duwa ka fandama ka. “Fandama kute niŋ naa wundɛ wuthokiye. Kɛna see niŋ nkinikiniŋ bohi. Kɛna thare wundɛ; wundɛ key niŋ pɔpitɔkɔ; wundɛ dɔɔkɔy niŋ.
42015021	Huna tepe hati woŋ, na ‘Papaŋ, yaŋ ni hakɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na mɛnɛ ba yina sɔkinɔkɔ. Yaŋ ka nda yando tɛŋɛ ba domo na hati nda.’
42015022	Kɛrɛ fandama thiyi bawaliŋ nama beŋ, na ‘Sisaŋ yako kuhɔli ku yamɛ yɔhɔ koŋ, e beŋ niŋ kuŋ si thiya. Thiyaŋ niŋ gbɛtu iŋ dagbalɛŋ ka ŋathaki.
42015023	Kaayiyaŋ manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, e beŋ niŋ si kɔra, awa miŋ thɔmɛŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ.
42015024	Baa hati niŋ woŋ wotukɛ na nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ thɔhɔy; wopiriŋɛ na nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ yaŋ kute niŋ?’ Kɛna bohe bindɛ fooma yehitɔkɔ.
42015025	“Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, hati nama wowathe wobakalaŋ woŋ kɔŋ nde ka dumgbu ka. Naa kooye wundɛ gboŋa ba duwa ka mɛti ka, wundɛ si nthɔŋ thuriye, wundɛ yuye sɔnkɔ ba muhaŋ muŋ mɛnɛ kama hubɛina.
42015026	Huna thiye wundɛ wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi ka fandama beŋ, na ‘Mbɛ mu niyɔy?’
42015027	Huna dome wundɛ, na ‘Wɛnda wohatiyɛ wo kaayɛ nde woŋ na tɛŋɛ, awa fanda kore manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, baa wundɛ kute hɛlɛŋ niŋ wopethɔy nakeŋ!’
42015028	Wɛndama wobakalaŋ woŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ. Wundɛ tha mɛyi ba biyande ka banka ka. Kɛna see niŋ fandama theteke ba wundɛ be biyande.
42015029	Kɛrɛ wundɛ tepe fandama na, na ‘Detha, thaninɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ fooma yaŋ bareŋ nɔŋ yina niyiyɛ wali. Hanthe yaŋ baŋineta hɛ yamari nda, kɛrɛ mbɛ mu dunkune yi yama? Hali hintiŋ baahu woyete ba yaŋ be yehitɔkɔ iŋ binyathikɔŋ niŋ, yi tha yama niŋ dunkune.
42015030	Kɛrɛ hati nda woŋ baŋ, wo teetuwɛ kɛɛ bakɛnda baŋ fooma ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi katitoko nama yo nama beŋ, naa see hɛ wundɛ, yi koriye niŋ manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma!’
42015031	Huna tepe fandama, na ‘Hatiŋ woŋ, yi, yi kɔŋ iŋ yaŋ dondo timo tima awa ntha yo ntha kikiyaŋ yina biyɛ.
42015032	Kɛrɛ miŋ kɔŋ ba niya yakali, e miŋ yehitɔkɔ, baa wɛnda woŋ baŋ ndɛ tuku nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ thɔhɔy; wundɛ piriŋe nde, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ kuto.’ ”
42016001	Yisɔs tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ: na “Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ iŋ nde badethiteke wunthe wo dethiteke nanhulu nama baŋ fooma. Wundɛ sisiyo ŋafuŋutu ba dɔma na badethiteke woŋ thanki teetuwa nanhulu nama baŋ.
42016002	Bananhulu woŋ ŋindi ba badethiteke woŋ be ka thiya, na ‘Mbɛ hu yaŋ yuyɛ haŋ ba yi? Awa saa tɔŋ kuna si kute yi iŋ si thunkuŋ yi, baa yi sa nda niyɔ bawali wokiyaŋ hali.’
42016003	Huna tepe badethiteke woŋ ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Mbɛ hu yaŋ ni yee naa see hɛ yaŋ ka kanito wali bakiyaŋ baŋ na? Yaŋ sa nda punku wali ba ka kusaala koŋ baŋ; yaŋ nɛnɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ba yawa.
42016004	Ka tete yaŋ kɔthɛŋ nda na yaŋ ni, haliko na yama biya yereke ka bankɛŋ bakɛnamɛŋ naa yaŋ fuŋuto ka wali ba ka dethiteke haŋ baŋ.’
42016005	Huna thiye wundɛ bi ba thunkuna mariki nama woŋ beŋ. Wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ womayoŋ woŋ, na ‘Tima yi ba thunkuna mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ?’
42016006	Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Mayɔ thakiyanɛ kɛmɛŋ biye.’ Huna tepe badethiteke woŋ, na ‘Ya dondo kuthagba nda koŋ; dɔŋɔ, e yi thikipa magbali maŋ ka thakiyanɛ kɛmɛ wunthe.’
42016007	Wundɛ thiyi hɛlɛŋ wobiye woŋ, na ‘Mbu yi, tima yi ba thunkuna mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ?’ Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Paka yankamani kɛmɛŋ bitaati.’ Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Ya dondo kuthagba nda koŋ e yi thikipa magbali maŋ ka paka yankamani kɛmɛ wunthe e kɔnthɔ kasɔhi.’
42016008	Mariki woŋ baŋ thunkunu badethiteke wo be yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya woŋ baŋ ba kele nama haŋ ba na kɔsinɔkɔy wundɛ ba malɔkɔ ma see maŋ. Biya bi dɔŋɔy ba deethuwa nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ beŋ hɛ akele haaŋ adaŋande mpati bi ka waŋ baŋ beŋ.
42016009	“Bɛna yaŋ tepe bena, dethuweŋ thayathikiya ka nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ, baa, mɛnɛ bɛŋ pɛyi bena, beŋ kɔŋ yɛroko iŋ Masaala ka madoŋe ma kɔy yo kɔy maŋ.
42016010	Wɔ yo wɔ wo thimɔy niyo lanɛya ka wuyete, wundɛ kɔŋ thimɔ niyo lanɛya ka wubɔyɛ.
42016011	Mɛnɛ beŋ tha niyɔ bendo yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ka nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ, nkaana bena piteke ba nanhulu ba yamɛ yiki baŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma?
42016012	Naa beŋ tha niyɔ bendo yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ka ntha ki ka wɔ hɛna kɔŋ, mbɛ bena dunkune wukendeŋ wuŋ gbeeŋ?
42016013	“Bawali ka wo punku niyiyɛ marikɔŋ biye wali, baa lɔkɔ hɛ ndɛ kɔŋ thambo wunthe e wundɛ thimo wunthe, maa ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wunthe yiki e niŋ putiyɔ e yethitɔ wunthe. Yi sa punku niyiyɛ Masaala na wali e yi hɛlɛŋ niyɔ waayi wo ka nanhulu kɔɔ hanthe.”
42016014	Naa yuye huŋ biFaresini beŋ, bi thimo kɔbiri wumandiŋ-mandiŋ beŋ, wuŋ thime bindɛ dɛkuiŋ.
42016015	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ, bena tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biya nɔŋ bendo thumbɛ, kɛrɛ Masaala kɔthɛŋ thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ. Bɛyiniŋ ba biyamɛti kutu wumandiŋ, Masaala kute bɛŋ nɔŋ ntha kituunuwɛ.
42016016	“Bɛyiniŋ ba gbalo ka Siraŋ baŋ baŋ iŋ magbali ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ ni wali haaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma ka Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ. There nda ka malɔkɔ mabɛina, Huseri Huyɔhɔy hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ niyo kɛwandi. Wɔ yo wɔ nda adekiyɔkɔ ba biyande kɛndɛ.
42016017	Kɛrɛ ba soora wunthe wo ka Siraŋ baŋ ba fuŋa, bɛyi bɛna bakahɛ-kahɛ; wu kɔŋ yaŋ niyɔ wuŋɛnɔy ba ariana iŋ dunia baŋ ba daŋande.
42016018	“Wɔ yo wɔ wo baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama e wundɛ ka yɛnta yɛrɛmɛ wohɛna, wundɛ ni kubɛy. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛnti yɛrɛmɛ wo baŋino iŋ wandama, wundɛ ni kubɛy.
42016019	“Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ nde wo thɔɔ mupithi muyɔhɔy mu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ, e wundɛ kɔ thɔma wumandiŋ timo tima.
42016020	Bamɔnɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo dɔma Lasarɔsi wo thiŋɛ iŋ mathimɔyŋ, wo ŋɔɔ timo tima ka biyo hu ka bananhulu woŋ.
42016021	Lasarɔsi thimoŋ ba thɔma ŋaboba ŋa bananhulu woŋ tɔnki ŋaŋ ka karo nama baŋ. Yɔkɔŋ ŋatheŋ bina see ba minuwa mathimɔyŋ nama maŋ.
42016022	Malɔkɔ manthe bamɔnɛ woŋ see tuku. Wundɛ see kata iŋ malekɛŋ beŋ e ka thiyo ka thɛnkɔ tha ka Ebrahim thaŋ. Bananhulu woŋ see hɛlɛŋ tuku e wundɛ mankuwo.
42016023	Ka yahanama kɛna niyɔy wundɛ ka nambara bathoonɛ. Kɛna dethe wundɛ ka thinthi. Wundɛ kute Ebrahim na wuthokiye e Lasarɔsi niŋ doŋe kuwaŋ.
42016024	Kɛna yele wundɛ thampa, na ‘Fandaŋ Ebrahim, kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ. Ŋinda Lasarɔsi na ba wundɛ be muluŋ kuthenke nama koŋ ka mandi e wundɛ yama thondine ka hiliŋ niŋ haŋ baa yaŋ kɔŋ ka nambara bamandiŋ ka buu buŋ buŋ!’
42016025	Kɛrɛ Ebrahim tepe, na ‘Hatiŋ woŋ, siyuwa naa nde yi ka dunia baŋ ka hɛri bakɛnda e Lasarɔsi kɔ niyɔ thɔrɔ. Kɛrɛ ka hɛ woŋ wundɛ kɔŋ ka mathɛbɛ, yi nɛnɛ yi kɔŋ ka wuthoonɛ.
42016026	Hali ba huŋ kutɛ hintiŋ, mateete makɛntuŋ iŋ beŋ, matha masunŋɔy maŋarinɛ nɔŋ ka tha ka tha kuyɛkɛŋ mankande ma kɔŋ mina mateete ba bi dondo beŋ bi ba kaa kendeŋ ka beŋ, bi be tha kɛndɛ punku kaa, awa wɔ be tha hɛlɛŋ punku ŋayi kɛndɛ ba saa dondo.’
42016027	Huna tepe bananhulu woŋ, na ‘Mba yaŋ theteke nda yina, fandaŋ woŋ, ba yi be ŋindi Lasarɔsi na ka biya niŋ ka,
42016028	baa yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ mbɛndaŋ bisɔhi, haliko wundɛ be bindɛ ka yeli na sa nda bindɛ see du tha du thɔrɔ dondo.’
42016029	Kɛrɛ Ebrahim tepe, na ‘Bi kɔŋ iŋ magbali ma ka Musa maŋ iŋ ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ ba bindɛ yela, awa bi kɔŋ ba mɛŋ poniyɛ kuiha.’
42016030	Huna tepe bananhulu woŋ, na ‘Ade, fandaŋ woŋ Ebrahim, huŋ sa ni wali, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ ŋaye nda ka tuka haŋ e wundɛ bindɛ ka yela, bi kɔŋ sikiyɔkɔ maŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikɛnamɛŋ.’
42016031	Huna tepe Ebrahim, na ‘Mɛnɛ bindɛ tha poniyɛ kuiha magbali ma ka Musa maŋ iŋ ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ, hali aŋaye na wɔ ka tuka haŋ bindɛ sa sikiyɔkɔ.’ ”
