42017001	Huna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Nɔndi yaathi, bɛyiniŋ ba thiiki biya ba ŋɔta ka hakɛ bɛ kɔŋ see, kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka wɔ bɛina wo bɛŋ sisi woŋ.
42017002	Ba niya wunthe ka bithahuwɔy beŋ beŋ ba ŋɔta ka hakɛ, wu kɔŋ niyɔ kuhita ba wɔɔŋ yantino raka humandiŋ ka nkoyo e ka yelo ka mandi masunŋɔy-sunŋɔy.
42017003	Bɛna niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba ba beŋ ni. “Mɛnɛ wɛnda ni hakɛ, pinda niŋ; naa wundɛ sikɔŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ, pɛniyɛ niŋ.
42017004	Mɛnɛ wundɛ ni yina bɛyi banɛnɔy dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye e wundɛ yina theteke dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye ba gbɛɛŋ woŋ, yi kɔŋ ba niŋ pɛniyɛ.”
42017005	Huna tepe baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ beŋ ka Mariki woŋ, na “Yaandi, ndintiyɛ mina kulanɛya ntuŋ koŋ.”
42017006	Huna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ niyɔy iŋ kulanɛya nɔŋ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na mɔstadi, hu thɔyande nɔŋ mpende, e beŋ tepe kuyeŋ kumandiŋ koŋ koŋ na ‘Mukɔ dondo e yi ka kɔɔ ka mankɔ ka,’ ku kɔŋ bena putiyɔ.
42017007	“Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy na wɔ wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ iŋ bawali wunthe wo niŋ niyiyɛ wali ka yiya nama maa wo niŋ tɔliyɛ takɛŋ? Mɛnɛ bawali woŋ tɛŋ ŋaye ka dumgbu, e yi kɔŋ niŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Kahina, yi be sɛkɛthi muthɔma nda, yi be thɔŋ’?
42017008	Wuŋ sa niyɔ! Yi kɔŋ hintiŋ niŋ yenke tepe, na ‘Yehinuwa muthɔma mukiyaŋ muŋ e yi sɛkitha muthɔɔ mukɛnda e yi yama dunkune muthɔma muŋ. Naa yaŋ muŋ thɔŋ e yaŋ kɔ thiiye, mahɛŋ mabɛina yi kɔŋ ntiŋ sɛkɛthi muthɔma mukɛnda muŋ ba thɔma.’
42017009	Wuŋ ka na yɔkɔŋ bawali woŋ thiyo maamo ba putiyɔ nama yamari haŋ.
42017010	Nɛna hɛlɛŋ beŋ, naa beŋ thanki niya ba domo beŋ ba niya baŋ, tɛpaŋ, na ‘Miŋ kɔŋ hɔkɔŋ bawaliŋ; gbɛthɛŋ bakɛntuŋ bɛna ni miŋ baŋ.’ ”
42017011	Naa wundɛ ka biyasi nama haŋ ba kaa ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, wundɛ fuŋe mateete ma ka Sameriya iŋ ka Kalili.
42017012	Naa bohe Yisɔs ba biyande ka mɛti banthe, kɛna penko wundɛ iŋ biya kɔhi bi iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi e bindɛ kɔɔ wuthokiye.
42017013	Bindɛ yele thampa e tepe Yisɔs na, na “Mariki, kutiyɛ mina nkinikiniŋ.”
42017014	Naa kute Yisɔs bindɛ, wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Kaaŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ bafodeni beŋ, ba bi be kɔthɔ na beŋ pethɔy.” Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ key, bindɛ kute ba dɔma na bindɛ pethɔy nagbelebe.
42017015	Wunthe ka mateete namɛŋ, naa kute wundɛ ba dɔma na wundɛ pethɔy, wundɛ duu kaŋ thunkunuwa Masaala na iŋ thampɛŋ thatɔɔkɛ.
42017016	Wundɛ see ŋɔti ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs e niŋ thiya maamo, kɛrɛ hati lamgba woŋ, wɔ na nde wo ŋaye ka siya bayethitiyo ba dɔma baŋ na biSameriya.
42017017	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “E kɔhi kutɛ puyo? Mbu bisɔŋ-binaŋ beŋ?
42017018	E wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna tha kutɔ ba si thiya Masaala na maamo yɔkɔŋ thahinɛ woŋ baŋ?”
42017019	Huna tepe wundɛ hati lamgba woŋ, na “Ŋayi, kɔ, key ba ntha nda. Lanɛya bakɛnda petheŋ yina.”
42017020	Naa thonthiŋino wundɛ iŋ biFaresini beŋ ba malɔkɔ ma Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ see, wundɛ tepe, na “Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ seeta iŋ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ tɛŋ.
42017021	Maa, ba hintiŋ tɛpa, na ‘Ya huŋ dondo,’ maa, ‘Ya huŋ kanka.’ Dethaŋ hɛ, Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ mateete makendeŋ.”
42017022	Huna tepe wundɛ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see ma beŋ thimo ba hɛlɛŋ kutiyɔkɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ iŋ malɔkɔ makɛnama maŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa mɛŋ kutu.
42017023	Biya binɔndi bi kɔŋ bena tepe, na ‘Dethaŋ ka thuhaŋ ka,’ maa ‘Dethaŋ dondo,’ kɛrɛ baŋ kɛndɛ dethi, ba hintiŋ tɛpa na ba bindɛ yema.
42017024	Naa nthɔŋ beŋ kutu naa kuwalani koŋ ni ka kuthahinɛ koŋ na, ku kɔŋ mɔɔlɔti kuthahinɛ koŋ ŋaye kuwaŋ kunthe makey ka kuwaŋ kukuntheŋ koŋ, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malɔkɔ ma ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ maŋ.
42017025	Kɛrɛ wundɛ boheŋ hintiŋ ba niyo thɔrɔ e baŋinoko iŋ biya bi ka yamana nama baŋ.
42017026	Na nde nthɔŋ wuŋ ka yamana ba ka Nowa baŋ na, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka yamana ba ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ baŋ.
42017027	Wɔ yo wɔ athɔŋ, athiiye, ayɛntuwande haaŋ saaŋ bohi malɔkɔ ma thɔɔyɛ Nowa ka gbe baŋ maŋ. Mandi matɛnkɛ maŋ bindɛ si kɔruwa fooma.
42017028	Wu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na niyɔy nde wuŋ ka yamana ba ka Lɔti baŋ na. Wɔ yo wɔ athɔŋ, athiiye, aboyi, ani gbɔŋ, athuu, athoyi.
42017029	Kɛrɛ ka malɔkɔ ma fuŋ Lɔti ka Sɔdɔmi, Masaala thuhuŋ kɛndɛ tharaka tha buu nɔŋ koyoŋ ŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ e bindɛ si kɔɔruwa fooma.
42017030	Nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malɔkɔ ma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see.
42017031	“Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, wɔ yo wɔ wo penko ka gbada ka, ndɛ bɛiŋ nda biyande ba sɛkitha munki nama; nɛna hɛlɛŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔthɔi ka dumgbu nama, ndɛ bɛiŋ nda kaho ba duwa.
42017032	Simɔkɔŋ ba yɛrɛmɛ wo ka Lɔti woŋ!
42017033	Wɔ yo wɔ wo gbɛrɛŋɛŋ ba niya sii nama baŋ kisi, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ, kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ kutu.
42017034	Ka huyɛ babɛina biya biye bi kɔŋ ŋɔɔ ka kuhinsi kunthe; wunthe kɔŋ si sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ peyo.
42017035	Yɛrɛmɛŋ biye bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ka yɔŋa ka kuthodo kunthe, wunthe kɔŋ sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ peyo. [
42017036	Biyɛthɛŋ biye bi kɔŋ niyɔ ka dumgbu banthe; wunthe kɔŋ sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ pɛyo.]”
42017037	Kɛna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Thɔ kɛndɛ ka wuŋ niiye, Mariki?” Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ kute ŋabeli ŋa ŋoye, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yibani bi kɔŋ ŋɔti kɛndɛ.”
42018001	Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ ba bindɛ thaninuwa ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ ba niya kuraminɛ timo tima awa bindɛ ka ba yɔntuwa hali.
42018002	Wundɛ tepe, na “Bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ wunthe kɔŋ nde ka mɛti banthe. Wundɛ payeta Masaala na, awa ndɛ niyeta wɔmɛti yiki.
42018003	Awa bagbokora wunthe kɔŋ kɛndɛ ka mɛti babɛina, wo see yako-yako ka bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ, e kɔ tɛpa, na ‘Mase yama ba yama dunkune mayoho niŋ maŋ ka kithi ba miŋ iŋ ntɔŋ woŋ baŋ.’
42018004	Bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ tha mɛyi ba wuŋ niya yako, kɛrɛ naa nambe wuŋ haaŋ wundɛ tepe ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Hali na niyɔy wuŋ na yaŋ payeta Masaala na, yaŋ niyeta wɔmɛti yiki,
42018005	halisa bagbokora woŋ kɔŋ yama ni thɔrɔ. Yaŋ kɔŋ kɔnsɔŋɔŋ kithi nama baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, saa nama haŋ yako-yako hu kɔŋ yama thamaŋ.’ ”
42018006	Kɛna key Yisɔs ka kɔtɔkɔy e tɛpa, na “Yuyaŋ hu tepe bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ wosikɔi woŋ.
42018007	E Masaala sa kɔnsɔŋɔŋ wuthumbɛ biya nama beŋ bi niŋ berinteke gbɛɛŋ iŋ piripiri beŋ? E wundɛ kɔŋ kɔɔkɔ ba bindɛ mase?
42018008	Yaŋ tepe bena, wundɛ kɔŋ bindɛ mase ka kɔnsiŋina haŋ, awa ndɛ kɔŋ ntiŋ wuŋ ni yako. Kɛrɛ, e Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ pɛnki biya bi niyɛ lanɛya ka dunia baŋ naa wundɛ see?”
42018009	Yisɔs gbonkoy hɛlɛŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ ka biya bi niyɛ lanɛya yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ ba bindɛ niyɔ bithumbɛ e bindɛ yethitɔ wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna:
42018010	“Biya biye bina kɔɔyɛ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ba niya kuraminɛ, wunthe woŋ woFaresi, wowuntheŋ woŋ wo bathuu duthu.
42018011	WoFaresi woŋ kɔɔyɛ ndɛ wuntheŋ; ndɛ ni kuraminɛ ka yɛthɛ nama e tɛpa, na ‘Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo Masaala, baa yaŋ ka nɔŋ biya bihɛna; yaŋ ka bamilɛ, yaŋ ka wɔ nɛnɔy, yaŋ ka babɛy. Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo, baa yaŋ ka nɔŋ bathuu duthu wo kɔɔyɛ kanka woŋ na.
42018012	Yaŋ kɔŋ bohi suŋ kaye ba wiki, yaŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wu tɛŋɛŋ kɔhi wuŋ maŋaye ka ntha yo ntha ki iŋ yaŋ.’
42018013	Kɛrɛ bathuu duthu woŋ kɔɔyɛ wuthokiye. Wundɛ tha hintiŋ nthɔŋ ŋataŋ thaaya nama thaŋ ka ariana; wundɛ sinkɔŋ yaha nama haŋ e tɛpa, na ‘Masaala, kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ, yando bahakɛ.’ ”
42018014	Yisɔs tepe, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, bathuu duthu woŋ baŋ si duu ka banka nama ka, Masaala yɛrɔkɔy niŋ nɔŋ wɔ thumbɛ. Kɛrɛ woFaresi woŋ, Masaala tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ nɔŋ wɔ thumbɛ. Baa, wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋatinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ thathina; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo thathinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋatina.”
42018015	Komisɛŋ binɔndi sisi malɛɛthɛŋ namɛŋ ba Yisɔs be bindɛ si tutu thɛnkɔ e bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba. Kɛrɛ naa kute bakarandeni beŋ bindɛ, bindɛ pinde bindɛ ba bi be tha wuŋ ni.
42018016	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs thiyi ba bi be sisa, wundɛ tepe, na “Mpati beŋ saaɛŋ kiyaŋ do; baŋ bindɛ pindi, baa na mpati beŋ na, nɛna biya bi biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ ba niyɔ.
42018017	Yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, yɔkɔŋ wɔ yɛrɔkɔy Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ nɔŋ na huŋ hatiyɛ yɛreke na, mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, wundɛ sa kɛndɛ punku biyande.”
42018018	Kɛna thonthiŋine niŋ wɔ wunthe wo iŋ makooye maŋatɛ, na “Karimɔkɔ woyɔhɔy, mbɛ ba yaŋ ni ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy?”
42018019	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba yama yi thiye karimɔkɔ woyɔhɔy? Wɔ yo wɔ ka woyɔhɔy yɔkɔŋ Masaala pe.
42018020	Yi kɔthɛŋ Sirani ba ka Masaala baŋ: ‘Ba ni kubɛy, ba kɔri, ba tuwe, ba ni maseri maŋasɔkɛ, niya fanda na yiki iŋ nanda.’ ”
42018021	Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Sirani baŋ baŋ fooma yaŋ kooye bɛŋ kɔsina kabi yaŋ kɔŋ nde hatiyɛ.”
42018022	Naa yuye Yisɔs yaabi baŋ baŋ, wundɛ tepe hati lamgba woŋ, na “Kɛrɛ bɛyi banthe bɛna pɛyɛ yina, kaa ni gbɔŋ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ yi, e yi dunkuna ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ kɛɛ bamandiŋ ka ariana. Mahɛŋ mabɛina e yi saa ba yama si yema.”
42018023	Kɛrɛ naa see hati lamgba woŋ yuyɛ yaabi ba ni Yisɔs baŋ baŋ, wundɛ teetuwɔy thukuma, baa bananhulu na nde womandiŋ.
42018024	Naa niŋ Yisɔs dethi, wundɛ tepe, na “Akaahi ba bananhuluiŋ beŋ ba biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ!
42018025	Akaahi ba maama womandiŋ nɔŋ nyɔkɔmɛ ba fuŋande ka matha ma ka masandeŋ. Awa ba bananhulu ba biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, wu kɔŋ yaŋ kaahuwa.”
42018026	Biya bi yuyɛ huŋ beŋ tepe, na “Mbu mbɛ bi niyɔ kisi ntiŋ nda?”
42018027	Yisɔs tepe, na “Ba sa wɔmɛti punku niya, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ ni.”
42018028	Huna tepe Pita, na “Detha, miŋ fooma pɛyi yikiyani bakɛntuŋ e miŋ yina yema.”
42018029	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ ka wo pɛyɛnɛ yikiya nama, maa yɛrɛmɛ nama, maa mbɛndama, maa biya nama, maa mpati nama ba saathɛ ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ,
42018030	wo sa muŋ duu ka kuta makɔɔni mabɔyɛ e daŋande ba mu pɛyɛŋ wundɛ muŋ ka yamana bahɛ baŋ, iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy ka yamana ba nɔŋ see baŋ.”
42018031	Awa naa ŋakɔy wundɛ, wundɛ sekithe bakarandeni bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ. Wundɛ tepe kɛnamɛŋ, na “Dethaŋ, kaa na miŋ key haŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi; bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thankɛ gbalo iŋ banabiŋ beŋ ba Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, bɛ kɔŋ niyɔ nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na gbalo nde bɛŋ na.
42018032	Baa wundɛ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biya bi be kɔthɔ Masaala na. Ndɛ kɔŋ hɛtha, e niyo kuyaahu, e thutho.
42018033	Bi kɔŋ niŋ gbuduŋ, e kɔra niŋ, awa ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋayi.”
42018034	Kɛrɛ bakarandeni beŋ tha metho bɛyi banthe. Kolo ba ka madunkunɔkɔy maŋ maŋ tha bindɛ methe. Bindɛ tha punku fuŋeke bɛyiniŋ ba gbonkoy Yisɔs baŋ.
42018035	Naa Yisɔs thuriye ka Yɛriko, wɔ mankɔy thaaya doŋeŋ nde ka gboŋa baŋ kuwaŋ e kɔ yawa.
42018036	Naa yuye wɔ mankɔy thaaya woŋ sɛthɛ baŋ bɛ si daŋande, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bithuriye niŋ beŋ, na “Mbɛ mu niyɔy?”
42018037	Bindɛ tepe niŋ, na “Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ na daŋande.”
42018038	Kɛna bereŋ wundɛ, na “Yisɔs! Hati ka Dauda, yaandi kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ!”
42018039	Bi nde ka kɔtɔkɔy biya muŋ beŋ pinde niŋ ba ndɛ be daanɔkɔ, kɛrɛ wundɛ yame ntiŋ berina, na “Hati ka Dauda, yaandi kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ!”
42018040	Kɛna kɔɔyɛ Yisɔs. Wundɛ ni yamari ba hati lamgba wo mankɔy thaaya woŋ be sisa kɛnama. Naa siso wundɛ, Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na
42018041	“Mbɛ ba thimo yi ba yaŋ yina niyiyɛ?” Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ thimoŋ ba hɛlɛŋ kuta.”
42018042	Yisɔs tepe kɛnama, na “Awa kuta; kulanɛya kukɛnda petheŋ yina.”
42018043	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina hati lamgba woŋ punke ba kuta. Wundɛ ŋaye e yema Yisɔs na, e kaa kaŋ thiya Masaala na maamo. Naa kute wuŋ biya beŋ, bindɛ fooma thunkunu Masaala na.
42019001	Naa tɛŋ Yisɔs ka Yɛriko, wundɛ bohe ba kɛriŋande mɛti baŋ.
42019002	Bayaha wo ka thuuwa duthu wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ. Wundɛ kɔŋ dɔma na Sakiyɔsi, wo bananhulu womandiŋ.
42019003	Wo thimo nde ba kutiyɔkɔ wo dɔma Yisɔs woŋ. Kɛrɛ wundɛ niyɔ wothurɔy. Wundɛ punketa ba kuta Yisɔs na, na sɛthɛ baŋ babɔyɛ.
42019004	Huna thare wundɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e ka dunkɔ ka kuyeŋ ba kuta Yisɔs na, wo nde ba fuŋe gboŋa babɛina woŋ.
42019005	Naa see Yisɔs kɛndɛ tɛŋ, wundɛ dethe ka thinthi e tɛpa ka Sakiyɔsi, na “Kahina thuha Sakiyɔsi, baa ka banka bakɛnda baŋ na hɛ yaŋ niye yikiya.”
42019006	Sakiyɔsi thuhe yako e yɛritɔ niŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
42019007	Biya beŋ fooma bi kutiyɔkɔy wuŋ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ e kɔ tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ bohe kaa kaŋ thɔma ka banka ba ka bahakɛ!”
42019008	Sakiyɔsi ŋayinɔkɔy e tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Detha, hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ haninande nanhulu niŋ baŋ mateete, e yaŋ dunkune bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Mɛnɛ kanite wɔ ntha yo ntha ka kɔɔtha maa ka kansuŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ wuŋ dutiyɛ makɔɔni manaŋ.”
42019009	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Hɛ kisi baŋ biyande ka banka baŋ baŋ, baa wundɛ hɛlɛŋ hati Ebrahim na.
42019010	Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see ba saa ka deethuwa iŋ ba si niya kisi bipiriŋɛ beŋ.”
42019011	Naa bindɛ poniyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ kuiha, wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tepe bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, baa ka lɔkɔ babɛina wundɛ bohe nda ba biyande ka Yɛrusalɛmi, awa biya beŋ fooma simɔkɔy nda ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ tete tɛŋ.
42019012	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Wɔ ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka hugbakine kɔŋ nde ba kaa wuthokiye napooŋ ba ka boho hugbakine. Wundɛ dɛɛnki ba duwa ka mɛti nama ka naa wundɛ key kutu hugbakine haŋ.
42019013	Saanuŋ wundɛ ba kaa, wundɛ thiyi biya kɔhi ŋaye ka bawaliŋ nama beŋ, e dunkune bindɛ kɔbiri woboyi wunthe-wunthe, na ‘Pɛyɔŋ niŋ sikinuwande haaŋ yaŋ nɔŋ saa.’
42019014	Kɛrɛ biya bi doŋe wundɛ ka mɛti baŋ beŋ kaake tha niŋ thimo. Huna peyene bindɛ baseriŋ mahɛŋ nama ba ka tepe bayahɛŋ beŋ, na ‘Hati lamgba woŋ, miŋ thimota niŋ ba wundɛ niyɔ gbaku wokɛntuŋ.’
42019015	“Halisa hati lamgba woŋ key kutu hugbakine haŋ. Naa kute wundɛ huŋ, wundɛ duu. Wundɛ see thiyi bawaliŋ nama beŋ ba bi be si tɔŋ kuna ba wɔ yo wɔ si pɛyɛ wundɛ ka kuta.
42019016	Womayoŋ woŋ see wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, ka kɔbiri wo dunkune nde yama yi woŋ, ya kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi ka thinthi.’
42019017	Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yi, bawali woyɔhɔy na yi. Mba na niyɔy yi wɔ thimɔy niyo lanɛya ka wuthahuwɔy wuŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ yina dunkuŋ ba kɛriŋiyɛ mɛtiŋ kɔhi.’
42019018	Bawali wobiye woŋ see. Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, yaŋ kute kɔbiriŋ bisɔhi biboyi ka thinthi ka wo dunkune nde yi yama woŋ.’
42019019	Huna tepe wundɛ niŋ, na ‘Yi kɔŋ niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ ka mɛtiŋ basɔhi.’
42019020	Bawali wowuntheŋ woŋ see hɛlɛŋ. Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, ya dondo kɔbiri woboyi wunthe wo dunkune nde yi yama woŋ. Yaŋ kosineŋ nɔŋ niŋ ka kulɛmpi-lɛmpi ku ka yankisa niŋ woŋ.
42019021	Yando nde yina payɔ, baa yi, wɔ na yi wo thiyɛ dɛnkɛŋ. Yi kɔŋ sɛkɛthi wu ka wukɛnda; yi kɔŋ ŋɔŋ ka tha yi payi.’
42019022	Huna tepe gbaku woŋ, na ‘Yi, bawali wonɛnɔy na yi. Madunkunɔkɔy nda maŋ mɛna yaŋ sɛkɛthi ba yina thonkine. Yi, yi kɔthɛŋ ba yaŋ kɔ sɛkitha wu ka wukiyaŋ, e yaŋ kɔ ŋɔna ka tha yaŋ payi.
42019023	Mbu mbɛ ba tha nde yi thohinuwe kɔbiri niŋ woŋ? Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, naa yaŋ duu nde nɔŋ yaŋ kɔŋ nde nɔŋ si tutiya ka thunkuno.’
42019024	Huna tepe wundɛ biya bi kɔɔyɛ nde kɛndɛ beŋ, na ‘Bohitaŋ niŋ kɔbiri woŋ, e beŋ niŋ dunkuna ka wo iŋ kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi woŋ.’
42019025	Huna tepe bindɛ, na ‘Kɛrɛ wundɛ kɔŋ nda iŋ kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi ye!’
42019026	Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ ntha woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ ndintiya wumandiŋ. Kɛrɛ wo ka iŋ ntha woŋ, hali wuyete wu iŋ wundɛ wuŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ wuŋ kanita.
42019027	Ka tete, hadeni niŋ beŋ bi ka nde ba yaŋ niyɔ gbaku namɛŋ beŋ, sisaŋ bindɛ dondo e bindɛ si koro ka thaaya niŋ thaŋ!’ ”
42019028	Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya, wundɛ key kubiyasi nama koŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42019029	Naa bohe wundɛ thuriye ka mɛtiŋ ba ka Bɛthɛfɛki mɛnɛ ka Bɛthani, ka kusɛri ku dɔma na Ɔlifisi, Yisɔs ŋindi biya biye ŋaye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy.
42019030	Wundɛ ŋindi bindɛ iŋ manunkunɔkɔ maŋ maŋ, na “Kaaŋ ka mɛti ba bena ka kɔtɔkɔy baŋ. Naa beŋ biyande kɛndɛ, beŋ kɔŋ kɛndɛ pɛnki maama wotutuyo wohatiyɛ yuke wo be hɛ tutuyo bahanthe; pɛɛkaŋ niŋ, e beŋ niŋ sisa dondo.
42019031	Awa mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bena ba beŋ niŋ peeke, tepeŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Mariki woŋ na thimo niŋ ba niŋ niye bɛyi.’ ”
42019032	Bakarandeni biye beŋ key, awa bindɛ key pɛnki nɔŋ na tepo nthɔŋ bindɛ iŋ Yisɔs na.
42019033	Naa bohe bindɛ pɛɛka maama woŋ, bibiyɛ niŋ beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ peeke maama woŋ?”
42019034	Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Mariki woŋ na thimo niŋ ba niŋ niye bɛyi.”
42019035	Bindɛ sisi niŋ ka Yisɔs, e bindɛ yiinthuwa maama wohatiyɛ woŋ ŋahɔli e bindɛ tuta kɛndɛ Yisɔs na.
42019036	Naa Yisɔs kata iŋ maama woŋ, biya binɔndi bohe taayuwa ŋahɔli ka gboŋa ba Yisɔs fuŋe baŋ.
42019037	Naa thuriye Yisɔs ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ka thuhe gboŋa ba ŋaye ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi koŋ baŋ, bakarandeni beŋ fooma bohe thiya Masaala na maamo ka thampa thaŋatɛ ba bɛyiniŋ babukuyuwɛ ba thanki bindɛ kutiyɔkɔ baŋ.
42019038	Bindɛ tepe, na “Masaala thiyiyɛŋ gbaku wobɛina thaduba wo see ka keŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ! Mathɛbɛ ka ariana! Yiki ka kuwaŋ ku ka Masaala!”
42019039	Awa biFaresini binɔndi ka mateete ma ka biya muŋ tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, pinda bakarandeni nda beŋ.”
42019040	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, hali adaanɔkɔy na beŋ beŋ, tharaka thaŋ thaŋ gbeeŋ thɛ kɔŋ yɛli thampa.”
42019041	Naa thuriye wundɛ mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ e bɛŋ detha, wundɛ bokoti bɛŋ.
42019042	Wundɛ tepe, na “Wu niyɔyŋ nde hɛ ba dɔma na beŋ kɔthɛ bɛyiniŋ ba sisi mathɛbɛ! Kɛrɛ ka tete bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba nunɔkɔy bena.
42019043	Baa malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ bena see ma bohe hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ ba bena pɛnkande e bena lɔnkita kaake kufɛŋ ndo kufɛŋ.
42019044	Bi kɔŋ teeti mɛti ndeŋ baŋ iŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo kaake ka thatha baŋ. Bindɛ sa pɛyi raka hunthe hu tute ka ntɔ nama, baa beŋ tha ŋee malɔkɔ ma see Masaala ba bena si niya kisi.”
42019045	Kɛna biyande Yisɔs ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, e bɔha kanthuwa biya beŋ fooma bi nde ni kɛndɛ gbɔni bahakuwande beŋ.
42019046	Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Wuŋ thanki nde gbalo ba dɔma na Masaala tepe, na ‘Banka niŋ baŋ, bɛ kɔŋ niyɔ banka ba ka kuraminɛ,’ kɛrɛ beŋ sikɔŋ bɛŋ ka tha ka batuwani nuneke.”
42019047	Awa timo tima wundɛ kɔŋ thanani ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ. Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, iŋ bayahɛŋ bi ka biya beŋ dethi gboŋa ba bindɛ kore Yisɔs na.
42019048	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu bɛyi yo bɛyi ba bindɛ ni, baa biya beŋ fooma bi thimoŋ ba yuyɛ thampa tha ka Yisɔs thaŋ.
42020001	Lɔkɔ banthe naa nde Yisɔs thanani biya beŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ka niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ see niŋ pɛnkande.
42020002	Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Tepe hɛ mina, mbɛ mayoho ma iŋ yi ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yi ni baŋ? Nkaana dunkune yina mayoho mabɛina?”
42020003	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ kɔŋ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ kunthe; ka tete tepeŋ hɛ yama,
42020004	kama ŋaye nde mayoho ma ka Yɔni maŋ ba biye biya, ka Masaala, maa ka wɔmɛti?”
42020005	Bindɛ bohe gbonkiya ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ e ka tɛpa, na “Mɛnɛ miŋ tepe, na ‘Ŋaye ka Masaala,’ wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Mbu mbɛ hu tha nde beŋ niŋ niye kulanɛya?’
42020006	Mɛnɛ miŋ tepe nɛnɛ, na ‘Ŋaye ka biyamɛti,’ biya beŋ fooma bi kɔŋ mina lɔɔpi tharaka haaŋ miŋ tuka, baa bi simekeŋ nde ba dɔma na Yɔni banabi na nde.”
42020007	Huna meyiye bindɛ Yisɔs na, na “Miŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye nde mɛŋ.”
42020008	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ nɛnɛ, yaŋ sa bena tepe ka kute yaŋ mayoho ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yaŋ ni baŋ.”
42020009	Kɛna tepe wundɛ biya beŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ na mahɛ nde dumgbu e wundɛ thuuwa ŋayeŋ ŋatimɛ e bɛŋ dunkuna ka bawaliŋ, e bindɛ tepe ba niŋ kɔsiniyɛ mutiŋ munɔndi ba naa wundɛ tɛŋ nɔŋ, e kaa kubiyasi ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuthokiye ba wunambɛ.
42020010	Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba ka thada mutiŋ muŋ baŋ, bayɔy woŋ ŋindi waayi nama wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi peye wundɛ dumgbu baŋ beŋ, ba bi be niŋ ka dunkune mutiŋ munɔndi. Kɛrɛ bawaliŋ beŋ bohe baseri woŋ. Bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ. Bindɛ tha niŋ dunkune ntha, nɛna duu wundɛ wu ka ntha.
42020011	Huna ŋindi hɛlɛŋ wundɛ waayi wobiye woŋ. Bindɛ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ haaŋ bindɛ niŋ niya kuyaahu, nɛŋ duu ma hɛlɛŋ wu ka ntha.
42020012	Wundɛ ŋindi hɛlɛŋ wotaati. Bindɛ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Bindɛ yɔmɔni niŋ e bindɛ niŋ gbanta ka kuyɔrɔ koŋ.
42020013	Huna tepe bayɔy woŋ, na ‘Nama nda yaŋ ni ye? Hu kute yaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ nda ŋindi hatiŋ wo thimo yaŋ woŋ gbeeŋ; thampo bi kɔŋ nda niŋ yɛrɔkɔ.’
42020014	Kɛrɛ naa kute niŋ bawaliŋ beŋ, bindɛ tepe ka yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Woŋ ndɛ na si pɛyɛtɔ kɛɛ baŋ, nkɔraŋ niŋ haliko na kɛɛ baŋ peyiye kɛntuŋ.’
42020015	Kɛna fuŋutu bindɛ niŋ ka dumgbu baŋ e kɔra niŋ.” Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs biya beŋ, na “Nama nda bayɔy woŋ ni bindɛ ye?
42020016	Bayɔy woŋ kɔŋ see e si kɔɔruwa bawaliŋ beŋ beŋ fooma e dunkuna dumgbu nama baŋ ka bawaliŋ bihɛna.” Naa yuye bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, bindɛ tepe, na “Haliko Masaala niya wuŋ thanka.”
42020017	Kɛna dethe bindɛ Yisɔs natiŋ e tɛpa, na “Mbɛ kolo ba ka magbali maŋ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Raka hu baŋino iŋ bathoyini beŋ haŋ ba huŋ niyɔ mayɛini, huna see niyɔ raka hu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda niyɔ waŋ ka thoya haŋ’?
42020018	Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋote raka hubɛina hu kɔŋ niŋ yɔmɔŋ, awa mɛnɛ ntiŋ raka hubɛina ŋote wɔ hu kɔŋ niŋ gbɔkɔlɔti.”
42020019	Karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ iŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ yole ba bɔha Yisɔs na kɔna iŋ kɔna, baa bi kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs gbonkoy mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ baŋ ba bindɛ sɔkinɔkɔ, kɛrɛ bi payɔ biya beŋ.
42020020	Kɛna bohe bindɛ deethuwa gboŋa ba bindɛ niŋ bohe. Bindɛ gbake biya binɔndi ba bi be niyɔkɔ nɔŋ biya bi thimo ba thanuwe ka Yisɔs. Bindɛ ŋindi bindɛ ba ka bohe Yisɔs na ka ŋathɔnthɔŋɔŋ, ba haliko na bindɛ niŋ dunkune ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bayaha wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ woŋ, wo deŋo nde iŋ biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ.
42020021	Biya beŋ beŋ see tɛpi ka Yisɔs, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na yi, karimɔkɔ na yi wothumbɛ; yi detheta makɔɔ ma ka wɔ, kɛrɛ yindo thanani toloŋ nɔndi ba ka Masaala baŋ iŋ madɛɛnki nama maŋ ba wɔmɛti.
42020022	Tepe hɛ mina, e wu kɔŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba thunkuna duthu ka gbaku womandiŋ wo ka Romaŋ woŋ, wo dɔma na Siisa woŋ, maa wuŋ ka ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ?”
42020023	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kute kɔɔtha kukɛnamɛŋ koŋ. Wundɛ tepe bindɛ,
42020024	na “Toŋineŋ hɛ yama kɔbiri woŋ. Mbɛ yethi haŋ haŋ iŋ keŋ koŋ koŋ?” Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Gbaku woŋ Siisa na.”
42020025	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Awa dunkune gbaku woŋ wu ka gbaku, e yi dunkune Masaala na wu ka Masaala.”
42020026	Bindɛ tha kɛndɛ punku kuta gboŋa yo gboŋa ba bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka biya beŋ fooma. Kɛna daanɔkɔy bindɛ nayeŋ e niya kukabanɛ wumandiŋ ba yaabi ba ka Yisɔs baŋ.
42020027	Kɛna see biSadusini binɔndi ka Yisɔs, bi tɛpɛ beŋ ba dɔma na biya sa nɔŋ nda ŋayi ka tuka haŋ,
42020028	e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, Musa gbale nde siraŋ baŋ baŋ ba miŋ: Mɛnɛ wɔ wathe tuku awa e wundɛ pɛya wɔtɔ nama, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niye mpee mpati, wɛndama wowathe woŋ kɔŋ ba pɛɛtɔ bagbokora woŋ bi be mpuu mpati bi nde nɔŋ wɛndama ba mpaa beŋ.
42020029	Lɔkɔ banthe biya bisɔŋ-biye bi huwɛndiya bi kɔŋ nde ka tha banthe. Wokalaŋ woŋ yente yɛrɛmɛ, kɛrɛ wundɛ tuku wu ka hati.
42020030	Wo biye woŋ pɛɛtɔy bagbokora woŋ. Wundɛ tuku hɛlɛŋ wu ka hati.
42020031	Wotaati woŋ pɛɛtɔy hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Biya bisɔŋ-biye beŋ beŋ fooma thanki niŋ yɛnta e bindɛ tuka wu ka hati.
42020032	Naa thanki bindɛ tuukuwa, woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ tuku ntiŋ.
42020033	Ka mɔlɔkɔ ma ka ŋayi ka tuka haŋ maŋ nɔŋ, nkaana biyɔ woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ? Baa biya bisɔŋ-biye beŋ beŋ fooma thanki niŋ yɛnta.”
42020034	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ ayɛnti, adunkuŋ ŋayɛntande.
42020035	Kɛrɛ biya bi niyɔ bitɛŋɛ beŋ ba ŋayi ka hutuka haŋ e bindɛ nɔŋ niyɔ ka yamana ba biya beŋ ŋaye ka tuka haŋ baŋ, bindɛ yenteta, bindɛ dunkuneta yɛnta.
42020036	Baa bindɛ sa nɔŋ nda tuku, baa bi kɔŋ nda nanthe iŋ malekɛŋ e nda niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala, baa biya bina nda bi ŋayino ŋaye ka tuka haŋ.
42020037	Musa tɔŋɔŋ wuŋ nagberekethe, ba dɔma na bitukɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ niyɔ iŋ sii. Ka gbonkiyo wuŋ kɛ ba kuyeŋ ku nde tɔɔki koŋ, e ndɛ kɛndɛ gbonkiya ba Mariki woŋ, ba wundɛ niyɔ Masaala wo ka Ebrahim, Aisaki, mɛnɛ Yakuba.
42020038	Mariki wobɛina, wundɛ na Masaala wo ka bipethɔy beŋ, wuŋ ka wo ka bitukɛ beŋ, baa wu niyɔyŋ bipethɔy, maa bitukɛ, Masaala kute bindɛ ba bindɛ niyɔ iŋ sii ka kuwaŋ kukɛnama koŋ.”
42020039	Binɔndi ka karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, yi gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy.”
42020040	Baa bindɛ tha nda dɔinɔkɔ ba niŋ thɔnthiŋina hɛlɛŋ.
42020041	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Nama dɔmɛ wu be dɔma na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ hati ka gbaku woŋ Dauda?
42020042	Baa wundɛ Dauda yaathi, wundɛ tepe ka buku wo ka Ŋaiŋa ŋaŋ woŋ, na ‘Mariki woŋ tepe ka Mariki niŋ woŋ: na Dɔŋɔ dondo ka yɔnkɔ niŋ huthome haŋ, ka madoŋe mayiki maŋ,
42020043	haaŋ yaŋ thanka sisa bihadeni bikɛnda beŋ fooma ka pothi ka ŋathaki nda ŋaŋ!’
42020044	Dauda thiyi niŋ na Mariki. Nama hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niiye na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ hati ka Dauda?”
42020045	Naa niŋ biya beŋ fooma poniyɛ kuiha, wundɛ yeli bakarandeni nama beŋ,
42020046	na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, bi thimo ba pɛnkande iŋ ŋahɔli ŋathɔɔkuwɛ ba tɔŋina ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ kolo, e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ maanuwo iŋ yiki ka thani ka wuŋ niyo gbɔni baŋ ka, e thimo ba kiiyo madoŋeŋ mathɔɔkɔ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ iŋ madoŋeŋ ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka thɔma.
42020047	Bindɛ kɔŋ tutu bagbokorani beŋ sɛmbɛ, awa e bindɛ ka kaa kaŋ tuuta bindɛ bankɛŋ ba bindɛ peyo iŋ biwandamɛŋ beŋ baŋ, e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ niya ŋaraminɛ ŋathɔɔkuwɛ haliko ba pututa bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy ba bindɛ ni baŋ. Kugbasaŋati kukɛnamɛŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ niyɔ kumandiŋ ayaŋ ba wɔ yo wɔ.”
42021001	Naa Yisɔs yili thaaya na wundɛ kaake ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ, wundɛ dethe natiŋ naa bananhuluiŋ beŋ thiye munkii namɛŋ muŋ ka kuma ba bindɛ kosine kɔbiri woŋ baŋ.
42021002	Kɛna kute wundɛ bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ-bamɔnɛ si thiyi sɛntiŋ biye.
42021003	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ woŋ baŋ, yame thiya wumandiŋ ayaŋ ba beŋ beŋ fooma.
42021004	Baa binɔndi beŋ beŋ thiye maŋaye ka wuyete wu fuŋuŋ bindɛ ka nanhulu namɛŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ woŋ baŋ thiye fooma wu iŋ wundɛ; wundɛ dunkuŋ fooma kɔbiri wo pɛyɛtɔi wundɛ ba thɔma nama.”
42021005	Bakarandeni binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde gbonkoy wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama ba banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ si peye bɛŋ ka yɔhɔ, tharaka tha yehinuwo bɛŋ thaŋ, munkii mu bindɛ dunkuŋ muŋ ba niya Masaala na yiki. Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ,
42021006	na “Fooma mu beŋ kutu muŋ muŋ, malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see raka hunthe huŋ sa tutɔ ka ntɔ nama, thɛ kɔŋ pankitinuwando fooma.”
42021007	Huna thonthiŋine bakarandeni beŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, tima bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niiye? Mbɛ lamanthoŋ wo niyɔ wo mina toŋine ba dɔma na bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ tɛŋ ka niyɔ?”
42021008	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Niyɔŋ bendo siyɔkɔy, awa baŋ mɛyi ba bena wɔ yo wɔ thiika thɔkɔ, baa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ see ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ. Bi kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ba bindɛ kɔ gbonkiya ba yaŋ. Awa bindɛ kɔŋ dɔmɔkɔ, na ‘Yama Banikisi woŋ,’ awa bi kɔŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Malɔkɔ maŋ tɛŋ.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ bindɛ yeŋ.
42021009	Baŋ payɔ mɛnɛ beŋ yuye ba ŋayombo iŋ ŋadekiyande kaake ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ. Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba kɔŋ ba yenke niyɔ. Wuŋ, wuŋ kutɛ nda dɔŋ nde na mapeye maŋ thuriye.”
42021010	Wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tɛpa, na “Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ kɔɔ ba dekiya kuyɛkɛŋ ntɔ nama. Hugbakine hu kɔŋ ŋayinɔkɔ ba dekiya hugbakine.
42021011	Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ ka thani ka bɔyɛ, kɔnthɔ iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande ki kɔŋ niyɔ ka thani ka bɔyɛ, bɛyiniŋ bagbɛki iŋ lamanthoni bɛ kɔŋ see ŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ.
42021012	Kɛrɛ, gboŋa yo gboŋa saanuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ba niyɔ, beŋ kɔŋ yenke boho, e beŋ niyo thɔrɔ. Beŋ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bakɔnsɔŋɔni beŋ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ haaŋ e beŋ thiyo ka nɔthitɔy. Ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kata ka gbakuiŋ iŋ ka bakɛrɛni beŋ.
42021013	Wuŋ, wu kɔŋ niyɔ hɛɛra bakendeŋ ba tɛpa kɛndɛ Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba yaŋ.
42021014	Dɛɛnkaŋ nda ba thana niyɔkɔ yaagba ba hu beŋ ka tɛpi ba na lɔkɔ babɛina tɛŋ.
42021015	Baa yaŋ kɔŋ bena dunkune thampɛŋ iŋ kele hu sa hintiŋ nthɔŋ hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ punku sɔkinɔkɔ.
42021016	Hali hintiŋ biya bi mpɛɛ bena beŋ gbeeŋ, mbɛnda ndeŋ beŋ, mpooni kikendeŋ, iŋ binyathikɔŋ bikendeŋ bi kɔŋ bena dunkuŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bakɔnsɔŋɔni beŋ, awa bendo binɔndi beŋ kɔŋ kɔra.
42021017	Wɔ yo wɔ kɔŋ bena thambo ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
42021018	Kɛrɛ mbɔɔyɛ kinthe ka thankaha thakendeŋ thaŋ sa piriŋ.
42021019	Kɔɔŋ wukahɛ awa beŋ kɔŋ niya kisi.
42021020	“Mɛnɛ beŋ kute ka Yɛrusalɛmi pɛnkando iŋ kurugbani, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na kɛ kɔŋ tete teetuwa.
42021021	Awa bi ka Yudiya, bi tharɛŋ ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ. Awa bi kaake ka mɛti baŋ beŋ, bi fuŋɛŋ; awa bi nɛnɛ ka hee ka beŋ, bi bɛiŋ nda duu.
42021022	Baa, malɔkɔiŋ maŋ maŋ, mɛ kɔŋ niyɔ malɔkɔ ma ka kugbasaŋati ba haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ haŋ.
42021023	Nkinikiniŋ ba yɛrɛmɛŋ bi iŋ thahɔɔyɛ iŋ bi bɔpɔŋ malɛɛthɛŋ. Wuthoonɛ wunkinikiniŋ wu kɔŋ ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ koŋ. Awa kugbasaŋati ku ka Masaala koŋ ku kɔŋ ŋote biya beŋ beŋ.
42021024	Binɔndi ka mateete namɛŋ silanhi bɛ kɔŋ bindɛ kɔɔri. Binɔndi bi kɔŋ diŋa huwaayinɛ ka ŋakuyɛkɛŋ ŋahɛna fooma. Siyani bahɛna ba be kɔthɔ Masaala na bɛ kɔŋ fuŋuŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi kasara haaŋ nɔŋ, yɔkɔŋ malɔkɔ ma ka siyani bahɛna baŋ maŋ thiŋe.
42021025	“Lamanthoni bi kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka kaŋ woŋ iŋ sɛnkɛ woŋ, iŋ ka sosɛŋ beŋ. Siyani baŋ fooma ka dunia baŋ bɛ kɔŋ thɛŋ iŋ payɔ humandiŋ naa mankɔ mathanthɛ maŋ manki poro iŋ thamunkulu thabɛina.
42021026	Biyamɛti bi kɔŋ heŋɔ iŋ hupayɔ naa bindɛ dethiteke ba bɛyiniŋ ba see ka niyɔ ka dunia babunthu baŋ. Baa, sɛmbɛŋ ba ka kuthahinɛ koŋ baŋ bɛ kɔŋ ŋɛna e bɛŋ fuŋuto ka makooye makɛnamɛŋ.
42021027	Mahɛŋ mabɛina Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see. Wundɛ kɔŋ see ka wuruma haŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ mɛnɛ yiki.
42021028	Naa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bohe niyɔ, dethaŋ ka thinthi; kisi bakendeŋ baŋ thuriye.”
42021029	Kɛna sisiyɛ Yisɔs bindɛ mathɔyande e tɛpa, na “Simɔkɔŋ hɛ kuyeŋ kuthɔma ku dɔma koŋ na fiki iŋ ŋayeŋ ŋahɛna ŋaŋ.
42021030	Naa ŋɛŋ yose nthɔŋ bompa buŋama, beŋ kɔthɛ nda ba dɔma na thamɔ thuriye.
42021031	Awa nɛna hɛlɛŋ, naa beŋ kute bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛ si niyɔ, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye.
42021032	“Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, biya bi ka yamana baŋ baŋ beŋ sa niye thanke tuukuwe, bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma bɛ kɔŋ thanki niyɔ.
42021033	Kuthahinɛ koŋ iŋ dunia baŋ mu kɔŋ daŋande, kɛrɛ huseri hukiyaŋ haŋ huŋ sa daŋande.
42021034	“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba haliko beŋ be tha thɔŋ haaŋ e beŋ boho pumpuŋ. Baŋ thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ. Baŋ mɛyi ba yaagbani bi ka sii baŋ baŋ beŋ kɛriŋiyɛ thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, malɔkɔ ma ka saa hu ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ haŋ mɛ kɔŋ bena bohi
42021035	nɔŋ mudikɔŋ. Babiyɛ mɛ kɔŋ see ka biya fooma bi dɔŋɔy ka dunia baŋ beŋ.
42021036	Kɛrɛ lɔkɔ timo tima, yilaŋ e beŋ niya kuraminɛ ba haliko beŋ be kutu sɛmbɛ ba daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba see ka niyɔ baŋ wupankɔy bɛyi iŋ ba kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
42021037	Lɔkɔiŋ baŋ baŋ fooma Yisɔs dunkuŋ bɛŋ ba thaninuwa ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa mahɔnkɔlɛŋ tɛŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ key ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi e ndɛ kɛndɛ ka hura napii.
42021038	Timo tima kuputhɔ ku kaŋ, biya bi kɔŋ key ka poniyɛ niŋ kuiha ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
42022001	Wiki wo ka thɔma kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ thuriye, malɔkɔ ma bindɛ dɔŋ maŋ, na “Malɔkɔ ma miŋ siyi na puntiyando nde mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo ka tuka haŋ woŋ maŋ ka Iyipiti.”
42022002	Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ fooma, bi nde payɔ biya beŋ, huna bindɛ bohe deethuwa gboŋa ba ŋasɔiŋ ba bindɛ kore Yisɔs na.
42022003	Sithani thɔɔyɛ Yudasi na wo dɔma Isakariyɔti, wunthe ka karandeni kɔhi iŋ biye bi ka Yisɔs beŋ.
42022004	Kɛna fuŋ Yudasi, wundɛ key gbonkitiyande bafodeni bibukuyɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bayahɛŋ bi dethiteke banka ba ka Masaala baŋ beŋ ba nɔŋ na wundɛ bindɛ niyite Yisɔs na gbɔŋ.
42022005	Wuŋ yehe bindɛ haaŋ e bindɛ si bohinande ba niŋ thunkuna kɔbiri.
42022006	Yudasi yɛrɔkɔy huŋ. Wundɛ bohe nda deethuwa hɛɛra ba wundɛ dunkune Yisɔs na kɛnamɛŋ naa sa wuŋ biya kothiye.
42022007	Malɔkɔ mamayoŋ ma ka wiki wo bindɛ thome kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ tɛŋ, ka lɔkɔ ba takɛŋ bi ka thɔma huthɔɔkɔ haŋ beŋ koro baŋ ba fuŋuno saraka.
42022008	Yisɔs ŋindi Pita na iŋ Yɔni e tɛpa, na “Kaaŋ e beŋ ka kɔsinɔkɔ thɔma hu siyuwe malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde siya ntuŋ baŋ maŋ.”
42022009	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs na, na “Kama thimo yi ba miŋ ka kosineke thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ?”
42022010	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ kɔ biyande ka mɛti ka, beŋ kɔŋ pɛnkande iŋ hati lamgba wo tutɔkɔy mandi ka ntha. Yemaŋ niŋ ka banka ba wundɛ ka biyande baŋ,
42022011	e beŋ tepe wo biyɛ banka baŋ woŋ, na ‘Karimɔkɔ woŋ tepe, na ba miŋ yina si thɔnthiŋina ka yikiya baŋ ka wundɛ si thome thɔma hu ka mapuntande maŋ haŋ iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ.’
42022012	Awa wundɛ kɔŋ bena toŋine makonko mamandiŋ maŋ maŋ ka thinthi ka banka baŋ, ma kosinoko nda awa ma nda iŋ ntha yo ntha, kɛna beŋ kiye mu niye bɛyi ntuŋ muŋ fooma.”
42022013	Kɛna key bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ key pɛnki bɛyi o bɛyi nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na tepe nthɔŋ bindɛ Yisɔs na. Bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔy kɛndɛ ba thɔma thɔma hu ka malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ maŋ.
42022014	Naa tɛŋ wuŋ ba thɔma thɔma hu ka mapuntande maŋ haŋ, Yisɔs dɔŋɔy iŋ baseriŋ nama bithɔɔkɔ beŋ ba thɔma.
42022015	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ nda kufiyo wumandiŋ ba thɔma thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ iŋ beŋ saanuŋ yaŋ kɔ niyo nambara.
42022016	Awa yaŋ tepe bena, yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thɔŋ thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ iŋ beŋ, yɔkɔŋ nɔŋ nda huŋ toŋino kolo nama baŋ gbeeŋ ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
42022017	Awa Yisɔs sekithe kɔɔpu haŋ e thiya Masaala na maamo, e tɛpa, na “Sɛkithaŋ kɔɔpu haŋ haŋ e beŋ huŋ hanande.
42022018	There nda ka malɔkɔ mahɛ maŋ, yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thiiye mampa maŋ maŋ baŋ yɔkɔŋ nɔŋ nda Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ tɛŋ.”
42022019	Awa wundɛ sekithe hɛlɛŋ kutoŋ koŋ e thiya Masaala na maamo, e kuŋ thinkinande e bindɛ kuŋ dunkune e tɛpa, na “Wuŋ, kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna, ku dunkuŋ yaŋ koŋ ba beŋ. Niyaŋ wuŋ ba yama kɔ siyuwe.”
42022020	Ka gboŋa banthe babɛina hɛlɛŋ, naa thanki bindɛ thɔma, wundɛ dunkune bindɛ kɔɔpu haŋ, e tɛpa, na “Kɔɔpu haŋ haŋ mayuku maŋama ma ka Masaala maŋ mɛna, ma kahitino wasi bakiyaŋ baŋ, ba toŋe yaŋ baŋ ba beŋ.
42022021	“Kɛrɛ dethaŋ, wo yama ni gbɔŋ woŋ, ndɛ doŋeŋ iŋ yaŋ ka thɔma haŋ dondo.
42022022	Baa, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ kaaye nɔŋ na tepe nde Masaala na, na nɛŋ ma kaaye. Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka hati lamgba wo ni niŋ gbɔŋ woŋ ka hadeni nama beŋ!”
42022023	Kɛna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande ba wo dɛɛnkɛ ba niya wali baŋ baŋ woŋ.
42022024	Kuyuŋande see hɛlɛŋ ŋɔti ka mateete ma ka bakarandeni beŋ ba wo si niyɔ bayaha woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma.
42022025	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Gbakuiŋ bi ka siyani bahɛna baŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ sɛmbɛ ka bi bindɛ ka pothi beŋ, awa bakɛrɛni beŋ bi kɔŋ thunda keŋ, na ‘Bamaseŋ biya.’
42022026	Kɛrɛ beŋ, wuŋ ka ba nɛŋ niyɔ, wo bayaha woŋ kɔŋ ba simɔkɔ yɛthɛ nama nɔŋ wothahuwɔy woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, awa wo bakɔtɔkɔ woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ ba niyɔ nɔŋ bawali.
42022027	Nkaana yamɛ bukuya, wo dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ woŋ ndo, iŋ wo sisi muthɔma muŋ woŋ? E wo dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ woŋ kutɛ? Kɛrɛ detha hɛ, yaŋ kɔŋ ka mateete makendeŋ nɔŋ basisi muthɔma.
42022028	“Beŋ, bena pɛyɛ ka kuwaŋ kukiyaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma yaŋ ka gberiŋinuwo haŋ maŋ.
42022029	Nɔŋ na dunkune nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ woŋ mayoho ba kɛriŋa na, nɛna hɛlɛŋ yaŋ bena dunkune mayoho ba kɛriŋa.
42022030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ mayoho ba thɔma e thiiye ka tha banthe iŋ yaŋ ka Hugbakine hukiyaŋ haŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ dɛŋa ka thayensi ba kɛriŋiyɛ bɔnsɔni kɔhi iŋ baye ba ka biIsirɛli beŋ baŋ.
42022031	“Saimɔŋ, Saimɔŋ, pona kuiha! Sithani dunkuno mayoho iŋ Masaala ba bena gbɛriŋinuwa fooma, ba haliko ba hakinande biyɔhɔy beŋ iŋ binɛnɔy beŋ, nɔŋ na bamahi woŋ hakinande paka baŋ na iŋ ŋawoy ŋaŋ.
42022032	Kɛrɛ yaŋ thanki yina niyiyɛ kuraminɛ Saimɔŋ, ba haliko lanɛya bakɛnda baŋ ba be tha thamɔ. Awa naa yi sikiyɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ kiyaŋ, kahina mbɛnda thathukuma.”
42022033	Huna tepe Pita, na “Mariki, yando kɔsinɔkɔy ba thiyo iŋ yi ka yeeli. Hali hintiŋ na ba tuka iŋ yi, yando kɔsinɔkɔy!”
42022034	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Pita, koki woŋ sa niye kokire huyɛ bahɛ baŋ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔyta yama.”
42022035	Huna tepe Yisɔs bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Naa ŋindi nde yaŋ bena beŋ tha thiiti ka gbooti, maa pontho, maa dagbalɛŋ, e beŋ panke nde ntha yo ntha?” Bindɛ tepe, na “Ade.”
42022036	“Kɛrɛ ka tete, wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ kɔbiri maa pontho, diŋɛŋ muŋ ka kaa. Wɔ yo wɔ wo ka iŋ silanhi, wundɛ niyɛŋ kuhɔli nama gbɔŋ, e wundɛ boya silanhi banthe.
42022037	Yaŋ tepe bena, magbali ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Wundɛ kɔnditando iŋ bahakɛŋ beŋ’ tɛŋ ka niyɔ nɔndi kiyaŋ, baa ba thankɛ gbalo baŋ ba yaŋ baŋ thanki thuriye.”
42022038	Huna tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mariki, detha, ya dondo silanhiŋ baye.” Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Atɛŋ.”
42022039	Kɛna fuŋ wundɛ. Wundɛ key ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi nɔŋ na bare nde ndɛ na, awa bakarandeni beŋ yeme niŋ.
42022040	Awa naa tɛŋ wundɛ ka tha ka bɛina, wundɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuraminɛ haliko beŋ be tha ŋɔti ka mathiiko.”
42022041	Kɛna yɔsɔkɔy wundɛ wuyete. Wundɛ kunthuŋe e niya kuraminɛ, e tɛpa,
42022042	na “Fandaŋ, mɛnɛ mamɛyi makɛnda mɛna, gbɔnina kɔɔpu hu ka thɔrɔ haŋ haŋ kuwaŋ kukiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ wu bɛiŋ niyɔ ka mamɛyi makiyaŋ nde, kɛrɛ bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thimo yi bɛ be niyɔ, ba niyɔyŋ.”
42022043	Kɛna see niŋ maleka tɔŋinɔkɔ ŋaye ka ariana, e wundɛ niŋ si kahina thukuma.
42022044	Thukuma nama haŋ see ni thɔrɔ. Kɛna ni wundɛ kuraminɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ haaŋ mamuheyani nama maŋ thonda nɔŋ wasi bɛna thondi ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ.
42022045	Naa ŋaye wundɛ ka kuraminɛ koŋ, wundɛ penke bindɛ bi si nine, baa bindɛ niyɔy nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ.
42022046	Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ niniye? Ŋayeŋ e beŋ niya kuraminɛ haliko beŋ be tha thɔɔ ka mathiiko.”
42022047	Naa wundɛ ka gbonkiya haŋ, kɛna tɛŋ sɛthɛ. Wɔ wunthe wo dɔma na Yudasi, wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye bi ka Yisɔs beŋ, kɔtiyɔkɔy bindɛ. Kɛna see wundɛ Yudasi niŋ thuriye ba niŋ si dɔɔkɔ.
42022048	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yudasi, e yi aniye Hati ka Wɔ woŋ gbɔŋ ka dɔɔkɔ?”
42022049	Naa kute bakarandeni beŋ ba see ka niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “Mariki, e miŋ yuwa iŋ silanhiŋ baŋ?”
42022050	Wunthe ka bindɛ gbari kuiha kuthome ku ka bawali wo ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ koŋ.
42022051	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Pɛyaŋ, baŋ nda wuŋ ni!” Kɛna boheke wundɛ kuiha ku ka bawali woŋ koŋ e kuŋ pethina.
42022052	Huna tepe Yisɔs bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bidethiteke banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ beŋ iŋ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ fooma bi sɛɛ ba niŋ saa ka bɔha beŋ, na “E beŋ asee iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbe ba yama saa ka bɔha nɔŋ batuwaŋ?
42022053	Naa nɔŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ timo tima ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, beŋ tha yama boheke. Kɛrɛ malɔkɔ maŋ mɛna tɛŋɛ ba beŋ, iŋ wo iŋ sɛmbɛ ba ka huntuma haŋ baŋ woŋ ba niya wali.”
42022054	Kɛna ni bindɛ yamari ba ndɛ be bɔha e kata niŋ. Naa bindɛ niŋ kati ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ baŋ, Pita yemeŋ kahɛŋ wuthokiye.
42022055	Buu ŋindo kɛndɛ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ haŋ mateete ba poyi. Pita thuriye ka poyi haŋ.
42022056	Kɛna kute niŋ bawali woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ naa doŋe wundɛ ka buu buŋ kuwaŋ. Kɛna dethe wundɛ niŋ natiŋ, e tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs.”
42022057	Kɛrɛ Pita thanthiye, e tɛpa, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, yaŋ kɔyta niŋ.”
42022058	Wuŋ tha hɛlɛŋ nambi hati lamgba wohɛna kute hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Wundɛ tepe hɛlɛŋ, na “Yi, yi kɔŋ wunthe wo ka bindɛ.” Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ Pita, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, yaŋ ka wunthe wo ka bindɛ.”
42022059	Naa daŋande wuŋ bɛrɛ ba wakathi wunthe wɔ hɛna see hɛlɛŋ gbonkoy wukahɛ, e tɛpa, na “Yaathi hati lamgba woŋ, kɔnsɔŋ ndo ka, ndɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs, baa wɔ ka Kalili na woŋ.”
42022060	Kɛrɛ Pita tepe, na “Wɛiŋ woŋ, yaŋ kɔyta hu yi dunkunɔkɔy haŋ.” Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina naa wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy, koki woŋ kokori.
42022061	Kɛna sikiyɔkɔy Mariki woŋ e detha Pita na. Pita siyi thampa tha ka Mariki woŋ thaŋ ba dɔma, na “Saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira hɛ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati.”
42022062	Kɛna fuŋ Pita. Wundɛ bereŋ wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.
42022063	Lamgbeŋ bi bɔhɛ Yisɔs na beŋ bohe hɛtha niŋ e bindɛ niŋ kɔ thorinuwa.
42022064	Bindɛ yuku niŋ thaaya, e tɛpa, na “Awa, banabi, hina hɛ wo thorinɛ yina woŋ!”
42022065	Kɛna gbonkoy bindɛ bɛyiniŋ bahɛna banɛnɔy babɔyɛ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na.
42022066	Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, Kaama wo ka bakalani bibayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ woŋ fooma thuŋande ka tha banthe, thiyitaŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ. Kɛna kato Yisɔs ka Kaama namɛŋ woŋ, e bindɛ tɛpa, na
42022067	“Mɛnɛ yina Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri, tepe mina.” Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena, beŋ sa yama ni kulanɛya.
42022068	Awa mɛnɛ yaŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bena, beŋ sa yama ni yaabi.
42022069	Kɛrɛ there nda ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Masaala wo iŋ sɛmbɛ woŋ haŋ.”
42022070	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ, na “E huna yina nda Hati ka Masaala woŋ?” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ beŋ.”
42022071	Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Mbɛ nda maseri ma nda miŋ deethi? Miŋ fooma yuyɔkɔy nda ŋaye ka hothi hukɛnama!”
42023001	Bakaamani beŋ fooma ŋaye narɛ, e kata Yisɔs na ka Pailɛti ka.
42023002	Kɛna bohe bindɛ gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na, na “Miŋ bohe hati lamgba woŋ ka thɔkina biya ntuŋ beŋ, e tepe bindɛ ba thana thunkuna duthu ka gbaku womandiŋ woŋ Siisa ka Romaŋ, e hɛlɛŋ ka tɛpa na ndɛ na gbaku woŋ, Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.”
42023003	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Pailɛti na, na “E yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yi tepe nda nɛŋ.”
42023004	Pailɛti tepe bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ sɛthɛ baŋ fooma, na “Yaŋ tha kutu mathonko ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ hali.”
42023005	Kɛrɛ bindɛ yame ntiŋ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ gbonkiya ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ key kaŋ sɔkinuwande biya iŋ mathanani nama maŋ fooma ka Yudiya. Ndɛ therine ka Kalili haaŋ ndɛ na see hɛlɛŋ dondo woŋ.”
42023006	Naa yuye huŋ Pailɛti, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ biya beŋ mɛnɛ Yisɔs wo ka Kalili na.
42023007	Naa tepo wundɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs wɔ na wo ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi kɛriŋiyɛ koŋ, wundɛ toŋite niŋ ka Hɛrɔdi ka. Hɛrɔdi kɔŋ nde ka Yɛrusalɛmi ka malɔkɔ mabɛina.
42023008	Naa kute Hɛrɔdi Yisɔs na, wuŋ yehe niŋ wumandiŋ, baa wundɛ thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda niyɔ kufiyo ba kutiyɔkɔ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba Yisɔs ni baŋ.
42023009	Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔni Hɛrɔdi Yisɔs na wufuyɛ, kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha niŋ ni yaabi.
42023010	Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ kɔɔyɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e gbonkiya wukahɛ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na.
42023011	Hɛrɔdi iŋ kurugbani nama beŋ hethe Yisɔs na haaŋ bindɛ niŋ thiminuwa dɛkuiŋ. Kɛna thiye bindɛ niŋ kuhɔli ku ka gbaku e duuta hɛlɛŋ niŋ ka Pailɛti ka.
42023012	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina gbeeŋ Hɛrɔdi iŋ Pailɛti, bi nɔŋ bithayande beŋ, see bohinande.
42023013	Pailɛti thiyi ka tha banthe bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bayahɛŋ beŋ iŋ biya beŋ.
42023014	Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ sisi hati lamgba woŋ kiyaŋ do nɔŋ wɔ wo key kaŋ thɔkinuwa biya. Ka tete, yaŋ thanki niŋ thɔnthiŋinuwa fooma ka thaaya ndeŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ tha pɛnki mathonko manthe ka bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki beŋ gbonkiya baŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ niŋ.
42023015	Hɛrɔdi gbeeŋ wundɛ tha pɛnki mathonko makɛnama, huna biyɛ ndɛ hɛlɛŋ niŋ duuta kɛntuŋ do. Bɛyi o bɛyi ka ba ni hati lamgba woŋ ba tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba koro.
42023016	Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba wundɛ gbusuŋo ba niŋ thiya thukuma saanuŋ yaŋ niŋ kɔ pɛyɛna kuyankaŋ.” [
42023017	Pailɛti kɔŋ nde iŋ mabari ma ka pɛniyɛ bindɛ wɔ wunthe kuyankaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma ka thɔma humandiŋ haŋ maŋ.]
42023018	Kɛrɛ biya beŋ fooma thiye masɔnkɔ, na “Kɔra niŋ e yi mina pɛniyɛ Barabasi na kuyankaŋ.”
42023019	Barabasi hati lamgba na nde wo thiyo ka yeeli ba kɔnthɔhili wo biya beŋ ni woŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi e niyɔ wunthe ka bi kɔrɛ wɔmɛti ka dekiya.
42023020	Pailɛti kɔŋ kufiyo ba pɛyɛna Yisɔs na kuyankaŋ, huna gbonkitiyande hɛlɛŋ wundɛ biya muŋ.
42023021	Kɛrɛ bindɛ yame ntiŋ thiya masɔnkɔ, na “Yanta niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ! Yanta niŋ!”
42023022	Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ Pailɛti hutaati haŋ, na “Ka tete, tepeŋ hɛ yama, mbɛ banɛnɔy ba ni wundɛ? Yaŋ tha kutu mathonko manthe ma ni wundɛ ma tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba koro. Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba niŋ thiya thukuma e yaŋ niŋ pɛyɛna kuyankaŋ.”
42023023	Kɛrɛ bindɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy thuŋ kaŋ thiya masɔnkɔ wuthoonɛ ba wundɛ be yanta ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, haaŋ masɔnkɔ makɛnamɛŋ maŋ punka.
42023024	Huna yereke Pailɛti ba Yisɔs ba kɔra nɔŋ na thimo bindɛ na.
42023025	Wundɛ pɛyɛŋ kuyankaŋ Barabasi na wo thiyo nde ka yeeli woŋ ba thiya kɔnthɔhili iŋ ba kɔra wɔmɛti ka dekiya, nɔŋ na thimo biya beŋ na. Kɛrɛ wundɛ dunkuŋ Yisɔs na ka thɛnkɔ thakɛnamɛŋ, ba niŋ niya ba thimo bindɛ ba niŋ niya.
42023026	Naa bindɛ niŋ kati, bindɛ pɛnkande iŋ wɔ dɔma na Saimɔŋ wo ka mɛti ba ka Sairini, wo nde see ba biyande ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Bindɛ ŋote niŋ kɛndɛ ba kata kuyeŋ kubariŋande ka Yisɔs ba ka yanto kɛ.
42023027	Sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme Yisɔs na. Ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi tutɔkɔy thɛnkɔ e bokita Yisɔs na.
42023028	Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy; wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Yɛrɛmɛŋ bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi, baŋ bereŋ ba yaŋ! Kɛrɛ berinaŋ ba yɛthɛ bakendeŋ mɛnɛ ba mpati bikendeŋ.
42023029	Baa, malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see ma biyamɛti dunkunɔkɔy ba dɔma, na ‘Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi tha kutu komisine beŋ, bi tha punku mpaa mpati beŋ, bi tha bɔpɔŋ beŋ hali hanthe!’
42023030	Malɔkɔ ma biya tepe ka ŋasɛri ŋabukuyuwɛ ŋaŋ, na ‘Ŋote mina’ iŋ ka ŋasɛri ŋamɛɛsuwɛ ŋaŋ, na ‘Mankuwa mina.’
42023031	Mɛnɛ bindɛ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka kuyeŋ kuthɔnɛ koŋ, mbɛ mu niyɔ ka beŋ, bendo nɔŋ kuyeŋ kuthithɛ beŋ?”
42023032	Biya biye bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bi niyɛ wunɛnɔy; bindɛ kato ka nanthe iŋ Yisɔs ba ka koro.
42023033	Naa see bindɛ tɛŋ ka tha ka dɔma kɛ na Kugbomgboroko ku Yaha, bindɛ yanti niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ. Biya biye hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ yanto ka ŋayeŋ ŋaye ŋahɛna ŋabariŋande bi boho ba niya wunɛnɔy wuŋ beŋ, wunthe ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Yisɔs haŋ, wunthe ka yɔnkɔ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ.
42023034	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Masaala, pɛniyɛ bindɛ bi yama kɔri beŋ, bindɛ kɔyta ba bindɛ ni.” Kɛna yele bindɛ makoro ba hanuwande yabɛŋ ba ka Yisɔs baŋ.
42023035	Awa biya beŋ fooma kɔɔyɛ kuwaŋ e bindɛ kɔ detha, kɛrɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ thothe Yisɔs na dɛkuiŋ, na “Wundɛ na ba ni biya kisi woŋ, awa ndɛ niyɔkɔiŋ hɛ kisi, mɛnɛ ndɛ na Banikisi wo yɛthi Masaala woŋ e ndɛ niŋ ŋinda!”
42023036	Kurugbani beŋ thɔɔtɔy hɛlɛŋ niŋ ka hɛtha, e wunthe saa kaŋ thara e niŋ si yekiniyɛ mampa managbaiŋ.
42023037	Bindɛ tepe, na “Mɛnɛ yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, niya hɛ yɛthɛ nda kisi!”
42023038	Kɛna gbale bindɛ magbali ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ka thinthi, na “Woŋ, ndɛ na Gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ.”
42023039	Wunthe ka bi yanto ba niya wunɛnɔy beŋ thothe Yisɔs na dɛkuiŋ, na “E yi kutɛ Banikisi woŋ? Niyɔkɔ kisi, e yi mina niya kisi.”
42023040	Kɛrɛ wowuntheŋ woŋ pinde niŋ, na “E yi, yi payeta Masaala na? Miŋ fooma miŋ kɔŋ ka kugbasaŋati kunthe koŋ.
42023041	Kɛrɛ yaŋ iŋ yi, miŋ kɔŋ iŋ mayoho ba gbasiŋito, baa thunkuno na miŋ thunkuna haŋ ba ba thanki miŋ niya baŋ. Kɛrɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, wundɛ tha ni bɛyi yo bɛyi banɛnɔy.”
42023042	Huna kaaye wundɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e tɛpa, na “Yisɔs, siyuwa yama naa yi dɔŋɔy ka hugbakine hukɛnda haŋ.”
42023043	Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Yaathi, yaŋ tepe yina, hɛ yi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ yaŋ ka ariana.”
42023044	Naa tɛŋ wuŋ hatɔ teete, kaŋ woŋ dɔmɔi, huntuma humandiŋ putute kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ fooma haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na yilɔy kaŋ woŋ.
42023045	Awa thika babimɛ ba yanto nde ba hakinande biya beŋ iŋ makonko ma ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka Masaala koŋ kaake ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ thɛthande mateete.
42023046	Kɛna bereŋ Yisɔs iŋ thampa thatɔɔkɛ, e ndɛ tɛpa, na “Fandaŋ, yaŋ thiyi yina wokiyaŋ woŋ ka thɛnkɔ thakɛnda!” Naa thanki nthɔŋ ndɛ huŋ tɛpa, wundɛ thathaŋ.
42023047	Naa kute bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ woŋ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, wundɛ thunkunu Masaala na e tɛpa, na “Yaathi, hati lamgba wothumbɛ na woŋ.”
42023048	Fooma sɛthɛ ba sɛɛ baŋ ba saa ka detha, naa kute bindɛ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ fooma duu bi sinkinɛ thankaha iŋ nkinikiniŋ ka thathukuma.
42023049	Fooma bi barande nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ, iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ bi yemɛ nde niŋ beŋ ŋaye ka Kalili, kɔɔyɛ wuyɔsitɔy wuyete e bindɛ kuta fooma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
42023050	Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ keŋ nama kuna Yusufu, wo ka Arimathiya ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya, wɔ yɔhɔy, e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ wothumbɛ e kɔ dethiteke ti Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ kɛrɛŋ. Hali na nde ndɛ wunthe wo ka Kaama wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, wundɛ tha yɛrɔkɔ makɛrɛŋ ma keriŋe Kaama woŋ maŋ iŋ mani ma ni bindɛ maŋ.
42023052	Huna wundɛ key ka Pailɛti ba niŋ ka thɔnthiŋina ba dunkuno kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
42023053	Pailɛti yɛrɔkɔy. Yusufu key thuhuŋ kubeli koŋ ŋaye ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ. Wundɛ huitutu kuŋ thika bahuhɛ, e kuŋ ka thiya ka yoma hu gbuso ka kuthara nɔŋ makonko ka be nɔŋ hɛ wɔ manko.
42023054	Wuŋ, wuŋ niyɔy ka lɔkɔ bakosineke baŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ ka Fraide, naa thuriye wuŋ Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, Sathide, ba sɛsuwa.
42023055	Yɛrɛmɛŋ bi sɛɛ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ ŋaye ka Kalili yeme, e bindɛ kuta yoma haŋ, e bindɛ kuta ka tayo kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
42023056	Kɛna duu bindɛ; bindɛ key kɔsinɔkɔ mayɔ mathimɔy huru ba kubeli koŋ. Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ bindɛ hɛɛmi nɔŋ na tepe Siraŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ na.
42024001	Ka Sɔnde kuputhɔ ku kaŋ, yɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ beŋ key ka yoma haŋ ba kata mayɔ mathimɔy huru ma thanki bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔ maŋ.
42024002	Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, bindɛ penke raka haŋ hu binkilinɔy ŋaye ka biyo hu ka yoma haŋ.
42024003	Kɛrɛ naa biyande bindɛ, bindɛ tha kutu kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
42024004	Naa kooye bindɛ e bindɛ kɔ niya kukabanɛ ba bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, kumaŋ, lamgbeŋ biye bi kooyeŋ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ bi iŋ muthɔɔ mumaleke.
42024005	Na thooyo bindɛ payɔ e bindɛ sinkina thaaya ka pothi, biya bibiye beŋ beŋ tepe bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ deethuwe wopethɔy woŋ ka mateete ma ka bitukɛ beŋ?
42024006	Wundɛ ka dondo. Wundɛ ŋaye ka tuka haŋ. Siyuwaŋ hu tepe nde ndɛ bena haŋ naa nde ndɛ iŋ beŋ ka Kalili,
42024007	ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ dunkuno ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bahakɛŋ, e yanto ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, awa e ŋayi ka tuka haŋ ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ.”
42024008	Kɛna simɔkɔy bindɛ thampɛŋ tha ka Yisɔs thaŋ.
42024009	Awa naa bindɛ duu ŋaye ka yoma haŋ, bindɛ key kaŋ tɛɛpuwa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ wunthe beŋ iŋ ka biya bihɛna beŋ.
42024010	Mariyama wo ka Makadala, Yoana, iŋ Mariyama nanda ka Yemisi, mɛnɛ nda yɛrɛmɛŋ bihɛna bi nde iŋ bindɛ beŋ, bindɛ bina key tepe baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ beŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
42024011	Kɛrɛ bindɛ kute huseri haŋ haŋ nɔŋ sɛkɛlɛ bɛna, awa bindɛ tha huŋ ni kulanɛya hali.
42024012	Kɛrɛ Pita ŋayinɔkɔy; wundɛ key kaŋ thara ka yoma ka. Naa putɔy wundɛ e detha kaake, wundɛ kute thika bahuhɛ baŋ ba ŋoye kuwaŋ. Wundɛ duu kaŋ niya kukabanɛ kumandiŋ ba ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
42024013	Ka lɔkɔ banthe babɛina, bakarandeni biye bi ka Yisɔs bi kɔŋ nde key ka mɛti ba ka Imeyɔsi, wu bɛrɛ ba ŋaragba ŋasɔŋ-ŋaye ŋaye ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42024014	Bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ gbonkiya ba bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
42024015	Naa bindɛ key kaŋ gbonkiya e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ gbakila, Yisɔs see bindɛ thɔɔtɔ ka kubiyasi koŋ e bindɛ kɔ kaa ka nanthe.
42024016	Bindɛ kute niŋ kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niŋ ŋee.
42024017	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ key kaŋ gbonkiya?” Kɛna kɔɔyɛ hintiŋ bindɛ biŋurɛ.
42024018	Wunthe ka bindɛ wo dɔma na Kiyopasi thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E yi wuntheŋ nape ka thahinɛŋ bi sɛɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ fooma, yina tha kɔthɔ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ daŋande ka mandɛni maŋ maŋ baŋ?”
42024019	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy?” Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy ka Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ, wo simoko woŋ iŋ Masaala mɛnɛ biyamɛti ba wundɛ niyɔ banabi womandiŋ ka bɛyiniŋ ba wundɛ ni iŋ ba wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy,
42024020	iŋ na bohe niŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bayahɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ e dunkuna niŋ mathonko ba ndɛ be kɔra, awa e yanto ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ.
42024021	Kɛrɛ miŋ tuteŋ nɔŋ yima na ndɛ na si bakaŋ biIsirɛli beŋ. Mahɛŋ mabɛina gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ bɛna nda baŋ baŋ kabi naa niyɔy wuŋ.
42024022	Yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi ka mateete makɛntuŋ bi kaayɛ ka yoma ka kuputhɔ ku kaŋ koŋ beŋ tepe hɛlɛŋ mina bɛyi bathakaba,
42024023	na bindɛ tha pɛnki kubeli koŋ. Huna see bindɛ e si tɛpa na bindɛ kute malekɛŋ ka maniyɔ mathɔɔkɔ, bi tepe bindɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ wopethɔy.
42024024	Mindo binɔndi key ka yoma ka e miŋ ka pɛnka nanthe nathesi na tepe yɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ na, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu Yisɔs na.”
42024025	Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “O beŋ, bendo biya bithɔkɔy beŋ beŋ, e beŋ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ bendo kahɛ ba niya kulanɛya bɛyiniŋ fooma ba gbonkoy banabiŋ beŋ baŋ.
42024026	E wuŋ tha nde nda thanki deenko ba Banikisi woŋ ba niyo thɔrɔ, e wundɛ nɛnɛ biyande ka yiki nama baŋ?”
42024027	Awa there ka magbali ma ka Musa maŋ haaŋ saaŋ ka ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ, Yisɔs methine bindɛ nagberekethe ba tepo nde ba wundɛ baŋ fooma ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ.
42024028	Naa thuriye bindɛ mɛti ba nde bindɛ key baŋ, Yisɔs ni nɔŋ ka wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy.
42024029	Kɛrɛ bindɛ yikɔŋ niŋ ba wundɛ be hintiŋ niyɔ iŋ bindɛ, baa gbɛɛŋ woŋ yole nda kaa e huntuma nda kɔ saa. Kɛna key wundɛ niyɔ iŋ bindɛ.
42024030	Naa dɔŋɔy bindɛ ka thɔma haŋ, wundɛ sekithe kutoŋ koŋ e thiyɛ kuŋ thaduba, e thinkinuwande kuŋ e dunkune bindɛ kuŋ.
42024031	Kɛna pɛthɔy ntiŋ thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ. Bindɛ ŋee ntiŋ Yisɔs na, kɛrɛ wundɛ piriŋɔkɔy ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ.
42024032	Kɛna bohe bindɛ gbonkiya, na “E thathukuma thakɛntuŋ thaŋ tha hɛ thɛnɛŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ naa hɛ ndɛ mina gbonkitiyande ka gboŋa hɛ, naa hɛ ndɛ mina methine magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ?”
42024033	Kɛna ŋaye bindɛ kɔɔ hanthe e duwa ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Kɛna pɛnke bindɛ baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ bikɔhi iŋ wunthe beŋ bi kɔmandeŋ ka tha banthe iŋ biya bihɛna.
42024034	Biya beŋ beŋ tepe bindɛ, na “Mariki woŋ ŋaye yaathi, awa wundɛ thanki nda tɔŋinɔkɔ ka Saimɔŋ!”
42024035	Kɛna tɛŋɛni ntiŋ bakarandeni biye beŋ nagberekethe ba niyɔy bindɛ ka gboŋa ka baŋ, iŋ nɔŋ na ŋeeye bindɛ Yisɔs na naa thinkiniyande wundɛ bindɛ kutoŋ koŋ ka thɔma haŋ.
42024036	Naa bindɛ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs kɔɔyɛ ka mateete namɛŋ e tɛpa, na “Haliko mathɛbɛ ma niyɔ iŋ beŋ.”
42024037	Kɛna thunɔkɔy bindɛ iŋ payɔ humandiŋ. Bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na kuyimɛy na kute bindɛ.
42024038	Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ niyeke thɔrɔ? Mbɛ ba beŋ niyeke kɔnthɔhili ka thathukuma thakendeŋ?
42024039	Dethaŋ hɛ thɛnkɔ niŋ thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ, haliko beŋ be ni lanɛya ba dɔma na yama yaathi. Bohekeŋ hɛ yama e detha, baa kuyimɛy ka iŋ kɔtɔ iŋ bathoy nɔŋ na kute beŋ yama na.”
42024040	Naa thanki wundɛ gbonkiya nanaŋ, wundɛ toŋine bindɛ thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ.
42024041	Naa yuye bindɛ huseri haŋ haŋ, bindɛ see thiŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ haaŋ bindɛ tha nda kɔthɔ na bindɛ huŋ niye lanɛya. Huna thonthiŋine wundɛ bindɛ, na “E beŋ kɔŋ iŋ muthɔma?”
42024042	Kɛna dunkune bindɛ Yisɔs na he woponɔi.
42024043	Wundɛ sekithe niŋ e thɔma niŋ ka thaaya ka bakarandeni beŋ fooma.
42024044	Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛna gbonkitiyande nde yaŋ bena baŋ naa nde hintiŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ, ba dɔma na bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thankɛ nde gbalo ba yaŋ ka Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ, iŋ banabiŋ beŋ, iŋ ka Ŋaiŋa ŋaŋ na, ba boheŋ ba niyɔ nɔŋ na tepe bindɛ na.”
42024045	Kɛna ni wundɛ ba bindɛ metho magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ.
42024046	Awa wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Haŋ haŋ huŋ gbalo nde nda, na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ iŋ Masaala kɔŋ niya thɔrɔ, ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ ndɛ kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ.
42024047	Awa ka keŋ kukɛnama koŋ kɛna bohe maseri ma ka sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ mɛnɛ ba peniyo hakɛŋ ba niyo kɛwandi ka siyani baŋ fooma there nthɔŋ nda ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
42024048	Beŋ, bena maseri ma ka bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
42024049	Awa yaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tɔŋɔti wu dome nde Masaala ba bena tɔŋita wuŋ. Kɛrɛ yumbaŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi haaŋ e beŋ thiyo sɛmbɛ baŋ maŋaye ka thinthi.”
42024050	Naa peyete wundɛ bakarandeni beŋ haaŋ ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani, wundɛ yentheŋeŋ thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ e bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba.
42024051	Naa wundɛ bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba, kɛna piriŋe wundɛ mateete namɛŋ; wundɛ ŋatito ka ariana.
42024052	Kɛna ni bindɛ niŋ kubatho e duwa ka Yɛrusalɛmi iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
42024053	Bindɛ niyɔy ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ timo tima ka thunkunuwa niŋ.
43001001	Saanuŋ kafay woŋ ba therino, wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ kiŋ nde. Wundɛ kiŋ nde iŋ Masaala, awa ndɛ wobɛina na nde Masaala.
43001002	Ndɛ kiŋ ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ iŋ Masaala.
43001003	Awa maŋaye kɛnama yehinuwe na Masaala munki fooma, awa Masaala tha yeheni ntha yo ntha mahɛŋ nama.
43001004	Ka Thampa thaŋ kɛna ŋaye sii ba ntha yo ntha ki hɛmɛ. Awa sii babɛina bɛna see niyɔ waŋ ba biyamɛti.
43001005	Hiŋ waŋ babɛina ba si bɛndi ka huntuma haŋ kɛrɛ huntuma haŋ sa bɛŋ punku dɔmina.
43001006	Wɔ wunthe kiŋ nde wo ŋindi Masaala, keŋ nama kuna dɔma Yɔni.
43001007	Ndɛ see nde ba si niya maseri ba waŋ baŋ baŋ, haliko biya fooma bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya ba hu bindɛ tepo haŋ.
43001008	Ndɛ Yɔni kutɛ nde waŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ asee ma nde hɔkɔŋ ba si niya maseri ba waŋ baŋ baŋ.
43001009	Bɛna nde waŋ bagbeeŋ ba nde tɔŋinɔkɔ kafaydo baŋ e bɛŋ kɔ tɔŋina waŋ ka biyamɛti fooma.
43001010	Wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ kiŋ nde kafaydo, awa kafaydo yehinuwo nde maŋaye kɛnama, kɛrɛ halisa biya bi kafaydo beŋ tha niŋ ŋee.
43001011	Ndɛ see nde ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama koŋ, kɛrɛ biya bikɛnama beŋ tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ.
43001012	Kɛrɛ bindɛ fooma bi yɛrɔkɔy niŋ beŋ ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ e bindɛ niŋ piiteke, ndɛ dunkune bindɛ mayoho ba niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala.
43001013	Bindɛ tha dunkuno sii baŋ baŋ iŋ wɔmɛti, nɔŋ na wɔmɛti mpaa iŋ fandama kafaydo, kɛrɛ Masaala ka yɛthɛ nama baŋ ndɛ na dunkune bindɛ sii baŋ baŋ.
43001014	Wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ see niyɔ wɔmɛti awa e ndɛ si niya yikiya mateete makɛntuŋ. Wundɛ thimo nde mina wumandiŋ awa e ndɛ mina tepe nɔndi baŋ ba Masaala. Miŋ kute nde yiki ba iŋ wundɛ baŋ, awa yiki ba yɔkɔŋ ndɛ nagbɛti ndɛ na kutɛ bɛŋ maŋaye ka Fandama woŋ.
43001015	Yɔni wo Babiye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ ni maseri ba wundɛ kaŋ yɛla thampa ba dɔma, na “Woŋ baŋ na nde yaŋ dɔŋ woŋ, ‘Hali na ndɛ manke saa ba yaŋ na, kɛrɛ ndɛ yameŋ ba yaŋ, baa ndɛ kiŋ nde nda iŋ sii saanuŋ yaŋ ba mpoo.’ ”
43001016	Maŋaye ka makutiyɛ mamandiŋ ma ka wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ, miŋ fooma thiyiyo thaduba ka thinthi ka thaduba lɔkɔiŋ fooma.
43001017	Masaala dunkuŋ nde Siraŋ nama baŋ ka biyamɛti maŋaye ka Musa. Kɛrɛ makutiyɛ nama maŋ mɛnɛ nɔndi nama baŋ see kafaydo maŋaye ka Yisɔs Kraist.
43001018	Wɔ yo ka hɛ wo kutɛ Masaala na hali hanthe. Yɔkɔŋ Hati wowunthe woŋ napethi wo nanthe iŋ Masaala woŋ, wo thuriye Fandama na woŋ, ndɛ na toŋine mina Masaala na.
43001019	BiYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ ŋindi baseriŋ ka Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, bafodeni mɛnɛ lamgbeŋ bi ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Libay baŋ ba mase ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Awa bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ yina?”
43001020	Yɔni ni maseri maŋ maŋ baŋ ba bindɛ niya yaabi. Wundɛ tha baŋaŋ ba niya yaabi awa ndɛ tepe bindɛ nagberekethe e koyinta ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.”
43001021	Huna bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na “E yina Ilaiya?” Yɔni dome, na “Yaŋ kutɛ.” Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ, na “E yina Banabi woŋ?” Yɔni ni hɛlɛŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Ade.”
43001022	Huna thonthiŋine hɛlɛŋ bindɛ niŋ, na “Mbu mbɛ nda yina gbeeŋ? Miŋ kiŋ ba ka tɔŋa kuna ka bi ŋindɛ mina beŋ. Nama yi dɔmɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ bakɛnda?”
43001023	Huna niye Yɔni bindɛ yaabi maŋaye ka magbali ma ka banabi woŋ Aisaya maŋ, na “Yama ‘Wɔ wunthe wo yɛli thampa ka wula baŋ, na Kɔsinɔkɔŋ gboŋa baŋ ba Mariki woŋ.’ ”
43001024	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi kiki ba ka bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ bi dɔma na biFaresini beŋ ba dɔma, na
43001025	“Mbu mbɛ hu yi biiye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ mɛnɛ yi kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, maa Ilaiya, maa wunthe ka banabiŋ beŋ?”
43001026	Kɛna ni Yɔni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena biye iŋ mandi. Kɛrɛ ka mateete makendeŋ wɔ wunthe kooyeŋ kɛndɛ wo ba beŋ ŋee.
43001027	Awa ndɛ na manke saa ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ sisandeta ba putɔ ba pɛɛka nkala ki ka dagbalɛŋ nama baŋ kiŋ.”
43001028	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ, ka nde Yɔni biiye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka.
43001029	Ka gbɛɛŋ wowuntheŋ woŋ, Yɔni kute Yisɔs si see ka kooye ndɛ ka iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ya taka wohatiyɛ wo fuŋuŋ Masaala woŋ ba niya na biyamɛti bi kafaydo beŋ peniyo hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.
43001030	Woŋ baŋ na bare nde yaŋ dɔma woŋ, na ‘Hali na manke wɔ wunthe woŋ saa ba yaŋ na, kɛrɛ ndɛ yameŋ ba yaŋ, baa ndɛ kiŋ nde nda iŋ sii saanuŋ yaŋ ba mpoo.’
43001031	Yaŋ gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ baŋ yaŋ kɔita niŋ. Kɛrɛ huna koteke nde yaŋ ba si biye biya iŋ mandi haliko na ndɛ si toŋino ka biya bi ka Isirɛli beŋ.”
43001032	Kɛna ni Yɔni maseri maŋ maŋ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kute Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ si thuhu maŋaye ka ariana nɔŋ kurotho, e ndɛ niŋ tutɔ e niyɔ iŋ wundɛ.
43001033	Kɛrɛ halisa yaŋ tha kɔthɔ ba dɔma na wundɛ na. Kɛrɛ Masaala wo ŋindɛ nde yama woŋ ba si biye biya iŋ mandi, ndɛ na tepe nde yama ba dɔma, na ‘Wɔ wo nɔŋ nthɔŋ yi kutu Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ si thuhu maŋaye ka ariana e ndɛ niŋ tutɔ awa e niyɔ iŋ wundɛ, wɔ bɛina na bena si biye iŋ Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ.’ ”
43001034	Yɔni tepe, na “Yaŋ kutuyɔkɔy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ nagberekethe, awa huna niye yaŋ maseri ba dɔma na ndɛ na Hati ka Masaala woŋ.”
43001035	Ka gbɛɛŋ woyemɛ woŋ, Yɔni kooyeŋ nde hɛlɛŋ iŋ lamgbeŋ biye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ.
43001036	Naa kute wundɛ Yisɔs si kaande, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ya taka wohatiyɛ wo fuŋuŋ Masaala woŋ.”
43001037	Bakarandeni bibiye bi yuyɛ Yɔni si nɛŋ dɔŋ beŋ pɛyi yema Yɔni na haŋ awa bindɛ thɔɔtɔy Yisɔs na.
43001038	Naa bindɛ key, kɛna dethe Yisɔs mahɛŋ e ndɛ kuta bi si niŋ yeŋ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ mu beŋ deethi?” Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Rabay, kama niye yi yikiya?” ‘Rabay, thalintando ba dɔma na ‘Karimɔkɔ.’
43001039	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Saaŋ dethi.” Kɛna key bindɛ dethi ka niye ndɛ yikiya ka. Wu kiŋ nde nda bɛrɛ ba ti yɛrɛmɛŋ sesuwe ba tota muhure. Bindɛ key e bindɛ ka niyɔ kɛndɛ iŋ Yisɔs haaŋ kaŋ woŋ thɔɔ.
43001040	Wunthe ka beŋ beŋ baŋ ndɛ na dɔma Anduru, wɛnda Saimɔŋ Pita woŋ.
43001041	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Anduru kute wɛndama na Saimɔŋ. Ndɛ tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Miŋ kute Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, wo dɔma woŋ na Mɛsaya.” Keŋ ku dɔma koŋ na Mɛsaya, keŋ kunthe kuna iŋ ku dɔma koŋ na Kraist.
43001042	Kɛna sisi ndɛ Saimɔŋ na ka Yisɔs. Yisɔs dethe Saimɔŋ na natiŋ, e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Keŋ nda koŋ kuna dɔma Saimɔŋ hati ka Yɔni woŋ. Yina nda dɔma Sifasi.” Ŋakeŋ ŋaŋaye ŋaŋ ŋaŋ baŋ Sifasi mɛnɛ Pita, keŋ kunthe kuna. Awa ŋakeŋ ŋaŋaye ŋaŋ kuthara kuna domo.
43001043	Ka gbɛɛŋ woyemɛ woŋ, Yisɔs dɛɛnki ba kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili. Naa ndɛ key, ndɛ penke Filipi na. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnama, na “Thɔɔtɔ yama.”
43001044	Filipi woŋ baŋ ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛseda ka ŋaye Anduru ka mɛnɛ Pita.
43001045	Awa Filipi kute Nathaniyɛli na, e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Miŋ kute niŋ wo ba gbale nde Musa ka buku wo ka Siraŋ baŋ woŋ awa wo ba gbale banabiŋ beŋ ka ŋathagba namɛŋ ŋaŋ woŋ. Ndɛ na dɔma Yisɔs hati ka Yusufu wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ woŋ.”
43001046	Huna dome Nathaniyɛli ka Filipi, na “E bɛy bayɔhɔy ba kɔŋ punku ŋaye ka Nasarɛthi?” Huna dome Filipi kɛnama, na “Saa dethiyɔkɔ.”
43001047	Naa kute Yisɔs Nathaniyɛli si see ka kooye ndɛ ka, ndɛ tepe ba wundɛ, na “Ya wɔ wunthe wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Isirɛli baŋ wo sisande ba domo woIsirɛli woŋ. Hati wowathe woŋ baŋ sa thiiki womo woma thɔkɔ.”
43001048	Nathaniyɛli thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs na, na “Nama dɔmɛ yi kɔŋ yama kothiye?” Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Filipi tha yina niye thiye hu doŋe yi ka niŋ hu ka kuyeŋ ku dɔma koŋ na fiki e yaŋ hɛ nda yina thɔkita kuta.”
43001049	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Nathaniyɛli iŋ kukabanɛ ba dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ! Yina Gbaku wo ka Isirɛli woŋ!”
43001050	Huna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “E ba na dome yaŋ yina, na yaŋ thɔkɔti hɛ yina kuta yi doŋe ka niŋ hu ka kuyeŋ koŋ haŋ, huna niye yi lanɛya? Yumba, yi kɔŋ kutu bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yamɛ ba baŋ baŋ.”
43001051	Yisɔs dome hɛlɛŋ kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, yi kɔŋ nɔŋ kutu ka ariana pɛthɔ, awa e malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ kɔ ŋata e bindɛ kɔ thatha ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
43002001	Naa daŋande wuŋ hura kaye, kuyɛntande ku kiŋ nde ka mɛti ba ka Kena ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ. Awa nanda ka Yisɔs kiŋ nde kɛndɛ.
43002002	Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ thiyo ba ka penkitiye ka kuyɛntande koŋ.
43002003	Naa see biya beŋ thanko mampa, nanda ka Yisɔs tepe Yisɔs na, na “Bindɛ thanko mampa.”
43002004	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Naanaŋ, mbɛ hu yama yi tepe ba yaŋ ba niya? Lɔkɔ ba yaŋ toŋineke baŋ teŋeta hɛ.”
43002005	Kɛna dome nandama ka bawaliŋ bigbako beŋ, na “Bɛy yo bɛy ba ndɛ bena tepe ba niya, niyaŋ bɛŋ.”
43002006	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina thasokoro tha yehinuwo maŋaye ka tharaka thasɔŋ-hunthe tha kiŋ nde kɛndɛ, tha kiye kɛndɛ biYusu beŋ ba thiye mandi baa bindɛ kiŋ iŋ sirani babɔyɛ ba ka mɛthinɔkɔ ka kuwaŋ ku ka dina namɛŋ woŋ. Sokoro yo sokoro hu kɔŋ sɛkɛthi thakalɔni kɔnthɔ kaye maa kɔnthɔ kataati.
43002007	Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka bawaliŋ beŋ, na “Thiŋinuwaŋ thasokoro thaŋ thaŋ mandi.” Huna thiŋini bindɛ thɛŋ mandi nayerere.
43002008	Naa nambe wuŋ wuyete, huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛpaŋ manɔndi e beŋ mɛŋ kata ka bayaha ndeŋ wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ.” Bindɛ mepe mɛŋ e bindɛ mɛŋ kata.
43002009	Naa miŋ bayaha wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ mandi ma sikinando mampa maŋ, ndɛ tha kɔthɔ ka ŋaye mampa mayɔhɔy maŋ maŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ bawaliŋ bi mɛpɛ mɛŋ beŋ bi kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye mɛŋ. Kɛna thiyi bayaha wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ bayɛnti woŋ
43002010	e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Wuŋ niyɔy yama kɔnthɔhili. Timo tima biya bi bareŋ kɔ yenke dunkuno mampa ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ. Awa naa bindɛ thanki mɛŋ thiiye wubɔyɛ, ndɛ dunkuŋ ntiŋ ma ba thanki yɔhɔ maŋ. Kɛrɛ yi kɔsɔŋ hɛ ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ ba mɛŋ manke thiiyo.”
43002011	Bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ bɛna mayoŋ ba ni Yisɔs ba tɔŋina na ndɛ. Awa ndɛ ni bɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Kena ba ka Kalili. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ toŋine ma ntiŋ biya beŋ ba ndɛ niyɔ wɔ sisande ba gbuŋunuwo. Awa bakarandeni nama beŋ ni ntiŋ niŋ lanɛya.
43002012	Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, Yisɔs iŋ nandama, mɛnɛ mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ, mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ key ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi e bindɛ kɛndɛ ka niyɔ ba gbɛɛni bikɔndande.
43002013	Lɔkɔ baŋ thuriye ba biYusu beŋ siyuwe naa puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti. Huna kaaye Yisɔs ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
43002014	Naa tɛŋ ndɛ kɛndɛ, ndɛ key biyande ka gbada hu ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e pɛnka kɛndɛ bi ni gbɔŋ manani, takɛŋ, mɛnɛ kukuni mu biya beŋ boy ba fuŋuna saraka ka Masaala. Ndɛ hɛlɛŋ pɛnka kɛndɛ bi thikipiyɛ biya kɔbiri woŋ beŋ bi doŋe e bindɛ kɔ niya wali namɛŋ baŋ.
43002015	Kɛna sekithe ndɛ ŋalansi e ndɛ ŋɛŋ niya kusorigba ba kanthe maamiŋ beŋ fooma, takɛŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ manani beŋ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ haŋ. Ndɛ koŋotoni thebuluiŋ bi ka bathikipiŋ kɔbiri woŋ beŋ, awa e kɔbiri namɛŋ woŋ pankande fooma.
43002016	Ndɛ dome ka bi ni kukuni beŋ gbɔŋ beŋ, na “Funkutaŋ muŋ muŋ dondo baŋ fooma. Baŋ ni banka ba ka Fandaŋ baŋ banka ba niye gbɔŋ.”
43002017	Kɛna kɔthɛ ntiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba dɔma na wu ni Yisɔs wuŋ, magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe nde huŋ, ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na “Masaala, kufiyo niŋ koŋ ba niya banka nda baŋ yiki kuŋ abɔy, awa ku kɔŋ yama tɔɔni ka thukuma niŋ haŋ nɔŋ buu.”
43002018	Kɛna see biYusu bi bohitɛ sɛmbɛ baŋ beŋ ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Mbɛ bɛy bathakaba ba yi ni ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na yi kiŋ iŋ mayoho ba niya wuŋ baŋ?”
43002019	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Teetuwaŋ yikiya ba ka Masaala baŋ baŋ, awa ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ thanki thoya.”
43002020	BiYusu beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E banka ba sɛkithɛ thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ-kanaŋ iŋ thasɔŋ-hunthe ka thoyo baŋ bɛna yi dɔŋ ba thoya gbɛɛni bitaati?”
43002021	Bindɛ tha kɔthɔ ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ nde thɔyintande kɔtɔ nama koŋ iŋ banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
43002022	Yɔkɔŋ naa ŋaye Yisɔs ka tuka haŋ, kɛna siyi ntiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ tepe nde huŋ. Awa bindɛ yame ntiŋ niya magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ lanɛya iŋ hu tepe nde Yisɔs haŋ.
43002023	Naa nde hintiŋ Yisɔs ka Yɛrusalɛmi naa nde bindɛ siyi lɔkɔ ba puntuyando nde bindɛ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti maŋ, biya bibɔyɛ ni Yisɔs na lanɛya baa bindɛ kute bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba ni ndɛ ba tɔŋina na ndɛ.
43002024	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha bindɛ piiteke, baa ndɛ kɔthɛŋ na biyamɛti fooma
43002025	awa ndɛ kahota ba wɔ niŋ tepe na biyamɛti. Ndɛ gbeeŋ, ka yɛthɛ nama, ndɛ kɔthɛŋ mu kaake ka thukuma hu ka wɔmɛti.
43003001	Wɔ wathe wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo dɔma na Nikɔdimɔsi, wo nde wunthe ka bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka biYusu beŋ. Ndɛ nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ niyɔ wunthe ka kiki ba ka biFaresini beŋ baŋ.
43003002	Hati wowathe woŋ baŋ na kaayɛ nde ka Yisɔs huyɛ e ndɛ ka dɔma kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na bathanani na yi wo ŋaye ka Masaala. Awa wɔ sa punku niya bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yi ni baŋ yɔkɔŋ Masaala niyɔy iŋ wɔ bɛina.”
43003003	Huna niye niŋ Yisɔs yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ sa punku kuta Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ yɔkɔŋ ndɛ mpoo hɛlɛŋ.”
43003004	Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Nikɔdimɔsi Yisɔs na, na “Nama hɛlɛŋ wɔ thankɛ nda fuŋa kɔ duu ka mpoo hɛlɛŋ? Yaathi, ndɛ sa nda punku duuwa ka thɔɔ ka kotho hu ka nandama haŋ e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ duuwa ka mpoo hukaye.”
43003005	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ wɔmɛti mpoo maŋaye ka mandi mɛnɛ maŋaye ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, ndɛ sa punku biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
43003006	Wɔmɛti na mpuu wɔmɛti, kɛrɛ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ na dunkuŋ sii ka yina wo ka wɔmɛti woŋ.
43003007	Ba ni thakaba ba na tepe yaŋ yina ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ yi mpoo hɛlɛŋ.
43003008	Huru haŋ hu kɔŋ hɔŋ e huŋ kaa ka thimo huŋ ba kaa. Yi kɔŋ yuyɛ kutɔŋa kubɛina, kɛrɛ yi kɔita ka ŋaye huŋ maa ka huŋ key. Nɛna wuŋ niyɔ ka wɔ yo wɔ wo mpaa iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ.”
43003009	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Nikɔdimɔsi, na “Nama bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ punku niiye?”
43003010	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs, na “E yindo bathanani womandiŋ wo ka Isirɛli woŋ, haaŋ hɛ yi kɔita bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ?
43003011	Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, miŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ ba kɔthɛ miŋ, awa e miŋ kɔ niya maseri ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki miŋ kutuyɔkɔ baŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ o ka wo yɛrɔkɔ maseri ma thanki miŋ bena tepe maŋ.
43003012	Beŋ tha yama ni lanɛya ba bɛyiniŋ ba kafaydo ba thanki yaŋ bena tepe baŋ fooma. Nama beŋ niye lanɛya mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena bɛyiniŋ fooma ba ka ariana?
43003013	Wɔ yo ka hɛ wo ŋatɛ ka ariana yɔkɔŋ wo thuhɛ woŋ maŋaye ka ariana, wo dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
43003014	Awa nɔŋ na ŋataŋ nde nthɔŋ Musa wokɛkɛŋ wodɛwɔi wo kahitinɔy ka kuyeŋ koŋ ka wula baŋ na, nɛna nɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ŋatina ka thinthi.
43003015	Huna, mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ niŋ ni lanɛya ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
43003016	Masaala na thimo kafay woŋ haaŋ e ndɛ dunkuna Hati nama wowunthe woŋ napethi. Huna wɔ yo wɔ wo niŋ ni lanɛya, wɔ bɛina sa tuku, kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
43003017	Awa Masaala tha ŋindi Hati nama woŋ kafaydo ba si thonkine biya bi kafaydo. Kɛrɛ ndɛ ŋindi niŋ haliko biya bi kafaydo beŋ bi be niyɔ kisi maŋaye kɛnama.
43003018	Wɔ yo wɔ wo niyɛ niŋ lanɛya, ndɛ sa thonkino. Kɛrɛ wo tha niŋ ni lanɛya, ndɛ thanki nda thonkino, baa ndɛ tha ni lanɛya ka Hati ka Masaala wowunthe woŋ napethi.
43003019	Wɔ yo wɔ wo tha ni lanɛya ka Hati ka Masaala woŋ ndɛ kɔŋ thonkino, bɛy bahɛna kutɛ waŋ baŋ see ka faido kɛrɛ biya bi kafaydo beŋ athimo huntuma haŋ e wuŋ yama ba waŋ baŋ, baa bɛyiniŋ ba bindɛ ni baŋ anɛnɔ.
43003020	Wɔ yo wɔ wo ni banɛnɔy wundɛ thimota waŋ baŋ, awa ndɛ sa see ka waŋ baŋ, baa bɛyiniŋ ba ndɛ ni banɛnɔy baŋ ba kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka waŋ baŋ.
43003021	Kɛrɛ wɔ wo ni bɛyiniŋ ba dome Masaala ba bɛŋ niyɔ bayɔhɔy, ndɛ kɔŋ see ka waŋ baŋ, haliko wali nama baŋ ba be kutɔ nagberekethe ba wuŋ niyɔ na ndɛ ni wali bayɔhɔy baa ndɛ putuyɔy Masaala na.
43003022	Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ key ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ. Kɛna niyɔy ndɛ iŋ bindɛ ba hura hukɔndande e ndɛ nde kɛndɛ kɔ biye biya beŋ biye hu ka Masaala haŋ.
43003023	Yɔni nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ ndɛ kɔŋ nde biye biya beŋ biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka mankɔ ma thuriye ka mɛti ba ka Enani baŋ, wuthuriye ka Selimi. Kɛna nde mandi mabɔyɛ, awa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde see kɛnama ba biyo.
43003024	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Yɔni tha nde niye thiyo ka yeeli woŋ.
43003025	Lɔkɔ banthe kugbakali see thɔɔ mateete ma ka bakarandeni bi ka Yɔni beŋ mɛnɛ woYu wunthe saathɛ ba ka mɛthinɔkɔ ka kuwaŋ ku ka dina namɛŋ woŋ.
43003026	Huna kaaye bakarandeni beŋ ka Yɔni ka e bindɛ ka dɔma kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, wɔ wo nde iŋ miŋ woŋ kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ, wo ba gbonkoy nde yi baŋ, ya niŋ kanka baŋ si biye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ. Awa biya muŋ fooma thanki kɔ kaa kɛnama ka.”
43003027	Yɔni mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Wɔ yo ka wo punku kuta ntha nɔŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha kiŋ dunkuno iŋ Masaala.
43003028	Beŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ bena maseri makiyaŋ ba na dome yaŋ, na ‘Yaŋ kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, kɛrɛ ayenke na yaŋ ŋindo ba ndɛ.’
43003029	Bayɛnti woŋ na biyɛ wɔtɔ nama, awa nyathiki wo ka bayɛnti woŋ na kɔɔ ba niŋ poniyɛ kuiha. Ndɛ kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ wumandiŋ ba thampa tha ka bayɛnti woŋ thaŋ. Bɛna, yaŋ yehitɔkɔy wumandiŋ.
43003030	Yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be ŋati keŋ e yaŋ thatha keŋ.”
43003031	Ndɛ wo ŋaye ka ariana woŋ, ndɛ yameŋ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ayaŋ ba wɔ yo wɔ kafaydo. Awa ndɛ wo kafaydo woŋ, ndɛ kiŋ ba kafaydo, awa ndɛ kɔŋ gbonkoy ba bɛyiniŋ ba kafaydo baŋ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ wo ŋaye ka ariana woŋ, ndɛ yameŋ ba ntha yo ntha.
43003032	Ndɛ see ni maseri ba bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki ndɛ kutuyɔkɔ iŋ ba thanki ndɛ yuyɔkɔ baŋ ka ariana. Kɛrɛ halisa wɔ tha niyɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy hu tepe ndɛ haŋ.
43003033	Kɛrɛ wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ hu ndɛ tɛpi haŋ woŋ, wɔ bɛina ni maseri ba dɔma na Masaala kiŋ banɔndi.
43003034	Wɔ wo ŋindi Masaala woŋ see tepe biya thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ, baa Masaala dunkune niŋ Yina nama woŋ wubɔyɛ.
43003035	Fanda ntuŋ woŋ athimo Hati nama woŋ wumandiŋ, wuna biyɛ ndɛ niŋ dunkune ntha yo ntha.
43003036	Wɔ wo ni Hati woŋ lanɛya, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔi o kɔi. Wɔ wo sa putiyɔ Hati ka Masaala woŋ, wɔ bɛina sa kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa Masaala sa pɛyi ba gbasiŋita wɔ bɛina.
43004001	BiFaresini beŋ yuye ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ nde yema iŋ biya bibɔyɛ, awa e wundɛ nde hɛlɛŋ kɔ biye bakarandeni bibɔyɛ wuŋ yama ba Yɔni.
43004002	Hali na niyɔy nde wuŋ na ndɛ Yisɔs kutɛ nde biye bindɛ. Bakarandeni nama beŋ bina nde biye bindɛ.
43004003	Naa yuye Yisɔs hu bindɛ gbonkoy ba ndɛ haŋ, ndɛ pɛyɛŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya ba kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili.
43004004	Kɛrɛ saanuŋ ndɛ ba tɛŋa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be kɛriŋiyande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sameriya koŋ.
43004005	Naa daŋande ndɛ ka Sameriya, ndɛ tɛŋ ka mɛti ba dɔma na Saika, wuthuriye kay hu dunkune nde Yakuba hati nama Yusufu na haŋ.
43004006	Ka kay hubɛina haŋ haŋ baŋ sobo hu ka Yakuba haŋ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ. Naa tɛŋ kɛndɛ Yisɔs, ndɛ thamɔy biyasi haŋ. Awa ndɛ dɔŋɔy kɛndɛ kuwaŋ ka sobo haŋ ba hɛɛmuwa. Wu kiŋ nde nda bɛrɛ ba hatɔ teete.
43004007	Ka doŋe Yisɔs kuwaŋ ka sobo haŋ kɛ, kɛna penko ndɛ iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woSameriya wo sɛɛ ka muna. Naa kute niŋ Yisɔs, huna dome ndɛ kɛnama, na “Nkaa yama mandi ba thiiye.”
43004008	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina bakarandeni nama beŋ niye nda kaaye ka mɛti ka ba ka boya muthɔma.
43004009	Huna thonthiŋine hati woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka Sameriya woŋ Yisɔs na, na “Mbɛ hu yindo woYu yama yawute mandi ba thiiye? Yando wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo ka Sameriya.” Ndɛ tepe huŋ baa biYusu beŋ thiiyeta ka thakɔɔpu tha biSameriya beŋ thiiye thaŋ.
43004010	Naa gbanthaŋ ndɛ, huna niye niŋ Yisɔs yaabi ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yi kɔthɛŋ nde munkii mu ka Masaala muŋ iŋ wo yina dɔŋ woŋ, na ‘Nkaa yama mandi ba thiiye,’ yi kɔŋ nde niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba mandi. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ nde yina dunkune mandi ma dunkuŋ sii.”
43004011	Huna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yi ka iŋ mumune, awa sobo haŋ hɛlɛŋ husuŋɔy. Kama yi punku kute mandi mabɛina ma dunkuŋ sii maŋ?
43004012	E ba hɔŋ yina yamɛ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ba mbemba ntuŋ woŋ Yakuba wo dunkune mina sobo haŋ haŋ ba miŋ fooma ndɛɛ kɔ mune mandi ba thiiye? Ndɛ yo, mpati nama yo, mɛnɛ ndansi nama kiŋ thiiye nde ka sobo haŋ haŋ baŋ.”
43004013	Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo thiiye mandi ma ka sobo haŋ haŋ baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ kaho kumbɛ.
43004014	Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo thiiye mandi ma yaŋ niŋ dunkune maŋ, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kumbɛ. Mandi ma yaŋ niŋ dunkune maŋ ma kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ sobo kaake kɛnama hu iŋ mandi ma niŋ dunkune sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.”
43004015	Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi nkaa yama mandi maŋ maŋ baŋ, haliko yaŋ be tha nda kaho kumbɛ, maa yaŋ be tha nda hɛlɛŋ see dondo baŋ ka muna mandi.”
43004016	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Kaa e yi ka thiya wanda na e beŋ saa dondo baŋ.”
43004017	Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome kɛnama, na “Yaŋ ka iŋ wathe wo yɛntɛ yama gbeeŋ.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yi asisande ba dɔma na yi ka iŋ wathe wo yɛntɛ yina gbeeŋ.
43004018	Kɛrɛ yi thanki nda yento iŋ biyɛthɛŋ bisɔhi, awa wo nda iŋ yi ka tete woŋ wanda kutɛ gbeeŋ. Yi konde nɔndi baŋ.”
43004019	Kɛna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ kute ba dɔma na banabi na yi.
43004020	Tepe hɛ yama, mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ nde niye Masaala na kubatho ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ bendo biYusu beŋ dome na wo ba niya Masaala na kubatho yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be key ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi; kɛna Masaala ba niyo kubatho. E nɛna huŋ?”
43004021	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Hati woyɛrɛmɛ, niya lanɛya hu yaŋ yina tepe haŋ. Lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see ba sa nda biya niye Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kubatho ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ maa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
43004022	Bendo biSameriya beŋ, bendo ni kubatho mu ba beŋ kɔthɔ. Kɛrɛ mindo biYusu beŋ miŋ kɔthɛŋ Masaala wo miŋ ni kubatho woŋ, baa Masaala ni lahiri ba niya biyamɛti kisi maŋaye ka biYusu beŋ.
43004023	Lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see, awa bɛŋ tɛŋ nda hintiŋ nthɔŋ, ba biya niye Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kubatho ku gbakita iŋ Yina nama woŋ, awa bi kɔŋ kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ ba wundɛ. Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kɔŋ deethi biya bi niŋ niye kubatho ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ.
43004024	Masaala yina na. Huna biya bi niŋ ni kubatho beŋ yɔkɔŋ bi be niŋ niye kubatho ku gbakita iŋ Yina nama woŋ, awa bi kiŋ ba kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ ba wundɛ.”
43004025	Kɛna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Banikisi wo niyo lahiri woŋ kɔŋ see. Naa ndɛ see, ndɛ kɔŋ mina si toŋinuwe bɛyiniŋ fooma.” Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome niŋ Banikisi. Ndɛ na hɛlɛŋ dɔma Kraist woŋ.
43004026	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yando yina gbonkitiyande woŋ, yama Banikisi woŋ gbeeŋ.”
43004027	Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina bakarandeni nama beŋ see maŋaye ka mɛti ka. Naa penke bindɛ Yisɔs si gbonkoy iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ thɛrɛnaŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo thɔnthiŋinɛ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ mu thimo yi?” maa Yisɔs na, na “Mbɛ hu yi gbonkitiyande hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ?”
43004028	Kɛna pɛy hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ mumune muŋ, e ndɛ kaa kaŋ thara ka mɛti ka. Ndɛ key tepe biya beŋ, na
43004029	“Saaŋ ka detha wɔ wathe wo tepe yama bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki nde yaŋ niya. E ba hɔŋ woŋ baŋ kutɛ Banikisi woŋ?”
43004030	Biya beŋ fooma ŋaye ka mɛti ka ba ka detha Yisɔs na.
43004031	Naa nambe wuŋ wuyete, bakarandeni nama beŋ theteke niŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, thɔma.”
43004032	Kɛrɛ huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ muthɔma ba thɔma mu ba beŋ kɔthɔ.”
43004033	Kɛna bohe bakarandeni beŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “E ba hɔŋ wɔ na sisiyɛ niŋ muthɔma?”
43004034	Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Muthɔma niŋ muŋ muna ba niya mathimo ma ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ, awa iŋ ba thankina wali nama ba ŋindi ndɛ yama ba si niya baŋ.
43004035	E beŋ tha dɔŋ, na ‘Ŋɔna haŋ pɛyɛ sɛnkɛni binaŋ’? Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, dethaŋ hɛ dumgbu baŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ kutu na thithi paka baŋ ba ŋono.
43004036	Wɔ wo ŋɔŋ ka lɔkɔ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu kuthunkuŋ, awa wɔ bɛina na kɔsinɔkɔ mutiŋ mu ka sii ba kɔy yo kɔy muŋ. Wuna bapay woŋ mɛnɛ baŋɔŋ woŋ yehitɔkɔ ka nanthe.
43004037	Wuna hu tepo haŋ niyɔ nɔndi hu tɛpɛ haŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Woŋ paye nthɔŋ, woŋ ŋone.’
43004038	Yaŋ kɔŋ ŋindi bena ba ŋɔna dumgbu ba tha beŋ ni wali. Biya bihɛna bina niyɛ kɛndɛ wali. Awa beŋ kɔŋ kutu munahaŋ maŋaye ka wali namɛŋ baŋ.”
43004039	BiSameriya bibɔyɛ ka mɛti babɛina ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs saathɛ ba magbonkoy ma ka hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ maŋ, naa dome ndɛ, na “Ndɛ tepe yama bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki nde yaŋ niya.”
43004040	Naa see biSameriya beŋ ka Yisɔs, bindɛ theteke niŋ ba ndɛ be niyɔ hintiŋ iŋ bindɛ. Awa Yisɔs niyɔy kɛndɛ ba hura kaye.
43004041	Awa biya bibɔyɛ ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs ba magbonkoy nama maŋ.
43004042	Huna dome bindɛ ka hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Wuŋ ka nda ba magbonkoy nda maŋ huna niye miŋ lanɛya, baa miŋ nda gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakɛntuŋ miŋ yuyɔkɔy nda. Awa miŋ kɔthɛ nda ba dɔma na ndɛ na wɔ bɛina wo ni biya bi kafaydo beŋ kisi.”
43004043	Naa daŋande hura kaye woŋ, Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili.
43004044	Yisɔs tepe nde, na “Banabi ka iŋ yiki ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama koŋ.”
43004045	Naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka Kalili, biya bi ka Kalili beŋ yɛritɔy niŋ wuyɔhɔy, baa bindɛ kute nde bɛyiniŋ ba ni ndɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ naa ndɛ bindɛ siyi malɔkɔ ma puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka woŋ baŋ. Awa bindɛ fooma bi kiŋ nde kɛndɛ.
