43004046	Yisɔs key hɛlɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Kena ba ka Kalili, ka sikinande nde ndɛ mandi maŋ mampa maŋ ka. Awa bayaha wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo thoono hati nama wowathe ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi.
43004047	Naa yuye ndɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs ŋaye ka Yudiya e ndɛ saa ka Kalili, ndɛ key niŋ theteke ba kaa ba niŋ ka puyiyɛ hati nama woŋ ka Kapaniyɔmi. Hati woŋ baŋ ŋoyeŋ nde nda matuke.
43004048	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Beŋ sa ni lanɛya yɔkɔŋ beŋ kute bɛyiniŋ bathakaba mɛnɛ babukuyuwɛ.”
43004049	Kɛna dome bayaha woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi saa, hati niŋ woŋ be tha niye tuke.”
43004050	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Duwa kɛnda ka, hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.” Bayaha woŋ baŋ ni lanɛya hu tepe niŋ Yisɔs haŋ. Ndɛ duu ka mɛti nama ka.
43004051	Naa bayaha woŋ baŋ duu kɛnama ka, ndɛ pɛnkande iŋ bawaliŋ nama beŋ ka gboŋa bi tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Hati nda woŋ sɛsi ba niyɔ hita.”
43004052	Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ wakathi wo sɛsi hati woŋ ba niiye hita woŋ. Bindɛ tepe niŋ, na “Heŋ naa bohe kaŋ woŋ dɛkinɔ sɛsi na niŋ kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ koŋ peyene.”
43004053	Fanda ka hati woŋ kɔthɛ ba dɔma na wakathi wo dome heŋ nthɔŋ niŋ Yisɔs woŋ, na “Hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.” Ndɛ na pethiye ndɛ woŋ. Awa bayaha woŋ mɛnɛ kubɔri nama koŋ fooma ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs.
43004054	Bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ bɛna tɛŋinɛ babaye ba ni Yisɔs ba tɔŋina na ndɛ, naa ŋaye ndɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya e ndɛ kaa ka Kalili.
43005001	Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs key ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba lɔkɔ banthe ka lɔkɔiŋ bathɔɔkɔ baŋ ka nina haŋ ba biYusu beŋ niye Masaala na kubatho baŋ.
43005002	Ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ, tumgbuŋ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ kuwaŋ ku ka biyo hunthe hu ka mɛti baŋ hu dɔma haŋ na Biyo hu ka Takɛŋ beŋ haŋ. Awa tumgbuŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ hu kɔŋ nde dɔma na Bɛthɛsetha ka huyuŋ hu ka biYusu beŋ haŋ. Leleni basɔhi ba kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wuthuriye tumgbuŋ haŋ.
43005003	Ka tumgbuŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ kuwaŋ ka leleni baŋ kaake kɛna nde bathoonani bihakuwande see ka ŋɔɔkɔ ba puyo. Binɔndi bi kiŋ nde kɛndɛ bimankɔy thaaya, bagbɛthɛŋ mɛnɛ bigbɛsinkɔy. [ Bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ kɔ yumbu ba mandi maŋ ma be ŋɛna,
43005004	baa maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ na nde kɔ thuhu maŋaye ka ariana e ndɛ si ŋɛna mandi maŋ ka tumgbuŋ haŋ. Bathoonaŋ wo nthɔŋ yenke gbantɔkɔ ka tumgbuŋ haŋ naa mandi maŋ ŋeno, ndɛ na pethɔ nthoonaŋ ndo nthoonaŋ kiŋ iŋ wundɛ.]
43005005	Hati lamgba wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo thoono bɛrɛ ba thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ kataati iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati.
43005006	Naa kute niŋ Yisɔs ndɛ ŋoye, awa e ndɛ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na ndɛ thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda kɛndɛ ŋɔɔ, Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “E yi thimoŋ ba puyo?”
43005007	Hati lamgba wothoonɔy woŋ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ ka iŋ wɔ yama thiyi ka tumgbuŋ haŋ naa mandi maŋ ŋeno. Naa yaŋ bathɔy nthɔŋ ba thɔɔ, wɔ hɛna yenke thɔɔ ba yaŋ.”
43005008	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Ŋaye ka kɔɔ, sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa.”
43005009	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati lamgba woŋ pethɔy awa ndɛ sekithe kuwatha nama koŋ e ndɛ kɔ kaa. Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy nde ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
43005010	Huna dome biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka hati lamgba wo puyo woŋ, na “Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ mɛna hɛ. Awa wu kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ ntuŋ baŋ yi ba sɛkitha hɛ kuwatha kukɛnda koŋ e yi kuŋ kɔ kata.”
43005011	Kɛrɛ huna niye hati lamgba woŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Hati wowathe wo puyɛ yama woŋ na dɔmɛ yama, na ‘Sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa.’ ”
43005012	Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mbɛ hati wowathe wobɛina wo dɔmɛ yina, na sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa?”
43005013	Kɛrɛ hati lamgba wo puyo woŋ tha kɔthɔ Yisɔs na wo puyɛ niŋ woŋ, baa sɛthɛ baŋ abɔy nde kɛndɛ, awa Yisɔs fuŋ nasɔyi.
43005014	Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, Yisɔs kute hati lamgba wo puyi ndɛ woŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “E yi kute na thanki yi pethɔ? Awa ba nda ni hakɛ yo wuna sa bɛy ba yamɛ nɛnɔ hɛlɛŋ yina pɛnki.”
43005015	Hati lamgba woŋ key e ndɛ ka tepe bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs na puyɛ niŋ.
43005016	Awa ba haŋ haŋ baŋ wuna biyɛ biYusu beŋ bi kɔŋ nde sɛsi ba niya Yisɔs na thɔrɔ, baa ndɛ puy hati lamgba woŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
43005017	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Fandaŋ woŋ wo ni wali timo tima, awa yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be ni wali.”
43005018	Magbonkoy maŋ maŋ baŋ ni hɛlɛŋ ba bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ deethuwa gboŋɛŋ ba niŋ kɔra. Wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba na thinke Yisɔs Siraŋ ba niya wali ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, kɛrɛ ba na dome ndɛ Masaala na Fandama. Wuŋ thɔyande ba dɔma ndɛ deŋine yɛthɛ nama nanthe iŋ Masaala.
43005019	Huna gbonkiyiyɔkɔy Yisɔs ka bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ e dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, na Hati woŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy ka mayoho nama. Yɔkɔŋ bɛyiniŋ ba ndɛ kutu Fandama woŋ si ni, bɛna ndɛ ni. Wali ba Fandama woŋ ni baŋ, bɛna Hati woŋ ni hɛlɛŋ,
43005020	baa komisa wowathe woŋ athimo Hati woŋ wumandiŋ, wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ niŋ toŋine bɛyiniŋ fooma ba ndɛ ni baŋ. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ toŋine bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yamɛ ba baŋ baŋ, wuna beŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ.
43005021	Nɔŋ na nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ ŋayaŋ biya ka tuka haŋ na e ndɛ bindɛ dunkune sii, nɛna hɛlɛŋ yando Hati nama woŋ dunkuŋ sii ka bi thimo ndɛ beŋ.
43005022	Fandaŋ woŋ tha kɔnsɔŋɔŋ womo woma, baa ndɛ thanki dunkuna kɔnsiŋina haŋ kiyaŋ yando Hati nama woŋ,
43005023	wuna biya beŋ fooma dunkune yando Hati woŋ yiki bamandiŋ, nɔŋ na nthɔŋ bindɛ ni Fandaŋ woŋ yiki na. Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa ni Hati woŋ yiki, ndɛ sa ni yiki Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ Hati woŋ.
43005024	“Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ. Wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ thampa niŋ thaŋ awa e ndɛ niya lanɛya yama, wɔ bɛina kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy. Awa ndɛ sa nɔŋ kɔnsiŋina, baa ndɛ buthurɔy nda tuka haŋ e ndɛ nda niyɔ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
43005025	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ. Malɔkɔ maŋ ma kɔŋ see, awa mɛna hintiŋ nthɔŋ nda maŋ maŋ gbeeŋ, ma bi tukɛ beŋ yuye thampa tha ka Hati ka Masaala woŋ thaŋ, awa bi thɛŋ yuyɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ dunkuno sii hɛlɛŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
43005026	Nɔŋ na nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ na ba dunkuna sii, nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati woŋ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba dunkune biya sii.
43005027	Awa ndɛ dunkune Hati woŋ mayoho ba kɔnsiŋina, baa ndɛ na dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.
43005028	Baŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba haŋ haŋ baŋ. Malɔkɔ maŋ ma kɔŋ see ma bitukɛ beŋ fooma yuye thampa tha ka Hati woŋ thaŋ,
43005029	awa e bindɛ fuŋa ka thayoma thaŋ. Bindɛ bi niyɛ nde bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina maŋaye ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ dunkuno sii hɛlɛŋ. Awa bi niyɛ nde bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina maŋaye ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ thonkino.”
43005030	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba tɛpa, na “Yaŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy ka mayoho makiyaŋ. Yɔkɔŋ ba yama Fandaŋ woŋ tepe ba niya, bɛna yaŋ ni. Awa kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ niŋ koŋ athumbu, baa yaŋ yoleta ba niya mathimo makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ ni mathimo ma ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ.
43005031	“Mɛnɛ yaŋ bɔhɔkɔy maseri ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ, magbonkoy niŋ maŋ sa yeroko ba mɛŋ niyɔ nɔndi.
43005032	Wɔ hɛna kiŋ kɛndɛ wo ni maseri ba yaŋ, awa yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hu ndɛ gbonkoy ba yaŋ haŋ hu kiŋ nɔndi.
43005033	Beŋ ŋindi nde baseriŋ ka Yɔni ka, awa ndɛ gbonkoy nde nɔndi baŋ ba yaŋ.
43005034	Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ yaŋ kute maseri maŋaye ka wɔmɛti. Kɛrɛ atɛpɛ na yaŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ haliko beŋ be niyo kisi.
43005035	Yɔni athɔyande nde nɔŋ lampu womaye wo iŋ waŋ bamandiŋ. Awa wuŋ yehe nde bena ba detha waŋ babɛina ba wuthurɔy.
43005036	Kɛrɛ maseri ma kiŋ kɛndɛ ba yaŋ ma yamɛ ba ma ka Yɔni maŋ nde. Wali ba dunkune yama Fandaŋ woŋ ba yaŋ thankina baŋ, bɛna yaŋ ni baŋ haaŋ nɔŋ, awa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛna ni maseri ba dɔma na Fandaŋ woŋ na ŋindɛ yama.
43005037	Awa Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ gbeeŋ ndɛ ni maseri ba yaŋ. Beŋ yuyeta hɛ nɔŋ thampa nama thaŋ hali hanthe, awa beŋ kuita hɛ niŋ hali hanthe.
43005038	Thampa nama thaŋ kahiteta hɛ ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, baa beŋ niyeta hɛ lanɛya wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43005039	Beŋ ni magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ karaŋ kuthɛgbɛ, baa beŋ siyi ba dɔma na ka mɛŋ na beŋ kute sii ba kɔi o kɔi. Awa magbali maŋ maŋ gbeeŋ mɛŋ ni maseri ba yaŋ.
43005040	Kɛrɛ halisa beŋ baŋaŋ ba saa kiyaŋ do haliko beŋ be kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
43005041	“Yaŋ yoleta ba niyo yiki iŋ biyamɛti.
43005042	Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ bena ba wuŋ niyɔ na beŋ ka iŋ mathimo ba Masaala ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ.
43005043	Yaŋ see kendeŋ do iŋ mayoho ma ŋaye ka Fandaŋ woŋ maŋ. Kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama yɛrɔkɔ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ hɛna see iŋ mayoho nama maŋ, ndɛ na beŋ yɛrɔkɔ.
43005044	Beŋ thimoŋ ba gbuŋunuwande, kɛrɛ beŋ niyeta na bena Masaala gbuŋunuwe. Huna, nama beŋ yama niye lanɛya?
43005045	Baŋ siyi ba dɔma na yaŋ see ba beŋ kuta mathonko ka Fandaŋ woŋ. Musa wo kahe nde beŋ thukuma woŋ na bena thonkine.
43005046	Mɛnɛ beŋ nde nɔŋ niya Musa na lanɛya, beŋ kɔŋ nde yama ni lanɛya, baa ndɛ gbale nde ba yaŋ.
43005047	Kɛrɛ na tha nde beŋ ni magbali nama maŋ lanɛya na, nama beŋ niye lanɛya hu yaŋ tɛpi haŋ?”
43006001	Naa daŋande wuŋ, Yisɔs thuhande mankɔ ma ka Kalili ma hɛlɛŋ dɔma maŋ na mankɔ ma ka Taibiriyɔsi maŋ.
43006002	Kɛna yemo ndɛ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baa bindɛ kute nde bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba ni nde wundɛ baŋ na puy ndɛ bithoonɔy beŋ.
43006003	Naa kute Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ, ndɛ dunkɔy ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ e bindɛ kɛndɛ ka dɔŋɔ.
43006004	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina malɔkɔ ma biYusu beŋ siyuwe naa puntuyando nde bindɛ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti thuriye.
43006005	Yisɔs yili thaaya e ndɛ kuta sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba si see kɛnama. Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ Filipi na, na “Kama miŋ boye muthɔma mu biya beŋ beŋ baŋ thɔŋ e bindɛ thimbɔ?”
43006006	Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Filipi na haliko ba niŋ gbɛriŋina ba kɔthɔ hu ka thukuma nama, halisa ndɛ Yisɔs gbeeŋ ndɛ kɔthɛŋ ba ndɛ ba niya.
43006007	Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Filipi ba dɔma, na “Kuthunkuŋ ku sɛnkɛni bisɔŋ-bitaati ba wɔ wunthe sa tɛŋ ba boya muthɔma mu tɛŋ ba womo woma ka beŋ beŋ ba kuta wuyete-wuyete.”
43006008	Kɛna dome bakarandeŋ nama wunthe kɛnama, wo dɔma Anduru woŋ wɛnda Saimɔŋ Pita, na
43006009	“Ya hati wathe dondo baŋ wo iŋ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi mɛnɛ muheni muye. Kɛrɛ muŋ sa tɛŋ ba sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ baŋ.”
43006010	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hande huyɔhɔy ba biya ba kɛndɛ dɔŋɔ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ. Huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni beŋ, na “Niyaŋ ba biya beŋ dɔɔnkɔ.” Kɛna dɔɔnkɔy biya beŋ fooma. Naa kondo bindɛ, bɛrɛ ba biyɛthɛŋ wuluiŋ bisɔhi bina nde kɛndɛ ka sɛthɛ baŋ.
43006011	Yisɔs sekithe ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ e ndɛ thiya Masaala na maamo, awa e ndɛ niya ba ŋɛŋ hano ka bi dɔɔnkɔy beŋ fooma. Nɛna ni hɛlɛŋ ndɛ muheni muŋ, awa biya muŋ thɔŋ haaŋ e bindɛ thimbuwɔ.
43006012	Naa thɔŋ bindɛ fooma e bindɛ thimbuwɔ, huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Kɔminandeŋ magbanthi ma pɛyɛtɔy maŋ ka tha banthe, haliko ntha ki be tha teetuwɔ.”
43006013	Bindɛ kɔminande muŋ ka tha banthe e magbanthi maŋ tɛŋa thadebe kɔhi iŋ thaye mu pɛyɛtɔy muŋ naa thɔŋ bindɛ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ.
43006014	Naa kute biya muŋ bɛyi bathakaba ba ni ndɛ baŋ, huŋ tepe mɛŋ ba dɔma, na “Banabi na woŋ baŋ yaathi wo domo nde ba saa kafaydo woŋ.”
43006015	Naa ŋeete Yisɔs ba dɔma na bi kiŋ ba niŋ si bɔha ka kansuŋ ba niŋ niya gbaku, ndɛ fuŋ kɛndɛ nasɔyi e ndɛ kaa ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ ka key ndɛ niyɔ ndɛ wuntheŋ.
43006016	Naa tɛŋ wuŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ, bakarandeni bi ka Yisɔs beŋ thathe ka mankɔ ka.
43006017	Bindɛ key thɔɔ ka gbe ba thuhande mankɔ maŋ ba kaa ka Kapaniyɔmi. Naa thɔɔyɛ kaŋ woŋ, wuŋ nambe haaŋ Yisɔs tha see kɛnamɛŋ.
43006018	Kɛna see huru humandiŋ hɔŋ ka mandi maŋ ka, awa thamunkulu thaŋ bohe gbantuwande gbe baŋ.
43006019	Naa ŋɛŋ bindɛ gbe baŋ bɛrɛ ba ŋaragba ŋataati maa ŋanaŋ, bindɛ kute Yisɔs si kaande ka mankɔ maŋ ka thinthi e ndɛ kɔ thuriye gbe baŋ. Kɛna see payɔ humandiŋ bindɛ thɔɔ.
43006020	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yama. Baŋ payɔ.”
43006021	Kɛna yehitɔkɔy bindɛ wumandiŋ e bindɛ thiya Yisɔs na ka gbe baŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina gbe baŋ tɛŋ ka thuhaŋ ka bindɛ key ka.
43006022	Ka gbɛɛŋ wo yeme woŋ, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba pɛyɛ heŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ kute ba dɔma na gbe banthe napethi bɛna kaayɛ. Awa Yisɔs tha thɔɔ gbe babɛina iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ. Bakarandeni nama beŋ key bindɛ bithɔ.
43006023	Gbeni bahɛna see ba ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Taibiriyɔsi e bɛŋ si kɔɔ wuthuriye ka thome nde bindɛ ŋatoŋ ŋa thiyiyɛ nde Mariki woŋ Masaala na maamo ŋaŋ.
43006024	Naa kute sɛthɛ baŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs ka kɛndɛ, awa bakarandeni nama beŋ ka hɛlɛŋ kɛndɛ, bindɛ fooma thɔɔyɛ ka gbeni baŋ baŋ e bindɛ kaa ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi kaŋ deethuwa Yisɔs na.
43006025	Naa kute bindɛ niŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ, bindɛ dome kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, tima see yi dondo baŋ?”
43006026	Huna niye Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, beŋ deethuweta yama ba bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba kute nde beŋ yaŋ si ni baŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ kɔŋ yama deethi ba na thɔŋ nde beŋ ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ e beŋ thimbɔ.
43006027	Baŋ hɔkɔŋ ni wali ba muthɔma mu daŋande muŋ, kɛrɛ niyaŋ wali ba muthɔma mu bena dunkune sii ba kɔi o kɔi, mu Hati ka Wɔ woŋ bena dunkune muŋ, baa ndɛ na thanki Masaala wo Fanda ntuŋ woŋ yɛtha ba wuŋ niya.”
43006028	Huna dome biya beŋ kɛnama, na “Nama miŋ siseke niya gbeeŋ ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma?”
43006029	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Bɛy ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma bɛna baŋ baŋ: piitekeŋ wo ŋindi ndɛ woŋ.”
43006030	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Mbɛ bɛy bathakaba ba yi ni, ba miŋ kutuyɔkɔ ba ni ba miŋ yina piiteke? Mbɛ wali bamandiŋ ba yi ni?
43006031	Mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ thɔŋ nde muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na mana ka wula baŋ, nɔŋ na tepo nde wuŋ na ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Ndɛ dunkune nde bindɛ ŋatoŋ ba thɔma ŋa ŋaye ka ariana.’ ”
43006032	Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ ba dɔma, na Nabi Musa tha nde bena dunkune ŋatoŋ ŋagbeeŋ ŋaŋ ŋa ŋaye ka ariana. Fandaŋ woŋ kɔŋ bena dunkune kutoŋ kugbeeŋ koŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana.
43006033	Kutoŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ kuna ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ, ku sɛɛ ba dunkuna sii kafaydo.”
43006034	Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi kɔ mina dunkune kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ timo tima.”
43006035	Kɛna ni Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi, na “Yama kutoŋ ku dunkuŋ sii baŋ koŋ, awa wɔ yo wɔ wo see kiyaŋ do, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kɔnthɔ, awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yama piiteke, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kumbɛ.
43006036	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na beŋ thanki nda yama kuta kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama piiteke.
43006037	Bi dunkune yama Fandaŋ woŋ beŋ fooma bi kɔŋ see kiyaŋ do, awa womo woma wo see kiyaŋ do yaŋ sa niŋ kanthi,
43006038	baa yaŋ see ŋaye ka ariana, wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba niya mathimo makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ ba niya mathimo ma ka wundɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ.
43006039	Awa mathimo ma ka wundɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, yaŋ be tha piriŋiŋ wunthe ka bi thanki ndɛ yama dunkune beŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ be nɔŋ bindɛ ŋayaŋ ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii.
43006040	Mathimo ma ka Fandaŋ woŋ maŋ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, ba wɔ yo wɔ wo kutu Hati woŋ e ndɛ niŋ piiteke wɔ bɛina be kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ.”
43006041	Naa yuye niŋ biYusu beŋ, bindɛ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ ba na dome ndɛ, na “Yama kutoŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ.”
43006042	Huna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande ba dɔma, na “E Yisɔs kutɛ woŋ baŋ, hati ka Yusufu woŋ? Miŋ kɔthɛŋ fandama iŋ nandama na. Nama dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ tɛpi ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ see ŋaye ka ariana’?”
43006043	Kɛna ni Yisɔs yaabi e ndɛ dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Pɛyaŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ haŋ.
43006044	Wɔ yo wɔ sa punku saa kiyaŋ do yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ na niŋ yɔɔsi kiyaŋ do, awa wo nɛnɛ see kiyaŋ do, yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ.
43006045	Banabiŋ beŋ gbale nde ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala kɔŋ bindɛ thanani fooma.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ o wɔ wo yuyɛ Fandaŋ woŋ e ndɛ thanuwa maŋaye kɛnama, wɔ bɛina sɛɛŋ kiyaŋ do.
43006046	Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ thanki nde nda kuta Fandaŋ woŋ. Ndɛ wo ŋaye ka Masaala ka woŋ nagbɛti, ndɛ na kutɛ Fandama na.
43006047	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ wo yama piiteke, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
43006048	Yama kutoŋ ku dunkuŋ sii baŋ koŋ.
43006049	Mbembɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ thɔŋ nde muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na mana ka wula baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ thanki hɛ tuukuwa fooma.
43006050	Kɛrɛ kutoŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ, kuna wɔ thɔŋ kuŋ koŋ ndɛ sa tuku.
43006051	Yama kutoŋ ku iŋ sii baŋ koŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ thɔŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ niyɔ kɔy yo kɔy, awa kutoŋ ku yaŋ dunkuŋ ba biya bi kafaydo beŋ bi be niyɔ iŋ sii kuna kɔtɔ kukiyaŋ koŋ.”
43006052	Naa yuye huŋ biYusu beŋ, wuŋ thoŋ bindɛ wumandiŋ, awa bindɛ sɛsi gbakila bindɛ bithɔ kaŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Nama hati wowathe woŋ baŋ punke dunkune mina kɔtɔ nama koŋ ba miŋ kuŋ thɔma?”
43006053	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ beŋ thɔŋ kɔtɔ ku ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ koŋ awa e beŋ thiiye wasi nama baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ sii.
43006054	Kɛrɛ wɔ wo thɔŋ kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ awa e ndɛ thiiye wasi niŋ baŋ, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka malɔkɔ mamankɛ maŋ.
43006055	Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna muthɔma mugbeeŋ mu wɔmɛti ba thɔma, awa wasi niŋ baŋ bɛna bageeŋ ba wɔmɛti ba thiiye.
43006056	Wɔ wo thɔŋ kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ e ndɛ thiiye wasi niŋ baŋ, ndɛ iŋ yaŋ, miŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ mabohinande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe na miŋ.
43006057	Nɔŋ na ŋindi nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ wo dunkuŋ sii woŋ na, awa e yaŋ niyɔ saathɛ ba ka Fandaŋ woŋ, nɛna wɔ wo yama thɔŋ woŋ niyɔ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
43006058	Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna kutoŋ ku thuhɛ ŋaye ka ariana koŋ. Awa kuŋ thɔyandeta iŋ kutoŋ ku thɔŋ nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ koŋ e bindɛ manke tuukuwa. Wɔ wo thɔŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kɔy yo kɔy.”
43006059	Ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ ka Kapaniyɔmi kɛna tepe Yisɔs biya beŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ naa nde ndɛ bindɛ thanani.
43006060	Naa yuye bakarandeni nama bibɔyɛ ndɛ si neŋ tɛpi, bindɛ dome, na “Magbonkoy makahɛ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, awa nkaana mɛŋ punku poniyɛ kuiha?”
43006061	Wɔ tha niyɔ wo tepe Yisɔs na, kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɔthɛ ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “E hu tepe yaŋ haŋ teeti bena thathukuma?
43006062	Mbu na beŋ kute nɔŋ ntiŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si ŋati ka ariana ka nde ndɛ ka?
43006063	Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ na dunkuŋ sii, kɛrɛ wɔmɛti sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy. Yina wo ka Masaala wo bena dunkune sii woŋ wundɛ kɔŋ see ka mathanani ma yaŋ bena thanani maŋ.
43006064	Kɛrɛ haaŋ hɛ biya bi kiŋ mateete makendeŋ bi ba ni lanɛya mathanani niŋ maŋ.” Kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ Yisɔs nde kɔthɔ bi sa niŋ ni lanɛya beŋ, awa iŋ wo niŋ si ni gbɔŋ woŋ.
43006065	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wuna biyɛ nde yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na wɔ sa punku saa kiyaŋ do yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ na niŋ sisi kiyaŋ do.”
43006066	Awa ba saabu baŋ baŋ, bakarandeni nama bibɔyɛ duuku kɛnamɛŋ awa bindɛ tha nda niŋ yeŋ hali.
43006067	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, na “E beŋ hɛlɛŋ beŋ kɔŋ duu?”
43006068	Saimɔŋ Pita ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Mariki, ka nkaana miŋ key? Yɔkɔŋ yi nagbɛti yina iŋ mathanani ma dunkuŋ sii baŋ maŋ,
43006069	awa miŋ ni yina lanɛya, awa miŋ see kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yina Wɔ Mɛthɛ woŋ, wo ŋaye ka Masaala ka woŋ.”
43006070	Yisɔs tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Kɔhi iŋ biye bina yɛthi yaŋ, kɛrɛ wunthe ka beŋ wayi wonɛnɔy na ndɛ.”
43006071	Yisɔs kɔŋ nde gbonkoy ba Yudasi hati ka Saimɔŋ Isakariyɔti woŋ. Hali na niyɔy nde wuŋ ndɛ na nde wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, wo nde ba niya Yisɔs na gbɔŋ woŋ.
43007001	Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde kaande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ kamo kama. Ndɛ tha kaande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ, baa biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ kɛndɛ bi kɔŋ nde deethi ba niŋ kɔra.
43007002	Wiki woŋ thuriye wo biYusu beŋ ni yikiya ka ŋabankaŋ ŋaŋ ba siyuwa nɔŋ na nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ ka wula baŋ naa fuŋ bindɛ ka huwaayine haŋ ka Iyipiti.
43007003	Huna dome mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ kɛnama, na “Ŋaye dondo baŋ e yi kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ, wuna bakarandeni nda beŋ kutu waliŋ bamandiŋ ba yi ni baŋ.
43007004	Wɔ wo thimo ba wali nama baŋ kuto nagberekethe thimota ba niya wali baŋ ka nunɔkɔy. Yi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, awa tɔŋinɔkɔ kafaydo nagberekethe.”
43007005	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hali nde hintiŋ mbɛndama beŋ gbeeŋ bindɛ niyeta nde niŋ lanɛya.
43007006	Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Lɔkɔ basisande baŋ teŋeta hɛ ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ lɔkɔ o lɔkɔ bɛŋ asisande ba beŋ.
43007007	Biya bi kafaydo beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ saabu ba bena thambo, kɛrɛ bi kɔŋ yama thambo, baa yando bindɛ tepe banɛnɔy namɛŋ baŋ.
43007008	Kaaŋ hɔkɔŋ ka mathuŋande mamandiŋ maŋ maŋ baŋ. Lɔkɔ niŋ baŋ teŋeta hɛ.”
43007009	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya, ndɛ pɛyɛ kɛndɛ ka Kalili ka.
43007010	Kɛrɛ naa key nthɔŋ mbɛndama beŋ ka mathuŋande mathɔɔkɔ maŋ maŋ baŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ndɛ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ ndɛ key nasɔyi kɛndɛ.
43007011	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi bi kɔŋ nde niŋ deethi ka mathuŋande maŋ e bindɛ kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwa, na “Thɔɔ ka ndɛ?”
43007012	Kɛna bohe biya muŋ ŋɔyintande wubɔyɛ ba wundɛ. Binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde dɔŋ, na “Wɔ yɔhɔy na ndɛ,” awa binɔndi nɛnɛ kɔy dɔma, na “Ade, bathɔkɔŋ biya na ndɛ.”
43007013	Wɔ tha niyɔ wo koyintɛ ka gbonkiya ba Yisɔs, baa biya beŋ payɔy biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ wumandiŋ.
43007014	Naa tɛŋ nthɔŋ bindɛ mathuŋande maŋ mateete, Yisɔs key biyande ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ndɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka thaninuwa biya beŋ.
43007015	Naa yuye niŋ biYusu beŋ si thanani, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba mathanani nama maŋ, awa huna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Nama dɔmɛ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ kɔŋ kute mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ, mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha thaninuwa ba niyɔ karimɔkɔ wo ka Siraŋ ntuŋ baŋ?”
43007016	Kɛna gbonkiyiyɔkɔy Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Mathanani ma yaŋ bena thanani maŋ yaŋ kutɛ biyɛ mɛŋ, kɛrɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ na biyɛ mɛŋ.
43007017	Mɛnɛ wɔ yɛrɔkɔy ba niya ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma baŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ kɔthɔ mɛnɛ mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ ŋaye ka Masaala maa yando gbonkoy ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ hɔkɔŋ.
43007018	Hanimaa wɔ wo gbonkoy ka sɛmbɛ bakɛnama baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ deethiyɔkɔ yiki. Kɛrɛ wɔ wo deethi yiki ba wo ŋindɛ niŋ woŋ, wɔ seŋa na ndɛ, awa wɔ bɛina ka bahothi hali.
43007019	Musa na dunkune nde bena Siraŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, kɛrɛ hali wɔ wunthe ka beŋ ndɛ tha bɛŋ kɔsɔŋ. Mbɛ hu beŋ yama deethuwe ba yama kɔra?”
43007020	Huna niye biya beŋ niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Wayi na bɔhɛ yina! Mbɛ biya na bi yɔli ba yina kɔra?”
43007021	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Yaŋ ni nde bɛy banthe bamandiŋ, awa beŋ ni nde thakaba ba bɛŋ.
43007022	Musa ni nde bena yamari ba thiya mpati ndeŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ ka bintɔni namɛŋ. Kɛrɛ wuŋ ka ba dɔma na Musa na thɛrinɛ naamu woŋ baŋ. Mbembɛŋ bikɛntuŋ bi kɔtiyɔkɔy Musa na beŋ bina thɛrinɛ wuŋ. Awa beŋ kɔŋ nde thiyi hati malɛɛthɛ wowathe ka bintɔni nama hali wuŋ niyɔŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
43007023	Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ na nde beŋ thiye malɛɛthɛ maŋ ka bintɔni nama haliko Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ ba be tha teetuwa ba tɛpɛ baŋ na wu kiŋ ba niyo ka gbɛɛŋ wosɔŋ-bitaati woŋ. Mbu mbɛ hu beŋ thooye ka mathoŋ ba na puyi yaŋ hati lamgba woŋ natharaŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?
43007024	Pɛyaŋ kɛriŋa thasɔkɔiŋ thaŋ ka na beŋ thɛŋ yenke kute na, kɛrɛ konsiŋineŋ thɛŋ ka gboŋa bathumbɛ baŋ.”
43007025	Kɛna bohe biya binɔndi bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “E ba hɔŋ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ kutɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ deethi ba kɔra woŋ?
43007026	Dethaŋ hɛ na ndɛ gbonkoy dondo baŋ ka biya muŋ ka teete, kɛrɛ hali wɔ sɔkinɔkɔy niŋ. E ba hɔŋ akɔthɛ na bayahɛŋ beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ gbeeŋ?
43007027	Miŋ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye hati wowathe woŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ ti wo domo Banikisi woŋ tɛŋ, wɔ yo wɔ sa kɔthɔ ka wundɛ ŋaye.”
43007028	Naa Yisɔs bindɛ thanani ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, ndɛ ŋataŋ ka gbonkiye bindɛ e dɔma, na “E beŋ kɔthɛŋ yama, awa e beŋ kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye yaŋ? Yaŋ tha see kafaydo ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ. Wɔ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ wɔ na woseŋa, awa beŋ kɔita niŋ.
43007029	Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ, baa kɛnama kɛna ŋaye yaŋ awa ndɛ na ŋindɛ yama.”
43007030	Naa gbanthaŋ Yisɔs, kɛna ŋaye bindɛ narɛ ba niŋ bɔha, kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo tɔpinɛ niŋ yɔnkɔ, baa lɔkɔ ba ndɛ ba boho baŋ teŋeta hɛ.
43007031	Kɛrɛ halisa biya binɔndi ka biya beŋ ni niŋ lanɛya e bindɛ dɔma, na “E ba hɔŋ na wo dɔma Banikisi woŋ see ndɛ kɔŋ si ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba babɔyɛ wuŋ yama ba thanki hati wowathe woŋ niya baŋ?”
43007032	BiFaresini binɔndi yuye biya beŋ bi si ŋɔyintande wubɔyɛ ba Yisɔs, huna bindɛ mɛnɛ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ ŋindi kurugbani namɛŋ beŋ ba ka bɔha Yisɔs na.
43007033	Naa kute Yisɔs bindɛ, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ nda hɔkɔŋ iŋ beŋ ba wuthurɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ teŋiteke ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43007034	Beŋ kɔŋ deethi ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa yama kutu, baa ka yaŋ ka niyɔ ka, beŋ sa kɛndɛ punku tɛŋa.”
43007035	BiYusu beŋ bohe thɔnthiŋinuwande wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Kama hati wowathe woŋ baŋ dɔŋ ba kaa ka sa miŋ niŋ punku kute? E ba hɔŋ ndɛ kiŋ ba kaa ka mɛtiŋ ba ka ŋakuyɛkɛŋ ŋahɛna ŋaŋ ka biya ntuŋ beŋ ka e thaninuwa biya bi ka siyani bahɛna baŋ beŋ kɛndɛ?
43007036	Mbɛ mu dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ tɛpi ba dɔma, na ‘Beŋ kɔŋ deethi ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa yama kutu,’ awa ‘ka yaŋ niyɔ, beŋ sa kɛndɛ punku kaa’?”
43007037	Ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ bamandiŋ baŋ ka mathuŋande maŋ, Yisɔs kɔɔyɛ mateete ka biya beŋ e ndɛ koyiŋa ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ kaho kumbɛ, ndɛ sɛɛŋ kiyaŋ do, ndɛ be si thiiye mandi.
43007038	Wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya woŋ, nɔŋ na tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ na, na ‘Mandi ma dunkuŋ sii ma kɔŋ buulu ka thukuma nama haŋ.’ ”
43007039	Yisɔs kɔŋ nde dɔŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, wo bi niyɛ niŋ lanɛya beŋ kutu woŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ dunkunɔita nde hɛ, baa Yisɔs ŋatinɔita nde hɛ ka thinthi e ndɛ niyo yiki.
43007040	Naa yuye biya beŋ magbonkoy maŋ maŋ baŋ, biya binɔndi ka biya beŋ tepe ba dɔma, na “Banabi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ baŋ gbeeŋ.”
43007041	Awa biya binɔndi tepe ba dɔma, na “Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ baŋ.” Kɛrɛ biya binɔndi tepe ba dɔma, na “Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ sa ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ.
43007042	Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ, awa na ndɛ kɔŋ ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi baŋ, mɛti ba ka nde gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ.”
43007043	Kɛna see mahakuwande niyɔ mateete ma ka biya beŋ saathɛ ba ka Yisɔs.
43007044	Binɔndi ka biya beŋ thimo nde ba niŋ bɔha, kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo tɔpinɛ niŋ yɔnkɔ.
43007045	Naa duu kurugbani bi ŋindo nde beŋ iŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bindɛ key tɔŋ kuna. Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bi ŋindɛ bindɛ beŋ, na “Mbɛ hu tha beŋ niŋ diŋe ka saa?”
43007046	Kurugbani bi ŋindo beŋ ni yaabi, na “Miŋ yuyeta hɛ nɔŋ hali hanthe wɔ si gbonkoy nɔŋ na hati wowathe woŋ gbonkiye na.”
43007047	BiFaresini beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “E beŋ hɛlɛŋ athiika thɔkɔ iŋ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ?
43007048	E wunthe ka bayahɛŋ beŋ maa ka biFaresini beŋ ni niŋ lanɛya?
43007049	Kɛrɛ sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ tha kɔthɔ Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ, huna Masaala thiyiyɛ bindɛ danka.”
43007050	Nikɔdimɔsi wo kaayɛ nde ka Yisɔs huyɛ woŋ, wo nde wunthe ka biFaresini beŋ woŋ, thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na
43007051	“E Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ mɛkɛŋ ba kɔnsiŋina wɔ mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke poniyo kuiha, awa e wuŋ yenke kothiyo ba ni ndɛ baŋ?”
43007052	Bindɛ ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “E ka Kalili kɛna ŋaye yi nɔŋ na ŋaye kɛndɛ Yisɔs wobɛina na?” Kɛna tepe bindɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Detha ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ awa yi kɔŋ kutu ba dɔma na haaŋ nɔŋ banabi sa fuŋ ka Kalili.”
43007053	Biya beŋ fooma duuku ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ,
43008001	kɛrɛ Yisɔs nɛnɛ ndɛ key ka kusɛri ku dɔma koŋ na Ɔlifisi.
43008002	Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ sanka, Yisɔs key hɛlɛŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, awa biya beŋ fooma key kɛnama ka, awa kɛna dɔŋɔy ndɛ ka thaninuwa bindɛ.
43008003	Ka nde wundɛ thanani biya beŋ ka, karimɔkɔiŋ binɔndi bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini binɔndi sisi hati yɛrɛmɛ woyɛntɔy kɛnama wo bohitande bindɛ ka niya kubɛy, e bindɛ niŋ si kiya mateete ka biya beŋ.
43008004	Bindɛ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Karimɔkɔ, hati woyɛrɛmɛ woyɛntɔy woŋ baŋ na bohitande miŋ ka niya kubɛi.
43008005	Awa Siraŋ ba dunkuno nde miŋ baŋ iŋ Musa ni mina yamari ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ wo bohitando ka maniyɔ maŋ maŋ baŋ, yɔkɔŋ wɔ bɛina be lɔɔpuwa tharaka haaŋ ndɛ koro. Mbu yi? Nama tepe yi ba wundɛ?”
43008006	Bindɛ see tɛpi haŋ haŋ baŋ ka Yisɔs ba niŋ gbɛriŋinuwa haliko ba kuta na bindɛ niŋ bohe ka magbonkoy ba kuta na bindɛ niŋ thonkine. Naa gbanthaŋ bindɛ, Yisɔs putɔy e ndɛ kɔ gbala ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ iŋ kuthenke nama koŋ.
43008007	Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔni thuuŋ, kɛna ŋayinɔkɔy Yisɔs ka pute nde wundɛ kɛ e bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Wɔ wo kɔthɛ woŋ ka beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ niyeta hɛ hakɛ hali hanthe, wɔ bɛina sɛkithɛŋ hɛ raka e yenke lɔɔpa hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ.”
43008008	Yisɔs putɔy hɛlɛŋ e ndɛ kɔ gbala ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ iŋ kuthenke nama koŋ.
43008009	Naa yuye bindɛ hu tepe bindɛ Yisɔs haŋ, bindɛ bohe funka ka wunthe-wunthe there ka bi yamɛ niyɔ bakalani beŋ. Kɛna pɛyɛ Yisɔs kɛndɛ ti bindɛ biye iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ.
43008010	Yisɔs ŋayinɔkɔy e thɔnthiŋina hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Kama kaaye bi sɛɛ yina ka fuŋutiyɛ beŋ? E wɔ wunthe ka bindɛ tha niyɔ wo thonkine yina?”
43008011	Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ni niŋ yaabi, na “Ndo hɛmɔŋ, wɔ tha niyɔ wo thonkine yama.” Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ, yaŋ sa yina thonkine. Kɛrɛ kaa; ba nda hɛlɛŋ ka ni hakɛ ye.”
43008012	Yisɔs gbonkitiyande hɛlɛŋ biya beŋ ba dɔma, na “Yama dunkuŋ waŋ kafaydo. Wɔ yo wɔ wo yama yeŋ, ndɛ sa kaande ka huntuma, kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ waŋ ba dunkuŋ sii baŋ.”
43008013	Huna dome biFaresini beŋ kɛnama, na “Yi kɔŋ bɔhɔkɔ maseri ka yɛthɛ bakɛnda. Bɛna magbonkoy nda maŋ tha tɔŋɔŋ bɛy yo bɛy.”
43008014	Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Hali yaŋ bɔhɔkɔŋ maseri ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ, magbonkoy niŋ maŋ ma kiŋ nɔndi, baa yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye yaŋ iŋ ka yaŋ key. Kɛrɛ beŋ kɔita ka ŋaye yaŋ iŋ ka yaŋ key ka.
43008015	Beŋ kɔŋ konsiŋine maŋaye ka huwɔmɛtiya haŋ, awa yaŋ, yaŋ konsiŋineta wɔ yo wɔ.
43008016	Hali yaŋ kɔnsiŋinaŋ hintiŋ wɔ, kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ niŋ koŋ ku kiŋ seŋa, baa yaŋ wuntheŋ kutɛ kɔnsɔŋɔŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ iŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ mina kɔnsɔŋɔŋ.
43008017	Wuŋ gbalo nde ka Siraŋ bakendeŋ baŋ ba dɔma na maseriŋ ma ka biya biye ma kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ nɔndi baŋ.
43008018	Yaŋ kɔŋ bohɔkɔ maseri ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ, awa Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ni maseri ba yaŋ.”
43008019	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Kama fanda wobɛina?” Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Beŋ tha yama kɔthɔ. E Fandaŋ woŋ na beŋ kɔthɔ? Mɛnɛ beŋ kɔthɛ nde yama, beŋ kɔŋ nde kɔthɔ Fandaŋ woŋ.”
43008020	Yisɔs gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka doŋe nde wundɛ kuwaŋ ka kumani ba kɔbiri wo kata ka Masaala woŋ thiyo kɛ, ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, naa ndɛ thanani biya beŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ tha niyɔ wo bɔhɛ niŋ, baa lɔkɔ ba nde ndɛ ba boho baŋ teŋeta hɛ.
43008021	Yisɔs tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ key napoŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ deethi ba yaŋ haaŋ e beŋ tuka iŋ hakɛ ndeŋ baŋ, baa ka yaŋ key ka, beŋ sa kɛndɛ punku tɛŋa.”
43008022	Huna dome biYusu beŋ ka wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Ndɛ dome na miŋ sa punku kaa ka ndɛ key ka. E wuŋ thɔyande ba dɔma na kɔrɔkɔ huna ndɛ ba kɔrɔkɔ?”
43008023	Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Biya bi ka pothi kafaydo bina beŋ; kɛrɛ yaŋ, yando ŋa ye ka thinthi ka ariana na yaŋ. Hulasiriya hukendeŋ hu kiŋ kafaydo, kɛrɛ yaŋ, hulasiriya niŋ haŋ ka kafaydo.
43008024	Wuna biyɛ yaŋ kɔŋ hɛ bena tepe ba dɔma na beŋ kɔŋ tuku iŋ hakɛŋ bakendeŋ baŋ. Awa beŋ kɔŋ tuku iŋ hakɛŋ bakendeŋ baŋ mɛnɛ beŋ tha ni lanɛya ba dɔma na yama wɔ kuhantheŋ woŋ.”
43008025	Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Mbɛ yina?” Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Yama wo tepe hɛ nthɔŋ yaŋ bena mayoŋ woŋ.
43008026	Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ ba gbonkiya ba beŋ iŋ ba bena thonkine. Kɛrɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ wɔ seŋa na ndɛ, awa yaŋ see tepe biya bi kafaydo beŋ fooma bɛyiniŋ ba yuye nde yaŋ maŋaye kɛnama baŋ.”
43008027	Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha metho ba dɔma na ndɛ kɔŋ nde gbonkoy ba Fandama woŋ ka ariana.
43008028	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ti nɔŋ beŋ ŋataŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka thinthi, ka lɔkɔ babɛina na beŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yama wɔ kuhantheŋ woŋ. Awa beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yaŋ sa ni bɛy yo bɛy ka mayoho makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ ba thanki nde Fandaŋ woŋ yama thaninuwa baŋ.
43008029	Ndɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ kiŋ iŋ yaŋ, awa ndɛ tha yama pɛyɛŋ yaŋ wuntheŋ, baa yando ni bɛyiniŋ ba niŋ yeheŋ thukuma baŋ timo tima.”
43008030	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya, biya bibɔyɛ ni niŋ lanɛya.
43008031	Kɛna dome ntiŋ Yisɔs ka biYusu bi niyɛ niŋ lanɛya beŋ, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba yema mathanani niŋ maŋ, bena bakarandeni niŋ bigbeeŋ beŋ;
43008032	awa beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ ba Masaala, awa nɔndi baŋ ba kɔŋ bena ni kɔɔrɔiŋ.”
43008033	Kɛrɛ bindɛ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Mindo bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Ebrahim bɛna miŋ, awa miŋ ka ka huwaayine ka wɔ yo wɔ. Nama ka dɔma mina, na ‘Beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ kɔɔrɔiŋ’?”
43008034	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ yo wɔ wo ni hakɛ, waayi na nda wundɛ ka niya hakɛ.
43008035	Beŋ kɔthɛŋ nɛnɛ ba dɔma na waayi woŋ sa niyɔ ka banka ba ka mariki nama woŋ kɔy yo kɔy. Hati o hati mpuu na kɛndɛ niyɔ kɔy yo kɔy.
43008036	Huna, mɛnɛ Hati wo ka Masaala woŋ pɛyi bena ka yɛthɛ bakendeŋ, beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ kɔɔrɔiŋ bigbeeŋ beŋ.
43008037	Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Ebrahim bɛna beŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ kɔ deethuwa ba yama kɔra, baa beŋ tha yɛrɔkɔ mathanani niŋ maŋ.
43008038	Yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy ba thanki nde yaŋ toŋino iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ baŋ, awa beŋ nɛnɛ beŋ kɔŋ ni ba thanki nde beŋ yuyɛ maŋaye ka fanda ndeŋ woŋ baŋ.”
43008039	Kɛrɛ bindɛ dome kɛnama, na “Ebrahim na fanda ntuŋ.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛnɛ Ebrahim na mbemba wokendeŋ, beŋ kɔŋ nde ni ba thanki nde Ebrahim niya baŋ.
43008040	Kɛrɛ dethaŋ hɛ na beŋ deethi ba yama kɔra, yando see bena tepe nɔndi ba thanki nde yaŋ yuyɛ ka Masaala baŋ. Ebrahim tha nde ni bɛyi nɔŋ ba beŋ ni baŋ baŋ.
43008041	Beŋ kɔŋ ni ba thanki nde fanda ndeŋ woŋ niya baŋ.” Bindɛ dome kɛnama, na “Biya kutɛ miŋ bi mpoo namo nama. Miŋ kiŋ iŋ fanda ntuŋ wunthe napethi, ndɛ na Masaala.”
43008042	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛnɛ Masaala na fanda ndeŋ, beŋ kɔŋ nde yama thimo, baa yaŋ see ŋaye ka Masaala, awa ka tete yaŋ kiŋ nda dondo baŋ. Yaŋ tha see ka mayoho makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ ndɛ na ŋindɛ yama.
43008043	Mbu mbɛ hu ba beŋ metho hu yaŋ tɛpi haŋ? Wu biyɛ saabu na, beŋ punketa ba niya muyuŋ ba poniyɛ kuiha thampa niŋ thaŋ.
43008044	Beŋ kiŋ mpati bi ka fanda ndeŋ woŋ Sithani, Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ, awa lɔkɔiŋ fooma bendo thimo ba niya ba ndɛ kufiyo baŋ. Bakɔri na ndɛ kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ, awa hali hanthe ndɛ ka ka kuwaŋ ku ka nɔndi baŋ baa ndɛ gbonkiyeta hɛ nɔndi baŋ hali hanthe. Naa ndɛ kɔ kɛrɛŋ hothi, ndɛ kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ maniyɔ makɛnama maŋ, baa bahothi na ndɛ, awa fanda ka kɛriŋa hothi na wundɛ.
43008045	Kɛrɛ saathɛ ba na yaŋ tɛpi nɔndi baŋ, beŋ tha yama ni lanɛya.
43008046	Mbɛ wɔ wunthe ka beŋ wo kutɛ yaŋ si ni hakɛ? Mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena nɔndi baŋ, mbɛ hu tha beŋ yama niye lanɛya?
43008047	Wɔ yo wɔ wo ka Masaala ndɛ kɔŋ poniyɛ kuiha thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ. Beŋ ka biya bi ka Masaala. Saabu babɛina bɛna dɔmɛ beŋ tha poniyɛ kuiha thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ.”
43008048	BiYusu beŋ mɛyiyɛ niŋ kaŋ thɔnthiŋina, na “E miŋ keriŋe hothi ba na dome miŋ na ka Sameriya kɛna ŋaye yi, awa yi kiŋ hɛlɛŋ iŋ wayi wo yina katitɔkɔ?”
43008049	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ ka iŋ wayi. Athiyɛ na yaŋ Fandaŋ na yiki, kɛrɛ beŋ, beŋ tha yama thiyi yiki.
43008050	Yaŋ deethiyɔkɔita yiki ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ kiŋ kɛndɛ wo deethi ba yaŋ niyo yiki awa ndɛ na kɔnsɔŋɔŋ wuthumbɛ ba yaŋ.
43008051	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ thampa niŋ thaŋ, wɔ bɛina sa nɔŋ tuku.”
43008052	Huna dome biYusu beŋ kɛnama, na “Ka tete kɛna kɔthɛ ntiŋ miŋ ba dɔma na yi kiŋ iŋ wayi. Ebrahim tuku nde, awa banabiŋ beŋ tuuku nde fooma. Kɛrɛ yi duu ka tɛpa, na ‘Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ yɛrɔkɔy thampa niŋ thaŋ, wɔ bɛina sa tuku.’
43008053	E ba hɔŋ yi yameŋ ba fanda ntuŋ woŋ Ebrahim, wo tukɛ nde woŋ, mɛnɛ banabiŋ bi tuukɛ nde beŋ? Nama yi dɔmɔkɔ gbeeŋ?”
43008054	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yaŋ niyɔkɔy yiki ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ, yiki ba ba gboŋ bɛna. Fandaŋ woŋ na yama ni yiki, wo dome beŋ woŋ na Fanda ndeŋ na.
43008055	Haaŋ hɛ beŋ kɔita niŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ. Mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena ba dɔma na yaŋ kɔita niŋ, yaŋ niyɔy bahothi nɔŋ na beŋ na. Kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ, awa e yaŋ hɛlɛŋ putuyɔ yamari nama woŋ.
43008056	Ebrahim wo fanda ndeŋ woŋ yehitɔkɔy nde naa ni niŋ Masaala lahiri ba ndɛ kɔ penkitiye ka lɔkɔ ba ka saa hukiyaŋ haŋ baŋ. Awa ndɛ kute nde bɛŋ, awa ndɛ yehitɔkɔy nde ba lɔkɔ babɛina.”
43008057	BiYusu beŋ dome kɛnama, na “Yi teŋineta hɛ hintiŋ thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ kasɔhi. E yina dɔŋ na yi kute nde Ebrahim na?”
43008058	Kɛna ni Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, saanuŋ Ebrahim ba mpoo, yaŋ kiŋ nde nda kuhantheŋ.”
43008059	Kɛna sekithe bindɛ tharaka ba niŋ kɔra kaŋ lɔɔpuwa niŋ, kɛrɛ Yisɔs nunɔkɔy bindɛ e ndɛ fuŋa nasɔyi ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
43009001	Naa nde Yisɔs daŋande, ndɛ kute hati lamgba wunthe doŋe ka gboŋa baŋ kuwaŋ wo mpoo womankɔy thaaya.
43009002	Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, nkaana niyɛ hakɛ, hati lamgba woŋ baŋ maa biya nama beŋ, na dɔmɛ kɔŋ nde mpaa womankɔy thaaya?”
43009003	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ tha ni hakɛ maa biya nama beŋ bina niyɛ hakɛ dɔma na ndɛ be mpaa womankɔy thaaya. Kɛrɛ wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko wali ba ka Masaala baŋ ba be tɔŋinɔkɔ kɛnama.
43009004	Miŋ kiŋ ba niya wali ba ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ baŋ, naa hintiŋ waŋ baŋ na, baa kaŋ woŋ kɔŋ tete thɔɔ, naa sa nda wɔ punku niye wali.
43009005	Hanimaa naa hintiŋ yaŋ kafaydo na, yama waŋ baŋ ba biya bi kafaydo beŋ.”
43009006	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya, ndɛ thuthu ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ e ndɛ nɔka kupati koŋ iŋ mathɔini ma thuthu ndɛ maŋ ka yɔnkɔ. Ndɛ sekithe kupati kubɛina e ndɛ kuŋ puyina ka thinthi ka thaaya tha ka hati lamgba woŋ thaŋ.
43009007	Kɛna dome ndɛ ka hati lamgba woŋ, na “Kaa e yi ka lɔkɔkɔ ka tumgbuŋ hu dɔma haŋ na Silowami.” Ka tha ka dome Yisɔs ka na Silowami, kɛndɛ thalintando ba dɔma na “ŋindo.” Hati lamgba woŋ key lɔkɔkɔ e ndɛ kuta nagberekethe.
43009008	Bi dɔŋitande nɔŋ iŋ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ bi bare nde niŋ kuta ndɛ si yawu beŋ dome, na “E hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kutɛ bare nɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka gboŋa baŋ kuwaŋ woŋ ba yawa?”
43009009	Binɔndi dome, na “Wundɛ na,” kɛrɛ binɔndi dome, na “Ade, athɔyande ma iŋ wundɛ.” Huna dome hati lamgba woŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yama gbeeŋ.”
43009010	Kɛna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Nama dɔmɛ yi kɔŋ pɛthɔ thaaya?”
43009011	Ndɛ ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Hati wowathe wo dɔma Yisɔs woŋ na nɔkɛ kupati e ndɛ kuŋ puyina ka thaaya niŋ thaŋ ka thinthi e ndɛ dɔma yama, na ‘Kaa ka tumgbuŋ hu dɔma haŋ na Silowami e yi ka lɔkɔkɔ.’ Naa key yaŋ lɔkɔkɔ, yaŋ kute nagberekethe.”
43009012	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ biya beŋ, na “Kama ndɛ?” Hati lamgba woŋ ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Yaŋ kɔita ka ndɛ.”
43009013	Kɛna sisi bindɛ hati lamgba wo mankɔy thaaya woŋ ka biFaresini beŋ.
43009014	Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ niye na nde Yisɔs kupati e ndɛ pɛtha thaaya tha ka hati lamgba woŋ thaŋ.
43009015	BiFaresini beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ hati lamgba woŋ na dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ kutu. Hati lamgba woŋ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kupati kuna puyuŋ ndɛ ka thaaya niŋ thaŋ, e yaŋ ka lɔkɔkɔ. Naa lɔkɔkɔy yaŋ, yaŋ kute nagberekethe.”
43009016	Huna dome biFaresini binɔndi, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ ka wɔ ka Masaala, baa ndɛ tha kɔsɔŋ siraŋ ba deŋo nde ba Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ baŋ.” Kɛrɛ binɔndi ka bindɛ dome, na “Nama wɔ bahakɛ punku niye bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ?” Kɛna see mahakuwande ka masiyini niyɔ mateete ka biya beŋ beŋ baŋ.
43009017	Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ hati lamgba wo mankɔy thaaya woŋ, na “Nama tepe yi gbeeŋ ba hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, wo pɛthɛ yina thaaya woŋ?” Hati lamgba woŋ ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Banabi na ndɛ.”
43009018	BiYusu beŋ tha ni lanɛya ba dɔma na hati lamgba woŋ baŋ na wo mankɔy thaaya na nde ndɛ, awa e thɛŋ petho, yɔkɔŋ naa thiyi bindɛ komisɛŋ bi ka hati lamgba wo puyo thaaya thaŋ woŋ.
43009019	Bindɛ si thɔnthiŋina bindɛ, na “E hati ndeŋ na woŋ baŋ gbeeŋ, wo dome beŋ wo mpoo womankɔy thaaya woŋ? Nama dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ nda kute nagberekethe?”
43009020	Komisɛŋ beŋ ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hati ntuŋ na gbeeŋ, awa e miŋ niŋ mpaa womankɔy thaaya.
43009021	Kɛrɛ na dɔmɛ nda wundɛ be kute miŋ kɔita, maa ba hintiŋ nthɔŋ dɔma na miŋ kɔthɛŋ wo pɛthɛ niŋ thaaya woŋ. Thɔnthiŋinaŋ niŋ, bakalaŋ na nda wundɛ, awa ndɛ kɔŋ gbonkiyiyɔkɔ ba yɛthɛ nama.”
43009022	Biya nama ni nde yaabi baŋ baŋ ka biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ iŋ payɔ, baa bayahɛŋ beŋ thanki nde nda niyɔ hunthe ba mɛnɛ wɔ kɔŋ dɔŋ na Yisɔs na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ kiya thɔŋ ba nda thana biyande ka banka namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ.
43009023	Wuna biyɛ komisɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ dɔŋ, na “Bakalaŋ na ndɛ, thɔnthiŋinaŋ niŋ.”
43009024	Kɛna thiyi hɛlɛŋ bindɛ hati lamgba wo mankɔy thaaya woŋ hukaye e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Gbiŋa hɛ Masaala na. Miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hati lamgba wo puyɛ yina woŋ baŋ bahakɛ na ndɛ.”
43009025	Kɛna dome hati lamgba woŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wu niyɔyŋ nthɔŋ ba dɔma na bahakɛ na ndɛ, yaŋ ka ba kɔthɔ. Bɛy banthe napethi bɛna kɔthɛ yaŋ, yando nde wo mankɔy thaaya, ka tete nda yando kutu.”
43009026	Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ niŋ, na “Nama ni ndɛ yina? Nama pethee ndɛ thaaya nda thaŋ?”
43009027	Hati lamgba woŋ ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ thanki hɛ bena tepe nagberekethe, kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama poniyɛ kuiha. Mbɛ hu thimo hɛlɛŋ beŋ ba huŋ yuyɛ hukaye? E beŋ hɛlɛŋ beŋ thimoŋ ba niyɔ bakarandeni nama?”
43009028	Kɛna wokitɔkɔy bindɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Yina nthɔŋ bakarandeŋ wo ka wɔ woŋ baŋ. Miŋ, bakarandeni bi ka Nabi Musa bina miŋ.
43009029	Miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Masaala gbonkitiyande nde Musa na, kɛrɛ wɔ woŋ baŋ miŋ kɔita ka ŋaye wundɛ.”
43009030	Hati lamgba woŋ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Hu tepe beŋ haŋ niyɔy yama thakaba. Beŋ dome na beŋ kɔita ka ŋaye wundɛ, kɛrɛ haliko ti pɛthi ndɛ yama thaaya.
43009031	Miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Masaala sa poniyɛ bahakɛ kuiha, kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo ni Masaala na yiki, awa e ndɛ niya bɛyiniŋ ba thimo Masaala ba bɛŋ niyo baŋ, Masaala kɔŋ niŋ poniyɛ kuiha.
43009032	Kabi naa thɛrɛŋ nde Masaala kafay woŋ miŋ yuyeta hɛ ba dɔma na wɔ wo mpoo womankɔy thaaya petho thaaya nama thaŋ.
43009033	Mɛnɛ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ tha nde ŋaye ka Masaala, ndɛ sa nde punku niya bɛy yo bɛy.”
43009034	Kɛna dome bindɛ ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, na “Yindo bahakɛ woŋ there ka mpoo hukɛnda. E yina mina see ka thaninuwa ba Masaala?” Kɛna fuŋutu bindɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ e bindɛ niŋ kiya thɔŋ ba wundɛ nda thana biyande ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ.
43009035	Naa yuye Yisɔs ba dɔma na bindɛ kanthe hati lamgba woŋ, wundɛ deethi niŋ e ndɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina, na “E yi ni lanɛya ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ?”
43009036	Kɛna ni niŋ hati lamgba woŋ yaabi, na “Hɛmɔŋ, nkaana dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ? Tepe yama haliko yaŋ be niŋ ni lanɛya.”
43009037	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Yi thanki nda niŋ kuta; ndɛ na gbeeŋ wo yina gbonkitiyande woŋ.”
43009038	Hati lamgba woŋ dome kɛnama, na “Mariki, yaŋ ni yina lanɛya.” Kɛna kunthuŋe hati lamgba woŋ e ndɛ niŋ niya kubatho.
43009039	Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Ba si kɔnsiŋina see na yaŋ kafaydo, haliko bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ bi be kutu, awa bi kutɛ beŋ bi be mankɔy thaaya.”
43009040	Naa yuye niŋ biFaresini bi thuriye niŋ beŋ si nɛŋ gbonkoy, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E siyuweŋ ba dɔma na miŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ bi mankɔy thaaya bina miŋ?”
43009041	Kɛna ni Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ nde niyɔ bi mankɔy thaaya, beŋ sa nde niyɔ iŋ mathonko hali. Kɛrɛ naa dome beŋ ba wuŋ niyɔ na bendo kutɛ bina beŋ, bɛna beŋ kiŋ iŋ mathonko haaŋ ka wuŋ key.”
43010001	Yisɔs tepe, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ yo wɔ wo sa biiyande ka biyo hu ka kubinthi ku ka takɛŋ beŋ koŋ, kɛrɛ e ndɛ biiyande gboŋa bahɛna, wɔ bɛina batuwaŋ na wundɛ iŋ bakanati biya munki ka kansuŋ.
43010002	Kɛrɛ wɔ wo biiyande ka biyo haŋ woŋ, wundɛ na batɔli wogbeeŋ woŋ.
43010003	Wɔ bɛina na wo dethiteke takɛŋ beŋ woŋ pɛthiyɛ biyo haŋ. Awa takɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ niŋ yuyɛ ka thampa, awa ndɛ kɔŋ bindɛ hiini ŋakeŋ fooma e ndɛ bindɛ fuŋuta ka gbada.
43010004	Naa ndɛ thanki funkuta bikɛnama beŋ fooma ka gbada, ndɛ kɔŋ bindɛ kɔtiyɔkɔ, awa takɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ niŋ yeŋ mahɛŋ, baa bindɛ ŋee thampa nama thaŋ.
43010005	Kɛrɛ bindɛ sa yeŋ thahinɛ, awa naa bindɛ kute niŋ bi kɔŋ niŋ kiti, baa bindɛ sa ŋee thampa tha ka thahinɛ.”
43010006	Mathɔyande maŋ maŋ baŋ mɛna tɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs ba bindɛ thaninuwa, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha wuŋ metho.
43010007	Huna dome hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, yama biyo hu ba biyande ka kubinthi ku ka takɛŋ beŋ koŋ.
43010008	Bi yenke nde saa ba yaŋ beŋ fooma batuwani bina iŋ bakanatiŋ biya munki ka kansuŋ. Kɛrɛ takɛŋ beŋ tha bindɛ poniyɛ kuiha.
43010009	Yama biyo hu ba biyande ka kubinthi ku ka takɛŋ beŋ koŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ biiyande kiyaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kisi, awa ndɛ kɔŋ key kaake e ndɛ fuŋa ka gbada, awa ndɛ kɔŋ kutu muthɔma mɛnɛ mandi mathiiye.
43010010	Batuwaŋ woŋ kɔŋ hɔkɔŋ see ba si tuwe, ba kɔra, mɛnɛ ba teetuwa. Kɛrɛ yaŋ see haliko biya bi be kutu sii bagbeeŋ baŋ, awa bi be tha panki ntha yo ntha ki ka sii bagbeeŋ baŋ baŋ.
43010011	“Yama batɔli takɛŋ wobathɛrɛgbɛŋ woŋ, baa batɔli wobathɛrɛgbɛŋ woŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ sii nama baŋ ba takɛŋ nama beŋ.
43010012	Wɔ wo gbako ba dethiteke takɛŋ beŋ woŋ, ndɛ kutɛ biyɛ bindɛ gbeeŋ. Naa ndɛ kute nthɔŋ yaŋa woŋ si seeyɛ takɛŋ beŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ pɛy takɛŋ beŋ e ndɛ kita napoŋ. Awa yaŋa woŋ kɔŋ si thiyɔkɔ takɛŋ beŋ e ndɛ bindɛ pankitinuwande.
43010013	Badethiteke woŋ kɔŋ kiti, baa wogbako na ndɛ, awa wuŋ ka niŋ bɛy hali apiriŋɛ na takɛŋ beŋ.
43010014	Yama batɔli wobathɛrɛgbɛŋ woŋ. Nɔŋ na kɔthɛ nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ woŋ na, e yaŋ kɔthɔ Fandaŋ woŋ; nɛna kɔthɔ yaŋ takɛŋ niŋ beŋ, awa takɛŋ niŋ beŋ yama kɔthɔ. Yaŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ sii bakiyaŋ baŋ ba takɛŋ niŋ beŋ.
43010016	Awa yaŋ kiŋ hɛlɛŋ iŋ takɛŋ bihɛna bi ka ka kubinthi koŋ koŋ baŋ. Yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be bindɛ biiti kaake. Bi kɔŋ poniyɛ kuiha thampa niŋ thaŋ e bindɛ niyɔ kubɛri kunthe, awa bi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ batɔli wunthe.
43010017	“Fandaŋ woŋ athimo yama baa yaŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ sii niŋ baŋ, haliko yaŋ be hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ duu ka kuta.
43010018	Wɔ yo ka wo yama punku kɔra, yɔkɔŋ yama dunkuŋ sii niŋ baŋ ka mathimo makiyaŋ maŋ. Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba bɛŋ dunkuna iŋ ba bɛŋ hɛlɛŋ duwa ka kuta. Haŋ haŋ baŋ huna ŋinde yama Fandaŋ woŋ ba yaŋ si niya.”
43010019	Kɛna see hɛlɛŋ biYusu beŋ hakuwande ka masiyini ba magbonkoy maŋ maŋ baŋ.
43010020	Bibɔyɛ ka bindɛ dome, na “Ndɛ kiŋ iŋ wayi wo thiyɛ niŋ kuso. Mbɛ hu beŋ niŋ poniye kuiha?”
43010021	Kɛrɛ binɔndi ka bindɛ dome, na “Magbonkoy ma ka wɔ wo iŋ wayi kutɛ maŋ maŋ baŋ. Wayi sa punku puya biya bi mankɔy thaaya.”
43010022	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina mathuŋande manthe mamandiŋ ma deŋo nde iŋ dina namɛŋ woŋ ma kiŋ nde ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ. Awa mathuŋande maŋ maŋ baŋ ma kiŋ nde ba siyuwa malɔkɔ ma dunkune nde bindɛ banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ kɛnama. Hiiri pati bɛna nde ka lɔkɔ babɛina,
43010023	awa Yisɔs kɔŋ nde kaande ka hunkiyɛ hu dɔma haŋ na Hunkiyɛ hu ka Silamani haŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
43010024	Kɛna see biYusu beŋ pɛnkiyande niŋ e bindɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina ba dɔma, na “Tima wuŋ sɛkɛthi saanuŋ yi ba mina tepe nɔndi baŋ? Mɛnɛ yina Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, tepe hɛ mina nagberekethe.”
43010025	Kɛna ni Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ thanki nde bena tepe, kɛrɛ beŋ tha ni lanɛya. Bɛyiniŋ ba thanki yaŋ niya baŋ ka keŋ ku ka Fandaŋ woŋ koŋ, bɛŋ thanki niya maseri ba yaŋ.
43010026	Kɛrɛ beŋ sa ni lanɛya, baa beŋ ka ka takɛŋ niŋ beŋ.
43010027	Takɛŋ niŋ beŋ bi poniyeŋ thampa niŋ thaŋ kuiha; yaŋ kɔthɛŋ bindɛ, awa bi kɔŋ yama yeŋ.
43010028	Yaŋ kɔŋ bindɛ dunkune sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa bindɛ sa piriŋ, awa wɔ sa yama bindɛ punku kanita.
43010029	Bi dunkune yama Fandaŋ woŋ beŋ bi yameŋ niyɔ waŋ ayaŋ ba ntha yo ntha, awa wɔ yo ka wo punku kanita niŋ ntha.
43010030	Awa yaŋ iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ wɔ wunthe na miŋ.”
43010031	Naa yuye huŋ biYusu beŋ, bindɛ sekithe tharaka ba niŋ lɔɔpuwa.
43010032	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bindɛ, na “E ba na kute beŋ yaŋ si ni bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy babɔyɛ ba tepe yama Fandaŋ woŋ ba yaŋ niya baŋ, huna beŋ yama ba loopuwe ba yama kɔra?”
43010033	Kɛna ni niŋ biYusu beŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Miŋ loopuweta yina ba bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ba thanki yi niya baŋ, kɛrɛ miŋ kɔŋ yina lɔɔpi ba na gbonkoy wunɛnɔy ma sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na, baa yindo wɔmɛti niyɔkɔy Masaala.”
43010034	Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bindɛ, na “E wuŋ tha nde gbala ka Siraŋ ndeŋ baŋ na Masaala tepe nde ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ tepe nde bena, na beŋ athɔyande iŋ Masaala’?
43010035	Beŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ma kiŋ nɔndi kɔy yo kɔy, awa Masaala tepe ba wuŋ niyɔ na biya bi dunkuno thampa nama thaŋ beŋ athɔyande iŋ wundɛ.
43010036	Mɛnɛ ba yaŋ, Fandaŋ woŋ thanki nde nda yama yɛtha e ndɛ yama ŋinda kafaydo. Mbɛ hu beŋ yama dome na yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy wunɛnɔy ba Masaala, ba na dome yaŋ, na ‘Yama Hati ka Masaala woŋ’?
43010037	Mɛnɛ yaŋ niyeta wali ba ka Fandaŋ woŋ baŋ, baŋ yama ni lanɛya.
43010038	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ yaŋ niyeŋ bɛŋ, hali beŋ thanaŋ yama niya lanɛya, niyaŋ lanɛya bɛyiniŋ ba thanki yaŋ niya baŋ, wuna beŋ kɔthɔ e beŋ metho ba dɔma na Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ yaŋ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe.”
43010039	Naa gbanthaŋ Yisɔs, kɛna yole hɛlɛŋ bindɛ ba niŋ bɔha, kɛrɛ Yisɔs kanɔkɔy bindɛ.
43010040	Yisɔs fuŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ thuhande mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ ka nde Yɔni biiye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka, awa kɛna key Yisɔs niyɔ nda haaŋ.
43010041	Kɛna penke biya bibɔyɛ Yisɔs na e bindɛ dɔma ka wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Yɔni tha ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba, kɛrɛ ba tepe ndɛ ba hati wowathe woŋ baŋ fooma ba kiŋ nɔndi.”
43010042	Awa biya bibɔyɛ ka bindɛ ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs.
43011001	Hati lamgba wunthe wo dɔma na Lasarɔsi, wo nde ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani, na thoono nde. Ka Bɛthani kɛna nde Mariyama mɛnɛ wɛndama woyɛrɛmɛ wo dɔma Matha woŋ.
43011002	Mariyama wobɛina na koŋe nde Mariki woŋ mayɔ ma thimɔy huru ka ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ e ndɛ ŋɛŋ puuthuwa iŋ bɔɔyɛ nama bu ka yaha buŋ. Ndɛ Mariyama wobɛina na nde huwɛndiya iŋ Lasarɔsi wo thoono nde woŋ.
43011003	Kɛna see yɛrɛmɛŋ bi huwɛndiya beŋ beŋ baŋ ŋindi baseri ka Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Mariki, wo thimo yi wumandiŋ woŋ kɔŋ thoona wukahɛ.”
43011004	Naa yuye Yisɔs huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ, ndɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Nthoonaŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ sa niŋ kɔri hali. Kɛrɛ ndɛ thoono haliko Masaala be kutu yiki. Awa wuna hɛlɛŋ Hati ka Masaala woŋ dunkuno yiki maŋaye ka nthoonaŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ.”
43011005	Yisɔs nde nɛnɛ niyɔ wo thimo-thimo Matha na, wɛndama Mariyama, mɛnɛ Lasarɔsi.
43011006	Naa yuye Yisɔs ba Lasarɔsi kɔ thoono, ndɛ niyɔy hɛlɛŋ ka nde ndɛ ka ba hura kaye.
43011007	Naa daŋande hura kaye woŋ, ndɛ dome ka bakarandeni beŋ, na “Miŋ teŋitekeŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ.”
43011008	Huna dome bakarandeni beŋ kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, biYusu beŋ bi kɔŋ yina deethi ba yina lɔɔpuwa ba yina kɔra. E kɛna yi dɔŋ ba kaa hɛlɛŋ?”
43011009	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Wakathiŋ kɔhi iŋ biye bina ka gbɛɛŋ woŋ. Bɛna mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ kaande ka gbɛɛŋ woŋ ndɛ sa thuŋɔ, baa ndɛ kuteŋ waŋ ba kafaydo baŋ nagberekethe.
43011010	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ kaande huyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ thuŋɔ, baa waŋ ka ka wundɛ ka.”
43011011	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ ndɛ gbonkiya ka bakarandeni beŋ, ndɛ dome ntiŋ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Nyathiki ntuŋ Lasarɔsi na ŋɔyɛ ka nine, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ key yaŋ be niŋ ka thɔhɔŋ ka nine haŋ.”
43011012	Huna dome bakarandeni beŋ kɛnama, na “Mariki, mɛnɛ ka nine ŋɔyɛ ma, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ pethɔ.”
43011013	Yisɔs kɔŋ nde tɛpi ba Lasarɔsi tuka, kɛrɛ bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na nine hu biyamɛti nine haŋ huna nde Yisɔs dɔŋ.
43011014	Kɛna dome ntiŋ Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ nagberekethe, na “Lasarɔsi tuku.
43011015	Kɛrɛ yaŋ yehitɔkɔy saathɛ ba kendeŋ, baa na tha yaŋ penkitiye kɛndɛ, wuna beŋ ni yama lanɛya. Awa miŋ kaayɛŋ kɛnama ka.”
43011016	Huna dome Thɔmɔsi, wo bathema woŋ, ka bintɔni nama beŋ, na “Miŋ fooma kaayɛŋ iŋ wundɛ, wuna miŋ ka tuku ka nanthe iŋ wundɛ.”
43011017	Naa tɛŋ Yisɔs kɛndɛ, ndɛ penke ba dɔma na Lasarɔsi sekithe nda hura kanaŋ naa mankuwo ndɛ.
43011018	Awa mɛti ba ka Bɛthani baŋ athuriyande nde iŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Wuŋ teŋeta nde hintiŋ ŋaragba ŋaye ka thɔkiyande.
43011019	Wuna dɔmɛ nde biYusu bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde key kɛndɛ ba ka thiya Matha na mɛnɛ Mariyama na thɔrɔ ba tuka hu ka wɛndamɛŋ haŋ.
43011020	Naa yuye Matha ba dɔma na Yisɔs tɛŋ, ndɛ key ba niŋ gbankita, kɛrɛ Mariyama pɛyɔy ka banka ka.
43011021	Naa penke Matha Yisɔs na, ndɛ dome kɛnama, na “Mariki, mɛnɛ yi kiŋ nde yeheeni dondo baŋ, wɛndaŋ woŋ sa nde yeheeŋ tuku.
43011022	Kɛrɛ hali ka tete yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na bɛyi o bɛyi ba yi thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Masaala na, ndɛ kɔŋ yina bɛŋ niiyɛ.”
43011023	Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Wɛnda kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋaye ka tuka haŋ.”
43011024	Huna dome Matha kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayeba niyɔ iŋ sii ti biya ŋayina ka tuka haŋ ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ.”
43011025	Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Yama ŋayaŋ biya ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ dunkune sii baŋ. Wɔ yo wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya, hali atukɛ ma, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ iŋ sii.
43011026	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo niyɔ iŋ yaŋ awa e ndɛ niya yama lanɛya, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda tuku. E niyeŋ huŋ lanɛya?”
43011027	Matha ni niŋ yaabi, na “Ndo, Mariki. Yaŋ niyeŋ lanɛya ba dɔma na yina Banikisi woŋ, Hati ka Masaala wo niyo nde lahiri ba saa kafaydo woŋ.”
43011028	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Matha gbonkiya, ndɛ duu ka banka ka e ka sakitɔkɔ wɛndama Mariyama na; e niŋ ŋoyinte, na “Karimɔkɔ woŋ tɛŋ awa ndɛ kɔŋ yina thiyi.”
43011029	Naa yuye huŋ Mariyama, ndɛ ŋaye nayaali ka doŋe nde ndɛ ka e kaa ba ka pɛnka Yisɔs na.
43011030	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs teŋeta hɛ ka mɛti ka; ndɛ kiŋ nde hintiŋ ka penke nde niŋ Matha ka.
43011031	Biya bi nde ka banka ka bi sɛɛ niŋ ka thiya thɔrɔ beŋ kute ndɛ si ŋaye nayaali e fuŋa ka gbada, huna yeme bindɛ niŋ yako. Bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na ka yoma ka na Mariyama key ba kɛndɛ ka boke.
43011032	Awa Mariyama nɛnɛ, naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka Yisɔs e ndɛ niŋ kuta, ndɛ ŋɔti ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ e ndɛ dɔma, na “Mariki, mɛnɛ yi kiŋ nde yeheeŋ dondo baŋ, wɛndaŋ woŋ sa nde yeheeŋ tuku.”
43011033	Naa kute Yisɔs ndɛ si bereŋ, e biya bi sɛɛ iŋ wundɛ beŋ hɛlɛŋ kɔ berina, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ ka thukuma.
43011034	Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ, na “Kama mankuwe beŋ niŋ?” Bindɛ ni niŋ yaabi, na “Mariki, saa, yi be si dethiyɔkɔ.”
43011035	Yisɔs buluŋ manɛɛni.
43011036	Naa kute biya bi nde kɛndɛ beŋ ndɛ si buluŋ manɛɛni, bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Hati wowathe woŋ baŋ athimo Lasarɔsi na wumandiŋ.”
43011037	Kɛrɛ binɔndi bohe thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “E ba hɔŋ woŋ baŋ kutɛ pɛthɛ thaaya tha ka hati lamgba woŋ thaŋ? E ndɛ sa nde punku niya ba Lasarɔsi thana tuka?”
43011038	Wuŋ niyɔy Yisɔs na nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ naa ndɛ key ka yoma ka, awa yoma haŋ kuthaŋ kuna nde, e raka humandiŋ ŋatho ka biiyando kɛ ka kuthaŋ koŋ.
43011039	Kɛna ni Yisɔs biya beŋ yamari, na “Gbɔninaŋ raka haŋ.” Kɛrɛ Matha, wo wɛnda Lasarɔsi wo tukɛ woŋ, dome, na “Mariki, ndɛ kɔŋ nda fuŋ huru tuunuwɛ, baa wuŋ sekithe nda hura kanaŋ naa manki miŋ niŋ.”
43011040	Yisɔs dome ka Matha, na “E yaŋ tha hɛ yina tepe ba dɔma na mɛnɛ yi kɔŋ ni lanɛya, yi kɔŋ kutu na sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ?”
43011041	Kɛna gbonino raka haŋ ka yoma haŋ. Naa gbonino huŋ, Yisɔs dethe ka thinthi ka Masaala e dɔma, na “Fandaŋ woŋ, yaŋ thiyi yina maamo, baa yi poniyaŋ yama kuiha.
43011042	Awa yaŋ kɔthɛŋ hɛlɛŋ ba dɔma na yi poniyeŋ yama kuiha timo tima. Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe haŋ haŋ baŋ saathɛ ba biya bi kooye yama kuwaŋ beŋ, haliko bi be ni lanɛya ba dɔma yina ŋindɛ yama.”
43011043	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs tɛpa, ndɛ yele thampa wuŋatɛ ka thinthi e dɔma, na “Lasarɔsi, fuŋa ka yoma haŋ.”
43011044	Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina Lasarɔsi wo tukɛ woŋ fuŋ ka yoma haŋ, thɛnkɔ mɛnɛ ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ niyɔ muyukɔi iŋ nnɛkithɛŋ kihuhɛ, awa e yaha nama haŋ niyɔ huhuitɔi iŋ thika bahuhɛ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Pɛɛkaŋ niŋ, ndɛ be key.”
43011045	Biya bibɔyɛ bi sɛɛ nde iŋ Mariyama beŋ ka yoma haŋ kute ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, awa bindɛ ni Yisɔs na lanɛya.
43011046	Kɛrɛ binɔndi ka bindɛ key ka biFaresini beŋ e bindɛ ka tepe bindɛ ba thanki Yisɔs niya baŋ.
43011047	Naa yuye huŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bindɛ dɔŋɔy makutande ma ka Kaama woŋ e bindɛ bɔha thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Nama miŋ siseke niya gbeeŋ ba hati wowathe woŋ baŋ wo ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba babɔyɛ woŋ?
43011048	Mɛnɛ miŋ sarite niŋ e ndɛ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ niya wali baŋ baŋ, biya beŋ fooma bi kɔŋ niŋ ni lanɛya, awa biRomaŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ thɔɔ ka mathoŋ, awa bi kɔŋ si teeti banka ntuŋ bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ mɛnɛ siya ntuŋ baŋ fooma.”
43011049	Kɛrɛ wɔ wunthe ka bindɛ wo dɔma woŋ na Keyafasi; wo nde Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ ka nina hubɛina, ndɛ na dɔmɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ kɔita bɛy yo bɛy.
43011050	E beŋ kɔita ba dɔma na wu kɔŋ niyɔ hita ba wɔ wunthe ba tuka ba biya beŋ fooma, haliko siya babunthu baŋ ba be tha mɔmina fooma?”
43011051	Ndɛ tha tɛpi haŋ haŋ baŋ ka sɛmbɛ nama, kɛrɛ ba na niyɔy wuŋ ndɛ na nde Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ ka nina hubɛina, wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ nde ni hunabi ba dɔma na Yisɔs boheŋ ba tuka ba siya baŋ fooma.
43011052	Wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba siya baŋ baŋ bathɔ, kɛrɛ iŋ ba kɔminande ka tha banthe fooma mpati bi ka Masaala bi thankɛ nde pankande beŋ.
43011053	Awa there nda ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ bohe dɔŋɔ makutandeŋ ba dɛɛnka na bindɛ niŋ kore.
43011054	There nda nɛnɛ ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Yisɔs tha nda tɔŋinɔkɔ nagberekethe ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ, awa ndɛ pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku thuriye wula baŋ koŋ, e ndɛ ka niyɔ ka mɛti ba dɔma baŋ na Ifiremi. Kɛna key ndɛ niyɔ nda iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ.
43011055	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina malɔkɔ ma nde biYusu beŋ doŋe ba siyuwa na puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti thuriye. Awa biya bibɔyɛ ŋaye nde ka mɛtiŋ bahɛna baŋ mɛnɛ ka dumgbuiŋ baŋ e bindɛ kɔtɔkɔ ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ba ka yenke mɛthinɔkɔ ka Masaala saanuŋ malɔkɔ maŋ ba tɛŋa.
43011056	Awa biya beŋ bohe deethuwa Yisɔs na. Naa key bindɛ thiŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, bindɛ bohe thɔnthiŋinuwande wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Nama siyuwe yi? E yi siyi ba dɔma na ndɛ kɔŋ see ka mathuŋande maŋ?”
43011057	Kɛna ni bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ yamari biya beŋ ba dɔma, na wɔ yo wɔ wo kɔthɛ ka Yisɔs, wundɛ be bindɛ tepe, haliko bi be niŋ bohi.
43012001	Yisɔs key ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani, mɛti ba ka Lasarɔsi wo ŋayaŋ nde wundɛ ka tuka haŋ woŋ, naa pɛyɛ wuŋ ŋalaŋ ŋasɔŋ-kunthe biYusu beŋ ba dɔŋɔ ba siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti.
43012002	Naa tɛŋ wundɛ kɛndɛ, ndɛ yehiniyo muthɔma muhɔnkɔlɛ e Matha niŋ muŋ katiyɛ. Lasarɔsi wunthe na nde ndɛ ka bi dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ beŋ iŋ Yisɔs.
43012003	Kɛna sekithe Mariyama yoki hunthe hu thiŋɛ mayɔ ma thimɔy huru awa e mɛŋ nde hɛlɛŋ niyɔ ma kahɛ mɔlɔŋ. Ndɛ see mɛŋ koŋe Yisɔs na ka ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ, e ndɛ ŋɛŋ puuthuwa iŋ bɔɔyɛ nama bu ka yaha buŋ. Awa kɛna see huruthimɔy hu ka mayɔ maŋ maŋ haŋ gbanthande ka banka baŋ fooma.
43012004	Huna dome wunthe ka bakarandeni nama beŋ wo dɔma Yudasi Isakariyɔti, wo dɛɛnkɛ nde ba niya Yisɔs na gbɔŋ woŋ, na
43012005	“Mbɛ hu tha mayɔ ma thimɔy huru maŋ maŋ baŋ niyo gbɔŋ? Ma kɔŋ nde tɛŋ bɛrɛ ba kuthunkuŋ ku ka wɔ wunthe ka nina haŋ. Kɔbiri wobɛina kɔŋ nde dunkuna ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ.”
43012006	Kɛrɛ atɛpɛ ma hɔkɔŋ nɛŋ, wuŋ ka ba dɔma na ndɛ kiŋ nde iŋ nkinikiniŋ ka thukuma ba bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ ba na wuŋ ndɛ na kɔsɔŋ kɔbiri wo nde bindɛ kutu woŋ, awa e ndɛ bara ba kɔ tuwe kɔbiri woŋ baŋ. Wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ nɛŋ tɛpi.
43012007	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Penekeŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ. Wundɛ kɔsinɛŋ wu iŋ wundɛ wuŋ ba yama mankuwe.
43012008	Beŋ kiŋ iŋ bamɔnɛŋ beŋ timo tima, kɛrɛ beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ yaŋ timo tima.”
43012009	Naa yuye biya bibɔyɛ ba Yisɔs niyɔ ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani, bindɛ key kɛndɛ. Wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba ka kuta Yisɔs na nagbɛti ye, kɛrɛ iŋ ba hɛlɛŋ ka detha Lasarɔsi na wo ŋayaŋ nde Yisɔs ka tuka haŋ woŋ.
43012010	Bɛna ka lɔkɔ babɛina sɛsi na bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ ba dɛɛnka ba kɔra Lasarɔsi na,
43012011	baa biYusu bibɔyɛ pɛyɛŋ bindɛ e bindɛ niya Yisɔs na lanɛya.
43012012	Ka gbɛɛŋ wo yemɛ woŋ, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba sɛɛ nde ka Yɛrusalɛmi ka penkitiye naa bindɛ siyi malɔkɔ ma puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ ka Iyipiti yuye ba Yisɔs kɔ saa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
43012013	Huna thalinke bindɛ rɔnkɔiŋ e bindɛ gbankita Yisɔs na ka gboŋɛŋ ka e bindɛ kɔ yɛla thampa, na “Miŋ gbuŋunuwɛŋ Masaala na. Thaduba tha kiŋ ka wo see ka keŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ koŋ. Ndɛ na Gbaku wo ka Isirɛli woŋ.”
43012014	Kɛna kute Yisɔs mbapu wohatiyɛ e ndɛ niŋ tutɔ, nɔŋ na gbalo nde wuŋ na ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ na ba dɔma, na
43012015	“Baŋ payɔ, bendo biya bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi, mɛti ba ka kusɛri ku dɔma koŋ na Saiyɔŋ. Gbaku ndeŋ woŋ na see woŋ wo tutɔy ka mbapu wohatiyɛ.”
43012016	Kɛrɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ tha wuŋ peŋ hakiyando. Yɔkɔŋ naa see Yisɔs yenthiŋina ka thinthi ka tha ka yiki bamandiŋ, kɛna siyuwe ntiŋ bindɛ thampɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ tha gbalo nde thaŋ ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba wuŋ nɛŋ kɔ niiye ba wundɛ, awa wuna niyɔy wuŋ gbeeŋ ba wundɛ.
43012017	Biya bi nde iŋ Yisɔs beŋ ndɛ si thiyi Lasarɔsi na ba fuŋa ka yoma haŋ e ndɛ niŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ, bindɛ bina niyiyɛ maseri ba bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
43012018	Sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ key ka gboŋɛŋ ka ba niŋ ka gbankita, baa bindɛ yuye nde ka biya bihɛna ba ndɛ niya bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ.
43012019	Huna dome biFaresini beŋ ka wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Miŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy. Dethaŋ hɛ, biya beŋ fooma bi si niŋ yeŋ.”
43012020	Biya binɔndi bi ka siyani bahɛna baŋ kiŋ nde ka mateete ma ka biya bi kaayɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ ka niya kubatho malɔkɔ ma ka mathuŋande mamandiŋ maŋ.
43012021	Beŋ beŋ baŋ bina kaayɛ nde ka Filipi, wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛseda ba ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili. Bindɛ key dɔŋ kɛnama, na “Yaandi hɛmɔŋ, miŋ thimoŋ ba kutuyɔkɔ Yisɔs na.”
43012022	Huna kaaye Filipi ka Anduru ka ba niŋ ka tepe. Naa tepe ndɛ niŋ, bindɛ biye key tepe Yisɔs na.
43012023	Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ ntiŋ ba Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyo yiki wumandiŋ.
43012024	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ thaa hunthe ŋɔti ka kupati koŋ e huŋ tuka e hooya haŋ muka, saanuŋ huŋ ntiŋ kɔ tima. Mɛnɛ huŋ tha tuku, huŋ kɔŋ niyɔ thaa hunthe thuŋ.
43012025	Wɔ yo wɔ wo thimo tindɛ sii nama baŋ wumandiŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo tha tindɛ thimo sii nama baŋ kafaydo, ndɛ kɔsɔŋ bɛŋ ba ka kɔtɔkɔy nɔŋ.
43012026	Wɔ yo wɔ wo thimo ba yama niyiyɛ wali, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be yama yeŋ. Wuna wo yama niyiyɛ wali woŋ nɔŋ niyɔ ka yaŋ niyɔ ka. Awa Fandaŋ woŋ kɔŋ thiyi yiki wo yama niyiyɛ wali woŋ.”
43012027	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba tɛpa, na “Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ, thukuma niŋ haŋ hu kɔŋ yama ni thɔrɔ wumandiŋ. Kɛrɛ nama yaŋ ni? E ba hɔŋ yaŋ be dɔŋ na ‘Fandaŋ woŋ, yaandi niya ba wakathi wo ka nambara baŋ woŋ yama buthurɔ?’ Ade, huna see yaŋ kafaydo haliko yaŋ be niyɔ nambara ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ.
43012028	Yaandi, Fandaŋ woŋ, niya keŋ kukɛnda koŋ yiki.” Kɛna fuŋ thampa maŋaye ka ariana tha tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ thanki nda kuŋ niya yiki wumandiŋ, awa yaŋ kɔŋ ntiŋ hɛlɛŋ kuŋ ni yiki.”
43012029	Naa yuye sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba kɔɔyɛ nde kɛndɛ kuwaŋ baŋ thampa thaŋ thaŋ baŋ, binɔndi ka bindɛ dome, na “Nthanka kina hɔrɛ naŋ naŋ baŋ.” Kɛrɛ binɔndi dome, na “Ade, maleka na gbonkiye niŋ.”
43012030	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Thampa thaŋ thaŋ baŋ tha fuŋ ba yaŋ; thɛŋ fuŋ saathɛ ba kendeŋ.
43012031	Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ na Masaala konsiŋine kafay woŋ, awa ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ na Masaala kanthi bakɛrɛŋ wo ka faido woŋ.
43012032	Kɛrɛ naa yaŋ ŋatino ka thinthi kafaydo, yaŋ kɔŋ yoseke biyamɛti fooma ba saa kiyaŋ.”
43012033	Yisɔs kɔŋ nde tɛpi haŋ haŋ baŋ ba tɔŋina tuka siiya hu bohe ndɛ ba tuka haŋ.
43012034	Kɛna dome sɛthɛ baŋ kɛnama, na “Kɛrɛ miŋ yuye ka Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ ba dɔma na wo dɔma Banikisi woŋ sa tuku hali. Mbu nama hɛlɛŋ yi dɔŋ na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ boheŋ ba ŋatino ka thinthi? Nkaana Hati ka Wɔ woŋ baŋ?”
43012035	Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Beŋ kiŋ hintiŋ iŋ waŋ baŋ ba wuthurɔy. Bɛna, kaandeŋ ka waŋ babɛina naa hintiŋ beŋ iŋ bɛŋ na, wuna sa huntuma haŋ ni ba beŋ pirinka. Wɔ wo kaande ka huntuma haŋ kɔita ka ndɛ key.
43012036	Naa hintiŋ beŋ iŋ waŋ baŋ na, niyaŋ bɛŋ lanɛya wuna beŋ niyɔ biya bi ka waŋ baŋ.” Na thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya nafeu, ndɛ piriŋe biya beŋ nayeŋ.
43012037	Kɛrɛ hali na thanki nde Yisɔs niya bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ka thaaya namɛŋ na, halisa bindɛ tha niŋ ni lanɛya.
43012038	Wuna hu tepe nde banabi woŋ Aisaya haŋ niyɔ nɔndi. Aisaya tepe nde ba dɔma, na “Mariki, mbɛ niyɛ lanɛya huseri hu tepe miŋ haŋ? Ka nkaana Mariki woŋ tɔŋɔŋ sɛmbɛ nama baŋ?”
43012039	Bɛna, bindɛ tha punku niya lanɛya hali, baa Masaala tepe maŋaye ka Aisaya, na
43012040	“Yaŋ thanki nde bindɛ manka thaaya e bindɛ kahinuwa thathukuma, wuna sa bindɛ kutu e bindɛ hakiyando bɛy yo bɛy ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ e bindɛ saa kiyaŋ do haliko yaŋ be bindɛ puy.”
43012041	Aisaya tepe haŋ haŋ baŋ baa ndɛ kute nde yiki ba ka Yisɔs baŋ; wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ nɛŋ tɛpi.
43012042	Hali na niyɔy nde wuŋ na binɔndi ka bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ bi ni nde lanɛya ka Yisɔs. Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha ni na wuŋ kothiyo, baa bi kɔŋ nde payɔ biFaresini beŋ thampo bi kɔŋ nde nɔŋ kantha ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka dina namɛŋ woŋ baŋ.
43012043	Bi yameŋ nde thimo ba gbuŋunuwo iŋ biyamɛti ayaŋ ba Masaala bindɛ gbuŋunuwa.
43012044	Kɛna ŋataŋ Yisɔs ka gbonkiya ba dɔma, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya, yaŋ kutɛ ni ndɛ lanɛya hɔkɔŋ nagbɛti ye, kɛrɛ ndɛ ni hɛlɛŋ lanɛya wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43012045	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yama kutu, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43012046	Yaŋ see kafaydo nɔŋ ka mathɔyande ma ka waŋ, huna wɔ yo wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya, ndɛ sa pɛyɔ ka huntuma haŋ.
43012047	Awa mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ yuye thampa niŋ thaŋ e ndɛ thɛŋ thana yɛrɔkɔ, yaŋ sa niŋ kɔnsɔŋɔŋ, baa yaŋ tha see ka kɔnsiŋina biya bi kafaydo, kɛrɛ yaŋ see ka niya bindɛ kisi.
43012048	Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo tha yama yɛrɔkɔ, e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ thana yɛrɔkɔ thampa niŋ thaŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ kɔnsiŋina. Thampɛŋ tha yaŋ gbonkoy thaŋ thɛna nɔŋ niŋ kɔnsɔŋɔŋ ka malɔkɔ mamankɛ maŋ.
43012049	Nɔndi bɛna yaŋ gbonkoy baŋ, baa yaŋ gbonkiyeta ka sɛmbɛ bakiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ na niyɛ yamari ba yaŋ tɛpa hu yaŋ gbonkoy haŋ.
43012050	Awa yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na yamari nama woŋ kɔŋ sisi sii ba kɔy yo kɔy ka biyamɛti. Wuna biyɛ, hu nunkunɔkɔi nde yama Fandaŋ woŋ ba yaŋ si tɛpa, huna yaŋ gbonkoy haŋ.”
43013001	Wuŋ tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba biYusu beŋ doŋe ba siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs kɔthɛŋ nde nda ba lɔkɔ nama baŋ tɛŋa ba wundɛ peyene kafaydo ba duwa ka Fandama ka. Kɛrɛ ndɛ thimoŋ nde wumandiŋ bikɛnama beŋ kafaydo haaŋ ka mapeye ma ka sii nama baŋ kafaydo.
43013002	Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ dɔŋɔy ka thɔma mahɔnkɔlɛ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ thanki nde nda wuŋ thiya ka thukuma hu ka Yudasi haŋ wo fandama wo dɔma Saimɔŋ Isakariyɔti woŋ ba niya Yisɔs na gbɔŋ ka hadeni nama beŋ.
43013003	Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɔthɛŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na Fandama woŋ ka ariana thanki nde nda niŋ thiya ntha yo ntha ka yɔnkɔ. Awa ndɛ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na ka Masaala ŋaye na wundɛ, awa kɛna hɛlɛŋ ndɛ duu ka kaa.
43013004	Kɛna ŋaye Yisɔs ka bindɛ thɔŋ ka e ndɛ ŋuta yaba nama ba ka thinthi baŋ. Wundɛ deŋe bɛŋ kuwaŋ e ndɛ pitha thika bayete.
43013005	Ndɛ sase mandi ka ntha, e ndɛ bɔha looka ŋathaki ŋa ka bakarandeni nama beŋ ŋaŋ e ŋɛŋ kɔ puuthuwa iŋ thika ba pithe ndɛ baŋ.
43013006	Naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka Saimɔŋ Pita, ndɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs na, na “Mariki, e yi kiŋ ba looka ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ?”
43013007	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yi sa hɛ metho hu yaŋ wuŋ niye, kɛrɛ yi kɔŋ wuŋ manke nɔŋ metho.”
43013008	Kɛrɛ Pita dome kɛnama, na “Ba yama looki ŋathaki.” Yisɔs dɔma kɛnama, na “Mɛnɛ yaŋ sa looki ŋathaki nda ŋaŋ, yi sa nda niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ.”
43013009	Kɛna dome Pita, na “Mariki, ba yama looki ŋathaki ŋɛŋ ŋathɔ, kɛrɛ looka hɛlɛŋ thɛnkɔ niŋ thaŋ mɛnɛ yaha niŋ haŋ.”
43013010	Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo thankɛ biye, ndɛ thimota nda ba biye. Yɔkɔŋ ba nda looka ŋathaki nagbɛti. Bendo mɛthɛ fooma bina beŋ, yɔkɔŋ wɔ wunthe na ba mɛthi ka beŋ.”
43013011	Yisɔs kɔthɛŋ nda nagberekethe wo ba niŋ niya gbɔŋ woŋ; wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na “Beŋ fooma kutɛ bimɛthɛ.”
43013012	Naa thanki Yisɔs looka ŋathaki namɛŋ ŋaŋ, ndɛ duu hɛlɛŋ ka thɔɔ yaba nama baŋ e ndɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka doŋe hɛ ndɛ ka thebulu woŋ ka. Ndɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “E beŋ kɔthɛŋ wu ni yaŋ bena wuŋ?
43013013	Beŋ kɔŋ yama thiyi na karimɔkɔ iŋ Mariki. Hunɔndi huna yaathi, baa nɛna yaŋ gbeeŋ.
43013014	Mɛnɛ yaŋ, yando Mariki iŋ karimɔkɔ ndeŋ woŋ looki ŋathaki ndeŋ ŋaŋ, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na beŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ beŋ boheŋ ba lookuwande ŋathaki.
43013015	Mathɔyande ma beŋ ba yema mɛna dunkune yaŋ bena maŋ, ba beŋ niya wu thanki yaŋ bena niya wuŋ.
43013016	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ: bawali woŋ yameta ba mariki nama woŋ. Awa baseri o ka wo yamɛ ba wo ŋindɛ niŋ woŋ.
43013017	Ka tete beŋ thanki kɔthɔ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma. Mɛnɛ beŋ ni bɛŋ, beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
43013018	“Yaŋ tepeta haŋ haŋ baŋ ba beŋ fooma yo. Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ bi thanki yaŋ yɛtha beŋ. Kɛrɛ yɔkɔŋ magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ niyɔy nɔndi ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Wɔ wo thɔŋ yaŋ nthɔŋ ka tha banthe woŋ, wɔ bɛina na ŋaye ba yama dekiya.’
43013019	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena yenke tepe haŋ haŋ baŋ saanuŋ wuŋ ba niyɔ. Naa wuŋ niyɔy, beŋ be ni lanɛya ba dɔma na yama wɔ kuhantheŋ woŋ.
43013020	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ wɔ o wɔ wo yaŋ ŋindi woŋ, wɔ bɛina yɛrɔkɔy yama hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy yama, wɔ bɛina yɛrɔkɔy wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.”
43013021	Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya nafeu, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛna tepe ndɛ bindɛ nagberekethe ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ yama ni gbɔŋ ka hadeni niŋ beŋ.”
43013022	Kɛna bohe bakarandeni beŋ dethande, baa wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ kɔnthɔhili wumandiŋ ba wo Yisɔs siseke dɔma ka bindɛ.
43013023	Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bakarandeŋ wo yame nde Yisɔs thimo woŋ doŋeŋ Yisɔs na kuwaŋ e ndɛ niŋ tɔpita wuyɔhɔy.
43013024	Huna dome Saimɔŋ Pita ka wo tɔpitɛ Yisɔs na woŋ, na “Thɔnthiŋina hɛ niŋ, ba nkaa ma gbonkoy.”
43013025	Kɛna yame bakarandeŋ woŋ thuriye Yisɔs na wuyɔhɔy e ndɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋina, na “Mariki, nkaana yi dɔŋ?”
43013026	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Wo nthɔŋ yaŋ dunkune kutoŋ kusakɔy ku yaŋ yɔthɔŋɔti ka buyaŋ buŋ koŋ woŋ, ndɛ na.” Kɛna yothiŋite Yisɔs kutoŋ kusakɔy koŋ ka buyaŋ buŋ e ndɛ kuŋ dunkune Yudasi na, hati ka Saimɔŋ Isakariyɔti woŋ.
43013027	Naa bohe nthɔŋ Yudasi kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina Sithani thɔɔyɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ. Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka Yudasi, na “Kaa nda ka niya ba yi ba niya baŋ yako-yako.”
43013028	Wɔ yo wɔ ka bindɛ bi dɔŋɔy iŋ Yisɔs ka thebulu woŋ beŋ tha metho hu tepe Yisɔs ka Yudasi haŋ.
43013029	Binɔndi ka bakarandeni beŋ siyi ba dɔma na ba na niyɔy wuŋ Yudasi na kɔsɔŋ kɔbiri wo bindɛ kutu woŋ, wuna biyɛ Yisɔs kɔŋ niŋ tepe ba ndɛ be ka boy mu thimo bindɛ ba thɔma humandiŋ haŋ, maa ba ka dunkune bamɔnɛŋ beŋ kɔbiri.
43013030	Yudasi bohe kutoŋ koŋ e ndɛ kɔ kaa. Huyɛ bɛna nde ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
43013031	Naa key nthɔŋ Yudasi, Yisɔs dome ka bakarandeni bihɛna beŋ, na “Lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ ntiŋ ba yiki ba ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ toŋineke baŋ. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ na ntiŋ yiki ba ka Masaala baŋ toŋineke maŋaye ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.
43013032	Awa naa yiki ba ka Masaala baŋ tɔŋinɔkɔy maŋaye ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, bɛna Masaala gbeeŋ ndɛ kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ yiki ba ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ baŋ. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ wuŋ ni ka wuthurɔy wuŋ baŋ.
43013033	Mpatiŋ beŋ, wuŋ pɛyɛ wuthurɔy yaŋ ba niyɔ iŋ beŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ dethi ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe hu tepe nde yaŋ bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ haŋ, na ‘Beŋ sa punku kaa ka yaŋ key ka.’
43013034	Ka tete yaŋ kɔŋ bena dunkune siraŋ baŋama: Thimiyandeŋ. Nɔŋ na thimo nthɔŋ yaŋ bena na, nɛna beŋ ba thimiyande.
43013035	Mɛnɛ beŋ thimiyande, wɔ yo wɔ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na bakarandeni niŋ bina beŋ.”
43013036	Saimɔŋ Pita thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mariki, kama yi key?” Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Yi sa punku yama yema ka yaŋ key ka. Kɛrɛ yi kɔŋ yama manke yema kɛndɛ.”
43013037	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Pita, na “Mariki, mbɛ hu sa yaŋ yina punku yeme tete? Yando kɔsinɔkɔy nda ba tuka ba yi.”
43013038	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “E yi kɔsinɔkɔy hunɔndi yaathi ba ka tuka ba yaŋ? Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ: saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira, yi kɔŋ tɛpi dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔita yama.”
43014001	Yisɔs tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Baŋ ni ba thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ niya yaagba. Niyaŋ Masaala na lanɛya, awa e beŋ hɛlɛŋ yama niya lanɛya.
43014002	Makonkoiŋ mabɔyɛ ma kiŋ ka banka ka Fandaŋ ka. Awa yaŋ kɔŋ key ba ka kɔsinɔkɔ ka tha ba beŋ. Yaŋ sa nde nɛŋ bena tepe mɛnɛ nɛŋ kutɛ huŋ.
43014003	Naa yaŋ thanki ka kɔsinɔkɔ ka tha ba beŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ bena seeyɛ ba niyɔ iŋ yaŋ. Wuna beŋ niyɔ ka yaŋ niyɔ.
43014004	Beŋ kɔthɛŋ gboŋa baŋ nagberekethe ba beŋ yeŋ baŋ ba kaa kɛndɛ.”
43014005	Thɔmɔsi thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mariki, miŋ siseketa kɔthɔ ka yi key gbeeŋ; bɛna nama miŋ kothiye gboŋa baŋ ba kɛndɛ kaa?”
43014006	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yama gboŋa baŋ, nɔndi baŋ, mɛnɛ sii baŋ. Wɔ sa key ka Fandaŋ ka yɔkɔŋ afuŋe kiyaŋ.
43014007	Ka tete beŋ thanki yama kɔthɔ, awa beŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ kɔthɔ Fandaŋ na. Maŋaye nda hɛ beŋ kɔthɛ niŋ, awa beŋ thanki nda niŋ kutuyɔkɔ.”
43014008	Filipi dome kɛnama, na “Mariki, toŋine mina Fanda na wuna miŋ thɛbɛŋ thathukuma.”
43014009	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi e dɔma, na “Filipi, e ti thɔkɔti nɔŋ yaŋ niyɔ iŋ beŋ te haaŋ hɛ beŋ kɔita yama? Wɔ yo wɔ wo kutɛ yama, ndɛ thanki kuta Fandaŋ na. Nama hɛlɛŋ yi tɛpi ba dɔma, na ‘Toŋine mina Fanda na’?
43014010	Filipi, e yi niyeta lanɛya ba dɔma na Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ yaŋ bɔhande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe? Thampɛŋ tha tepe yaŋ bena thaŋ tha ŋaye kiyaŋ; Fandaŋ wo bɔhande iŋ yaŋ woŋ, ndɛ na niyɛ wali nama baŋ.
43014011	Niyaŋ yama lanɛya ba na tepe yaŋ ba dɔma na Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ yaŋ bɔhande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, niyaŋ nda lanɛya baa beŋ kute bɛyiniŋ ba thanki yaŋ niya baŋ.
43014012	Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ: wɔ yo wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya, ndɛ kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ ba ni yaŋ baŋ. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ hintiŋ nthɔŋ yaŋ niya bɛyiniŋ bayamɛ, baa yaŋ kɔŋ key ka Fandaŋ ka.
43014013	Awa yaŋ kɔŋ bena niyiyɛ bɛy yo bɛy ba beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ kaŋ hina yama keŋ, wuna yiki ba ka Fandaŋ woŋ baŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ maŋaye kiyaŋ, Hati nama woŋ.
43014014	Mɛnɛ beŋ hiŋ keŋ niŋ koŋ ka thɔnthiŋina yama ba bɛy yo bɛy, yaŋ kɔŋ bena bɛŋ niyiyɛ.
43014015	“Mɛnɛ beŋ athimo yama, beŋ kɔŋ mɛy yamariŋ niŋ baŋ.
43014016	Yaŋ kɔŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Fandaŋ na, awa ndɛ kɔŋ bena dunkune Bamase wohɛna wo si niyɔ iŋ beŋ kɔy yo kɔy.
43014017	Bamase wobɛina na Yina wo si tɔŋɔŋ nɔndi baŋ ba Masaala. Biya bi kafaydo beŋ sa kiŋ punku yɛrɔkɔ ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ, baa bindɛ sa niŋ punku kuta maa ba niŋ kɔthɔ. Kɛrɛ beŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ, baa ndɛ niyɔy iŋ beŋ, awa ndɛ kiŋ kaake kendeŋ.
43014018	“Bɛna naa yaŋ key, beŋ sa pɛyɔ beŋ bintheŋ; yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ duu ka saa kendeŋ do.
43014019	Wuŋ pɛyɛ wuyetenaŋ biya bi kafaydo beŋ sa nɔŋ nda yama kutu, kɛrɛ beŋ kɔŋ yama kutu. Baa yaŋ kiŋ iŋ sii, beŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ iŋ sii.
43014020	Naa lɔkɔ babɛina tɛŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yaŋ abɔhande iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ, awa e beŋ bɔhande iŋ yaŋ, nɔŋ na bɔhande nthɔŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ na.
43014021	“Wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy yamariŋ niŋ baŋ, awa e ndɛ bɛŋ putuyɔ, wɔ bɛina na thimo yama woŋ. Fandaŋ woŋ kɔŋ thimo wɔ yo wɔ wo yama thimo, awa yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛnɛ yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ thimo e yaŋ niŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ.”
43014022	Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yudasi wohɛna, Yudasi Isakariyɔti kutɛ ye, na “Mariki, nama yi toŋineke mina gbeeŋ, kɛrɛ wuŋ ka ka biya bi kafaydo beŋ?”
43014023	Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo thimo yama, ndɛ kɔŋ yɛrɔkɔ mathanani niŋ maŋ. Fandaŋ woŋ kɔŋ thimo wɔ bɛina, awa Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ yaŋ miŋ kɔŋ see kɛnama e miŋ si niyɔ iŋ wundɛ.
43014024	Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yama thimo, ndɛ sa yɛrɔkɔ mathanani niŋ maŋ. Awa mathanani ma thanki beŋ yuyɛ maŋ mathanani makiyaŋ kutɛ. Mɛŋ see maŋaye ka Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43014025	“Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma thanki na yaŋ bena tepe naa hintiŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ.
43014026	Bamase wo dɔma Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, wo Fandaŋ woŋ ŋindi ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ bena si thanani bɛyiniŋ fooma awa e ndɛ niya ba beŋ siyuwa bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki yaŋ bena tepe baŋ.
43014027	“Mathɛbɛ mɛna peye yaŋ bena; mathɛbɛ niŋ maŋ siiya mɛna dunkune yaŋ bena. Yaŋ sa dunkuŋ mathɛbɛ nɔŋ na kafay woŋ dunkune siiya na ye. Baŋ ni thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ yaagba; baŋ payɔ.
43014028	Beŋ thanki yuyɛ nagberekethe yaŋ si bena tepe, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ key napooŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ see kendeŋ do.’ Mɛnɛ beŋ athimo nde yama, beŋ kɔŋ nde yehitɔkɔ ba na yaŋ see ka kaa ka Fandaŋ ka; baa ndɛ yameŋ ba yaŋ kaye-kaye.
43014029	Yaŋ yenke bena tepe bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ saanuŋ bɛŋ ba niyɔ. Huna naa bɛŋ niyɔy, beŋ be ni lanɛya.
43014030	Yaŋ sa nda gbonkoy iŋ beŋ wunambɛ, baa bakɛrɛŋ wo kafaydo woŋ kooyeŋ gboŋa ba saa. Ndɛ sa yama punku tuta sɛmbɛ,
43014031	kɛrɛ yɔkɔŋ biya bi kafaydo beŋ kɔthɛ ba dɔma na yaŋ athimo Fandaŋ na; awa wuna biyɛ yaŋ niya bɛyiniŋ fooma ba ni Fandaŋ woŋ yama yamari baŋ. “Saaŋ, miŋ beŋ ŋaye dondo baŋ.”
43015001	Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba tɛpa, na “Yama kuyeŋ kugbeeŋ ku tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy muŋ, awa Fandaŋ woŋ na bathuu woŋ.
43015002	Ndɛ kɔŋ thalanki bathala yo bathala wo thahi kiyaŋ wo sa tiŋ. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ thɛmɛni kufɛŋ ndo kufɛŋ kunɛnɔy ku ka bathala yo bathala wo tiŋ, wuna ndɛ niyɔ natharaŋ e ndɛ punka tima mutiŋ mubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ.
43015003	Mathanani ma dunkune yaŋ bena maŋ thanki bena mɛthina natharaŋ.
43015004	Kaaŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka kahita kiyaŋ haŋ, awa yaŋ kɔŋ key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kendeŋ. Bathala woŋ sa punku tima ka yɛthɛ nama; naa yi kute ndɛ si tiŋ yɔkɔŋ ndɛ kahite ka kuyeŋ koŋ. Nɛna hɛlɛŋ beŋ, beŋ sa punku sisa mutiŋ yɔkɔŋ beŋ kahite kiyaŋ.
43015005	“Yama kuyeŋ koŋ, awa bena bathalɛŋ beŋ. Wɔ yo wɔ wo key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kiyaŋ, awa e yaŋ kahita kɛnama, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ tiŋ mutiŋ mubɔyɛ. Beŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy mahɛŋ ma kiyaŋ.
43015006	Wɔ wo sa key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kiyaŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kathiŋa kiyaŋ nɔŋ na nthɔŋ bathala woŋ thoŋa na e ndɛ thitha; bathalɛŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ si thinkuwo fooma e bindɛ thiyo ka buu, ka bindɛ tooke ka.
43015007	Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kiyaŋ, awa e thampa niŋ thaŋ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kendeŋ, thɔnthiŋinaŋ ba bɛy yo bɛy ba thimo beŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ bɛŋ niyiya.
43015008	Mutiŋ mubɔyɛ mu beŋ tiŋ muŋ mu kɔŋ ni ba Fandaŋ wuŋ kuta yiki; awa ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ na hɛlɛŋ wuŋ kothiyo ba dɔma na beŋ niyɔy bakarandeni bikiyaŋ.
43015009	Yaŋ athimo bena nɔŋ na thimo nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ na; bɛna kaaŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kahita kiyaŋ wuna yaŋ bena thimo.
43015010	Mɛnɛ beŋ putiyɔy yamariŋ niŋ beŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba bena thimo, nɔŋ na putiyɔy nthɔŋ yaŋ yamariŋ bi ka Fandaŋ beŋ na e ndɛ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy ka thimo yama.
43015011	“Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma bɛna thanki yaŋ bena tepe haliko mayehitɔkɔ niŋ maŋ ma be niyɔ iŋ beŋ, awa wuna beŋ yehitɔkɔ wumandiŋ.
43015012	Yamari niŋ woŋ ndɛ na woŋ baŋ: Thimiyandeŋ nɔŋ na thimo nthɔŋ yaŋ bena na.
43015013	Mathimo yo ka nda ma wɔmɛti tɔŋɔŋ ba ntɔ nama daŋandeŋ ndɛ ba dunkuna sii nama baŋ ba binyathikiŋ nama beŋ.
43015014	Bena binyathikiŋ bikiyaŋ mɛnɛ beŋ ni ba ni yaŋ bena yamari baŋ ba niya.
43015015	Yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda bena thiyi bawaliŋ bikiyaŋ, baa bawali woŋ sa kɔthɔ bɛyiniŋ fooma ba mariki nama woŋ ni. Yaŋ kɔŋ nda bena thiyi binyathikiŋ bikiyaŋ, baa yaŋ thanki bena tepe bɛyiniŋ fooma ba yuye yaŋ maŋaye ka Fandaŋ woŋ.
43015016	Beŋ kutɛ yɛthɛ yama yo; yama yɛthɛ bena thɔɔkɔ e yaŋ bena ŋinda ba beŋ kaa e beŋ ka tima mutiŋ mubɔyɛ mu niyɔ ba wunambɛ. Wuna Fandaŋ woŋ bena dunkune ntha yo ntha ki beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ naa beŋ hiŋ keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ.
43015017	Haŋ haŋ baŋ huna yaŋ bena ni yamari: Thimiyandeŋ.
43015018	“Naa biyamɛti bi kafaydo beŋ thambo bena, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na yama yenke bindɛ thambo saanuŋ bindɛ ntiŋ bena kɔ thambo.
43015019	Mɛnɛ beŋ kiŋ nde biya bi ba kafay woŋ, biyamɛti bi kafay woŋ bi kɔŋ nde bena thimo nɔŋ biya bikɛnamɛŋ. Kɛrɛ yaŋ thanki bena yɛtha maŋaye ka faido, awa beŋ ka nda ba kafay woŋ; wuna biyɛ biya bi ka faido beŋ bi kɔŋ bena thambo.
43015020	Siyuwaŋ hu tepe nde yaŋ bena haŋ: na ‘Bawali woŋ yameta ba mariki nama woŋ.’ Mɛnɛ bindɛ ni yama thɔrɔ, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ bena ni thɔrɔ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ. Mɛnɛ bindɛ nde yɛrɔkɔ mathanani niŋ maŋ, bi kɔŋ yɛrɔkɔ makendeŋ maŋ.
43015021	Kɛrɛ bi kɔŋ bena ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma baa bikiyaŋ bina beŋ; bi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ baa bindɛ tha kɔthɔ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
43015022	Mɛnɛ yaŋ tha nde see e yaŋ bindɛ si gbonkiye, bindɛ sa nde niyɔ iŋ mathonko ma ka hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ ka tete nda bindɛ sa punku tɛpa ba dɔma, na ‘Wu ni miŋ wuŋ miŋ kɔita ba dɔma na hakɛ bɛna.’
43015023	Wɔ yo wɔ wo thambo yama, ndɛ thambo Fandaŋ na.
43015024	Bindɛ sa nde niyɔ iŋ mathonko ma ka hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ mɛnɛ yaŋ tha nde ni bɛyiniŋ ba sa wɔmɛti punku niya ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ; kɛrɛ ka tete bindɛ kutuyɔkɔy bɛyiniŋ ba ni yaŋ baŋ nagberekethe awa bindɛ thambo yama iŋ Fandaŋ woŋ.
43015025	Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy haliko ba thiŋina magbali ma gbalo ka Siraŋ namɛŋ baŋ ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Bindɛ thambo yama wu ka iŋ saabu.’
43015026	“Bamase woŋ kɔŋ see wo Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ. Ndɛ na tɔŋɔŋ nɔndi baŋ ba Masaala, awa ndɛ kɔŋ see maŋaye ka Fandaŋ woŋ ka. Yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ ŋindi kendeŋ do maŋaye ka Fandaŋ ka, awa ndɛ kɔŋ si gbonkoy ba yaŋ.
43015027	Awa beŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ, beŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy ba yaŋ, baa beŋ kiŋ nɔŋ iŋ yaŋ kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ.
43016001	“Yaŋ thanki bena tepe bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma haliko beŋ be tha teeti lanɛya bakendeŋ baŋ.
43016002	Bi kɔŋ bena kanthi ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ, awa lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see ba wo bena kɔɔri woŋ siyuwe ba dɔma na wali bayɔhɔy bɛna wundɛ ni ba Masaala.
43016003	Biya bi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ baa bindɛ tha kɔthɔ Fandaŋ na maa yaŋ.
